dialogue: I know this is going to sound unbelievably selfish, but, were you planning on bringing up the whole baby/lesbian thing? Because I think it might take some of the heat off me.

dialogue: What that Rachel did to her life.... We ran into her parents at the club, they were not playing very well.

dialogue: Look, there are people like Ross who need to shoot for the stars, with his museum, and his papers getting published. Other people are satisfied with staying where they are- I'm telling you, these are the people who never get cancer.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: ...And I read about these women trying to have it all, and I thank God 'Our Little Harmonica' doesn't seem to have that problem.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay! Okay.  Look, I, uh- I realise you guys have been wondering what exactly happened between Carol and me, and, so, well, here's the deal. Carol's a lesbian. She's living with a woman named Susan. She's pregnant with my child, and she and Susan are going to raise the baby.

Chances are he's going to be this, this broken shell of a man, you know, so you should try not to look too terrific, I know it'll be hard. Or, you know, uh, hey!, I'll go down there, and I'll give Barry back his ring, and you can go with Carol and Susan to the OB/GYN...

Oh, oh, and Mind, you know, if-if everything works out, and you guys end up getting married and having kids- and everything- I just hope they have his old hairline and your old nose.   Okay, I know it was a cheap shot, but I feel so much better now.

dialogue: Uh, Ross.

dialogue: "So how does it feel knowing you are about to die?"

dialogue: I mean, why should I let them meet him? I mean, I bring a guy home, and within five minutes they're all over him. I mean, they're like- coyotes, picking off the weak members of the herd.

dialogue: Listen. As someone who's seen more than her fair share of bad beef, I'll tell you

name: monica
dialogue: I know. I just wish that once, I'd bring a guy home that they actually liked.

name: paula
dialogue: Well, you do realise the odds of that happening are a little slimmer if they never get to meet the guy..

name: joey
dialogue: Let it go, Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, well, you didn't know Chi Chi.

name: monica
dialogue: Do you all promise?

name: all
dialogue: Yeah! We promise! We'll be good!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler? Do you promise to be good?

name: joey
dialogue: You can come in, but your filter-tipped little buddy has to stay outside!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, Pheebs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: 'Dear Ms. Buffay. Thank you for calling attention to our error. We have credited your account with five hundred dollars. We're sorry for the inconvenience, and hope you'll accept this-  -football phone as our free gift.' Do you believe this?! Now I have a thousand dollars, and a football phone!

name: rachel
dialogue: What bank is this?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey. It's him.  Who is it?

name: alan
dialogue: It's Alan.

name: joey
dialogue: Chandler! He's here!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, please be good, please. Just remember how much you all like me.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi. Alan, this is everybody. Everybody, this is Alan.

name: alan
dialogue: Hi.

name: all
dialogue: Hi, Alan.

name: alan
dialogue: I've heard schho much about all you guyschh!

name: monica
dialogue: Thanks. I'll call you tomorrow.  Okay. Okay, let's let the Alan-bashing begin. Who's going to take the first shot, hmm?

name: monica
dialogue: C'mon!

name: ross
dialogue: ...I'll go. Let's start with the way he kept picking at- no, I'm sorry, I can't do this, can't do this. We loved him.

name: all
dialogue: Loved him! Yeah! He's great!

name: monica
dialogue: Wait a minute! We're talking about someone that I'm going out with?

name: all
dialogue: Yeah!

name: rachel
dialogue: And did you notice...?

name: ross chandler joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: Know what was great? The way his smile was kind of crooked.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes, yes! Like the man in the shoe!

name: ross
dialogue: ...What shoe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: From the nursery rhyme. 'There was a crooked man, Who had a crooked smile, Who lived in a shoe, For a... while...'

name: ross
dialogue: ...So I think Alan will become the yardstick against which all future boyfriends will be measured.

name: rachel
dialogue: What future boyfriends? No no, I th- I think this could be, you know, it.

name: monica
dialogue: Really!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, yeah. I'd marry him just for his David Hasselhof impression alone. You know I'm going to be doing that at parties, right?

name: ross
dialogue: You know what I like most about him, though?

name: all
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: The way he makes me feel about myself.

name: all
dialogue: Yeah...

name: monica
dialogue: Hi.. how was the game?

name: ross
dialogue: Well..

name: all
dialogue: WE WON!! Thank you! Yes!

name: monica
dialogue: Fantastic! I have one question

name: joey
dialogue: Alan.

name: ross
dialogue: He was unbelievable. He was like that-that-that Bugs Bunny cartoon where Bugs is playing all the positions, right, but instead of Bugs it was first base-Alan, second base-Alan, third base-...

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean, it-it was like, it was like he made us into a team.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yep, we sure showed those Hassidic jewellers a thing or two about softball..

name: monica
dialogue: Can I ask you guys a question? D'you ever think that Alan is maybe.. sometimes..

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: ..I don't know, a little too Alan?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, no. that is impossible. You can never be too Alan.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, it's his, uh, innate Alan-ness that-that-that we adore.

name: chandler
dialogue: I personally could have a gallon of Alan.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, Lizzie.

name: lizzie
dialogue: Hey, Weird Girl.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I brought you alphabet soup.

name: lizzie
dialogue: Did you pick out the vowels?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes. But I left in the Ys. Because, you know, "sometimes y". Uh, I also have something else for you.

name: lizzie
dialogue: Saltines?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, but would you like a thousand dollars and a football phone?

name: lizzie
dialogue: What?  Oh my God, there's really money in here.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know.

name: lizzie
dialogue: Weird Girl, what are you doing?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I want you to have it. I don't want it.

name: lizzie
dialogue: No, no, I ha-I have to give you something.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, that is fine, no.

name: lizzie
dialogue: Would you like my tin-foil hat?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No. Because you need that. No, it's okay, thanks.

name: lizzie
dialogue: Please, let me do something.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, alright, you buy me a soda, and then we're even. Okay?

name: lizzie
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: lizzie
dialogue: Keep the change.  Sure you don't want to pretzel?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I'm fine.

name: lizzie
dialogue: See you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Huh!

name: ross
dialogue: A thumb?!

name: all
dialogue: Ew!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know! I know, I opened it up and there it was, just floating in there, like this tiny little hitch-hiker!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, maybe it's a contest, you know? Like, collect all five?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Does, um, anyone want to see?

name: all
dialogue: Nook!

name: all
dialogue: Oh, hey, don't do that! Cut it out!

name: rachel
dialogue: It's worse than the thumb!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, this is so unfair!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, why is it unfair?

name: chandler
dialogue: So I have a flaw! Big deal! Like Joey's constant knuckle-cracking isn't annoying? And Ross, with his over-pronouncing every single word? And Monica, with that snort when she laughs? I mean, what the hell is that thing? ...I accept all those flaws, why can't you accept me for this?

name: joey
dialogue: ...Does the knuckle-cracking bother everybody?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I-I could live without it.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, is it, like, a little annoying, or is it like when Phoebe chews her hair?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, now, don't listen to him, Pheebs, I think it's endearing.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh,  "you do, do you"?

name: ross
dialogue: You know, there's nothing wrong with speaking correctly.

name: rachel
dialogue: "Indeed there isn't"... I should really get back to work.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, because otherwise someone might get what they actually ordered.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh-ho-hoooh. The hair comes out, and the gloves come on.

name: monica
dialogue: Did you ever go out with a guy your friends all really like?

name: paula
dialogue: No.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.. Well, I'm going out with a guy my friends all really like.

name: paula
dialogue: Wait wait.. we talking about the coyotes here? All right, a cow got through!

name: monica
dialogue: Can you believe it? ...You know what? I just don't feel the thing. I mean, they feel the thing, I don't feel the thing.

name: paula
dialogue: Honey.. you should always feel the thing. Listen, if that is how you feel about the guy, Monica, dump him!

name: monica
dialogue: I know.. it's going to be really hard.

name: paula
dialogue: Well, he's a big boy, he'll get over it.

name: monica
dialogue: No, he'll be fine. It's the other five I'm worried about.

name: joey
dialogue: Do you have any respect for your body?

name: ross
dialogue: Don't you realise what you are-you are doing to yourself?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you know, I have had it with you guys and your cancer and your emphysema and your heart disease. The bottom line is, smoking is cool, and you know it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Chandler? It's Alan, he wants to speak to you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really? He does?  Hey, buddy, what's up! Oh, she told you about that, huh. Well, yeah, I have one now and then. Well, yeah, now. Well, it's not that big- ..well, that is true,.. Gee, you know, no-one- no-one's ever put it like that before. Well, okay, thanks!

name: rachel
dialogue: God, he's good.

name: ross
dialogue: If only he were a woman.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh, Lambchop. How old is that sock? If I had a sock on my hand for thirty years it'd be talking too.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay. I think it's time to change somebody's nicotine patch.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey. Where's Joey?

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey ate my last stick of gum, so I killed him. Do you think that was wrong?

name: rachel
dialogue: I think he's across the hall.

name: monica
dialogue: Thanks.

name: ross
dialogue: There you go.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh, I'm alive with pleasure now.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey Pheebs, you going to have the rest of that Pop-Tart?.. Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Does anyone want the rest of this Pop-Tart?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, I might!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sorry. ..You know, those stupid soda people gave me seven thousand dollars for the thumb.

name: all
dialogue: you are kidding. Oh my God.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And on my way over here, I stepped in gum. ...What is up with the universe?!

name: joey
dialogue: What's going on?

name: monica
dialogue: Nothing. I just think it's nice when we're all here together.

name: joey
dialogue: Even nicer when everyone gets to wear their underwear..

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh, Joey..

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, God!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay..

name: all
dialogue: Oh! That was Lambchop!

name: monica
dialogue: Please, guys, we have to talk.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait, wait, I'm getting a Deja vu...no, I'm not.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, we have to talk.

name: phoebe
dialogue: There it is!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. It's-it's about Alan. There's something that you should know. I mean, there's really no easy way to say this.. uh.. I've decided to break up with Alan.

name: ross
dialogue: Is there somebody else?

name: monica
dialogue: No, no no no no.. it's just.. things change. People change.

name: rachel
dialogue: We didn't change..

name: joey
dialogue: So that is it? It's over? Just like that?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know.. you let your guard down, you start to really care about someone, and I just- I-

name: monica
dialogue: Look, I- I could go on pretending-

name: joey
dialogue: Okay!

name: monica
dialogue: -but that wouldn't be fair to me, it wouldn't be fair to Alan- It wouldn't be fair to you!

name: ross
dialogue: Who-who wants fair? You know, I just want things back. You know, the way they were.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm sorry..

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, she's sorry! I feel better!

name: rachel
dialogue: I just can't believe this! I mean, with the holidays coming up- I wanted him to meet my family-

name: monica
dialogue: I'll meet someone else. There'll be other Alans.

name: all
dialogue: Oh, yeah! Right!

name: monica
dialogue: Are you guys going to be okay?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey hey, we'll be fine. We're just going to need a little time.

name: monica
dialogue: I understand.

name: alan
dialogue: Wow.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm, I'm really sorry.

name: alan
dialogue: Yeah, I'm sorry too. But, I got to tell you, I am a little relieved.

name: monica
dialogue: Relieved?

name: alan
dialogue: Yeah, well, I had a great time with you.. I just can't stand your friends.

name: rachel
dialogue: Remember when we went to Central Park and rented boats?.. That was fun.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. He could row like a Viking.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi.

name: all
dialogue: Mm.

name: ross
dialogue: So how'd it go?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, you know..

name: phoebe
dialogue: Did he mention us?

name: monica
dialogue: He said he's really going to miss you guys.

name: ross
dialogue: You had a rough day, huh.. come here.

name: chandler
dialogue: ...that is it. I'm getting cigarettes.

name: all
dialogue: No no no!

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't care, I don't care! Game's over! I'm weak! I've got to smoke! I've got to have the smoke!

name: phoebe
dialogue: If you never smoke again I'll give you seven thousand dollars!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, alright.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright. Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, okay. If I were omnipotent for a day, I would want, um, world peace, no more hunger, good things for the rain-forest...And bigger boobs!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, see.. you took mine. Chandler, what about you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, if I were omnipotent for a day, I'd.. make myself omnipotent forever.

name: rachel
dialogue: See, there's always one guy.  "If I had a wish, I'd wish for three more wishes."

name: all
dialogue: Hey Joey. Hi. Hey, buddy.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, Joey, what would you do if you were omnipotent?

name: joey
dialogue: Probably kill myself!

name: monica
dialogue: ..Excuse me?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, if Little Joey's dead, then I got no reason to live!

name: ross
dialogue: Joey, uh- OMnipotent.

name: joey
dialogue: You are? Ross, I'm sorry..

name: monica
dialogue: How does she do that?

name: ross
dialogue: I cannot sleep in a public place.

name: monica
dialogue: Would you look at her? She is so peaceful.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! What what what! ...Hi.

name: ross
dialogue: It's okay, you know, you just nodded off again.

name: monica
dialogue: What's going on with you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I got no sleep last night!

name: ross
dialogue: Why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: My grandmother has this new boyfriend, and they're both kind of insecure in bed. Oh, and deaf. So they're constantly, like, having to reassure each other that they're having a good time. You have no idea how loud they are!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, if you want, you can stay with Rachel and me tonight.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thanks.

name: joey
dialogue: ...Ninety-five, ninety-six, ninety-seven. See, I told you! Less than a hundred steps from our place to here.

name: chandler
dialogue: You got way too much free time.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Here's the birthday boy! Ross, check it out

name: chandler
dialogue: Happy birthday, pal!

name: joey
dialogue: We love you, man.

name: ross
dialogue: Funny, my birthday was seven months ago.

name: joey
dialogue: So?

name: ross
dialogue: So, I'm guessing you had an extra ticket and couldn't decide which one of you got to bring a date?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, aren't we Mr. "The glass is half empty."

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God, oh- is today the twentieth, October twentieth?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, I was hoping you wouldn't remember.

name: ross
dialogue: oh.

name: joey
dialogue: What's wrong with the twentieth?

name: chandler
dialogue: Eleven days before Halloween.. all the good costumes are gone?

name: ross
dialogue: Today's the day Carol and I first.. consummated our physical relationship.  Sex. ..You know what, I-I'd better pass on the game. I think I'm just going to go home and think about my ex-wife and her lesbian lover.

name: joey
dialogue: The hell with hockey, let's all do that!

name: chandler
dialogue: C'mon, Ross! You, me, Joey, ice, guys' night out, c'mon, what do you say say, big guy,  Huh? Huh? Huh?

name: ross
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: chandler
dialogue: I have no idea.

name: joey
dialogue: C'mon, Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: Alright, alright, maybe it'll take my mind off it. Do you promise to buy me a big thumb finger?

name: chandler
dialogue: You got it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Look-look-look-look-look, my first pay check! Look at the window, there's my name! Hi, me!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I remember the day I got my first pay check. There was a cave in in one of the mines, and eight people were killed.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow, you worked in a mine?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I worked in a Dairy Queen, why?

name: rachel
dialogue: God, isn't this exciting? I earned this. I wiped tables for it, I steamed milk for it, and it was totally——not worth it. Who's FICA? Why's he getting all my money? I mean, what- Chandler, look at that.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, this is not that bad.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, you are fine, yeah, for a first job.

name: ross
dialogue: You can totally, totally live on this.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, by the way, great service tonight.

name: all
dialogue: Oh! Yeah!

name: ross chandler joey
dialogue: Hockey!  Hockey! Hockey.

name: leslie
dialogue: Rachel?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: monica
dialogue: I swear I've seen birds do this on Wild Kingdom.

name: rachel
dialogue: What are you guys doing here?

name: kiki
dialogue: Well, we were in the city shopping, and your mom said you work here, and it's true!

name: joanne
dialogue: Look at you in the apron. You look like you are in a play.

name: rachel
dialogue: Look at you, you are so big I can't believe it!

name: leslie
dialogue: I know. I know! I'm a duplex.

name: rachel
dialogue: So what's going on with you?

name: joanne
dialogue: Well, guess who my dad's making partner in his firm?

name: kiki
dialogue: And while we're on the subject of news..

name: phoebe
dialogue: Look, look, I have elbows!

name: chandler
dialogue: ...Poulet passes it up to Leetch!

name: joey
dialogue: Leetch spots Messier in the crease- there's the pass!

name: chandler
dialogue: We'll take a brief time out while Messier stops to look at some women's shoes.

name: ross
dialogue: Carol was wearing boots just like those the night that we- we first-you know. Fact, she, uh- she never took them off, Because we-we-  Sorry. Sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Peach pit.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, Bunny?

name: ross
dialogue: Peach pit. That night we, uh- we had-

name: joey
dialogue: #NAME?

name: ross
dialogue: Actually, nectarines, but basically...

name: chandler
dialogue: Could've been a peach.

name: ross
dialogue: Then, uh, then we got dressed, and I-I... I walked her to the-  -the bus stop... I'm fine.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, that woman's got an ass like Carol's!  What? Thought we were trying to find stuff.

name: rachel
dialogue: So c'mon, you guys, tell me all the dirt!

name: kiki
dialogue: Well, the biggest news is still you dumping Barry at the altar!

name: joanne
dialogue: Alright. Let's talk reality for a second.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: joanne
dialogue: When are you coming home?

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Guys, I'm not.

name: joanne
dialogue: C'mon, this is us.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm not! This is what I'm doing now. I've got this job-

name: kiki
dialogue: Waitressing?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, I'm not just waitressing. I'm.. I, um... I write the specials on the specials board, and, uh... and I, uh... I take the uh dead flowers out of the vase... Oh, and, um, sometimes Artelle lets me put the little chocolate blobbies on the cookies.

name: leslie
dialogue: Well. Your mom didn't tell us about the blobbies.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, Rach. How was it with your friends?  Okay! How would you like some Tiki Death Punch?

name: rachel
dialogue: What's that?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, it's rum, and-

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: We thought since Phoebe was staying over tonight we'd have kind of like a slumber party thing. We got some trashy magazines, we got cookie dough, we got Twister...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh! Ooh! And I brought Operation! But, um, I lost the tweezers, so we can't operate. But we can prep the guy!

name: monica
dialogue: Uh, Rach, it's the Visa card people.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, God, ask them what they want.

name: monica
dialogue: Could you please tell me what this is in reference to?  Yes, hold on.  Um, they say there's been some unusual activity on your account.

name: rachel
dialogue: But I haven't used my card in weeks!

name: monica
dialogue: That is the unusual activity. Look, they just want to see if you are okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: They want to know if I'm okay. Okay.. they want to know if I'm okay, okay, let's see. Well, let's see, the FICA guys took all my money, everyone I know is either getting married, or getting promoted, or getting pregnant, and I'm getting coffee! And it's not even for me! So if that sounds like I'm okay, okay, then you can tell them I'm okay, okay?

name: monica
dialogue: Uh- Rachel has left the building, can you call back?

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright, c'mon!  Let's play Twister!

name: ross
dialogue: Sorry, sorry... Uh-oh.

name: chandler
dialogue: What? There was ice there that night with Carol? Plastic seats? Four thousand angry Pittsburgh fans?

name: ross
dialogue: No, actually I was just saying it looks like we're not sitting together. But now you mention it, there was ice there that night... It was the first frost...

name: joey
dialogue: C'mon, sit. Just sit down, sit.

name: monica
dialogue: You should feel great about yourself! you are doing this amazing independence thing!

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, what is so amazing? I gave up, like, everything. And for what?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You are just like Jack.

name: rachel
dialogue: ...Jack from downstairs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, Jack and the Beanstalk.

name: monica
dialogue: Ah, the other Jack.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, right! See, he gave up something, but then he got those magic beans. And then he woke up, and there was this, this big plant outside his window, full of possibilities and stuff.. And he lived in a village, and you live in the Village..

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, but Pheebs, Pheebs, Jack gave up a cow, I gave up an orthodontist. Okay, I-I-I know, I know I didn't love him-

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, see, Jack did love the cow.

name: rachel
dialogue: But see, it was a plan. You know, it was clear. It was figured out, and now everything's just kind of like...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Floopy?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: So what, you are not the only one. I mean, half the time we don't know where we're going. You've just got to figure at some point it's all going to come together, and it's just going to be... un-floopy.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, like that is a word.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, but Monica, what if- what if it doesn't come together?

name: monica
dialogue: ...Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, well...Because.... you just... I don't like this question.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, see, see, you guys, what if we don't get magic beans? I mean, what if all we've got are.. beans?

name: ross
dialogue: Get him! GET HIM! Get him! Get- YESSS! Not laughing now, are you pal!

name: chandler
dialogue: See buddy, that is all you need, a bunch of toothless guys hitting each other with sticks.

name: ross
dialogue: Pass it! Pass it!

name: chandler
dialogue: He's open!

name: all
dialogue: Shoot! Shoot! Shoot!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, look, we're on that TV thing!

name: chandler
dialogue: Excuse me.

name: receptionist
dialogue: It says to call this number if you are not completely satisfied with this candy bar. Well, I'm not completely satisfied.

name: chandler
dialogue: Listen, it's kind of an emergency. Well, I guess you know that, or we'd be in the predicament room.

name: receptionist
dialogue: Hold on.  Fill these out, sit over there.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, I don't want to make any trouble, okay, but I'm in a lot of pain here, alright? My face is dented.

name: receptionist
dialogue: Well, you'll have to wait your turn.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, how long do you think it'll be?

name: receptionist
dialogue: Any minute now.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, this-  Hey...

name: rachel

dialogue: What?  Do you think he likes me?

dialogue: No, Joey.

name: ursula

dialogue: Yeah, you too.

dialogue: Hi, remember us?

name: nurse
dialogue: Mmm hmmm.

name: monica
dialogue: Um, okay. You just called a little while ago about needing a signature on the admissions form. Well, it turns out we need a whole new one  because uh, you see, I-I, I put the wrong name again. Because um...

name: nurse
dialogue: you are that stupid.

name: monica
dialogue: I am. I'm that stupid.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, and and, I'm just going to pay for this with a check.

name: nurse
dialogue: Well, you know your insurance will cover that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I know...  ..I'm I'm just not that bright either.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, worst case scenario. Say you never feel like a father.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: chandler
dialogue: Say your son never feels connected to you, as one. Say all of his relationships are affected by this.

name: ross
dialogue: Do you have a point?

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, you think I would.

dialogue: What's up with the simian?

name: ross
dialogue: It's just a fur ball.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay...  ..whose turn is it?

name: ross
dialogue: Yours, I just got 43 points for 'KIDNEY'.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, no, you got zero points for 'IDNEY'.

name: ross
dialogue: I had a 'K'. Where's where's my 'K'?

name: ross
dialogue: You've got to help me my monkey swallowed a 'K'!

name: nurse
dialogue: You go get that animal out of here.

name: ross
dialogue: No, no you don't understand the animal hospital is way across town he's choking I don't know what else to do.

name: monica
dialogue: What's going' on?

name: chandler
dialogue: Marcel swallowed a Scrabble tile.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

name: nurse
dialogue: Excuse me... This hospital is for people!

name: ross
dialogue: Lady, he is people. He has a name, okay? He watches Jeopardy! He he touches himself when nobody's watching. Please, please have a heart!

name: dr. mitchell
dialogue: I'll take a look at him.

name: rachel and monica
dialogue: Oh, thank you.

name: monica
dialogue: Michael.

name: dr. mitchell
dialogue: Rachel.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: Monica.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Urse...

name: joey
dialogue: ..ah, what're you doing here? I've been trying to call you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Listen, um...

name: joey
dialogue: No, no, no, don't say "listen." I know that "listen." I've said that "listen."

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: I don't get it. What happened? What about everything you said under the bridge?

name: joey
dialogue: You don't drink.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is right, I don't... But I was, I was drunk on you!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, Urse...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, yeah, so it's not going to work.

name: joey
dialogue: Why? Is it because I'm friends with Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: If it was, would you stop hanging out with her?

name: joey
dialogue: no. No, I, I couldn't do that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Um, then yes, it's Because of Phoebe! So, you know, it's either her or me.

name: joey
dialogue: Then, uh, then I'm sorry.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know...  you are going to be really, really hard to get over.

name: joey
dialogue: I know...

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know whether it's just Because we're breaking' up or... what, but you have never looked so beautiful.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really?

name: joey
dialogue: Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. Ooh...

name: ross
dialogue: He looks so tiny.

name: joey
dialogue: We just got the message.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Is he alright?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. The doctor got the 'K' out. He also found an 'M' and an 'O'.

name: chandler
dialogue: We think he was trying to spell out 'MONKEY.'

name: ross
dialogue: Well, the doctor says he's going to be fine, he's just sleeping now.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, you feel like a dad yet?

name: ross
dialogue: No, why?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, come on, you came through, you did what you had to do. That is very dad.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, look, he's waking up!

name: ross
dialogue: hey, fella! How you doing?

name: ross
dialogue: Here it is!

name: monica
dialogue: Who ordered General Sal's chicken?

name: chandler
dialogue: It could've been General Sal!

dialogue: Look, look, Ugly Naked Guy is doing the hula!

name: all
dialogue: Eww!

name: all
dialogue: Hi, Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, everybody!

name: monica
dialogue: Look, Ross, Marcel's got the remote.

name: ross
dialogue: The thing is, he doesn`t like the program!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, Rach, we're running low on resumes over here.

name: monica
dialogue: Do you really want a job with Popular Mechanics?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, if you are going to work for mechanics, those are the ones to work for.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, look, you guys, I'm going for anything here, OK? I cannot be a waitress anymore, I mean it. I'm sick of the lousy tips, I'm sick of being called 'Excuse me...'

name: ross
dialogue: Rach, did you proofread these?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh... yeah, why?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, nothing, I'm sure they'll be impressed with your excellent compuper skills.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my Good! Oh, do you think it's on all of them?

dialogue: Oh no, I'm sure the Xerox machine caught a few.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, guys.

name: chandler and ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey... hi, ladies... uh, can I get you anything?

name: monica
dialogue: Lots of responses.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Give me that!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, I can't believe you. Linda is so great! Why won't you go out with her again?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't know.

name: chandler
dialogue: Is this still about her whole 'The Flintstones could've really happened' thing?

name: ross
dialogue: No, it's not just that. It's just—I want someone who... who does something for me, you know? Who gets my heart pounding, who... who makes me, uh...

name: chandler
dialogue: ...little playthings with yarn?

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Could you want her more?

name: ross
dialogue: Who?

name: chandler
dialogue: Dee, the sarcastic sister from What's Happening.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, I am totally, totally over her, OK, I just...

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! How are you?

name: ross
dialogue: We're fine, we're fine.

name: rachel
dialogue: OK.

name: joey
dialogue: Shut up!

name: chandler
dialogue: We're not—we're not saying anything.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Uhhhh... Joey cried last night.

name: joey
dialogue: Thank you.

name: chandler
dialogue: We were playing poker, alright...

name: joey
dialogue: There was chocolate on the three. It looked like an eight, alright?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, guys, you should've seen him. 'Read them and weep.'

name: chandler
dialogue: And then he did.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, now, how come you guys have never played poker with us?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, what is that? Like, some kind of guy thing? Like, some kind of sexist guy thing? Like it's poker, so only guys can play?

name: ross
dialogue: No, women are welcome to play.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, OK, so then what is it? Some kind of... you know, like, like... some kind of, you know, like... alright, what is it?

name: chandler
dialogue: There just don't happen to be any women in our games.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, we just don't happen to know any women that know how to play poker.

name: rachel monica phoebe
dialogue: Oh, yeah, right.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, please, that is such a lame excuse!

name: rachel
dialogue: Really.

name: monica
dialogue: I mean, that is a typical guy response.

name: ross
dialogue: Excuse me, do any of you know how to play?

name: rachel monica phoebe
dialogue: No.

name: rachel
dialogue: But you could teach us.

name: ross chandler joey
dialogue: No.

name: chandler
dialogue: OK, so now we draw cards.

name: monica
dialogue: So I wouldn't need any, right? Cause I have a straight.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, good for you!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Congratulations!

name: chandler
dialogue: OK Pheebs, how many do you want?

name: phoebe
dialogue: OK, I just need two... the, um, ten of spades and the six of clubs.

name: ross
dialogue: No. No, uh, Pheebs? You can't—you can't do...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wait, I have the ten of spades! Here!

name: ross
dialogue: No, no. Uh... no, see, uh, you-you can't do that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, no-no-no-no-no-no, that is OK, I don't need them. I'm going for fours.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, you are...

name: monica

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: OOooooo!

name: joey
dialogue: Whoa, whoa, whoa, Monica, what're you doin'? This is a poker game. You can't serve food with more than one syllable. It's got to be like chips, or dip, or pretz...

name: chandler
dialogue: OK, so at this point, the dealer...

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, you know, we got it, we got it. Let's play for real. High stakes... big bucks...

name: phoebe
dialogue: But... I'm ready, so, just deal.

dialogue: Dammit, dammit, dammit!

name: phoebe

name: joey
dialogue: Heh... I was bluffing.

dialogue: OK, sorry to break up this party, but I've got resumes to fax before work tomorrow...

name: ross chandler joey
dialogue: Whoa, whoa, whoa!

dialogue: The... Jamestown colony of Virginia. You see, King George is giving us the land, so...

dialogue: The game, Rachel, the game. You owe us money for the game.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. Right.

name: phoebe
dialogue: OK, Monica? I had another answer all ready.

name: monica

name: ross
dialogue: Well that is fine with me. Could use the money.

name: ross
dialogue: ...Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, and I get my ya-yas from Ikea. You have to put them together yourself, but they cost a little less.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, Rachel, this is poker. I play to win, alright? In order for me to win, other people have to lose. So if you are going to play poker with me, don't expect me to be a 'nice guy,' OK? Cause once those cards are dealt...

name: joey
dialogue: ...Yeah?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm not a nice guy.

dialogue: Alright boys, let's eat.

dialogue: You still on that?

dialogue: Oh, come on. What was with that whole Black Bart speech?

name: ross

dialogue: No, I don't think so, see Ross, because I think you love her.

name: ross
dialogue: Um.... no. See, I might've had feelings for her at one time—not any more. I just—I...

dialogue: Marcel! Where are you going with that disc?

name: ross
dialogue: You are not putting that on again! Marcel, OK—if you press that button, you are in very, very big trouble.

dialogue: Can you believe what a jerk Ross was being?

dialogue: Yeah, I know. He can get really competitive.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ha. Ha, ha.

name: monica
dialogue: What?

dialogue: Oh, hello, kettle? This is Monica. you are black.

dialogue: Please! I am not as bad as Ross.

dialogue: Ooh.

name: monica
dialogue: you are kidding! Where? Where?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, Rachel!

dialogue: Oh, it's like the mother ship is calling you home.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, what's the job?

name: rachel
dialogue: Assistant buyer. Oh! I would be shopping... for a living!

name: monica
dialogue: OK, look. That is Aunt Iris. This woman has been playing poker since she was five. You got to listen to every word she says.  Hi!

dialogue: Is Tony Randall dead?

name: rachel
dialogue: No.

name: monica
dialogue: I don't think so.

name: rachel
dialogue: Why?

dialogue: Well, he may be now, because I think I hit him with my car.

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: monica
dialogue: Really?

name: aunt iris
dialogue: No! that is bluffing. Lesson number one.  Let me tell you something... everything you hear at a poker game is pure crap.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thank y...

dialogue: Girls, sit down.

name: monica
dialogue: Uh, Aunt Iris? This is Phoebe, and that is Rachel...

dialogue: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, listen, I am parked at a meter. Let's do it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, could we please, please, please listen to anything else?

name: ross
dialogue: Alright.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm going to pay for that tonight.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Guys! Guess what, guess what, guess what, guess what!

name: chandler
dialogue: Um, ok... the... the fifth dentist caved and now they're all recommending Trident?

name: rachel
dialogue: No... the interview! She loved me! She absolutely loved me. We talked for like two and a half hours, we have the same taste in clothes, and—oh, I went to camp with her cousin... And, oh, the job is perfect. I can do this. I can do this well!

name: all
dialogue: that is great! that is wonderful!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh God, oh, and then she told the funniest story...

name: monica
dialogue: OK, great. You'll tell us and we'll laugh. Let's play poker.

name: joey
dialogue: Alright now listen, you guys, we talked about it, and if you don't want to play, we completely understand.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes, yes, we could play some other game... like, uh, I don't know... Pictionary?

name: monica
dialogue: Ha, ha, very funny, very funny. But I think we'd like to give poker another try. Shall we, ladies?

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: Yes, we should. I think we should.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, Rach, do you want me to shuffle those?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, no, that's OK. you know, I think I'm going to give it a go.

name: ross
dialogue: Alright.

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright...

name: ross
dialogue: So, Pheebs owes $7.50, Monica, you owe $10, and Rachel, you owe fifteen big ones.

name: joey
dialogue: But hey, thanks for teaching' us Cross-Eyed Mary. You guys, we got to play that at our regular game.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Alright, here's my $7.50.  But I think you should know that this money is cursed.

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I cursed it. So now bad things will happen to he who spends it.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is alright, I'll take it. Bad things happen to me anyway. This way I can break them up with a movie.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, that just leaves the big Green poker machine, who owes fifteen...

name: rachel
dialogue: Mmm-hmmm. Oh, so typical. Ooo, I'm a man. Ooo, I have a penis. Ooo, I have to win money to exert my power over women.

name: monica
dialogue: You know what? This is not over. We will play you again, and we will win, and you will lose, and you will beg, and we will laugh, and we will take every last dime you have, and you will hate yourselves forever.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hmm. kind of stepped on my point there, Mon.

name: ross
dialogue: So, you gals want to hand over your money now? That way, we don't have to go through the formality of actually playing.

name: rachel
dialogue: ooh, that is fine. We'll see who has the last laugh there, monkey boy.

name: monica
dialogue: OK, we done with the chit-chat? Are we ready to play some serious poker?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey you guys, look, the one-eyed jack follows me wherever I go.  Right, OK, serious poker.

name: monica
dialogue: Excuse me, where are you going?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh... to the bathroom.

name: ross
dialogue: I want to go to the bathroom.

name: joey
dialogue: Alright, well, I'm going to order a pizza.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh no-no-no-no-no, I'm still waiting to hear from that job and the store closes at nine, so you can eat then.

name: joey
dialogue: that is fine. I'll just have a Tic-Tac to hold me over.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, Cincinnati, no blinds, everybody ante.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes!  .... or no.

name: ross
dialogue: Alright.

name: rachel
dialogue: Your fly is open, Geller.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You guys, you know what I just realized? 'Joker' is 'poker' with a 'J.' Coincidence?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, that is... that is 'joincidence' with a 'C'!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh... Phoebe? Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. Um... I'm out.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm in.

name: monica
dialogue: Me too.

name: joey
dialogue: Me too. Alright, what have you got.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, you better hop out of the shower, cause... I got to flush.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, well, well, hop back in bucko, cause I got four sixes!  I won! I actually won! Oh my God! You know what?  I think I'm going to make a little Ross pile.  I think that one was Ross's, and I think—oh—that one was Ross's. Yes!

name: rachel
dialogue: And your fly's still open...

name: rachel
dialogue: Ha, I made you look....

name: rachel
dialogue: I couldn't be inner. Monica?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Monica, in or out?

name: monica
dialogue: I hate this game!

name: phoebe
dialogue: OK Joey, your bet.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah, I fold like a cheap hooker who got hit in the stomach by a fat guy with sores on his face.  Oh, I'm out.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I am very in.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Couldn't be more out.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Me too. Rachel.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh, I will see you... and I'll raise you.  What do you say... want to waste another buck?

name: ross
dialogue: No, not this time.  So... what'd you have?

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm not telling.

name: ross
dialogue: Come on, show them to me.

name: rachel
dialogue: No..!

name: ross
dialogue: Show them to me!

name: rachel
dialogue: Get your hands out of there! No!

name: ross
dialogue: Let me see! Show them!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, I've had dates like this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Boy, you really can't stand to lose, can you? Your whole face is getting red... little veins popping out on your temple...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Plus that shirt doesn't really match those pants.

name: ross
dialogue: First of all, I'm not losing...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, you are losing. Definitely losing.

name: ross
dialogue: Let's not talk about losing. Just deal the...

name: rachel
dialogue: Hel-lo, Rachel Green.

name: ross
dialogue: Me mee, mee-mee mee.

name: rachel
dialogue: Excuse me.  It's about the job.

name: rachel
dialogue: Barbara! Hi, how are you?  Uh-huh.  No, I understand. Yeah. Oh, oh, come on, no, I'm fine. Don't be silly. Yeah... oh, but you know, if-if anything else opens up, plea—Hello? Hello?

name: monica
dialogue: Sorry, Rach.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know, there's going to be lots of other stuff.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.......OK. Where were we? Oh, OK... five card draw, uh... jacks or better... nothing wild, everybody ante.

name: joey
dialogue: Look, Rachel, we don't have to do this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes, we do.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, check.

name: joey
dialogue: Check.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm in for fifty cents.

name: chandler
dialogue: Call.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm in.

name: rachel
dialogue: I see your fifty cents... and I raise you... five dollars.

name: ross
dialogue: I thought, uh... it was a fifty cent limit.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I just lost a job, and I'd like to raise the bet five bucks. Does anybody have a problem with that?

name: ross
dialogue: No, I fold.

name: rachel
dialogue: What do you mean, you fold? Hey, come on! What is this? I thought that 'once the cards were dealt, I'm not a nice guy.' I mean, what, were you just full of it?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm in.

name: rachel
dialogue: How many you want?

name: ross
dialogue: One.

name: rachel
dialogue: Dealer takes two.  What do you bet?

name: ross
dialogue: I bet two dollars.

name: rachel
dialogue: OK... see your two... and I raise you twenty.

name: ross
dialogue: I see your twenty, raise you twenty-five.

name: rachel
dialogue: See your twenty-five...and...uh, Monica, get my purse.

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel, there's nothing in it.

name: rachel
dialogue: OK, then get me your purse.

name: monica
dialogue: OK, here you go. Good luck.

name: phoebe
dialogue: ...teen!

name: joey
dialogue: that is OK, Ross, you can ask me. What?

name: ross
dialogue: Fifteen.

name: chandler
dialogue: Alright, here's ten.

name: joey
dialogue: Here, I got five, I got five.

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Good luck.

name: rachel
dialogue: Full house.

name: ross
dialogue: You got me.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, well, when you don't have the cards, you don't have the cards, you know.  But, uh... look how happy she is.

dialogue: Airplane! Airport! Airport '75! Airport '77! Airport '79!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, time's up.

dialogue: Bye... bye... BIRDIE.

dialogue: Oh!

dialogue: that is a bird?

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is a bird!

dialogue: OK, OK, it's my turn.

name: chandler
dialogue: Go.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh.... bean! Bean!

dialogue: The Unbearable Likeness of Being!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes!

Oh, uh, okay, that is fine, that is great.  Okay.   She's on the other line, she's going to call me back.  She's on the other line, she's going to call me back, she's on the other line, going to call me back...

Except for maybe Laurie Schaffer, who I don't talk to anywhere, Because she's all bitter now that she lost the weight and it turns out she doesn't have a pretty face. ....Okay, I'm just going to ask you this once, and I want a straight answer.

dialogue: oh!!  ...What? What?

If I want to walk around my apartment in my underwear, I shouldn't have to feel like——Thank you, but... that is not really the point...  The point is that...  Mostly free weights, but occasionally..

name: susan
dialogue: You get to be the baby's father. Everyone knows who you are. Who am I? There's Mother's Day, there's Father's Day, there's no... Lesbian Lover Day.

dialogue: You want to explain that?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I mean, well, Because when I was growing up, you know my dad left, and my mother died, and my stepfather went to jail, so I barely had enough pieces of parents to make one whole one. And here's this little baby who has like three whole parents who care about it so much that they're fighting over who gets to love it the most. And it's not even born yet. It's just, it's just the luckiest baby in the whole world.  I'm sorry, you were fighting.

name: monica

dialogue: Oh, Joey, please tell me you are only donating your time.

name: joey
dialogue: Alright, come on you guys, it's not that big a deal. Really... I mean, I just go down there every other day and... make my contribution to the project. Hey, hey, but at the end of two weeks, I get seven hundred dollars.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow, ooh, you are going to be making money hand over fist!

name: monica
dialogue: OK, we got the cole slaw, we got the buns...

name: phoebe
dialogue: We've got the ground-up flesh of formerly cute cows and turkeys, ew...

name: chandler
dialogue: Men are here.

name: joey
dialogue: We make fire. Cook meat.

name: chandler
dialogue: Then put out fire by peeing, no get invited back.

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: Eww!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh Joey, Melanie called, said she's going to be late.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, OK.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So how are things going with you two? Is she becoming your  special someone?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know, she's, uh.... she's pretty great.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah? What does she think of your little science project?

name: joey
dialogue: What, you think I'm going to tell a girl I like that I'm also seeing a cup?

name: monica
dialogue: Man's got a point.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, the tough thing is, she really wants to have sex with me.

name: chandler
dialogue: Crazy bitch.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, well, I still got a week left to go in the program, and according to the rules, if I want to get the money I'm not allowed to conduct any... personal experiments, if you know what I mean.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey... we always know what you mean.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How long did you think this barbecue was going to last?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm going to China.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Jeez, you say one thing, and...

name: monica
dialogue: you are going to China?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I-it's for the museum. Someone found a bone, we want the bone, but they don't want us to have the bone, so I'm going over there to try to persuade them to give us the bo—it's—it's a whole big bone thing. Anyway, I'm going to be gone for like, uh... like a week, so, uh, if you want to reach me, y-you can't. So here's my itinerary . Um... here's a picture of me...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, let me see!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi, Ben. I'm your father. I am... the head. Aaaaaahhhh....  Alright, this barbecue is going to be very fun.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, is Rachel here? Um, I wanted to wish her a happy birthday before I left.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh no, she's out having drinks with Carl.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh.  Hey, who's Carl?

name: monica
dialogue: You know, that guy she met at the coffeehouse.

name: ross
dialogue: No.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, well, see, there's this guy she met at the...

name: ross
dialogue: At the coffeehouse, right.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So you do know who he is!  Sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: OK, I'm going to go say goodbye to the guys.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, hey,you know what? Tell them that bone story.

name: ross
dialogue: Hi.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: ....I have to go to China.

name: joey
dialogue: The country?

name: ross
dialogue: No no, this big pile of dishes in my mom's breakfront. Do you guys know who Carl is?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, let's see... Alvin... Simon... Theodore.... no.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, Rachel's having drinks with him tonight.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh no! How can she do that when she's never shown any interest in you?!?

name: chandler
dialogue: Forget about her.

name: joey
dialogue: He's right, man. Please. Move on. Go to China. Eat Chinese food.

name: chandler
dialogue: Course there, they just call it food.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah... I guess. I don't—I don't know. Alright, just... just give her this for me, OK?

name: joey
dialogue: Listen, buddy, we're just looking out for you.

name: ross
dialogue: I know.

name: joey
dialogue: We want you to be happy. And I may only have a couple beers in me, but... I love you, man.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm still on my first. I just think you are nice.

name: melanie
dialogue: Anyway, that is when me and my friends started this whole fruit basket business. We call ourselves 'The Three Basketeers.'

name: joey
dialogue: Like the three musketeers, only with fruit.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooooh.

name: monica
dialogue: OK, how does everybody like their burgers?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, no, no, no. Presents first. Food later.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, hold on there, tiger. How's it going? How you holding up?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, not so good. She definitely thinks tonight is the night we're going to... complete the transaction, if you know what I...

name: joey
dialogue: Then you do. Heh, heh.

name: monica
dialogue: So, uh, have you ever thought about being there for her?

name: joey
dialogue: What do you mean?

name: monica
dialogue: You know, just be there for her.

name: joey
dialogue: Not following you.

name: monica
dialogue: Think about it.

name: rachel
dialogue: OK, I'm guessing this is from...

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, thank you, Melanie.

name: chandler
dialogue: OK, this one right here is from me.

name: rachel
dialogue: OK... ah, it's light... ...it rattles... it's...  Travel Scrabble! Ooooh, thank you!

name: rachel
dialogue: This one's from Joey... feels like a book. Thinks it's a book... feels like a book. And......it's a book!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, it's Dr. Seuss!

name: melanie
dialogue: There is a little child inside this man!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, the doctors say if they remove it, he'll die.

name: rachel
dialogue: Who's this from?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, that is Ross's.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh... ...  Oh my God. He remembered.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Remembered what?

name: rachel
dialogue: It was like months ago. We were walking by this antique store, and I saw this pin in the window, and I told him it was just like one my grandmother had when I was a little girl. Oh! I can't believe he remembered!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, sure, but can you play it on a plane?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, it's so pretty. This must have cost him a fortune.

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe he did this.

name: chandler
dialogue: Come on, Ross? Remember back in college, when he fell in love with Carol and bought her that ridiculously expensive crystal duck?

name: rachel
dialogue: What did you just say?

name: chandler
dialogue: ahem... um... Crystal duck.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, no, no.... the, um, the... 'love' part?

name: chandler
dialogue: F-hah.... flennin....

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.... my God.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, no-no-no-no-no....

name: joey
dialogue: that is good, just keep rubbing your head. That'll turn back time.

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean, this is unbelievable.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know. This is really, really huge.

name: chandler
dialogue: No it's not. It's small. It's tiny. It's petite. It's wee.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Nuh-uh. I don't think any of our lives are ever going to be the same ever again.

name: chandler
dialogue: OK, is there a mute button on this woman?

name: monica
dialogue: I think this is so great! I mean, you and Ross! D-did you have any idea?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! None! I mean, my first night in the city, he mentioned something about asking me out, but nothing ever happened, so I just...

name: joey
dialogue: Well, given that he's desperately in love with you, he probably wouldn't mind getting a cup of coffee or something.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross? All this time? Well, I've got to talk to him.

name: chandler
dialogue: H-He's in China!

name: joey
dialogue: The country.

name: monica
dialogue: No, no, wait.  His flight doesn't leave for another forty-five more minutes.

name: chandler
dialogue: What about the time difference?

name: monica
dialogue: From here to the airport?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes!  you are never going to make it!

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel, what're you going to say to him?

name: rachel
dialogue: I-I-I don't know.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well then maybe you shouldn't go.

name: joey
dialogue: He's right, cause if you are just going to, like, break his heart, that is the kind of thing that can wait.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, but if it's good news, you should tell him now.

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know. Maybe I'll know when I see him.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Here, look, alright, does this help?

name: rachel
dialogue: No... look, all I know is that I cannot wait a week until I see him. I mean, this is just too big. You know, I just, I've just got to talk to him. I... I got to... OK, I'll see you later.

name: chandler
dialogue: Rachel, I love you! Deal with me first!

name: flight attendant
dialogue: Alright!

name: ross
dialogue: Ni-chou chi-ma!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross! Excuse me, pardon me, excuse me....

name: flight attendant
dialogue: Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: flight attendant
dialogue: May I see your boarding pass?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, no, no, I don't have one. I just need to talk to my friend.

name: flight attendant
dialogue: Oh, ooh. I'm sorry. You are not allowed on the jetway unless you have a boarding pass.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I know, but I—he just went on. He's right there, he's got the blue jacket on, I... can I j-just...

name: flight attendant
dialogue: No no no! Federal regulations!

name: rachel
dialogue: OK, alright, OK, um... then could you please, uh... just give him a message for me? Please? This is very important.

name: flight attendant
dialogue: Alright. What's the message?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh... I don't know.

name: flight attendant
dialogue: Sir? Sir? Excuse me, sir? Uh... I have a message for you.

name: man
dialogue: What?

name: flight attendant
dialogue: It's from Rachel. She said that she loved the present, and she will see you when you get back.

name: melanie
dialogue: Mmmmmm... Oh, Joey, Joey, Joey... I think I blacked out there for a minute!

name: joey
dialogue: Heh, heh. It was nothing'.

name: melanie
dialogue: Well, now we've got to find something fun for you!

name: joey
dialogue: Uhhh..you know what? Forget about me. Let's, uh... let's give you another turn.

name: melanie
dialogue: M-Me again?

name: joey
dialogue: Sure! Why not?

name: melanie
dialogue: Boy, somebody's going to get a big fruit basket tomorrow.

name: melanie
dialogue: Ooh, I got to tell you... you are nothing like I thought you would be.

name: joey
dialogue: How do you mean?

name: melanie
dialogue: I don't know, I-I guess I just had you pegged as one of those guys who're always 'me, me, me.' But you... you are a giver. you are like the most generous man I ever met. I mean... you are practically a woman.

name: monica
dialogue: Uh, so, uh, Rach, uh... do you want to save this wrapping paper, I mean, it's only a little bit torn... so are you going to go for it with Ross or should I just throw it out?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know. I don't know... I thought about it all the way there, and I thought about it all the way back... and, uh, oh, you guys, you know, it's Ross. You know what I mean? I mean, it's Ross.

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: Sure.

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know, I mean, this is just my initial gut feeling... but I'm thinking... oh, I'm thinking it'd be really great.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, me too! Oh! Oh, we'd be like friends-in-law! You know what the best part is? The best part is that you already know everything about him! I mean, it's like starting on the fifteenth date!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but, you know, it's... it would be like starting on the fifteenth date.

name: monica
dialogue: Another good point.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I mean, I mean, when you are at the fifteenth date, you know, you are already in a very relationshippy place. You know, it's... you are committed.

name: rachel
dialogue: Huh?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I mean, then what happens if it doesn't work out?

name: monica
dialogue: Why isn't it working out?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know... sometimes it doesn't.

name: monica
dialogue: Is he not cute enough for you?

name: rachel
dialogue: No!

name: monica
dialogue: Does he not make enough money?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I'm just....

name: phoebe
dialogue: Maybe there's someone else.

name: rachel
dialogue: What...

name: monica
dialogue: Is there? Is there someone else?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! There is.. there is no one else!

name: monica
dialogue: Then why the hell are you dumping my brother?!?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, big...

name: joey
dialogue: Shhhh!

name: chandler
dialogue: ...spender.

name: joey
dialogue: She's still asleep.

name: chandler
dialogue: So how'd it go?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, it was amazing. You know how you always think you are great in bed?

name: chandler
dialogue: The fact that you'd even ask that question shows how little you know me.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, it's like, last night, I couldn't do the thing that usually makes me great. So I had to do all this other stuff. And the response I got... man, oh man, it was like a ticker tape parade!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, I know, as it happens my room is very very close to the parade route.

name: joey
dialogue: It was amazing! And not just for her... uh-uh. For me, too. It's like, all of a sudden, I'm blind. But all my other senses are heightened, you know? It's like... I was able to appreciate it on another level.

name: chandler
dialogue: I didn't know you had another level.

name: joey
dialogue: I know! Neither did I!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, great skirt! Birthday present?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, from who?

name: rachel
dialogue: From you. I exchanged the blouse you got me.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, it's the thought. Hey, doesn't Ross's flight get in in a couple hours? At gate 27-B?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh, yeah. Uh, Monica, you know, honey, I've been thinking about it and I've decided this—this whole Ross thing, it's just not a good idea.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, why?

name: rachel
dialogue: Because, I feel like I wouldn't just be going out with him. I would be going out with all of you. Oh, and there would just be all this pressure, and I don't want to...

name: monica
dialogue: No, no, no, no, no, no pressure, no pressure!

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, nothing has even happened yet, and you are already so...

name: monica
dialogue: I am not 'so'! OK, I was a teensy bit weird at first, but... I'll be good. I promise.

name: rachel
dialogue: Who is it?

name: intercom
dialogue: It's me, Carl.

name: rachel
dialogue: C'mon up.

name: monica
dialogue: Behind my brother's back?  ... is exactly the kind of crazy thing you won't be hearing from me.

name: joey
dialogue: Seven hundred bucks!

name: chandler
dialogue: Alright, you did it! Do we have any fruit?

name: joey
dialogue: Man, hell of a two weeks, huh? you know what, though? I really feel like I learned something.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really? So, you are going to stick with this 'it's all for her' thing?

name: joey
dialogue: What, are you crazy? When a blind man gets his sight back, does he walk around like this?

name: carl
dialogue: I'm just saying', if I see one more picture of Ed Begley, Jr. in that stupid electric car, I'm going to shoot myself! I mean, don't get me wrong... I'm not against environmental issues per se.... it's just that guy!

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe you'd rather go out with him than me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Would you excuse me, please? I'm trying to have a date here.

name: ross
dialogue: Fine, just stop thinking about me.

name: ross
dialogue: Can't do it, can you?

name: rachel
dialogue: So I'm thinking about you. So what?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't get it. What do you see in this guy, anyway?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well... he happens to be a very nice... guy....

name: carl
dialogue: I mean, come on, buddy, get a real car!

name: ross
dialogue: Rachel, come on. Give us a chance.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, it's too hard.

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, no... why, because it might get weird for everyone else? Who cares about them. This is about us. Look, I-I've been in love with you since, like, the ninth grade.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, you are like my best friend.

name: ross
dialogue: I know.

name: rachel
dialogue: If we broke up, and I lost you...

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa, whoa, whoa. What makes you think we're going to break up?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, have you been involved with someone where you haven't broken up?

name: ross
dialogue: No. But... it only has to happen once. Look, you and I both know we are perfect for each other, right? I mean... so, the only question is... are you attracted to me?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know... I mean, I've never looked at you that way before.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, start looking.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow.

name: carl
dialogue: Exactly! And you just know I'm going to be the guy caught behind this hammerhead in traffic!

name: rachel
dialogue: Right! you are right!

name: carl
dialogue: Heh...you know?

name: rachel
dialogue: You know what?

name: carl
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: I forgot... I am supposed to pick up a friend at the airport. I am so sorry! I'm so... if you want to stay, and finish your drinks, please do....  I mean—I'm sorry. I-I-I got to go. I'm sorry.

name: carl
dialogue: But...

name: rachel
dialogue: Excuse me, pardon me, excuse me, excuse me, sorry. Hi.

name: man
dialogue: For God's sake, will you let it go? There's no Rachel!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, hey, hey, I got that.

name: julie
dialogue: Oh, thanks, sweetie.

name: ross
dialogue: No problem. I cannot wait for you to meet my friends.

name: julie
dialogue: Really?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: julie
dialogue: You don't think they'll judge and ridicule me?

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, they will. I just... uh...

name: ross and julie
dialogue: Can't wait.

name: ross
dialogue: Come on, they're going to love you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ok, so this is pretty much what's happened so far. Ross was in love with Rachel since, you know, forever, but every time he tried to tell her, something kind of got in the way, like cats, and Italian guys. Finally Chandler was like "forget about her" but when Ross was in China on his dig, Chandler let it slip that Ross was in love with Rachel. She was like, "Oh my god." So she went to the airport to meet him when he came back, but what she didn't know was, that Ross was getting off the plane with another woman. Uh-Oh! So, that is pretty much everything you need to know. But, enough about us. So, how've you been?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my god. Oh my god.  Excuse me. Move! Move! Emergency! Excuse me!

name: ross
dialogue: Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, there you are! Hi! Oh, so, so, how was China, you?

name: ross
dialogue: It was, it was great. Oh, what happened?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: you are bleeding.

name: rachel
dialogue: I am? Oh, look at that, yes I am. Enough about me, enough about me, Mr. Back from the Orient. Come on. I want to hear everything! Everything.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, where do I start? This is Julie. Julie, this is Rachel.

name: rachel
dialogue: These are, these aren't for you.  These are for you.  Welcome to our country.

name: julie
dialogue: Thank you. I'm from New York.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, well, not a problem. We'll just use them to stop the bleeding. Ok. Baggage claim? Ok.

name: chandler
dialogue: No way!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm telling you, she went to the airport, and she's going to go for it with Ross!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my god. This is huge. This is bigger than huge. This is like, all right, what's bigger than huge?

name: joey
dialogue: Um, this?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes.

name: monica
dialogue: Guys, you got your hair cut.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, yes, we did, thanks to Vidal Buffay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Because, you know,  if you don't look good, we don't look good. I love that voice.

name: rachel
dialogue: Airport, airport. Ross, not alone, Julie, arm around her. Cramp, cramp.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok, I think she's trying to tell us something. Quick, get the verbs.

name: rachel
dialogue: You, you, you said he liked me.  You, you slowpokes!

name: ross
dialogue: that is all right, Rach, we got the bags. Hi, hello. Julie, this is my sister Monica. This is Chandler. Phoebe. Joey, what up?

name: joey
dialogue: What up?!

name: ross
dialogue: Everyone, this is Julie.

name: rachel
dialogue: Julie.

name: all
dialogue: OH.  Hi!

name: julie
dialogue: Hi, but I'm not here, you haven't met me. I'll make a much better first impression tomorrow when I don't have 20 hours of cab and plane on me.

name: ross
dialogue: And bus.

name: julie
dialogue: Oh my god.

name: ross
dialogue: The screaming guy?

name: julie
dialogue: And the spitting?

name: ross
dialogue: You got to hear this story.

name: julie
dialogue: We're on this bus, that is easily 200 years old...

name: ross
dialogue: 200 at least.

name: julie
dialogue: ...and this guy...

name: rachel
dialogue: And the chicken pooped in her lap. Oh, I'm so sorry. I just gave away the ending, didn't I? Oh! It's just, I just heard this story in the cab, and it is all I can think about.

name: monica
dialogue: This is amazing. I mean, how, how did this happen?

name: julie
dialogue: Well, Ross and I were in grad school together.

name: ross
dialogue: But we haven't seen each other since then. Well I land in China, guess who's in charge of the dig.

name: rachel
dialogue: Julie! Julie, isn't that great? I mean, isn't that just kick-you-in-the-crotch, spit-on-your-neck fantastic?

name: monica
dialogue: It's an expression.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, we just wanted to say a quick hi, and then we're going to go see the baby.

name: julie
dialogue: And then we've got to get some sleep.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, it's really 6

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, listen, don't tell us what's going to happen though, Because I like to be surprised.

name: rachel
dialogue: Bye.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, Rach, can I get some coffee?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, sure.

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, Rach, can I get...

name: rachel
dialogue: Did you talk to him?

name: chandler
dialogue: Not yet.

name: rachel
dialogue: Then, no.

name: chandler
dialogue: So what the hell happened to you in China? I mean, when last we left you, you were totally in love with, you know.

name: ross
dialogue: I know, I know I was, but there was always this little voice inside that kept saying it's never going to happen, move on. You know whose voice that was?

name: chandler
dialogue: God?

name: ross
dialogue: It was you, pal.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, maybe it was God, doing me.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, you were right. She looks at me and sees a friend, that is all. But then I met Julie, and I don't know, we're having' a great time. And I have to say, I never would've gone for it with her if it hadn't been for you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you owe me one, big guy.

name: rachel
dialogue: Here's your lemonade.

name: ross
dialogue: I didn't order lemonade.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. Well then, you better go take that back because they're going to charge you for that.

name: ross
dialogue: But...

name: rachel
dialogue: Go-go-go-go, come on!   So uh, what did you find out?

name: chandler
dialogue: He said...he said, he said that they're having a great time. I'm sorry. But, the silver lining, if you want to see it, is that he made the decision all by himself! Without any outside help whatsoever.

name: rachel
dialogue: How is that the silver lining?

name: chandler
dialogue: You have to really want to see it.

name: ross
dialogue: Ironically, these are the guys who were picked last in gym.

name: monica
