dialogue: Okay, which one of you guys is Gunther Central-Perk?  Hey, Joey?

name: ross
dialogue: Where’s my ring? My dead grandmother’s wedding ring? Where is it? Where is it?

name: chandler
dialogue: Way to be cool, man.

name: the stripper
dialogue: What’s he talking about?

name: joey
dialogue: There was a ring, in a box, on my nightstand, after you left, it was gone!

name: the stripper
dialogue: Wait, you guys think I stole some ring?

name: the guys
dialogue: Yeah!

name: ross
dialogue: We know you took so just-just save yourself the time and confess!

name: the stripper
dialogue: Okay, who are you? The Hardy boys? Look, I don’t need to steal some stupid ring, all right? I make $1,600 a week doing what I do; any of you guys make that?

name: chandler
dialogue: Marry me.

name: joey
dialogue: I don’t get it! It was in my room all night! And if she didn’t take it, and I didn’t take it; and you  didn’t take it, then who did?  Shh! We’re trying to think!

name: rachel
dialogue: I still don’t get how you know when it’s false labour.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, do you see any babies?

name: monica
dialogue: How do you feel?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, I guess. I mean… I don’t know, it’s just, I guess I know it’s going to be over soon.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, isn’t that a good thing? You said you were sick of this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know. It’s just you know usually when you’re, when you’re done with the pregnant thing, you know, then you get to do the mom thing. I’m going to be you know, sitting around in my leather pants, drinking Tequila.

name: monica
dialogue: Some moms do that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay that’s even sadder. Look, I know, I know what I got myself into, it’s just that now that they’re in me it’s like, it’s like I know them you know, I mean-I mean, it’s just not going to be easy when these little babies have to go away.

name: monica
dialogue: Aww, sweetie, but it’s not like you’re not going to have anything. You’re going to have nieces and nephews, and some ways that’s even better.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, really. Really, Pheebs, you’re not going to be the one worrying about saving for college, or yelling at them when they’re bad, you know, or deciding to put them on Ritalin when they just won’t calm down. you know?

name: monica
dialogue: I mean, you’re the one they’re going to come to when they want to run away from home, and the one they talk to about sex.

name: rachel
dialogue: And you just get to be cool Aunt Phoebe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Cool Aunt Phoebe. I am pretty cool!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: And you know what else, oh my God, are they going to love you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: They are going to love me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thanks you guys! Again.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, sweetie!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You’re the best. Thanks. Oh!

name: monica and rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Just kidding. Ahh!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Got cha again, you guys are so easy.

name: joey
dialogue: If anything should happen to him

name: ross
dialogue: Joey! The vet said it’s a simple procedure.

name: joey
dialogue: So! Things can go wrong! You don’t know! What if he doesn’t make it?!

name: chandler
dialogue: He will, Joe.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, but what if he doesn’t? He’s such a good duck.

name: joey
dialogue: I’m so worried about him, you know?

name: the doctor
dialogue: Somebody lose a ring?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God! Thank you! Thank you so much!

name: joey
dialogue: H-h-h-how’s the duck?

name: the doctor
dialogue: He’s doing just fine, he’s resting now, but you can see him in a little bit.

name: joey
dialogue: OH, great! Oh hey, listen Ross, thanks for being so cool about this.

name: ross
dialogue: No, that’s all right.

name: joey
dialogue: No, it’s not. I mean you-you made me your best man and I totally let you down!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, come on, it’s not your fault.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, it is! You wouldn’t have lost the ring, right? you know what, Ross you were right from the start, he  should be your best man.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, you should.

name: joey
dialogue: Now, don’t argue with me

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! Hey! Hey! I get to choose my best man, and I want both you guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really?

name: joey
dialogue: Really?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, both you guys should be up there with me. I mean, you two are-are my… I mean, I’m lucky to have just one good

name: chandler
dialogue: Thanks man.

name: joey
dialogue: I got to go check something over here.

name: chandler
dialogue: What a baby.

name: ross
dialogue: Total wuss!

name: monica
dialogue: Guys, hurry up! The flight leaves in four hours! It could take time to get a taxi! There could be traffic! The plane could leave early! When we get to London, there could be a line at customs! Come on!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Six-hour trip to London. That’s a lot of Monica.

name: monica
dialogue: Passport, check!  Camera, check! Traveller’s cheques, check!

name: rachel
dialogue: Who are you saying "check" too?

name: monica
dialogue: Myself. you know for remembering to pack a thing. Yeah, you do a good thing, you get a check!  My mom does it, I never realized it was weird.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, my mom used to put her head in the oven. Well, actually, she only did it the one time. But it was pretty weird.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! Are you ready yet?

name: monica
dialogue: Yep! You got the tickets?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh! Got ‘them right here,  check!

name: joey
dialogue: It’s all London, baby! Here we go.

name: chandler
dialogue: You got your passport?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, in my third drawer on my dresser. You don’t want to lose that.

name: joey
dialogue: OH!!

name: chandler
dialogue: There it is.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, if you need the vacuum, it’s in my closet on the left-hand side. Ah, the garbage bags are next to the refrigerator

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, okay, but Rachel’s going to be here too, can’t I just ask her this stuff?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, okay, give that a try!

name: chandler
dialogue: All right! Let’s do it!

name: joey
dialogue: Woo-hoo!!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, cheerie-o!

name: joey
dialogue: London baby!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, because that’s not going to get annoying.

name: joey
dialogue: London baby!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you know what? I was wrong.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, we’re all here! I guess we should get going!

name: phoebe
dialogue: oh, I want to come over there and give you a hug and wish you luck on your wedding, but I don’t—can’t get up.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I’ll-I’ll come hug you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Great! Yeah, could you bring me the newspaper?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, have a great wedding!

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, hey, Chandler I want to hug you too!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, and great! You might as well bring me my book, it’s on the counter in your apartment.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh.

name: ross
dialogue: So, we’re off.

name: rachel
dialogue: Have fun!

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks!  Ugh, I can’t believe you’re not going to be there!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I know.

name: ross
dialogue: So-so come! Why don’t you come?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: To London! Come to London. Please? It’ll mean so much to me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, well, I got to work, I’m sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Why-why can’t you take a couple of days off?

name: rachel
dialogue: Because, I can’t! Ross, I told you, no. I can’t.

name: ross
dialogue: This is my wedding.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, you know what? We really are late! Let’s go! Let’s go! Let’s go!!

name: ross
dialogue: Fine. You’ll-you’ll watch it on video when we get back.

name: chandler
dialogue: Here you go Phoebe! Here you go Phobo! Phewbedo! Phaybobo.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thank you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thank you.

name: ross
dialogue: All right, let’s go! Bye, Pheebs!

name: joey
dialogue: Bye, Pheebs!

name: joey
dialogue: London baby!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, do you need a hug? You don’t have to bring me anything!

name: joey
dialogue: Come on! Do something!

name: chandler
dialogue: I am, I’m ignoring you.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, here!  I want to be the on camera guy. All right, first stop, Westminster Abbey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, what the hell is that?

name: joey
dialogue: It’s London, baby! All right, the hotel’s here.  Wait. No, we want to go… No. I know.  I’m going to have to go into the map.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, if you see a little version of me in there? Kill it!

name: joey
dialogue: I got it!  Here we go.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. Listen-listen, we’re not going to have to walk this way the entire time are we?

name: joey
dialogue: Shh!  Man, you made me lose it!

name: emily
dialogue: and that was all before 10 o’clock. The caterer rang and said it was going to be Chicken Kiev instead of Chicken Tarragon. And then the florist phoned to say there aren’t any tulips. Oh, and the chilliest has carpel-tunnel syndrome. We’re not going to be

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-whoa! Emily,  honey, okay?

name: emily
dialogue: Well, up yours too!

name: ross
dialogue: What?! No! No! That’s-that’s time-out!

name: emily
dialogue: Sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Sweetie, you got to relax. Everything’s going to be great, okay? Come on. Come on.

name: monica
dialogue: Chicken Kiev?

name: ross
dialogue: Um-hmm! Doesn’t that sound delicious at the last minute?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, you know, but something like salmon which would be so much more elegant than the chicken. And, you wouldn’t have to worry about the salmonella.  So, I can’t wait to see this place you’re getting married!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. Yeah. Yes, this place is beautiful. Emily’s parents got married here.

name: emily
dialogue: I still can’t believe they’re tearing it down. It really is the most lovely building you’ll ever see. I mean it’s over…  Oh my God!

name: monica
dialogue: It’s nice.

name: emily
dialogue: Oh. Oh.

name: emily
dialogue: Oh. Oh my God. How can this be happening? What are we going to do?

name: ross
dialogue: It’s all right! Everything’s going to be all right.

name: emily
dialogue: How’s it going to be all right?!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh, I see that.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I talked to the guy with the shovel and I found out what happened.

name: ross
dialogue: What? What?

name: monica
dialogue: They torn it down a few days early.

name: joey
dialogue: All right! Westminster Abbey! Hands down, best Abbey I’ve ever seen. Hey!  Okay. What do you think of the Abbey, Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: I think it’s great. It’s great. you know, they’re thinking of changing the name of this place.

name: joey
dialogue: Really? To what?

name: chandler
dialogue: To Put the Camera Away!!!

name: joey
dialogue: Man, you are Westminster Crabby.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh. Oh.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, honey! Don’t get up! What do you need?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, no. Oh, nothing.

name: rachel
dialogue: Come on! I am here to take care of you! What do you need? Anything.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, I have a wedgie.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, that is all you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So-so, what do you want for lunch?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I don’t know. I guess we have to eat.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I do. What’s the matter?

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m just bummed about the way I left things with Ross. I shouldn’t have lied to him about having to work. He seemed so mad at me.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Eh, don’t be so hard on yourself. If someone I was still in love with was getting married

name: rachel
dialogue: Still in love with?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m not in love with Ross!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh. No. No. Good! Yeah, me neither.

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, I’m going to Ross’s wedding because he is my ex-boyfriend and that would be really uncomfortable. Not because, I’m still in love with him! I mean, hey, you know, I like Ross as much as the next guy, you know? Clearly I have feelings for him, but feelings don’t mean love! I mean, I still have loving feelings for Ross. Yeah! But, I have, I have continuing feelings of love, but that doesn’t mean that-that I’m still in love with him. you know? I-I have sexual feelings for him, but I do love him—OH! Oh my God! Oh my—why didn’t you tell me?!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: We thought you knew!

name: rachel
dialogue: We?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, we all know! We talk about it all the time!

name: rachel
dialogue: You all know? Does Ross know?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no, Ross doesn’t know anything.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I can not believe you didn’t tell me!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, because we thought you knew!! It’s so obvious! God, that would be like telling Monica, "Hey, you like things clean."

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: the vendor
dialogue: So, what are you guys in the market for? We’ve got uh, scarves, tulip post cards...

name: joey
dialogue: Check this out? Huh?  Yeah. That’s the stuff. What do you think?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I don’t have to buy that, "I’m with stupid" T-shirt anymore.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I like it. Here you go.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right, look, you’re not really going to buy that are you? Don’t you think you’ve embarrassed me enough for one day?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, I embarrass you?

name: chandler
dialogue: How can I answer that when I’m pretending I don’t know you?

name: the vendor
dialogue: He’s just jealous. You’ll fit right in; all Londoners wear them!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh really? Then how come no one here is wearing them?

name: the vendor
dialogue: They’re all tourists.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right, look, if you insist on wearing that, in public, you know, you’re going to spend the rest of the afternoon all by yourself.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh yeah?  If you’re going to make me choose between you and the hat? I choose the hat.

name: the vendor
dialogue: Good choice.

name: joey
dialogue: Thanks.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, wait. All right, that’s it, okay, I’m out of here. I am not going to be embarrassed anymore!

name: emily
dialogue: Hello?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! I just spoke to your dad, and you know what? He seems to think we’ll be able to find a new place for the wedding.

name: emily
dialogue: We don’t have to.

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-what? You found a place?

name: emily
dialogue: No. But, Monica and I were talking, and-and I was so upset about the hall being knocked down, and she suggested that we put the wedding off for a bit.

name: ross
dialogue: She said what?

name: emily
dialogue: She said, "If I’m not going to be happy getting married somewhere that we find in a day, well then we should just postpone it."

name: ross
dialogue: Postpone it? Emily, do you think Monica realises how much our parents spent on this wedding? Do you my sister’s teeny-tiny little brain comprehends that people took time out of their lives to fly thousands of miles to be here, huh?  This isn’t right.

name: emily
dialogue: I realize that people are going to be disappointed. But, I’m sure they’ll come back when we can do it right.

name: ross
dialogue: I can’t ask people to do that? Would you ask people to do that?

name: emily
dialogue: Don’t you point your pants at me!  We have no choice! Anywhere that’s half-decent would’ve be booked months ago, Ross don’t you understand? This is our wedding I’m talking about.

name: ross
dialogue: The only thing I understand is; postponing it is not an option. This is when we’re getting married.

name: emily
dialogue: So what are you saying? It’s now or never?

name: ross
dialogue: No. I’m saying it’s now.

name: emily
dialogue: Or?

name: ross
dialogue: There’s no ‘or’ in mind. What is wrong with these pants?!!

name: emily
dialogue: It’s not the pants. It’s you that is backwards. And if, and if you don’t understand how important this is to me, well then, perhaps we shouldn’t get married at all!

name: ross
dialogue: No, wait! Emily! No, wait, stop! Emily, please—

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, did shopping make you feel any better about Ross?

name: rachel
dialogue: Manhattan does not have enough stores.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I think I can help you get over him.

name: rachel
dialogue: You can?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. I just need you to bring me some photos of Ross.

name: rachel
dialogue: Um-hmm.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And a small piece of chocolate.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And a glass of tepid water.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh, is this one of those things where you throw it in a bag with some graveyard dirt and hang it from a north-facing tree?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh, only if you have the hiccups too. Yeah, the pictures are for you, the water and the chocolate is for me. I just didn’t feel like getting up. Okay, I’m going to show you a picture of Ross. Okay? And you’re going to remember all of the bad things about him. All right? Really focus on his flaws.

name: rachel
dialogue: I can do that. I certainly did it when we were going out.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Umm, before we get started, I just want to say for the record that I love Ross, I think he’s such a great guy. Here.  Okay, now, close your eyes. And imagine that you’re with Ross okay and imagine that you’re kissing him. And you’re-you’re running your hands all over his body. And then you run your hands through his hair, but eww-oh gross it’s some kind of grease, it’s—uck! Hah?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don’t know, his uh, his hair never really bothered me that much, and you know it was always more crunchy than it was greasy.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, this is going to be harder than I thought. Umm, let’s try some uh, aversion therapy.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay?

name: rachel
dialogue: All right.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So uh, now look at the picture

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, and umm

name: rachel
dialogue: Ow!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, how do you feel now?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I like you less!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh.  Sorry!

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no-no, you know what? I really shouldn’t have said that you were embarrassing me, I mean that really wasn’t cool. And if it makes you feel any better, I’ve had a really lousy day.

name: joey
dialogue: Me too.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah?

name: joey
dialogue: No!! I’ve had the best day ever! Dude, check this out!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Sh-shh-shh!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, so say hi to my friend and tell him that you like the hat.

name: fergie
dialogue: Okay, so umm, what’s your friend’s name?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, Chandler.

name: fergie
dialogue: Hi Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: That’s… That’s was

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: joey
dialogue: That’s Fergie baby!!

name: fergie
dialogue: Joey says you don’t really like his hat, but I think it’s kind of dashing.

name: chandler
dialogue: How did you? How? How?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I was trying to figure out how to get to Buckingham Palace, right? So, I’m in my map and-and… Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi. I understand you had a little talk with Emily.

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, I did! And you are welcome!

name: ross
dialogue: Am I?! And was it your idea to postpone the wedding?!

name: monica
dialogue: Umm

name: chandler
dialogue: I’m going to go to the bathroom.

name: joey
dialogue: Wait up!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey-hey, since you’re the ‘fix-it’ lady, here’s a pickle, what do you do when the bride says she doesn’t want to have the wedding at all?

name: monica
dialogue: She said that?!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Why?!

name: ross
dialogue: I don’t know, I told her it was stupid to put off the wedding just because the hall was gone and she liked flipped out.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God. You’re even dumber than I am!

name: ross
dialogue: Excuse me?

name: monica
dialogue: Ross, how long have you been planning this wedding?

name: ross
dialogue: I don’t know. A month?

name: monica
dialogue: Emily has probably been planning it since she was five! Ever since the first time she took a pillowcase and hung it off the back of her head. That’s what we did! We dreamed about the perfect wedding, and the perfect place, with the perfect four-tiered wedding cake , with the little people on top.  Thanks. But the most important part is that we had the perfect guy who understood just how important all that other stuff was.

name: ross
dialogue: I had no idea. And that-that pillowcase thing, I thought you guys were just doing the flying nun.

name: monica
dialogue: Sometimes we were.

name: ross
dialogue: Come on. You got to help me figure out what to do. Okay?

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: Come on.

name: chandler
dialogue: That was pretty intense huh?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.  Hey, I hope Ross didn’t think that we just went in there because we were uncomfortable being out here!

name: chandler
dialogue: I hope he did!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hello.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, Pheebs! It’s Joey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, Joey! Hey! Ooh! Ooh! I just say someone on the—that looks just like you on the subway. And I was going to go over and say ‘hi!’ but then I figured, he doesn’t care if he looks like you.

name: joey
dialogue: That just cost me four bucks. But uh listen, I just called to see how the chick and the duck are doing?

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH, they’re having a great time with their Aunt Phoebe! Aunt Rachel hasn’t been helpful at all. So, do you miss me?

name: joey
dialogue: kind of, but I’ve just been having way too much fun.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So you’re not homesick yet?

name: joey
dialogue: No, I don’t think so.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, the seven of us miss you.

name: joey
dialogue: Who’s seven?

name: phoebe
dialogue: you know, me, Rachel, the birds, the babies

name: joey
dialogue: Ahh, the babies miss me?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, the pizza guy’s here!

name: joey
dialogue: What? You ordered pizza without me?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. But you know we were thinking about you, you know we ordered the Joey Special.

name: joey
dialogue: Two pizzas?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yep! Okay, got to go, talk to you later.

name: joey
dialogue: Wait, well, where did you get it from?!

name: emily
dialogue: Monica, why have you brought me here of all places?!

name: monica
dialogue: You’ll see.

name: emily
dialogue: I tell you, this wedding is not going to happen.

name: emily
dialogue: Oh God.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay? But-but imagine a lot more lights, okay? And-and you know fewer bricks, and-and-and flowers, and candles

name: monica
dialogue: And the musicians, look, they can go over here , okay? And the chairs can face this way , and…  You go.

name: ross
dialogue: But-but, if you don’t love this, we’ll do it in any other place at any other time. Really, it’s fine, whatever you want.

name: emily
dialogue: It’s perfect.

name: ross
dialogue: And, I don’t know, if it starts to rain

name: emily
dialogue: Well then we’ll get wet.

name: monica
dialogue: OH. And I don’t even have a date.

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you remember where the duck food is?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, it’s in the guys’ apartment under the sink. Why?

name: rachel
dialogue: Because I’m going to London.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?! What do you mean you’re going to London?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I have to tell Ross that I love him. Now honey, you take care, you don’t have those babies until I get back.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I—Rachel, you can’t go! Ross loves Emily!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I know, I know, I know he does. But I have to tell him how I feel! He deserves to have all the information and then he can make an informed decision.

name: phoebe
dialogue: That’s not why you’re going! You’re going because you hope he’s going to say, "Yeah, I love you too, Rach. Forget that British chippy."

name: rachel
dialogue: OH—Do you think he will?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! Because he’s in love with the British chippy! Look, Rachel, if you go, you’re just going to mess with his head and ruin his wedding! you know, it’s too late! You missed you’re chance! I’m sorry, I know this must be really hard, it’s over.

name: rachel
dialogue: you know what? No. It’s not over until someone says, "I do."

name: phoebe
dialogue: I do! I do! I do!  I do!  Ugh, like I can really chase you. I’m carrying a litter.

name: housekeeper
dialogue: The Waltham Residence.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh...yes.. is this.. umm.. Emily’s Parents’ house.

name: housekeeper
dialogue: This is the housekeeper speaking. And by the way, young lady, that is not how one addresses oneself on the telephone. First one identifies oneself and then asks for the person with whom one wishes to speak.

name: phoebe
dialogue: This is Phoebe Buffay. I was wondering, please, if-if it’s not too much trouble, please, umm, might I speak to Miss Emily Waltham, please?

name: housekeeper
dialogue: Miss Waltham, is at the rehearsal dinner and it’s not polite to make fun of people. Goodbye.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No no no, I’ll be nice, I swear!!!   Could you just give me the number for where they are?

name: housekeeper
dialogue: I’m afraid, I’m not at liberty to divulge that information.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ok, somebody is on their way to ruin wedding okay. And I have to warn somebody, alright. So if you don’t give me that number then I’m going to come over there and kick your snooty ass all the way to New Glocken..shire.

name: housekeeper
dialogue: Hangs up.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hello, Hello. OH, OHH, she knew I could kick her ass.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Hi. Mom. Dad.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Sweetheart. Oh sorry were late, my fault, I insisted on riding the tube.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Judy, the kids..

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Jack, that’s what they call the subway.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: OH, I thought that you....

name: ross and monica
dialogue: Dad, dad. We got it!! We Got It!!!

name: emily
dialogue: OH, here comes my dad and stepmom. Mister and Misses Geller, this is Steven and Andrea Waltham.

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: Hello. Hello. How do you do? How do you do? Very nice to meet you.  Darling it’s the Gellers.   Darling, it’s the Gellers.  She’s very self-absorbed, you know. I should never have married her.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Sorry, what?

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: It’s the Gellers!

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Where?

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: Well there’s one  and there’s another .

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Lovely to meet you.

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: Terribly nice of you to offer to pay for half the wedding.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: OH forget it. Too hell with tradition, we’re happy to do it.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: We know how expensive weddings can be, besides this may be the only wedding we get to throw .

name: monica
dialogue: Ha ha, a joke that’s funny in all countries.

name: waiter
dialogue: Sir?

name: joey
dialogue: What’s in it?

name: waiter
dialogue: Goat cheese, water chestnuts, and panchetta.

name: joey
dialogue: That’s not food...No, I don’t, no... Everything's different here...I want to go home. I...I miss my family. I miss the coffee house. I can’t even remember what Phoebe looks like.

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey, it’s been three days, okay.. Your just a little homesick, Okay. Would you just try to relax. Just, just try to enjoy yourself.

name: joey
dialogue: Your different here too. Your mean in England.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: What the hell!!!

name: ross
dialogue: what’s up, Dad?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: This bill for my half of the wedding. it’s insane.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: How could it be so much? The receptions at their house.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Flowers, liquor, recarpet first floor. New guest bath, landscaping. I’m paying to remodel this guys house.  I’m going to give that son on a bitch, a piece of my mind.

name: ross
dialogue: Dad, dad, please. Look I don’t want anything to upset Emily tonight. Alright, she's had a hard enough couple of days as it is.  Now here, here, let me go talk to him, okay?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: And you tell him no one takes advantage of the Gellers.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Ooh, Jack.... Sometimes I forget how powerful you can be.

name: monica
dialogue: And I’m going to go get drunk.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh.  Hi.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Hello.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hello. Umm, when is your next flight to London?

name: ticket agent
dialogue: There’s one leaving in thirty minutes.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, good.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: And I do have one seat left.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, thank you, thank you, thank you.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: The last minute fare on this ticket is twenty seven hundred dollars.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, I just don’t think I have enough left on my credit card.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Well you can split it with another credit card.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, okay, how about five.  OH, thank you.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: I’m just going to need to see your passport.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you know what? I don’t have it, but I can tell you exactly where it is on my night stand, and...okay. But you know what? I have my drivers license and I have a twenty.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, face it, my father is not going to pay for the build-in barbecue and believe me you can kiss you gazebo goodbye. Now I might be able to get you the new lawn.

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: Ahh, then you have to give us the lawn ornaments.

name: ross
dialogue: I go back there with lawn ornaments, he’s going to laugh in my face.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: This is ridiculous. I mean we had an agreement.  Will you say something, Steven?! Please!!!

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: Don’t take that tone with me.  All-all right you can.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi, Pheebs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh thank god. Oh, you changed your mind. Oh, look I know you probably want to be alone, and you don’t want to talk about it, that’s fine. I just want you to know, I think you are doing the right thing and...

name: rachel
dialogue: Bye, Pheebs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait!! Where are you going?! What are you doing?! No!! Wait!!  God!! Why am I always pregnant when she does that?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I’d like to toast, Ross and Emily. Of course, my big toast will be tomorrow at the wedding, so this is kind of my little toast or Melba toast, if you will.  Okay. I known Ross for a long time. In fact, I knew him when he was going out with his first girlfriend.  And I thought things were going to work out for him. Until the day he over inflated her.  OH, Dear God..

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Hello, Waltham Interiors.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, hi, Mrs. Waltham. I need to speak with ether one of the best men, or Ross’s sister Monica.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Who is this?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I’m Phoebe Buffay. I’m one of Ross’s best friends.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Well, if you’re on e of Ross’s best friends, why aren’t you here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, um, I can’t fly. I’m having my brother’s babies.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Oh, am I on the radio?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No.. umm, could I talk to one of them? It’s very  important.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: No, I’m bored with you now. I’m going to cut you off.

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH! Okay, I’m going to have to kick her ass too.

name: chandler
dialogue: And I’m sure we’re all very excited that Ross and Emily are getting married at Montgomery Hall. I mean to think, my friend getting married in Monty Hall.  OH, come on!! Monty Hall!! Lets make a Deal!! Come on, you people!! All right, forget it!! Congratulations, Ross and Emily.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, best man number two, Joey Tribbiani. Now I’m not good with the jokes like Chandler here. Boy...but ahh, I just want to say congratulation to the happy couple. I first met Ross in this coffee house back home...Home...New York City...Where everybody knows my name. Well anyway, I love you guys.  But not as much as I love America.  Could we please. Go home now?

name: felicity
dialogue: Are you going home? I was hoping to get to know you better.

name: joey
dialogue: I’m not going anywhere, sweetheart.

name: monica
dialogue: I was laughing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Out loud?

name: monica
dialogue: Well I didn’t want everyone to think I was stupid.

name: chandler
dialogue: So how are you doing?

name: monica
dialogue: My mother’s driving me crazy, but Ross is getting married. I’m happy.  I’m not going to let anything spoil that.

name: drunk man
dialogue: I just want to say that Ross is a wonderful young man.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, thanks, we like him.

name: drunk man
dialogue: My god!! You must have been a teenage when you had him.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: There’s no way in hell, I’m paying for it.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, were down to just one point. Could we please, maybe just settle it after the wedding.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: All-right fine, but I just want to say, I’m not paying for your wine cellar. You thieving, would be speaking German if it weren’t for us, cheap little man.

name: chandler
dialogue: The guy was hammered, okay? There’s no way, you look like Ross’s mother.

name: monica
dialogue: Then why would he say it?

name: chandler
dialogue: Because he’s crazy. Okay? He came up to me earlier and thanked me for my very moving performance in Titanic.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, my mother’s right. I’m never going to get married.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ahh, you know what? That is....Who wouldn’t want you?

name: monica
dialogue: OH, Please?! I’m a single mom, with a thirty year old son!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi, I’m back. Listen, I need to...

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Hello.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hello. I need to get on the 11 o'clock flight.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Oh I’m afraid that plane has already pulled away from the gate.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you know what/ You’re going to have to call that plane and tell them to swing around and come and pick me up.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: I can’t do that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Sure, you know what? Come on, we’ll just tell them that there was like a problem with like the "engine".

name: ticket agent
dialogue: I’m afraid I’m going to have to ask you to step aside, Miss.

name: rachel
dialogue: Look, If I don’t get to London!! He is going to marry that other girl!!!

name: ticket agent
dialogue: I can’t imagine why.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, you know what? I am not leaving here, until you call that plane back!!

name: ross
dialogue: I’m getting married today!! Whoo-hoo!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Morning, Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: I’m getting married, to..day!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah you are!!

name: ross
dialogue: Ahh, whoo-hoo!!

name: monica
dialogue: Do you think he knew I was here?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well I’ve-I’ve never done that with you before.

name: monica
dialogue: Nope.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, ahh, how are you? How you...How you... You okay?

name: monica
dialogue: Yep, yep...You?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes...Yes.. Uh-huh, You? We did you.

name: monica
dialogue: Well...I’d better get going.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yea yea, absolutely.

name: monica
dialogue: Could you not look?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don’t want to look.

name: rachel
dialogue: oh.

name: passenger
dialogue: Ahh, ahh, excuse me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah?

name: passenger
dialogue: If you’re planning on doing that throughout the entire flight. Please tell me now. So that I could that a sedative...or perhaps slip you one.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. I’m sorry. I’m very sorry. Sorry.  It’s just, I’m ahh, I’m kind of excited. I’m, ahh, going to London to ahh, tell this guy that I love him and...

name: joey
dialogue: Hello?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, were the hell have you been?!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey. I spent the night out. I met this cute bridesmaid. She is so...

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don’t want to hear about her!!

name: joey
dialogue: Ahh Pheebs, you know you’re still my number one girl.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! No, we have an emergency. Okay? Rachel’s coming to London.

name: joey
dialogue: OH great!!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No it’s not great. No, she’s coming to tell Ross that she loves him.

name: joey
dialogue: But, he loves Emily?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I KNOW THAT!!! You have to stop her!! She’s going to ruin the wedding!!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, so, okay...

name: joey
dialogue: Hold on. Hold on.  Rachel coming. Do...Something.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, so I’m done my part, okay. It’s your responsibility now, okay. The burden is off me, right?

name: joey
dialogue: Right!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So tell me about this girl?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Have you seen Monica?

name: chandler
dialogue: I’m not seeing Monica.

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Look we’ve got to find her. Phoebe just called!! Rachel’s coming to tell Ross she loves him!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my god!

name: joey
dialogue: I know! That’s why we got to find Monica!! You know where she is?

name: chandler
dialogue: No!! Okay!! What’s with the third degree?! Why don’t you just shine a light in my eyes?!

name: rachel
dialogue: ...And so then I realized. All this stuff I had been doing. proposing to Joshua, lying to Ross about why I couldn’t come to the wedding. Was all just a way of...

name: passenger
dialogue: Oh, oh oh!! I’m sorry, can I interrupt? You know I just want to say.. That you are a horrible, horrible person.

name: rachel
dialogue: Eh, pardon me?

name: passenger
dialogue: You say you love this man, yet you’re about to ruin the happiest day of his life. I’m afraid I have to agree with you friend Pheebs.. This is a.. this is a...terrible, terrible plan.

name: rachel
dialogue: But he has to know how I feel!

name: passenger
dialogue: But why? He loves this...this Emily person. No good can come of this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well I-I think your wrong.

name: passenger
dialogue: Oh-no. And by the way, it seems to be perfectly clear that you were on a break.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Oh my God! It’s like a fairyland.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: I know, it’s horrible isn’t it?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, I love it. I only hope my wedding looks this good.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: I just hope...

name: monica
dialogue: You can let some of them go by!

name: joey
dialogue: Pisst, Monica. Alright, we really need to start looking out for Rachel. I’ll cover the front door. You watch that big hole at the back of the building and I got Chandler covering Ross.

name: monica
dialogue: Why would I care where Chandler is? You know uhh...You know sometimes I don’t even like Chandler.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: I do. I do. I do.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yea, your right. It’s the second one.

name: ross
dialogue: Really?

name: felicity
dialogue: Hello Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, Felicity.

name: felicity
dialogue: Umm, I thought about you all day.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: felicity
dialogue: Um-hum. Talk New York to me again.

name: joey
dialogue: Fuggetaboutit.  How you doin?

name: felicity
dialogue: Mmm.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, yeah.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: There’s nothing to discuss. We’re not paying for your wine cellar.

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: You-you have to meet me in the middle here.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Hey, you keep pushing me on this, my foots going to meet the middle of your ass.

name: ross
dialogue: Dad!!

name: emily
dialogue: What-what’s going on?!

name: ross
dialogue: Nothing, nothing. Everything's under control.

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: You want a piece of me, sir? Is that what your saying?  You want a piece of me?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay! Okay! That’s it!! Parents!! Parents!! Back away!! All right, this is our wedding day!   From now on everyone gets along, and if I hear one more word. NO GRANDCHILDREN!  That’s right!!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Okay, okay.

name: mr. waltham
dialogue: Sorry old boy, sorry. Sorry. Sorry.  I could kill you with my thumb, you know.

name: emily
dialogue: What was all that about?

name: ross
dialogue: It was...This disagreement over... My god. You...you look beautiful.

name: emily
dialogue: OH... Oh! You were not meant to see me before the wedding. It’s bad luck.

name: ross
dialogue: You know what, I think we’ve had all the bad luck we’re going to have.

name: ross
dialogue: My God. Rachel!  Your here. I can’t believe it.  What happen? Why are you here?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well I just came... I just needed to tell you... Congratulations.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Hello, Waltham Interiors.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mrs. Waltham. Hi. It’s Phoebe again.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Why?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yea. Can I please, please, please talk to one of the best men? This is going to be the last time I promise.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Joey there’s a girl on the phone for you.

name: joey
dialogue: OH great!!  Hello.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Did you stop Rachel?

name: joey
dialogue: No, but it’s okay. She just came in and gave him a hug, that it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So nothing got ruined?

name: joey
dialogue: No.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh that’s so great! OH, so what’s going on now?

name: joey
dialogue: Ah, I’m-I’m walking down the aisle...Still walking.  I’m about to pass the bridesmaid I hooked up with last night.  Hey!  I told her "Hey." And now I’m at the front with Ross. It’s Phoebe.  He looks pretty mad. Uh...I’d better go.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No!! wait, wait, wait!! Oh please, hold it up so I can listen.

name: chandler
dialogue: What we did last night was....

name: monica
dialogue: Stupid.

name: chandler
dialogue: Totally crazy stupid.

name: monica
dialogue: What were we thinking?

name: chandler
dialogue: I’m coming over tonight though, right?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh yeah. Definitely.

name: minister
dialogue: Friends. Family. We are gathered to celebrate here today the joyous union of Ross and Emily. May the happiness we share with them today be with them always. Now Emily, repeat after me. I, Emily...

name: emily
dialogue: I, Emily...

name: minster
dialogue: Take thee Ross...

name: emily
dialogue: Take thee Ross...

name: minster
dialogue: As my lawfully wedded husband, in sickness and in health, till death parts us.

name: emily
dialogue: As my lawfully wedded husband, in sickness and in health, until death parts us.

name: minster
dialogue: Now Ross, repeat after me. I Ross...

name: ross
dialogue: I Ross...

name: minister
dialogue: Take thee, Emily...

name: ross
dialogue: Take thee, Rachel... Emily.  Emily.

name: minister
dialogue: Uhh...Shall I go on?

name: minister
dialogue: Friends. Family. We are gathered to celebrate here today the joyous union of Ross and Emily.  Now Ross, repeat after me. I Ross...

name: ross
dialogue: I Ross...

name: minister
dialogue: Take thee, Emily...

name: ross
dialogue: Take thee, Rachel... Emily.  Emily.

name: minister
dialogue: Uhh...Shall I go on?

name: rachel
dialogue: He-he said Rachel, right? Do you think I should go up there?

name: emily
dialogue: Yes, yes, do go on.

name: minister
dialogue: I think we’d better start again. Ross, repeat after me. I, Ross

name: ross
dialogue: I, Ross

name: minister
dialogue: Take thee, EM-I-LY

name: ross
dialogue: Take thee,  Emily.  Like there’d be anybody else.

name: minister
dialogue: As my lawfully wedded wife, in sickness and in health, till death parts us.

name: ross
dialogue: As my lawfully wedded wife, in sickness and in health, until death parts us. Really, I do. Emily.

name: minister
dialogue: May I have the rings?  Emily, place this ring on Ross’s finger as a symbol of your bond everlasting.  Ross, place this ring in Emily’s hand as a symbol of the love that encircles you forever.

name: ross
dialogue: Happy too.

name: minister
dialogue: Ross and Emily have made their declarations and it gives me great pleasure to declare them husband and wife.

name: ross
dialogue: Yay!

name: minister
dialogue: You may kiss the bride.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: This is worse than when he married the lesbian.

name: emily
dialogue: Just keep smiling.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, that went well. Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: It could’ve been worse, he could’ve shot her.

name: ross
dialogue: That uh, that was pretty funny. Wasn’t it?

name: emily
dialogue: You’ve spoiled everything! It’s like a nightmare! My friends and family are out there! How can I face them?! How can you do this to me?!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, no matter what happens with Ross and Emily, we still get cake right?

name: ross
dialogue: That-that-that’s all right, no honey, you take your time sweetie. I’ll be right out here.  She’s just fixing her makeup.

name: emily
dialogue: I hate you!!

name: ross
dialogue: And, I love you!!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Boy, bad time to say the wrong name, huh Ross?

name: ross
dialogue: That’s true, thanks dad.  People should be dancing! Huh? Hey, this is a party! Come on! Joey, dance!!

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Yes, Waltham interiors.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh, hello, this is Ross Geller’s personal physician, Dr. Phalange.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Who?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I’ve discovered that Ross forgot to take his brain medicine, uh, now without it, uh, in the brain of Ross, uh women’s names are interchangeable, through-through no fault of his own.

name: mrs. waltham
dialogue: Oh my God, Phoebe.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, not Phoebe, Dr. Phalange. Oh no! You have it too!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hello?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh wow, I hope you don’t take this the wrong way but, I know we had plans to meet up tonight and, ugh, I’m just kind of worried about what it might do to our friendship.

name: monica
dialogue: I know. How could we have let this happen?

name: chandler
dialogue: Seven times!

name: monica
dialogue: Ugh! Well, you know, we were away

name: chandler
dialogue: In a foreign, romantic country

name: monica
dialogue: I blame London.

name: chandler
dialogue: Bad London!

name: monica

name: monica
dialogue: I'm really getting tired of sneaking around.

name: chandler
dialogue: I know, me too. Hey! you know what if we went away for a whole weekend? You know we'd have no interruptions and we could be naked the entire time.

dialogue: All weekend? that is a whole lotta naked.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I can say that I have a conference and you can say you have a chef thing.

name: monica
dialogue: OH, I've always wanted to go to this culinary fair that they have in Jersey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, you know your not though. Let's go.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait! What about Joey?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, guess what I'm doing this weekend! I'm going to this culinary fair in New Jersey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh weird, Chandler just told us he's got a conference there!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh now that-that-that is funny, it seems like Chandler's conference could've been in Connecticut or Vermont.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm not in charge of where the conference is held. Do you want people to think it's a fake conference? It's a real conference.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Is Rachel here? I got to talk to her.

dialogue: No, she's out shopping.

name: ross
dialogue: Damn!

name: chandler
dialogue: What's going on?

name: ross
dialogue: I told Emily to come. And I just need to you know, talk to Rachel about it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait a minute! So when Emily comes you are just, you are not going to see Rachel anymore?

name: ross
dialogue: Well look, I'm just trying to focus on the "I get to see my wife," part, all right? And not the part that makes me do this.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow, so you guys are, you are never going to be in the same room together? How is that even going to work?

name: ross
dialogue: I have no idea. I mean… But-but I assure you I will figure it out.

name: joey
dialogue: Doesn’t seem like it's going to work, I mean

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi, guys!

name: joey
dialogue: Hi!

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: What's going on?

name: chandler
dialogue: We're flipping Monica's mattress.

name: joey
dialogue: So I'm thinking, basically we pick it up and then we flip it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah that is better than my way.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh okay, hey guys, would you flip mine too?

name: chandler
dialogue: Aww, man!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh look! A letter from my mom.

name: ross
dialogue: So, Rach, you know-You know how Emily's coming right?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah! I know.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Can you hear anything?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes, somebody just said, "Can you hear anything?"

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, Joey's ass! What are you doing?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, remember when they got in that big fight and broke up and we were all stuck in her with no food or anything? Well, when Ross said Rachel at the wedding, I figured it was going to happen again, so I hid this in here.

name: monica
dialogue: Ooh, candy bars, crossword puzzles

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, Madlibs, mine!

name: chandler
dialogue: Condoms?

name: joey
dialogue: You don't know how long we're going to be in here! We may have to repopulate the Earth.

name: chandler
dialogue: And condoms are the way to do that?

name: ross
dialogue: Anyway it-it kind of-it all boils down to this, the last time I talked to Emily

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! My dog died!

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God, Le Poo, our dog!

name: ross
dialogue: Le Poo's still alive?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh God, it says he was hit by an ice cream truck and dragged for nine--teen blocks. Oh.  Oh my God.

name: monica
dialogue: Sweetie, we heard you crying. Please don't cry.

name: rachel
dialogue: It's Le Poo.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know it's le poo right now, but it'll get better.

name: chandler
dialogue: I can't believe it! We're here!

name: monica
dialogue: Ooh, chocolates on the pillows! I love that!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, you should live with Joey, Roll-os everywhere.

name: monica
dialogue: Come here.  Okay, be right back.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes! Monica, get in here! There's a high-speed car chase on!

name: monica
dialogue: We're switching rooms.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh dear God, they gave us glasses!

name: monica
dialogue: No, they gave us glasses with lipstick on them! I mean, if they didn't change the glasses, who knows what else they didn't change.  Come on sweetie, I just want this weekend to be perfect, I mean we can change rooms, can't we?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, but let's do it now though, because Chopper 5 just lost it's feed!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, so uh, you know how there's something I wanted to talk to you about?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, you know how I'm trying to work things out with Emily. Well, there's this one thing… Okay,  here goes. I made a promise that--Oh hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: you are nose is bleeding!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh God.  No! Oh not again!  This-this happened when my grandfather died. It's ugh! Sorry.  Oh, okay, so I'm sorry, what-what were you-what did you want to tell me?

name: ross
dialogue: Umm

name: rachel
dialogue: Sorry. Sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, I uh, I can't see you anymore.

name: hotel clerk
dialogue: I think you'll find this room more to your liking.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, great.

name: hotel clerk
dialogue: They say he's only got half a tank left.

name: chandler
dialogue: Half a tank? We still got a lot of high-speed chasing to do!

name: monica
dialogue: We're switching rooms again.

name: chandler
dialogue: What? Why?

name: monica
dialogue: This is a garden view room, and we paid for an ocean view room.

name: hotel clerk
dialogue: Our last ocean view room was unacceptable to you.

name: monica
dialogue: Excuse me, umm, can I talk to you over here for just a second?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Look, these clowns are trying to take us for a ride and I'm not going to let them! And we're not a couple of suckers!

name: chandler
dialogue: I hear you, Mugsy! But look, all these rooms are fine okay? Can you just pick one so I can watch--have a perfect, magical weekend together with you.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, this one I like!

name: chandler
dialogue: Nothing! It's over! Dammit! This is regularly scheduled programming!

name: monica
dialogue: Can we turn the TV off? Okay? Do we really want to spend the entire weekend like this?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry, am I getting in the way of all the room switching fun?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, don't blame me for wigging tonight!

dialogue: Oh, who should I blame? The nice bell man who had to drag out luggage to 10 different rooms?

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know, how about the idiot who thought he could drive from Albany to Canada on a half a tank of gas!

name: chandler
dialogue: Do not speak ill of the dead.

name: monica
dialogue: We're supposed to uh, be spending a romantic weekend together, it-it, what is the matter with you?

name: chandler
dialogue: I just want to watch a little television. What is the big deal? Geez, relax mom.

dialogue: What did you say?

name: chandler
dialogue: I said, "Geez, relax Monnnnn."

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, what's up?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, you know how you told me I should do whatever it takes to fix my marriage?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I told you to give Emily whatever she wants.

dialogue: And while that was good advice, you should know that what-what she wants

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah?

name: ross
dialogue: is for me not to see you anymore.

name: rachel
dialogue: that is crazy! You can't do that! What are you going to tell her?   Oh God. OH, you already agreed to this, haven't you?

name: ross
dialogue: It's awful I know, I mean, I feel terrible but I have to do this if I want my marriage to work. And I do, I have to make this marriage work. I have too. But the good thing is we can still see each other until she gets here.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH! Lucky me! Oh my God! That is good news, Ross! I think that is the best news I've heard since Le Poo died!

name: ross
dialogue: You have no idea what a nightmare this has been. This is so hard.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah, really? Is it Ross? Yeah? Okay, well let me make this a just a little bit easier for you.

dialogue: What are you doing?

name: rachel
dialogue: Storming out!

dialogue: Rachel, this is your apartment.

dialogue: Yeah, well that is how mad I am!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

dialogue: How was your conference?

name: chandler
dialogue: It was terrible. I fought with  my colleagues you know, the entire time. Are you kidding with this?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, so your weekend was a total bust?

dialogue: Uh, no, I got to see Donald Trump waiting for an elevator.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, you are back too!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah. Umm, Chandler can I talk to you outside for a second?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, how was your chef thing?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, it was awful.  I guess some people just don't appreciate really good food.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, maybe it was the kind of food that tasted good at first but then made everybody vomit and have diarrhoea.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I'd like to know how much the room was because I'd like to pay my half.

name: chandler

dialogue: Urgh!!

dialogue: What are you guys woofing about?

dialogue: Chandler stole a twenty from my purse!

dialogue: No!!!you know what? Now that I think about it, I constantly find myself without twenties and you always have lots!

name: joey
dialogue: you are not going to like it.

dialogue: Maybe I could do it.

dialogue: Hi!

dialogue: Hi!

dialogue: Hey.

dialogue: Hey.

dialogue: Okay, Ross is in the bathroom.

dialogue: Who cares? you are Rachel!  Who's Kip?

name: rachel
dialogue: See? Yeah, you told me the story. He and Monica dated when they broke up they couldn't even be in the same room together and you all promised that you would stay his friend and what happened? He got phased out!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, of course I am! It's not going to happen to Ross! He's your brother.  He's your old college roommate. Ugh, it was just a matter of time before someone had to leave the group. I just always assumed Phoebe would be the one to go.

dialogue: Phoebe?  I'm sorry about the whole lifting out thing.  You got to come with me!

dialogue: Hi.

dialogue: Because of the weekend, we had a fight.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, this isn't over?

name: monica
dialogue: You are so cute! No. No, it was a fight. You deal with it and move on! It's nothing to freak out about.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really? Okay. Great!

name: monica
dialogue: OH, welcome to an adult relationship!

name: chandler

name: monica
dialogue: I'm afraid so.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

dialogue: Yeah, it's in there.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh! OH! Oh!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey, can I talk to you for a second?

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh!! OH! Oh-oh-oh! Oh-oh!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes. Yes.

dialogue: You?!  And-and you?!

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, but you cannot tell anyone! No one knows!

name: joey
dialogue: How?! When?!

name: chandler
dialogue: It happened in London.

name: joey
dialogue: IN LONDON!!!

name: chandler
dialogue: The reason we didn't tell anyone was because we didn't want to make a big deal out of it.

dialogue: But it is a big deal!! I have to tell someone!

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no-no-no-no! You can't!

name: monica
dialogue: Please? Please?! We just don't want to deal with telling everyone, okay? Just promise you won't tell.

name: joey
dialogue: All right! Man, this is unbelievable! I mean, it's great, but

name: monica
dialogue: I know, it's great!

name: joey
dialogue: Aww, I don't want to see that!

name: phoebe
dialogue: We're so stupid! Do you know what's going on in there? They're trying to take Joey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: The most popular Phoebe in tennis is called the overhand Phoebe. And if you win, you must slap your opponent on the Phoebe and say, "Hi, Phoebe!"

name: monica
dialogue: Oh that is cute! We really all enjoyed it. But you know, it doesn't count.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Count for what?

name: monica
dialogue: Count in our heads as-as good Madlibs.

name: joey
dialogue: I guess I'm done.

name: chandler
dialogue: Fun's over!

name: monica
dialogue: Wait-wait, guys! If-if we follow the rules, it's still fun and it means something!

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh!

name: joey
dialogue: I think I'm going to take-off.

name: monica
dialogue: Guys, rules are good! Rules help control the fun!  oh!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!! None of that, not while you are living under my roof!

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Look, just because I know about you two, doesn't mean I like looking at it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Aren't you supposed to be at an audition for another hour?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I'm sorry if I'm not a middle-aged black woman!  And I'm also sorry if sometimes I go to the wrong audition! Okay, look, if I have to pretend I don't know about you two, then you two are going to have to pretend there's nothing to know about.

name: chandler and monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Sorry.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: I can hear that!

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel's at work.

dialogue: I can still hear you!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hello!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, what's that?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, my mom sent me a family heirloom that once belonged to my grandmother. Can you believe it?! A year ago I didn't even have a family, and now I have heirlooms for crying out loud.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Eeeee--ooh!! God!

name: joey
dialogue: Argh-argh!!  Ooh, soft. Is this mink?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Why would my mother send me a fur? Doesn't she know me but at all! Plus, I have a perfectly fine coat that no innocent animal suffered to make!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, just some 9-year-old Filipino kids who worked their fingers bloody for 12 cents an hour.  That didn't happen, I made that up!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: gunther
dialogue: Oh, Ross? Ross! You can't put up flyers in here.

name: ross
dialogue: How come? Everybody else does.

name: gunther
dialogue: You can't.

name: monica
dialogue: What is that?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, umm, I'm just getting rid of a couple of things.

name: monica
dialogue: This is all of your things.

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, yes it is! No, but it's good it's—Emily thinks we should get all new stuff. Stuff that is just ours, together. You know brand new.

name: monica
dialogue: So basically, this is a getting-rid-of-everything-Rachel-ever-used sale.

name: ross
dialogue: Touched. Used. Sat on. Sleep on.

name: gunther
dialogue: I'll take it all.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, Ross, you are okay with that?

name: ross
dialogue: Look, if I can just do what Emily wants and get her to New York, I'm sure everything will be fine.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, but don't you think this is a little extreme?

name: ross
dialogue: After what I did? Can you blame her?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! You got off easy! When my friend Silvie's husband said someone else's name in bed, she cursed him and turned his thingy green.

name: joey
dialogue: What is he doing? What, Emily, thinks Ross's furniture has got Rachel coodies?

name: monica
dialogue: Now calm down Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: No! Everything's getting' all messed up, you know? Emily won't let Ross see Rachel, we're not going to stop seeing Rachel, hence Ross stops seeing us!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I hate this. Everything's changing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah I know, we're losing Ross, Joey said hence

name: monica
dialogue: Look, I'm not happy about this either, but you know if-if Ross says he's happy then we're just going to have to keep our feelings about Emily to ourselves. Are you cool with that?

name: joey
dialogue: No! But you know, I'm an actor, I'll act cool.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, whoa God! Storage rooms give me the creeps! Monica, come on please hurry up honey! Please?

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel, if you want the little round waffles, you got to have to wait until I find the little waffle iron.

name: rachel
dialogue: I want the little round waffles.

name: monica
dialogue: All right.  Op, here it is! Right underneath the can of-of bug bomb. I wonder if the best place to put something that cooks food is underneath the can of poison?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you know what? I'll-I'll have toast!

name: rachel
dialogue: Argh!!!!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! Fog him! Fog him!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't know what I'm going to do about this coat.

name: joey
dialogue: I'll take it!

name: phoebe
dialogue: That might work!

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh-ooh-ooh, yeah!  Enh? All right, what do you think?

name: chandler
dialogue: you are on in 5 Ms. Minnelli.

name: ross
dialogue: No-no-no, it's just a bit sudden.  No, it's great. Okay? I'm totally on board. I love you too, all righty. Bye.

name: joey
dialogue: What's the matter Ross?

name: ross
dialogue: Nothing. Oh, actually, great news! I just got off the phone with Emily and it looks like I'm moving to a new apartment. Woo-hoo!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, her thought is, and I agree, fresh new furniture, why not a fresh new apartment? Her cousin has this great place to sublet, it's got a view of the river on one side and Columbia on the other.

name: joey
dialogue: that is way uptown! that is like three trains away!  Which is great! I love to ride that rail!

name: chandler
dialogue: So you are really okay with this?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes! Yes! I mean it's-it's kind of far from work, but uh, you know, I'll get so much done on the commute. I-I've been given the gift of time!

name: chandler
dialogue: Now that is so funny, because last Christmas I got the gift of space. We should get them together and make a continuum.

name: joey
dialogue: Now he's moving'? Man, what is Emily doing to him?  Ow!! He's not even here!!!

name: rachel
dialogue: You guys! You guys!

name: monica
dialogue: We were, we were just in the storage area and we saw this really creepy man!

name: rachel
dialogue: It was like this crazy-eyed, hairy beast man! He was like a, like a bigfoot or a yeti or something!

name: monica
dialogue: And he came at us with an axe, so Rachel had to use a bug bomb on him!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I-I-I just pulled the tab and I just fogged his yeti ass!

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh, like dark hair, bushy beard?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah!
