dialogue: Yeah, you fogged Danny.

name: rachel
dialogue: Please! We did not fog Danny! Who's Danny?

name: joey
dialogue: Dan just moved in downstairs. Yeah, he just got back from like this four-month trek in the Andes. Nice fella.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh he's nice. He's nice! You know, you always stick up for the people we fog!

name: danny
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! You might not remember us, but we are the girls that fogged you.

name: monica
dialogue: We're-we're really sorry we fogged you.

name: danny
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Just so you know, we-we didn't mean to fog you, we thought you were like a yeti or something.

name: danny
dialogue: Okay.

name: danny
dialogue: Yes?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Sorry to bother you, but I don't think we can accept your acceptance of our apology, it just doesn't really seem like you mean it.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: danny
dialogue: O-kay!

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! That guy is so rude!

name: rachel
dialogue: Really! What is with that guy? I mean you'd forgive me if I fogged you.

name: monica
dialogue: Well you did a little bit.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God, honey, I'm so sorry!

name: monica
dialogue: I totally forgive you!

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So listen, you know my friend Chris who owns the crematorium?

name: monica
dialogue: Crematorium Chris? Sure!

name: phoebe
dialogue: He says, that he would cremate my fur coat for free if I umm, you know, bring in the next person I know who dies.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! Oh my God, look at these pelts!

name: monica
dialogue: Don't get too attached, she's having it cremated.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Uhh, Phoebe, honey, honey, I know you are quirky and I get a big kick out of it, we all do actually, but if you destroy a coat like this that is like a crime against nature! Not nature, fashion!

name: phoebe
dialogue: This is fashion?!  Okay, so to you, death is fashion?! that is really funny.  Here's Phoebe umm, sporting uh, you know, cutting edge hairy carcass from you know, the steal traps of wintry Russia. I mean, you really thing this looks good? Because I do.

name: ross
dialogue: I know I miss you too. I can't wait to see you. I love you. Bye.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, what is in here? Rocks?

name: ross
dialogue: No-no, this is my collection of fossil samples.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, rocks.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm really going to miss this apartment. You know, Ben-Ben took his first steps right over there.

name: joey
dialogue: OH. Hey, remember when I ran into this thing  and it kind of knocked me out a little?

name: ross
dialogue: I loved this place! To tell you the truth, I wish I didn't have to move.

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh, are you saying that you are not entirely happy about this?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I mean if uh, if Emily gave me a choice

name: joey
dialogue: You do have a choice!! Ross, why are you listening to her?! Are you, are you crazy?!

name: ross
dialogue: Why?

name: joey
dialogue: It's not right what Emily wants you to do! She is totally--Ow!! Stop pinching me! Look, now you guys said I only had to keep my mouth shut as long as Ross was happy, right? Well he just told me that he's not entirely happy.

name: ross
dialogue: What's going on?

name: joey
dialogue: We all hate Emily!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No!!

name: monica
dialogue: No, Ross, we do not hate Emily. We-we just, we just think that you are having to sacrifice a whole lot to make her happy.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah!

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, we just think that maybe she's being a little unreasonable.

name: joey
dialogue: Yes! Yes! Unreasonable!

name: ross
dialogue: Unreasonable? How about we have this conversation when one of you guys gets married! You have no idea what it takes to make a marriage work! All right, it's about compromise! Do you always like it? No! Do you do it? Yes! Because it's not all laughing, happy, candy in the sky, drinking coffee at Central Perk all the time! It's real life, okay? It's what grown-ups do!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I think he's right. You guys hang out at the coffeehouse way too much.

name: monica
dialogue: God, I feel so guilty about Ross.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I know.

name: joey
dialogue: I kind of feel like it's my fault.

name: chandler
dialogue: Kind of? If you just kept this to yourself none of this would've happened.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I'm keeping so many things to myself these days, something was bound to slip out!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I think it's very brave what you said.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, I can't sit here anymore. I have to walk places.

name: chandler
dialogue: Pheebs, what are you doing with the coat? How about the whole animal rights thing?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I've been reading up and for your information, minks are not very nice. Okay, I admit it! I love this coat! Okay, I—it's the best thing I've ever had wrapped around me, including Phil Huntley!  Remember Phil Huntley? He was fine!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: danny
dialogue: So you like the short hair better.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Yeti—I mean Danny?

name: danny
dialogue: I had to cut my hair to get rid of the uh, fogger smell.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. Listen, I'm so sorry. I would, I would've never fogged you if you know if you hadn't looked so….you know.

name: danny
dialogue: Absolutely. Some people are just into appearances.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: danny
dialogue: that is cool. Cool.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Hey! No-no-no! This not cool! You don't even know me!

name: danny
dialogue: Come on, you got the shopping bags and the Sack's catalogue.

name: rachel
dialogue: So from that you think you've got me all figured out? Well, you don't! You know I-I could have toys for underprivileged kids in here!

name: danny
dialogue: Do you?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you know, if-if kids like to play with Capri pants.

name: danny
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: And stop saying that! I hate that!

name: danny
dialogue: Okay!

name: rachel
dialogue: Fine! I judged you. I made a snap judgement. But you did it too! And you are worse because you are sticking to your stupid snap judgement! You can't even open up your mind for a second to see if you are wrong! What does that say about you?

name: danny
dialogue: The pizza-place across the street any good?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: danny
dialogue: I'm hungry. want to get some pizza? You can keep yelling if there's more.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Okay.

name: danny
dialogue: Stop saying that. I hate that.

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, Ross?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are you still mad at us?

name: ross
dialogue: Yep.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh good! Because we have an "I'm sorry" song.

name: ross
dialogue: You know what? I'm really not in the mood.

name: joey
dialogue: Look, Ross, I feel really bad. I mean, you are going through all this stuff and I just acted like a jerk.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, we are so sorry.

name: phoebe
dialogue: you are kind of stepping on the song.

name: joey
dialogue: Look, we were way out of line, we totally support you.

name: monica
dialogue: Whatever you decide, whatever you do.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, now you are just taking lines right out of the song!

name: ross
dialogue: Look, this is hard enough! I really need you guys right now.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes! Exactly! And that is why

name: monica
dialogue: Why don't you come over tonight? And I'll make you favourite dinner.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay. Thanks you guys. Pheebs are you wearing fur?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, let's get some perspective people; it's not like I'm wearing a seeing-eye dog coat!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, you know Ross, I think I kind of understand why I kind of lost it today.

name: ross
dialogue: You do, huh?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah you see umm, well, I'm an actor. Right? So I got to keep my emotions right at the surface you know? See what I'm saying? I got to lot of balls in the air. you know what I mean? It's tough! Guys like me, you know, you wander around, you are alone

name: ross
dialogue: What are you talking about?

name: joey
dialogue: I'm not sure.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, look at you! Where have you been?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I went to have pizza. With Danny.

name: monica
dialogue: How did that happen?

name: rachel
dialogue: That yeti is one smooth talker.

name: monica
dialogue: I hope you are not full, Because dinner's almost ready.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, you know I-I think I'm just going to hang out in my room.

name: all
dialogue: No! Why?

name: rachel
dialogue: Come on you guys! Listen, if Emily knew I was here having dinner you with you she would flip out and you know it. It's okay, I really… I don't mind.

name: ross
dialogue: Wait! Wait! Wait! You know what? Just stay. Please? It uh… It would really mean a lot to me if you stayed.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, I

name: joey
dialogue: RACHEL PLEASE!!! JUST HAVE DINNER WITH US!!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Okay. Joey, it's okay. Settle down.

name: joey
dialogue: All right, I-I'm sorry. I'm sorry. You see Rach I'm an actor

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! Hey, look! Ugly Naked Guy's back!

name: rachel
dialogue: I haven't seen him in so long!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh God, I really missed that fat bastard!

name: monica
dialogue: Wow, this is so weird. I just realized this might be the last time we'll all be hanging out together.

name: joey
dialogue: It's almost as if he knew.

name: monica
dialogue: I'll get it.  Hello.  Hi Emily!  Yeah, uh you-you tracked him down. Hold on one second.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!  Yeah-yeah, we're just having dinner.  Uh, yeah, sure uh hold on.  She wants to say hi.  Hold on.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi Emily!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi!

name: emily
dialogue: Hello everyone. So who am I saying hello too?

name: joey
dialogue: Well uh, I don't know about who's here, but I can tell you for damn sure who's not here and that is Rachel!!

name: emily
dialogue: Well, I should hope not. Ross knows better than that by now.

name: ross
dialogue: You know what? Uh, Rachel is here!

name: emily
dialogue: She's there?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah, there-there she is!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, yeah, she's here.

name: emily
dialogue: Ross, take me off speakerphone.

name: ross
dialogue: Hi.

name: emily
dialogue: How can you do this too me?! I thought I'd made my feelings about Rachel perfectly clear!

name: ross
dialogue: Look Emily, I'm just having dinner with my friends, okay?

name: emily
dialogue: You obviously can't keep away from her.

name: ross
dialogue: Emily that is ridiculous. Look, I'm-I'm moving for you, I'm cutting friends out of my life for you. Please, just get on the plane and come to New York. Okay, you'll see you are the only person I want to be with.

name: emily
dialogue: I'll feel better when I'm there, and I can know where you are all the time.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, you can't know where I am all the time. Look, this marriage is never going to work if you don't trust me.

name: emily
dialogue: you are right.

name: ross
dialogue: So, can you trust me?

name: emily
dialogue: No.

name: joey
dialogue: I think it's going okay. Looks like he's smiling.

name: monica
dialogue: How can you tell? You can only see the back of his head!

name: joey
dialogue: You can totally tell! Here look, watch me.  Smile! Frown. Smile! Frown.  Smile!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I guess that is it.

name: all
dialogue: Why, what happened?

name: joey
dialogue: What happened? What happened?

name: ross
dialogue: My marriage is over.

name: all
dialogue: What?!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, sweetie. Oh, look at you. you are shivering.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, honey, is there anything we can do?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. You can help me get my furniture back from Gunther.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, stop tormenting me! This mink! Okay, they're mean! And they hate squirrels! And you know, okay, most of these probably wanted to be coats!  All right, fine, now I get it.  Here.  You take it.  Are you happy now? I'm cold!

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you looking at naked tribe's women?

name: joey
dialogue: No, look.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is a pig.

name: joey
dialogue: I know, I know, but look at the knobs on her.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Emily's cousin kicked me out!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Why?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, when you are subletting an apartment from your wife's cousin and then you get a divorce, sometimes the cousin suddenly wants his apartment back.

name: chandler
dialogue: How can he do that? Didn't you sign a lease?

name: ross
dialogue: Who needs a lease when it's family!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, you can stay with us! We'll take care of you!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, yeah! Absolutely! Anything you need man! But you have to promise me the second you are feeling better so that we can make fun of your hair!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: You got it.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks you guys, I really appreciate this. All right, I'm going to get packing again. Man, I've been moving around so much I'm beginning to feel like a nomad.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: He thought you said gonad.

name: health inspector
dialogue: Wow, Monica, if every restaurant is as clean as yours, I'd have a tough time making a living.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, Larry.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, do health inspectors work on commission?

name: larry
dialogue: No, bribes.

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's okay to laugh right?

name: larry
dialogue: Yeah, I was just kidding.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: larry
dialogue: I'll check the kitchen floors.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, knock yourself out, Larry.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yum-my!

name: monica
dialogue: Larry?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah! I'd let him check out my kitchen floors.

name: larry
dialogue: A 98. I deducted 2 points because you are not wearing your chef's hat, and that is a Section 5 violation.

name: monica
dialogue: Uh, look, Larry honey, umm, I wrote the book on Section 5 and I know that you don't have to wear your hat unless you are in the kitchen.

name: larry
dialogue: And where is your hat?

name: monica
dialogue: It's in the kitchen, I'll go get it.

name: larry
dialogue: Ahh that is the 2 points.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, you should really read that book you wrote.  Wow! You saw the hat in the kitchen and knew that she'd have to go in there hatless to get it. You can have your own health inspector detective show!

name: larry
dialogue: Oh, I don't know about that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but then I can be you sidekick Vunda.

name: larry
dialogue: Maybe uh, Vunda could give me her number and I can ask her to dinner sometime.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, she would love that! You know, Because you know all the clean places to eat.

name: larry
dialogue: I-I'll call you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: He's so funny!

name: monica
dialogue: Thanks.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you.  Mon?

name: monica
dialogue: Hmm?

name: rachel
dialogue: How's Ross doing? You know since all the Emily stuff.

name: monica
dialogue: He's not great umm, but he's dealing with it. Oh wait a minute, you are not going to try

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, honey, please, no, I can't get started with all that Ross stuff again. I mean, he's going to screwed up for a long time. And besides you know, I don't, I don't go for guys right after they get divorced.

name: monica
dialogue: Right, you only go for them 5 minutes before they get married.

name: danny
dialogue: Two pounds of Moca Java please.

name: monica
dialogue: Danny. Are you guys ever going to go out again?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know! He hasn't called me since that one time when we went out. I see him in the hallway, we flirt, I'm all ha-ha-ha-ha, and nothing.

name: danny
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi Danny!  Wow! Thirsty huh?

name: danny
dialogue: Uh, actually, actually, I'm having a party at my place on Saturday, it's sort of a house warming kind of thing.

name: monica
dialogue: OH, fun!

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, great!

name: danny
dialogue: Yeah, I'm really looking forward to it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: danny
dialogue: Okay, see you.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, I guess we won't be warming his house.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. All right, I see what he's doing! He's not asking me out, because he wants me to ask him out.

name: monica
dialogue: And you are not going to do that.

name: rachel
dialogue: that is right! Because that would give him the control! So now he's all ooh, coming up with this whole I've got a party thing you know, trying to get me to hint around for an invitation. Blew up in his face, didn't it?

name: monica
dialogue: So-so there is no party.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, there's a party. There's a party. But the power, that is still up for grabs. You follow me?

name: monica
dialogue: I think so. Se, he-he's not inviting you to his party because he likes you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Exactly.

name: joey
dialogue: Ross?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey roomies!

name: chandler
dialogue: Love what you've done with the place.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, yeah I know, I know, it's a lot of boxes, but again I really appreciate you guys letting me stay here.

name: joey
dialogue: Not a problem. And listen, hey! Since you are going to be here for a while, why don't—I was thinking we uh, put your name on the answering machine.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I uh, hope you don't mind, I kind of uh, jazzed it up a little. Check this out.  We will, we will, call you back!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, all right!

name: ross
dialogue: Pretty cool, huh?

name: joey
dialogue: you are fake laughing too, right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, the tears are real.

name: larry
dialogue: You look beautiful this evening.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Show me the badge again.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Shiny.

name: larry
dialogue: Oh, will you mind if I wash up? Because I came straight from work and who knows where these babies  have been.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You are just nonstop!

name: larry
dialogue: We're out of here!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why?!

name: larry
dialogue: Just walking past the kitchen I saw 10 violations! I'm shutting this place down!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You have the power to do that?

name: larry
dialogue: This does.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Shut it down.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: joey
dialogue: Nothing.

name: chandler
dialogue: You built a fort didn't you?

name: joey
dialogue: kind of.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God, the air purifier! Ross's air purifier! All I heard through 4 years of college was

name: joey
dialogue: Dude, you should've gone out once and a while.

name: chandler
dialogue: I hate this thing!

name: joey
dialogue: Come on, Chandler, Ross is our friend. He needs us right now, so why don't you be a grown up and come and watch some TV in the fort!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, hi Danny.

name: danny
dialogue: Hey guys, I just uh, wanted to invite you to the party tomorrow night.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, thanks! We'll try to stop by.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh, actually, I think I'm going to be busy.

name: monica
dialogue: You are?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! Remember I got that uh, gala.

name: danny
dialogue: Yeah, what's the gala for?

name: rachel
dialogue: It's a uh, regatta gala.

name: danny
dialogue: Really! You-you sail?

name: rachel
dialogue: No-no, but I support it.

name: danny
dialogue: Okay,  hope I see you tomorrow night.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: danny
dialogue: Take care.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.  Walked right into that one didn't he?

name: monica
dialogue: What one? You wanted him to invite you to the party and he did it!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, but he waited until the last minute! So if I said yes, he would know I had nothing better to do than wait around for an invitation to his stupid party. I said, "No!" Which puts me right back in the driver seat.

name: monica
dialogue: Great. So the ball is in his court?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ball? There is no ball.

name: ross
dialogue: Joey, please!

name: joey
dialogue: Sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah

name: chandler
dialogue: Hello children!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! want to play some foosball? Please?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: No-no, no! We have to move the table into my room, yeah! Because of all the boxes. Come on!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, I have one question. What is the deal with this?

name: chandler
dialogue: Bye-bye little puppet Joey hand?

name: joey
dialogue: No, the quiet down thing!

name: chandler
dialogue: You mean this.

name: joey
dialogue: Um-hmm! Look, I-I-I don't know how much more of this I can take! Did you know he taped over my Baywatch tape with some show about bugs! My God! What if that had been porn?

name: chandler
dialogue: All right look, you know, this maybe tough but come on, this is Ross! I survived college with him!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, I guess I can hold out a little longer. Let's have a game.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no-no-no!

name: joey
dialogue: YES!!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh fellas,

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, so he's out of here.

name: joey
dialogue: Um-hmm.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: You guys got anything to eat? I just went down to Johnos for some chicken and it was closed!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I took Larry there to eat but it was all violated. So we shut it down!

name: joey
dialogue: Pheebs, if this guy keeps closing down all of our favourite places, where are we going to eat?!

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know, clean places?

name: joey
dialogue: Umm, yum!

name: monica
dialogue: It's Danny.

name: rachel
dialogue: Don't let him in! I'm supposed to be at a regatta gala.

name: monica
dialogue: We'll be right there!  Can't you just say it starts later?

name: rachel
dialogue: What? What kind of a regatta gala starts at night?!

name: monica
dialogue: The fake kind!

name: danny
dialogue: Hey, hi, I need a ladle. You got a ladle?

name: monica
dialogue: We have a ladle.

name: danny
dialogue: Thanks, see you at the party.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, great!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, guys, you know what Larry would say? He would say, "See you ladle."

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I-I-I'm done with this. You want anything Ross? Sports? International? Apartment listings?

name: ross
dialogue: I'll take sports.

name: joey
dialogue: Mine!

name: ross
dialogue: All right. Uhh, international.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh that is mine too!  I'm Italian!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I guess I can check out those apartment listings, even though there's never anything in here.

name: chandler
dialogue: Not even on page 7?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah! you are—hey, you are right! Here's an affordable place,  two bedroom, close to work, ooh, it's available in five weeks!

name: chandler
dialogue: What about that circled one?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I-I don't know, it's kind of expensive for a studio.

name: joey
dialogue: But it's available now! Isn't it?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, it is.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, let's go look at it!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, let's go.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay!

name: chandler
dialogue: There we go!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh-oh-ooh, hey guys, I was wondering if you guys would uh, maybe chip in on some new air filters for the air purifier? I mean after all, we all are using it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Let's go quicker.

name: joey

dialogue: Okay. Sometimes I feel

dialogue: Okay, umm, question 2. Umm, did that marriage end A. Happily, B. Medium, or C. In the total abandonment of her and her two children?

dialogue: Yeah. See?

dialogue: Well then I guess then I-I would I would have to say C.

dialogue: Hmm, okay, total abandonment. Okay, reasons for abandonment, A. Top secret government work, B. Amnesia, or C. Or you are just a selfish, irresponsible bad, bad man?

dialogue: You know, I don't think I want the lipstick that much.  But umm… Oh, would you do me a favour? And umm, would you, would you give Lilly that, please?

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!

name: frank sr.
dialogue: Well Lilly, when you see Lilly would you give her that, that note? Because I wanted to talk to her at the memorial but, well I pictured her getting mad at me the way you got mad at me and I well, I chickened out. So, uh, I wrote her that note, would you give it to her please?

dialogue: Yeah, yeah. Why?

dialogue: She what?!

dialogue: She's dead.

dialogue: Are you sure?

dialogue: Well, if she isn't then cremating her was a big mistake.

dialogue: I can't believe this. I just—I can't believe this. How-how—Oh my God. How long ago?

dialogue: Phoebe, I-I-I-umm,  Oops.  I just, I-I-I-I don’t, I don’t know what to say. I just can't believe that you are my daughter, you are so pretty.

dialogue: Yes. Well, that is neither here nor there.

name: frank sr.
dialogue: So would it, would it make you feel better if I said I was very, very sorry that I left?

dialogue: You know what, it doesn’t matter what you say it's not going to make a difference anyway, so you can just go.

dialogue: All right. Well, you know in my defence I was a lousy father.

dialogue: that is a defence?

dialogue: Yes. Yes it is. I burned the formula and I put your diapers on backwards. I mean, I made up a song to sing you to sleep, but that made you cry even more!

dialogue: Well no, just-just that one. But, it was stupid. Let's see, how did it, how did it go. Umm.

dialogue: Bread, so you never go hungry.

name: ross
dialogue: OH.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And a scented candle for the bathroom, because well, you know.

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks. Thanks. And thanks again.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: guy
dialogue: Hi!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi!

name: guy
dialogue: Welcome to the building. I'm uh, Steve Sarah; I'm president of the tenants committee.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh hi! Ross Geller. And this is my friend Phoebe.

name: steve
dialogue: Oh hi Phoebe.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mr. President.

name: steve
dialogue: I came to talk to you about Howard.

name: ross
dialogue: Howard?

name: steve
dialogue: Yeah, he's the handy man. He's going to be retiring next week and everyone who lives here is kicking in a 100 bucks as a thank you for all the hard work type of thing.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh that is nice.

name: steve
dialogue: Yeah. So, do you want to give a check? Or

name: ross
dialogue: Oh. Uhh

name: steve
dialogue: Oh look, you don't have to give it too me right now! You can slip it under my door.

name: ross
dialogue: No-no, it's not that, it's just… I-I just moved in.

name: steve
dialogue: Well, the guy's worked here for 25 years.

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, but I've lived here for 25 minutes.

name: steve
dialogue: Oh, okay, I get it.

name: ross
dialogue: No wait, look. Look! I'm sorry, it's just I've never even met Howard. I-I mean I don't know Howard.

name: steve
dialogue: Howard's the handy man!

name: ross
dialogue: Yes but too me he's just, man.

name: steve
dialogue: Okay, fine, whatever. Welcome to the building.

name: ross
dialogue: Ugh, can you believe that guy!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. I really like his glasses.

name: ross
dialogue: so then President Steve told everyone that I was a cheapskate, and now the whole building hates me! A little kid spit on my knee! You know what I'm going to do? I'm going to throw a party. that is right. For everyone in the building, and I'm going to sit them down and explain to them, I am not a bad guy. I am not a cheap guy! I'm just a guy who-who stands up for what he believes in. A man with principles.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sounds like a fun party.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hmm. Look, Ross, if you want your neighbours to like you, why don't you just pay the hundred bucks? The party's going to cost you way more than that.

name: ross
dialogue: It doesn't matter! It's my principles! We're talking about my principles!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, I thought it was about your neighbours liking you.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, they'll like me. Once they come to my awesome PAR-TAY! Okay, I got to run. I got to go get some nametags.

name: rachel
dialogue: And that crazy party animal will be your brother-in-law.

name: chandler
dialogue: Very, very funny, but don't say things like that in front of Monica. I don't want you putting any ideas in her head.

name: rachel
dialogue: Umm, Chandler, you do realize that those ideas are probably already in Monica's head.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wh-wh-why?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, because she loves you and because you love her.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, so, what's that supposed to mean?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, Chandler, don't freak out! I'm telling you something you already know! Come on, she broke up with Richard because he didn't want to have babies. And she's a woman, and she's almost 30, and you know it's Monica.

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't see it that way. Okay? Because, I see two Monica's, the one that was my friend, who lived across the hall, and wanted to have a lot of babies and then the new Monica, who I just started to date. Now, who's to say what she wants?! I’m right. I'm right. Am I right?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, you are right, you are absolutely right. I mean that makes, that makes everything different.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. It's not different at all, is it?

name: rachel
dialogue: Not unless different means the same.

name: katie
dialogue: You were so funny with that waiter! you are such a nut!

name: joey
dialogue: You know, breadstick fangs are always funny.

name: katie
dialogue: No, you make them funny. you are the funny one!

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh, look Katie, uh listen, we-we need to talk. Okay? Umm, look I like you. I-I really do, I like you a lot. Okay? But sometimes when you, when you playfully punch me like that it-it feels like someone's hitting me with a very tiny but very real bat.

name: katie
dialogue: Aww, like I could hurt you. Are you making fun of my size? Don't make fun of me because of my size!

name: monica
dialogue: Isn't this great?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hmm.

name: monica
dialogue: Couldn't you just stay like this forever?  Chandler! Couldn't you just stay here forever?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, here, somewhere else, you know where-where ever.

name: monica
dialogue: Are you okay?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I'm cool. Casual.

name: monica
dialogue: What-what are you doing?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm just hanging out. You know, having fun. You know with the girl that I'm seeing casually.

name: monica
dialogue: Man, I knew it! I knew you were going to do this!!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: monica
dialogue: Get all freaked out because everybody was talking and just joking around about marriage and stuff.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you do want all that stuff, right?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh and you know what I want!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes! You want babies! You have baby fever!

name: monica
dialogue: I do not have baby fever!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh please, you are obsessed with babies and-and marriage and everything that is related to babies and-and marriage! I've got an idea, why don't we turn down the heat on this pressure cooker?!

name: monica
dialogue: Have you lost your mind? Chandler, this isn't about me! This is about you and all your weird relationship commitment crap!

name: chandler
dialogue: Nah-uh! I know you! Okay? I know the thoughts that you have in the head--in your head!

name: monica
dialogue: You don't know everything. Did you know that I'm going out with Rachel tonight instead of you? Hmm? And did you know that the only baby around here is you?! And did you know that I can't even look at you right now?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I did not know that.

name: chandler
dialogue: It's going to be okay, right? I mean she's not going to leave me? This is, this is fixable.

name: ross and joey
dialogue: Oh yeah, yeah, sure. Absolutely.

name: chandler
dialogue: By me?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, no!

name: joey
dialogue: No-no.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, unless you make some kind of big gesture.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, big!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh-oh, shht! The Misses.

name: monica
dialogue: Gunther, can I get a coffee  to go?

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm still not done not wanting to talk to you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Just tell me what I need to do to make things right.

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, that is what we do. You know, I-I mess up and then you tell me how to fix it and then I do and then you know you think I'm all cute again.

name: monica
dialogue: Really? I'm really tired of being your relationship tutor. you are going to have to figure this one for yourself. All right? You know what? If you are too afraid to be in a real relationship, then don't be in one.

name: party guests
dialogue: Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard!  Howard! Howard! Howard!  Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard!  Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Yay!!

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, hi Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I thought this was your party and it turns out it’s a party for Howard. He's just the sweetest little man!

name: guest #1
dialogue: See ya Phoebe! Oh and hey, thanks for chipping in!

name: ross
dialogue: You chipped in?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, uh-huh, a 100 dollars.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe! I can't believe you gave them money! I thought you agreed it was totally unreasonable that they asked me for that money!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but they didn't ask me! You know? This way I'm just you know, the exotic, generous stranger. that is always fun to be.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, but you are making me look bad!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No I'm not. No! If anything I'm making you look better! They'll see you talking to me and that is--I'm a hit!

name: steve
dialogue: Oh hey, Pheebs!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: steve
dialogue: Oh hey, Ross. Umm, see, I was thinking maybe you two could switch apartments because Phoebe's more our kind of people. Something to think about.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, okay, my bad.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Wow! You look, you look…big.

name: joey
dialogue: Thanks! I've been working out. Hey listen, is it obvious that I'm wearing six sweaters?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uhh, yeah. But it's not obvious why.

name: joey
dialogue: Well look, I’m breaking up with Katie so I had to put on some extra padding. You know? I mean, if she hits me when she's happy, can you imagine how hard she's going to hit me when I tell her I'm taking away the Joey love?

name: katie
dialogue: Hi!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Hiya!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! Hey, cute jacket!

name: katie
dialogue: Oh, thanks! that is so sweet!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! Ow!

name: katie
dialogue: Oh, ow! Did Joey tell you to say that? You guys,  are too much!

name: rachel
dialogue: Whoa! you know what Katie? I got to tell ya I-I-I-I think you are the one who is too much.

name: katie
dialogue: OH, Joey has the nicest friends!

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, and the nicest girlfriend!

name: katie
dialogue: you are so sweet!

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, you are so sweet!

name: katie
dialogue: Oww!!!! Joey, she just kicked me.

name: joey
dialogue: Huh.

name: katie
dialogue: Well? Aren't you going to do something?

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh….

name: katie
dialogue: You'd better do something, or I'm going to walk out that door right now! Well? Are you going to?

name: joey
dialogue: Nah.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is what I'm saying.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe? Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, this is a disaster! Can't I please just go?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! No! I'm talking you up to people. Just give it a little time, all right? Relax, get something to eat! Okay?

name: ross
dialogue: So uh, what did you tell them about me?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I was telling them about you and Emily. You know, try to get some sympathy.

name: ross
dialogue: OH.

name: phoebe
dialogue: But somehow you came off as the bad guy.

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I think I told it wrong. You know, we should talk about that because I don't totally understand what happened there.

name: ross
dialogue: OH, this cake is really good!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, okay, see? Things are looking up already!

name: guest #2
dialogue: Oh my God! Someone cut Howard's cake!  Who would do a think like that?

name: all
dialogue: Oh yeah, aww!

name: steve
dialogue: Okay, you got your free food! You ruined everyone's fun! Don't you think it's time you went home?!

name: guest #3
dialogue: Yeah, leave!

name: all
dialogue: Yeah, get out! Now!

name: steve
dialogue: Go back to 3-B, 3-B!

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, everyone calm down! Everyone calm down! I have something that I would like to say! Who here likes Ross?  Of course you don't like him! He-he didn't give you any money, he raised his own hand when I asked, "Who hear likes Ross," and he's wearing two nametags!  I-I'll be honest with you guys, when I first met Ross I didn't like him at all! But then once I got to know him I saw that he's really sweet and caring and very generous. I mean, all I'm saying is don't judge Ross before you get to know him all right? I mean, I like all you guys now, but when I first meet you you know Kurt, I thought, you know abrasive drunk, umm Lola, mind numbingly stupid! And okay, you guys   Gold-digger,  cradle robbing perv! So, I think you all know what I mean.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Obviously I didn't think they were going to start throwing things. I just thought if I kept insulting everyone, you would jump in and defend everyone and then you could look like the hero.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh wow, yeah! See, I did not get that.

name: chandler
dialogue: Where's Monica?! Where is she? I need to talk to her! It's urgent! Is she here?

name: monica
dialogue: I'm Monica.

name: chandler
dialogue: I need to talk to you, it's urgent!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, I've been doing a lot of thinking about us, you know a lot of uhh, us thinking. And uh, well I guess there's only one-one way to do this.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait what-wh-wh-what are you doing?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica

name: monica
dialogue: No-no, don't-don't-don't do it!

name: chandler
dialogue: Will you marry me?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh-no. No. No.

name: joey
dialogue: What a bad idea!

name: rachel
dialogue: oh, I cannot look at it!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, why are you doing this?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know. But I know I'm not afraid to do this.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm doing this because I'm sorry?

name: monica
dialogue: Do you umm, you really think the best reason to get married is because you are sorry?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, the best reason to get married is pregnancy. Sorry is pretty much fourth you know, behind being ready and actually wanting to get married.  Will you be my wife?

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, umm, I want you to take just a minute and I want you to think about how ridiculous this sounds.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I'm kind of wishing everyone wasn't here right now.

name: monica
dialogue: Honey! Do you know that none of that stuff came from me?! I mean I never said I wanted to have babies and get married right now!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah I know, but I was really confused and then I talked to these guys.

name: monica
dialogue: Who? Two divorces and Joey?!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: She's right you know.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, but still, cheap shot!

name: monica
dialogue: You know what? You know when I said that I want you to deal with this relationship stuff all on your own? Well, you are not ready for that.

name: chandler
dialogue: I didn't think I was!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, what would have done if I said yes?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well I would've been happy because I would've be able to spend the rest of my life with the woman that I love. Or, you would've seen a Chandler shaped hole in that door.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Ross, will you pass me that knife?

name: ross
dialogue: No, I will not!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, it's okay. You don't have to be so mean about it.

name: ross
dialogue: you are right, I'm sorry. Will you marry me?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Aw, and I was going to ask you to marry me because I forgot to say hello to you last week.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh no wait Pheebs, I think for something like that you just ask them to move in with you. But I'm not sure, Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, how long is this going to go on.

name: monica
dialogue: Well I think the length of teasing is directly related to how insane you were so, a long time.

name: ross
dialogue: This is fun. Hey Rach, remember that whole "We were on a break thing?" Well, I'm sorry, will you marry me?

name: chandler
dialogue: that is not funny.

name: joey
dialogue: that is not funny at all!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: What are you guys doing up?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, we wanted to finish the crossword before we went to bed. Hey, do you know a six-letter word for red?

name: joey
dialogue: Dark red.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I think that is wrong, but there's a Connect the Dots in here for you later.  Hey, how about maroon?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, you are so smart!

name: joey
dialogue: Aww, you guys are so cute!

name: monica
dialogue: I know.

name: joey
dialogue: All right, I'll see you in the morning.

name: chandler and monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: dream monica
dialogue: You know, I love doing crossword puzzles with you honey!

name: dream joey
dialogue: Aww, me too. Now let's finish this and go to bed.

name: dream monica
dialogue: Okay! There's only one left, three letter word, not dog but

name: dream joey
dialogue: Cat.

name: dream monica
dialogue: Yes! You are so smart!  I love you.

name: dream joey
dialogue: I love you too.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uhh, we still need a tip.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right. Hold on.  I got it. Nickel!  How much more do we need?

name: rachel
dialogue: A couple of bucks.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, dime!  You guys should probably keep talking; this could take a while.  Oh no, wait! Look it! Whoa!  Oh my God, this is a police badge!

name: monica
dialogue: Wow!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh that is so cool! Why would a cop come in here though? They don't serve donuts. you know what actually, could you discover the badge again? I think I can come up with something better than that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, I bet somebody's missing that badge.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I should probably take it back. Ooh, but you know what? While I'm at the police station, I could check their Ten Most Wanted lists because my friend Fritzy has been like number 11 forever, so this could be her year!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, you guys!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Joey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey. That uh, that my sweatshirt?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh yes, it is. I'm sorry I borrowed it, I was cold. I hope its okay?

name: joey
dialogue: Well uh, it's just that uh, you know if-if you are going to be wearing someone's sweatshirt shouldn't it be your boyfriends--and I’m not him.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm sorry, I'll give it back to you.

name: joey
dialogue: No-no! No! I mean it's going to be all smelling like Monica!

name: monica
dialogue: Are you saying I smell bad?

name: joey
dialogue: No! No, you smell like a meadow.  I'm sorry.

name: monica
dialogue: What's with him?

name: chandler
dialogue: OH, you know what? The last time Joey went to a meadow, his mother was shot by a hunter.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I still don't know.  I'm sorry I just want to make sure that I bought the right couch. I need a couch that says, "Kids welcome here." But that also says,  "Come here to me!"

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! You say that to kids?!!

name: ross
dialogue: No! No! No! The "Come here to me" is you know for the ladies.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, honey, it's a nice couch. It's not a magic couch.

name: the salesman
dialogue: You picked a great couch.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: the salesman
dialogue: Yeah. Could you just sign right here please?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, sure. Whoa-whoa, what's this? The delivery charge is almost as much as the couch!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait! No, that is ridiculous. Come on, he lives three blocks away!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, you know what? I'll take it myself, thank you!  All right Rach, let's go!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah!   Are you kidding'?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, come on it's only three blocks! And-and, it's not very heavy, try it! Come on! Come on!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. Oh! I can do it!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah!

name: the salesman
dialogue: You two are really going to enjoy that couch.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah, we're uh, yeah we're not together.

name: the salesman
dialogue: OH, okay.  Something didn't quite add up there.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: What's that supposed to mean?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross!

name: the salesman
dialogue: Well you, her, I mean, she's very…You know. And you are like…You know.

name: ross
dialogue: Not that it's any of your business, but we did go out.

name: the salesman
dialogue: Really? You two?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah! Rach?

name: rachel
dialogue: Come on, I don't really want to be doing this right now. I am carrying a very heavy couch.

name: ross
dialogue: Then tell him quickly.

name: rachel
dialogue: Fine!  We went out.

name: ross
dialogue: Not only did we go out, we did it 298 times!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross!! Oh my--ugh!! You kept count?! You are such a loser!

name: ross
dialogue: A loser you did it with  298 times!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh. Oh! Ma'am? Excuse me, ma'am?

name: the smoking woman
dialogue: Yes?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You can't put your cigarette out on a tree!

name: the smoking woman
dialogue: Yeah I can, it worked real well.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No but you shouldn't! Don't ever do that again.

name: the smoking woman
dialogue: I won't!  Until I have my next cigarette.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hold it!  N.Y.P.D! Freeze punk!

name: the smoking woman
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah that is right you are so busted.  Book them.

name: the smoking woman
dialogue: Who are you talking too?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Save it Red! Unless you want to spend the night in the slammer, you apologize to the tree.

name: the smoking woman
dialogue: I am not going to apologize to a tree!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You apologize to the tree right now or I am calling for backup.   Backup! Backup!!

name: the smoking woman
dialogue: I-I'm sorry! Sorry.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, cancel backup! Cancel backup!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, didn't you say that there was an elevator in here?

name: ross
dialogue: Uhh, yes I did but there isn't. Okay, here we go.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, go left. Left! Left!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you know what? There is no more left, left!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh okay, lift it straight up over your head! Straight up over your head! You can do it! You can do it!  Okay. You got it?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: Good-good-good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh-oh!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, you got it right? You got it right? You got it?

name: rachel
dialogue: Any chance you think the couch looks good there?

name: phoebe
dialogue: so this guy was all  And I'm all, Buffay, Homicide.  It was just so cool!

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, you were supposed to take that back!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know but I'm having so much fun doing good deeds.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, but impersonating a police officer is a serious thing. You could get arrested.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You could get arrested, right now!  All right, yeah, I got to take it back. I'm totally drunk with power.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!  Oh.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi, Joe.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I didn’t know you guys were going to be here.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Joey, sweetie, taste this.

name: joey
dialogue: What?! Why?!

name: monica
dialogue: What is going on with you?

name: joey
dialogue: Nothing!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, come on! You've been acting strange all day!

name: joey
dialogue: All right! There is something. I kind of had a dream,  but I don't want to talk about it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-what-what if Martin Luther King had said that?  I kind of have a dream! I don’t want to talk about it.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, it involved Monica.

name: chandler
dialogue: You had a dream about a girl that I am seeing?! Oh, that is so cool!  I can't tell you how many times I've dreamt about a girl that he was seeing.   Anyway we're talking about your dream.  I love you.  Your dream?

name: joey
dialogue: Don't worry, there wasn't any sex in it or anything. I haven't dreamt about her like that since I found out about you two--ish.

name: monica
dialogue: What was the dream about?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, okay. You were my girlfriend and we were doing the crossword puzzle. You know like you guys were doing last night. So, that is it. I'm in love with Monica and I'll be moving out.

name: monica

dialogue: that is quite all right, but I feel obligated to tell you that this meeting is being videotaped.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Umm, well, first I would like to start by apologizing for kissing you and uh, for yelling at you.

name: mr. zelner
dialogue: Fair enough.

name: rachel
dialogue: Now you are probably going to hire one of the people who did not ah,  who did, who did not umm, yell at you and storm out, and I think that is a big mistake and here's why. I made a huge fool of myself and I came back, that shows courage. When I thought you wanted sex in exchange for this job, I said no. That shows integrity. And, I was not afraid to stand up for myself and that shows courage.  Okay umm, now I know I already said courage, but you know you got to have courage. And umm, and finally when I thought you were making sexual advances in the workplace, I said no and I was not litigious. {By the way, litigious means to want to litigate and litigate is to make a lawsuit against.  So she didn't want to sue him.   Don't worry, I had to look it up too.} So there you go, you got, you got  courage, you got integrity, you got  courage again, and not litigious. Look Mr

name: mr. zelner
dialogue: Zelner.

name: rachel
dialogue: Zelner! Right! I knew that! I really, really want this job and I think, I think I would be really good at it.

name: mr. zelner

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! You are?

name: mr. zelner
dialogue: Um-hmm.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really? Oh thank you! Oh… Oh, would it be completely inappropriate to give you a hug?

name: mr. zelner
dialogue: Yes!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, well then how about a handshake?  Oh God I'm sorry! Oh God, I'm sorry! I did not mean to touch that—I mean you there. There. Uhh, okay, so thank-thank you, I'm going to leave now thank you very much uh-huh, thank you so—Hey! I'll see you Monday!

name: monica

name: chandler

name: chandler

name: monica

name: chandler

name: monica
dialogue: Really?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah! I've never been in a relationship that is lasted this long before. You know to get past the beginning and still be around each other all the time, I think that is pretty incredible. And the fact that this is happening all with you, yeah I think that is pretty exciting.

name: monica
dialogue: That is so sweet. I know that I was acting a little crazy but umm, I feel the same way.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: You know what I just realized? You just freaked out about our relationship.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes you did! Admit it! You freaked out!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I freaked out a little.

name: chandler

dialogue: Oh no, my dad's a doctor and he would always tell me just horror stories……about ghosts and goblins who totally supported the princess's right to smoke.

And then when the day comes when Kim wants to promote one of us, who do you think she's going to pick? Me or Smokey Smokerson?

dialogue: Well, you just

dialogue: Well I mean, let me get the door first.  Oh, hi! No one.

dialogue: You just give him a spoon baby!

dialogue: No well, no it's not that bad, you know? I mean yeah, my tongue feels a little fuzzy and these fingers sort of smell, I actually feel like I can throw up.

dialogue: Okay, but you got to push past this because it is about to get so good!

dialogue: I think you smell great!

name: rachel
dialogue: I am so on board!

dialogue: It does sound appealing.

dialogue: Oh but you could. You can. Absolutely! We can help each other out! We can get--what are those--those patches! We could be like the Patch Sisters!

dialogue: OH you know, we really should quit. Okay, let's quit!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes! Great! Give me those cigs! Give it! Give it!

dialogue: Okay then!

dialogue: Hmmm, soup!  Hmm soup!  Hmm, soup!

dialogue: Hi Ben! So you want to be an actor huh? I got to tell ya, it's no picnic. There's tons of rejection. No stability. One day you are Dr. Drake Ramoray, the next day you are eating ketchup right out of the bottle.

name: joey
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: Ben!   I mean, Ben! Ben!

dialogue: Hi!

dialogue: Uh-oh.

name: the casting director
dialogue: Is there a problem?

dialogue: Well this is noodle soup and uh, I've been working with tomato. But that is okay, no problem. No problem. Hmm, noodle soup.

dialogue: You know, that is-that is fine, but the line is, "Hmm, soup."

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, what did I say?

name: the casting director
dialogue: Hmm, noodle soup.

name: joey
dialogue: How's that different?  Oh! Yeah!

name: the casting director
dialogue: All right, let's try one.

name: joey
dialogue: Hmm, noodle soup.

dialogue: Okay. Let's do it again.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Hmm, soup.  I mean, noodle soup. I mean soup!

dialogue: COME ON!!!!

dialogue: You know what? We need to move on.

name: joey
dialogue: No! No! I-I can do it one more time! See? Look!  Hmm, noodle soup. Damnit!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! Hey-hey-hey!!

name: kim
dialogue: Uh-oh, busted!

name: rachel
dialogue: Come on you guys! What are doing?! I thought we were the patch sisters!

name: kim
dialogue: Yeah. That didn't work out.

dialogue: Rachel we tried to quit, but it was too hard!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well you know if you, if you started smoking again you could've at least told me! Come on, give me one of those! What are we talking about?

dialogue: No. No! you are doing great! Don’t you give up! that is why we didn't tell you and we're not going to drag you down with us.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wait, no-no-no! Drag me down. Drag-drag me down.

dialogue: Forget it Rachel! We're both so proud of how well you are doing. I'm not going to let you blow it. In fact, if I catch you with a cigarette, you are fired. So go on, get out of here! Go on, I don't want you breathing this stuff! Go on!

dialogue: Okay, guys, listen, don't forget that tomorrow is the day that Emily gets married again, so whatever we do, just try to really keep Ross's mind off of it.

dialogue: Hey man, what's up?

dialogue: Oh, eh, just thinking about Emily getting married tomorrow.

dialogue: What? Where?

name: joey
dialogue: Right over there! Right there! Look-look-look!

name: ross
dialogue: What am I looking at?

dialogue: Somebody help me out here!

dialogue: Hey!

name: gary
dialogue: Hello!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: gary
dialogue: How are you?

dialogue: Monica, I'm sorry I didn't come by last night. I was out with Gary; he let me ride around with him in his cop car. We saw and prevented crimes.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh!

dialogue: Okay!

dialogue: Yeah, yeah! Me too!

dialogue: Really?! You?

dialogue: Yeah.

dialogue: Well, it's kind of dangerous.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I like danger.

name: gary
dialogue: Okay, you guys free tonight?

dialogue: Yeah!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Tonight? You-you didn't say it was going to be at night-time.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! Oh, I'm so glad you are home, I thought tonight we could finally organize these photos!

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, thank God! Finally!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I've broken them down into categories. Okay, we have uh, we got holidays, birthdays, candids, you know… And then what I've done is I've cross-referenced them by subject. Right? So if you are looking up, oh let's say birthdays and dogs, you get Photo 152. See?

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, it's me and La Poo! Wow! I miss that dog.

name: monica
dialogue: You can also find him under umm, dog and dead.

name: rachel
dialogue: Great! Thanks!

name: monica
dialogue: All right, hand me that other box of photos; that is the very last one.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oops. Sorry! Well, good thing you number all of them, huh?

name: monica
dialogue: I hadn't! Photo 152 was a prototype.

name: rachel
dialogue: oh. Honey, honey, honey, it's okay, it's okay honey. I'm going to fix you a drink, huh? Maybe a margarita?

dialogue: Ross has the blender! Ugh, everything's just falling apart!

name: rachel
dialogue: No honey, it's okay! Listen, I'll got to Ross's and get the blender, you get all the margarita stuff ready.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, he's keys are in the drawer. You know what? I also need some cash.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you want me to stop at the ATM?

name: monica
dialogue: Nah, while you are at Ross's if you see any lying around

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: monica
dialogue: What?! I-I-I don't, I don't do that!

dialogue: That was so cool man, the way you leaned on that guy.

name: chandler
dialogue: It is starting to get dark out there.

name: ross
dialogue: He told you everything! I mean you totally cracked him!

name: gary
dialogue: Yeah well, being that he was the victim, they're usually pretty talkative.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.  But it is officially night-time.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh hey, Gary, want me to grab the berry for ya?

name: gary
dialogue: It's called the cherry.

name: ross
dialogue: It's the—Chandler!!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, I got it! This place makes the best sandwich in the world!

name: gary
dialogue: Hey Joe does it have meatballs on it?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh-ho, yeah!

name: gary
dialogue: Does it have melted cheese and marinara sauce?

name: joey
dialogue: Yep!

dialogue: Yeah, you can't eat that in my car.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah okay.  Even though my tax dollars paid for this car.

name: chandler
dialogue: Your tax dollars?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow! That sandwich really does smell good.

name: joey
dialogue: Did I say you could smell it?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I can't smell your sandwich?

name: joey
dialogue: Half the taste is in the smell! You-you are sucking up all the tastiness!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, I'll give them back.  Look! What is so great about that sandwich?

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, imagine the best sex you've ever had.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Are you thinking about Monica?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, what's that like?

name: rachel
dialogue: OH please don't be from a real dinosaur! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please!  Made in Mexico! Yes!! Ugh, who would buy this?!

name: monica
dialogue: Rach! It's me! Pick up!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! What's up?!

name: monica
dialogue: I need a few more things to make the margaritas. Uhh, I need some salt, some margarita mix, and tequila.

name: rachel
dialogue: So all we have is ice?

name: monica
dialogue: See if he has ice.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: emily
dialogue: Hello Ross? It's Emily.  I know this is out of the blue but uh, I'm getting married tomorrow. Well, maybe I am. I keep thinking about you and I'm wondering if-if we made a mistake giving up so fast. Are you thinking about me? Of course you are not, but if you are, call me tonight. Okay, bye.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. Oh!

name: ross
dialogue: So where are we going next?

name: gary
dialogue: This witness won't return my calls so we're going to see if we can surprise him coming home.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sur-surprise him? We're not, we're not going to make anybody mad are we?

name: joey
dialogue: Come on man!  Listen so uh, are you going to squeeze the perps shoes a little bit before he lawyers up?

name: gary
dialogue: It's a witness not a perp. And no one talks like that!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, no one talks like that!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh what? Like your Mr. Cop!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, I'm more cop than you two!

name: chandler
dialogue: How do you figure that?

name: ross
dialogue: Hello! I'm in the front seat, okay? I'm Gary's partner!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, when you say partner it doesn't sound cop. It, it sounds gay.

name: ross
dialogue: Umm, jealous!

name: gary
dialogue: Hey, do you mind? We're under cover here.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, no problem.

name: gary
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: Sorry! Sorry! Oh,  there!  Hey Gary, who am I? Phone home!

name: chandler
dialogue: Look at Officer Ross riding back here with the visitors.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, what's up with that Serpico?

name: emily
dialogue: Are you thinking about me? Of course you are not, but if you are, call me tonight. Okay, bye.

name: monica
dialogue: No!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know!

name: monica
dialogue: Well thank God you were here! I mean, we have to erase that!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! We can't do that!

name: monica
dialogue: We have too! I mean what if Ross's hears that and then calls her back and then they get back together? Is that what you want? Ross back with that controlling, neurotic, crazy Emily? The Emily that wouldn't let him see you?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Oh no! No! God no! He should not get back together with her. I know that! You know that! Even Ross knows that! But that still doesn’t give us the right to erase his message!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm his sister, okay? I love him! I don't want to see him get hurt! Come on! Doesn’t that give me the right to control him—help him?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't think he's the one who needs help.

name: monica
dialogue: No, look, she's obviously unstable, okay? I mean she's thinking about running out on her wedding day.   Okay, fine! But I mean, look at the position she's putting him in! What's he going to do? Ross is going to run over there on the wedding day and break up the marriage?! I mean, who would do that?!  Okay, fine, all right, but that is you know, it's different! Although it did involve a lot of the same people.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh!

name: monica
dialogue: You know what, this is obviously some kind of twisted joke she's trying to play on him.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you are crazy! I'm sorry, but she sounded generally upset! I mean, listen!

name: answering machine
dialogue: Your messages have been erased.

name: rachel
dialogue: No!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, you know, we-we're safe right? I mean nothing bad can go down!

name: gary
dialogue: No. But that reminds me,  sign this.

name: ross
dialogue: What is it?

name: gary
dialogue: Oh it's nothing, it just says that you can't sue the city if you scrap your knee or you know, get your head blown off.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, hurry up. I want to sign that.

name: gary
dialogue: Okay, here he comes. What is he doing? What the hell is he doing?!

name: ross
dialogue: What? What? What? What is it?

name: joey
dialogue: Is everything okay?

name: chandler
dialogue: What's going on?

name: gary
dialogue: Okay, he sees us. Now don't move. Don't look at him.

name: gary
dialogue: Hey, it's okay. It was just a car backfire.  Hey, look at that! You tried to save your buddy. You see that? You see what he did?

name: joey
dialogue: You okay man?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh. Thank Joey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, HELLO!!

name: joey
dialogue: Hi.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, I guess we should go.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, wait. Wait.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh yeah right!

name: rachel
dialogue: No, Monica! Monica! We have to fix this!

name: monica
dialogue: There's nothing we can do. You erased the message!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah well unless we tell him.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, if you are going to be totally rational about this, I can't argue with you! All right? Fine, if you want to tell him, tell him. I just don't want to be a part of it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, maybe that is Emily calling back to leave the exact same message.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey Ross! It's you! I just want you to remember this feeling. You are lucky to be alive! So live everyday to the fullest. Love yourself, okay? Okay. Oh, and also get stamps. Bye!

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! Play that message for Emily and this whole problem goes away!

name: rachel
dialogue: Right?

name: gary
dialogue: Hey, anybody want to meet a hero?

name: phoebe
dialogue: John Glenn is here?!

name: gary
dialogue: No, Joey!

name: ross
dialogue: Pheebs, we had the most incredible night! Okay, so, we're in the car

name: gary
dialogue: Wait! Hold on!   Hi!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi!

name: gary
dialogue: Okay, go ahead.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, okay, so we're in the car. Right? And bang! A shot was fired. And Joey with no regard for his own safety throws himself on me!

name: phoebe
dialogue: My God, Joey!

name: chandler
dialogue: It was a car backfire!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, but-but he didn't know that!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I didn't know that.

name: ross
dialogue: And it could've just as easily have been a bullet.

name: gary
dialogue: Hey Joe, you ever think about joining the force? We could use a guy like you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Who jumps at loud noises!

name: ross
dialogue: Wow! I could've died tonight.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah! If the car that backfired had run over you! You know what, I think I'll go home before Ross starts rambling about his newfound respect for life.

name: ross
dialogue: I do have a newfound respect for life.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: gary
dialogue: So you want to get some dinner?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Sure! Yep!  OH, you know what? If I heard a shot right now, I'd throw my body on you.

dialogue: Oh yeah? Well maybe you and I should take a walk through a bad neighbourhood.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay!

name: gary
dialogue: All right.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Bye!

dialogue: Bye!
