dialogue: Cut it out Ross! I hate to have to save your life and kick your ass in the same day!

name: joey
dialogue: Dude! How come you took off?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I just went for a walk, around the living room. Whatever

name: joey
dialogue: Is something wrong?

name: chandler
dialogue: No. No I'm just tired. You know, from-from the walk.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: You dove in front of Ross! Ross!

name: joey
dialogue: that is what this is about! Oh my God, you hate Ross!

name: chandler
dialogue: I do not hate Ross!

name: joey
dialogue: Of course you do! I saved him! you are mad at me! It all adds up! You want Ross out of the picture.

name: chandler
dialogue: What picture?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know, but I don't like what I'm hearing!

name: chandler
dialogue: Look I'm very glad that you saved Ross from the car backfire, but you know, it could've been a bullet and you you know, you didn't try to save me!

name: joey
dialogue: OH, you are upset because you think I chose Ross over you! No! I…knew…you could take care of yourself. You know, I mean Ross, he need help. He's not street like us!

name: chandler
dialogue: When it comes down to it, you would risk your life for Ross before you would for me. that is the bottom line.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, no, not exactly! All right, look, I, I wasn't trying to save Ross. Okay? My sandwich was next to Ross. All right? I was, I was trying to save my sandwich.

name: chandler
dialogue: From a bullet!

name: joey
dialogue: I know it doesn't make much sense

name: chandler
dialogue: Much sense?!

name: joey
dialogue: Look Chandler, it was instinct! Okay? I just went for it!

name: chandler
dialogue: So you risked your life, for a sandwich!

name: joey
dialogue: I know it sounds crazy, but Chandler this is  the greatest sandwich in the world!

name: chandler
dialogue: So you didn't uh, choose Ross before me.

name: joey
dialogue: No! I would never do that! You-you are like my brother!

name: chandler
dialogue: Really?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! In fact, to prove how much you mean to me,  here.

name: chandler
dialogue: Thanks.

name: joey
dialogue: No, eh, oh-oi, easy, it's not a hot dog!

name: joey
dialogue: How good is that?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh-oi-ho, yeah!

name: joey
dialogue: See?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hm-hmm.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh-whoa-hey, dude, what are you doing?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I thought you were showing me how much you mean to me.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. With a bite!  Gee-e-e-eez!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! Hi!

name: ross
dialogue: Rach, what uh, what are you doing here?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! you know what? You are in our apartment all the time! Okay? This is, this is just a drop in the bucket mister!

name: ross
dialogue: You know, it-it doesn't matter. The important thing is that you are here. you are my friend, and you are here. Oh!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, just a little scared. What's going on Ross?

name: ross
dialogue: The most amazing thing happened tonight. I thought my number was up. I had an actual near death experience!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! What? What happened?!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, okay, we were on the ride along with Gary, right?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah!

name: ross
dialogue: And somebody took a shot at me!

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?!

name: ross
dialogue: No, a car backfired, but  I thought somebody was taking a shot at me. And Rach, I…I survived! And I was filled with this-this great respect for life. You know? I-I want to experience every moment. I want to seize every opportunity. I-I am seeing everything so-so clearly now.

name: rachel
dialogue: Because a car backfired?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, why are you here?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I-I-I don't know how this fits into your whole "seizing" thing but um, Emily called you today.

name: ross
dialogue: You talked to her?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, she left a message.   But it-it kind of got erased. There's just  something wrong with your machine.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, okay, what-what did she say?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, uh something about having second thoughts about the wedding and did you guys make a mistake breaking up and uh, she wants you to call her.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow!

name: rachel
dialogue: Now, that-that was a good thing that I told you, right?

name: ross
dialogue: Huh? Yeah! Yes, of course!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Thank you! Thank you! Because—I'm sorry, all right. Because you know what? She didn't want me—not important. The point is, I was right. Your decision. Okay? I was right.   Your decision.

name: ross
dialogue: Right. I guess, I guess I should call Emily.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, no, that is not the right decision. that is not, that is not right, no Ross-Ross, come on! I mean, that woman made you miserable! Okay, Ross, do you really want to get back into that?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, look, yesterday I would've even considered calling her back, but my ex-wife calls on the same day I have a near death experience. I mean, that-that has got to mean something!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh, Ross! That was not a near death experience! That was barely an experience!

name: ross
dialogue: You weren't there! Okay, maybe this is something that I-I'm supposed to seize! You know?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you know what? Maybe, this is not about seizing stuff. Maybe this is about escaping stuff.

name: ross
dialogue: Huh.

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean, look-look today you escaped   death, you know? And maybe this is a chance for you to escape getting back together with Emily?

name: ross
dialogue: That does make sense. Because I do want to seize some opportunity, but I-I really don't want to see or talk to her.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, there you go!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. Maybe today is just, close call day.

name: rachel
dialogue: Close call day.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, thanks Rach.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, honey no problem. Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh wait-wait-wait! The message is blinking. Maybe you didn't erase it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh?

name: ross
dialogue: "Hey Ross, it's you!"  Oh yeah, no that is-that is an old message, nobody needs to hear that.

name: rachel
dialogue: No.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey umm, was-was Monica here?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I want my money back.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, uh you-you probably need that for stamps, right?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey Pheebs, has Gary ever been shot at for real?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes. Once. Yeah, a little. He kind of did it to himself. It's not really a good story.

name: ross
dialogue: I wonder how I would react under fire, you know? And not backfire but-but heavy fire, like I was in a war or something.

name: monica
dialogue: Man, I would be great in a war! I mean, I really, I think I would make a fantastic military leader. I mean I know I would make General way before any of you guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: Before or after you were shot by your own troops?

name: ross
dialogue: I know where Joey would be. He would be down in the foxhole protecting all of us.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, if the foxhole was lined with sandwiches.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, hero sandwiches.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well you all know that I'm a pacifist so I'm not interested in war in any way.  But you know what? When the revolution comes, I will have to destroy you all.   Not you Joey.

name: gary
dialogue: Would you like some more coffee, baby-doll?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm fine, thanks.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, see, I can't pull of baby-doll can I?

name: monica
dialogue: No. I think we learned that from the sugar lips incident. I'm going to get some tea.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hiya doin' pumpkin?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Nope.

name: monica
dialogue: So it looks like it's going really well for you two, huh?

name: gary
dialogue: I know, really well. In fact, I'm going to ask Phoebe to move in with me.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: gary
dialogue: What do you, what do you think?

name: monica
dialogue: I think that is so great! When are you going to ask her?

name: gary
dialogue: Tonight, but don't say anything. Okay?

name: monica
dialogue: I swear, I promise. I promise. Oh my God, I'm so excited! All right, listen let me tell you, do not get her flowers. Okay? Because you know, she cries when they die, and there's the whole funeral

name: gary
dialogue: I'll see you after work sweetie.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Bye!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, what movie should we see?

name: monica
dialogue: Gary's going to ask you to move in with him!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?! Really?!

name: monica
dialogue: He just told me at the counter. He made me promise not to tell, but I couldn't hold it in any longer!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can't believe this!

name: chandler
dialogue: Right, because it's fast. Because, it's so fast. It's fast!

name: monica
dialogue: Relax! It's Phoebe! Not you!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh! Good for you Pheebs, way to go!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, but it is fast. Isn't it?

name: monica
dialogue: oh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I like him a lot but I don't think I'm ready for this!

name: chandler
dialogue: So, what are you going to do?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't know. I'll just handle it—I'll ask you to talk to him!

name: chandler
dialogue: Me?! Why me?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Because you are so afraid of commitment! You talk to him, make him scared like you! Make him a…man!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'll try, but I'm not sure what good it would do, you know? Because I'm a lot less afraid of commitment than I used to be.

name: monica
dialogue: That is so sweet!

name: chandler
dialogue: Still terrified, I'll take care of it. No problem.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Ross, is uh, is Staten Island really an island?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh, that is why they call it Staten Island.

name: joey
dialogue: oh. I thought it was like Long Island.

name: ross
dialogue: Also an island.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, what time is it?

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! You realize that we've been throwing this ball, without dropping it, for like an hour?

name: ross
dialogue: Are you serious?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. I realized it about a half-hour ago but I didn't want to say anything Because I didn't want to jinx it.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow! We are pretty good at this! Hey! We totally forgot about lunch!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, I-I, I think that is the first time I ever missed a meal!  Yeah, my pants are a little loose!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, you guys

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Is Monica here?

name: joey and ross
dialogue: No.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right listen umm, I just bought something I'm not sure she's going to like it, and it's going to seem a little crazy, but this is something that I wanted since I was a little girl.

name: ross
dialogue: You bought Shawn Cassidy!

name: rachel
dialogue: No! I wish! Okay, you ready?

name: joey and ross
dialogue: Yeah!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay!  Check it out!

name: ross
dialogue: What-what is it?!

name: joey
dialogue: What the hell is that?!!

name: rachel
dialogue: It's a, it's a cat!

name: joey
dialogue: That, is not a cat! {I have to agree with Joey on this one.}

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes it is!

name: ross
dialogue: Why is it inside out?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Excuse me! But this is a purebred, show-quality Sphinx cat!

name: ross
dialogue: How much did you pay for that?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, it was a little extravagant, but I a pretty good deal.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah? How much?

name: rachel
dialogue: A thousand bucks.

name: ross
dialogue: ON A CAT??!!!!

name: joey
dialogue: It's not a cat!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right listen ball boys! My grandmother had one of these when I was a little girl and it was the sweetest thing! I mean it was so cute, it would sit in my lap and purr all day long, and I would drag a shoestring on the ground and he would chase it!

name: ross
dialogue: Free cats do that too, you know. {Which reminds me, if I might get a little political here, support your local animal shelter. Pet shops are not the place to buy dogs and cats from, you get a much better deal from the shelter, plus they probably won't die on you in a week and a half. If you want a leash, go to the pet shop. If you want the dog for that leash, go to the shelter and save it's life. Now back to regularly scheduled programming.}

name: joey
dialogue: It's not a cat!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh! Look you guys, I'm really excited about this! Okay? I don't care what you think! I'm going to go set up a little litter box for Mrs. Whiskerson.  Well, what am I going to call her? Fluffy?!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, you want to get something to eat or uh, do you want to see how long we can throw this ball back and forth? Huh?

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh, the ball thing.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Ross, wouldn't it be great if we could go two straight hours without dropping it?!

name: ross
dialogue: Uhh, yeah it would! Let's do it!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh-oh.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: I have to pee. And Rachel's in the bathroom!

name: joey
dialogue: Man, I didn't think we were going to make it!

name: ross
dialogue: I know!  Don't switch hands, okay?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey ladies! What are you in here for?

name: gary
dialogue: Hey Chandler, what are you doing here?

name: chandler
dialogue: Gary, I'm here to report a crime.

name: gary
dialogue: Yeah?

name: chandler
dialogue: It is a crime that you and I don't spend more time together.

name: gary
dialogue: What's up?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I heard that you thinking about asking Phoebe to move in with you and I thought maybe, we should have a talk. Man to uh, me.

name: gary
dialogue: Sure. Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, are you crazy? Are you insane? If you live with Phoebe, you two are going to be you know, live-living together!

name: gary
dialogue: Yeah, I-I considered that. I just know it would make me happy.

name: chandler
dialogue: You mean scared.

name: gary
dialogue: No, I mean happy.

name: chandler
dialogue: Scared? Happy?

name: gary
dialogue: Chandler, what-what are you doing?

name: chandler
dialogue: I am trying to open your eyes, my man! Don't you see, if you lived with Phoebe she's always going to be there. you are going to get home, she's there. You go to bed, she's there. You wake up and oh yes, she's there!

name: gary
dialogue: I know! I can't wait!

name: chandler
dialogue: Were you are parents happy, or something?

name: gary
dialogue: Listen Chandler, the way I see it is that I was lucky enough to find someone that I really love. I just—I want to be around her as much as I can.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow, you know when you say it, it doesn't sound so scary.

name: gary
dialogue: So you know what I'm talking about, right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I think I do! You know what? You move in with her! You move in with her right now! Maybe I should in with Monica!

name: gary
dialogue: No, it's too soon for you guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, you are right about that.

name: ross
dialogue: now when they found the remains of the Mesozoic Mastodon they discovered what appeared to be the remains of a Palaeozoic Amphibian in its jaws! How did it get there?!

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe this should be more of a quiet game.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey guys!

name: joey
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, I left my watch on the counter last night.  It was right here, where is it?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, come on, I'm-I'm late for work!

name: ross
dialogue: How do you know? You don't have a watch.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, I don't know…. Yeah, can't do it.

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, we haven't dropped it in

name: monica
dialogue: Really?!

name: monica
dialogue: I-I'm not going to be able to make it into work today, I don't feel very good.   Yes!!   Wow! Uh, for a second there I thought I was really better, but I'm not.

dialogue: Hey Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Check it out! Almost 3 hours without dropping' it!

dialogue: Rach?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah?

dialogue: You have scratches all over you, what happened?

dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah, I got a cat.

name: monica
dialogue: I don't want a cat!

dialogue: Oh, don't worry, it's not a cat.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: You guys this cat is nothing like my grandmother's cat. I mean, it's not sweet, it's not cute, I even dragged that little string on the ground, and it just flipped out and scratched the hell out of me. And I swear, I know this sounds crazy, but every time this cat hisses at me I know it's saying, "Rachel!"

name: ross
dialogue: Doesn't sound as crazy as paying a thousand dollars for a cat.

name: monica
dialogue: What?! You paid a thousand dollars for a cat when you owe me 300!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I was going to let you play with it.

dialogue: Hi!

dialogue: Yes I did, and I think you should do it.

dialogue: What?!

name: chandler
dialogue: He's a great guy, you know? And he loves you a lot, you are a very lucky lady.

dialogue: You are useless! Freaking out about commitment is the one thing you can do! The one thing! And you can't even do that right! God!

name: chandler
dialogue: I’m sorry.  If you ask me, I'd move in with him.

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH!! God!  Ooh!  Get out of here, good for nothing.

dialogue: Hey Chandler.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey Gar!

dialogue: Hi sweetie.  Hi, can I talk to you for a second?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Okay.

dialogue: You look very pretty today.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thanks! Okay.

name: gary
dialogue: Here's the thing.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: gary
dialogue: You know I really want to move this relationship forward.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-hmm.

name: gary
dialogue: Because if you are not moving forward, you know you are just moving backwards.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No that is not true. If you are not moving forward, you are just staying still. And staying still is good. Watch this.

name: gary
dialogue: Phoebe?

dialogue: Yeah?

name: gary
dialogue: I want you to move in with me.

name: phoebe
dialogue: That is so sweet. But don't you think it's a little too soon? I mean there's so much we don't know about each other.

name: gary
dialogue: Oh. Oh-oh-okay, I get it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I just—I don't want us to jump into something we're not ready for.

name: gary
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I really don't want to mess up what we have. I'm just—I'm worried it's going to be a big mistake.

name: gary
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Which is why my answer is yes!

name: gary
dialogue: Really?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh!  I'm so…happy.

dialogue: Monica! Stop throwing it so hard! We're on the same team!

name: chandler
dialogue: Four hours? You guys have been doing this for four hours?

name: joey
dialogue: that is right baby.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right, let me in.

name: monica
dialogue: No-no! Don't do it! Don't!

dialogue: I'm not a dropper!

dialogue: All right.

dialogue: Oh! Oh! that is so hard.

dialogue: Whoa-whoa you guys, it's not a cat!

dialogue: Oh my—Oh good God!

dialogue: Well, they said would but they would only give me store credit. I mean, what am I going to do, get a thousand regular cats?

dialogue: Look, if you want you can keep it at our place until you find out what to do with it.

name: rachel
dialogue: No Mon that is not the point. I'm out a thousand dollars, I'm all scratched up, and I'm stuck with this stupid cat that looks like a hand!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, the cat's made my eyes water! Don't-don't throw it to me! My vision's been compromised!!  Oh God! Okay. Okay. It's okay. Man, that was close.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, you almost overreacted to something.

dialogue: Hey!

name: all
dialogue: Hey!

dialogue: We have great news!

name: phoebe
dialogue: We're moving in together! Isn't it great! Yay!

name: all
dialogue: Congratulations! Congrats!

dialogue: Well, you are not more excited than I am! No way! I'm the most excited!

dialogue: Okay, I'll see you at the station later.

dialogue: So you are moving in with him. What happened?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I couldn't tell him no. He got so sad. Maybe it'll be all right. I do really like him a lot and probably do it eventually anyway and plus, think of all the money I'll save on stamps.

name: monica
dialogue: Why, do you write him a lot?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I just heard when people live together, they split the cost of stamps. Don't they?

name: all
dialogue: Yeah! that is right. Yeah-yeah! Yeah!

dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry, the oven mitts really freaked me out.

dialogue: Hey, honey! Okay, so did you find any apartments? Anything in Brooklyn Heights?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, nothing.

name: gary
dialogue: Oh really?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: gary
dialogue: Nothing at all?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, as soon as something opens up we'll move right in. Unless it doesn't have a pool, I need a pool.

name: gary
dialogue: Phoebe, can I talk to you for a second?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh!

name: gary
dialogue: Take a seat. You okay? You feeling all right?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I feel great. Because we're moving in together.

name: gary
dialogue: So you uh, you checked the paper for listings in Brooklyn Heights, right? You-you checked the Post?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, uh-huh, there was nothing.  Can I get some water?

name: gary
dialogue: In a minute. You-you checked today's Post?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, yeah! Today's.

name: gary
dialogue: because uh, this is today's Post  and uh, these are the listings I found.  Brooklyn Heights, two bedroom.  Brooklyn Heights, one bedroom.  Brooklyn Heights,  Brooklyn Heights,  Brooklyn Heights!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are these for rent! I thought people were just bragging!

name: gary
dialogue: Let me tell you what I think might be going on.  No-no-no, don't look at the table. Look at me.  Okay, I think somebody asked someone to move in with them. And I think someone said, "Yes" but now she's having doubts because things are moving to fast for someone. Does that sound at all possible to you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes. Yes! Fine! I am someone! You want me to say it? I have doubts!  I'm sorry!

name: gary
dialogue: Phoebe

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: gary
dialogue: Phoebe, it's okay that you feel this way. I mean it is soon. And there's a lot of things we don't know about each other, and I just figure that everything I really like. And the things I don't know, I get to learn about at someplace with both our names on the mailbox.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is so sweet.

name: gary
dialogue: Sweetheart, but none of that matters if it's too soon for you. It's fine! We don't have to move in together. I just—I want you to be happy

name: phoebe
dialogue: Living with you would make me happy.

name: gary
dialogue: Phoebe, you don't have to say that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I really want to live with you! I want to move in with you!

name: gary
dialogue: Are you sure?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes. Definitely! Yes! Let's live in an apartment that we both live in!

name: gary
dialogue: Oh that is great!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh wait, one sec. One sec.  Hey you! Behind the glass! Who are you looking at! I've always wanted to say that when I was in one of these rooms,  which was never!

dialogue: Show cat! Quality show cat! Show cat!

dialogue: Oh my God! What's wrong with your baby?!

name: rachel
dialogue: It's not a baby! It's a cat!

dialogue: Eew! It's creepy looking!

dialogue: Oh no! No! It's actually—it's very sweet. It's very sweet. Look!  Yeah, do you want it?

dialogue: No, I hate cats.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, so then what are you doing to me? Okay? Just get out of here! All right? Move on!

dialogue: Wow! What an unusual cat!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes! Thank you! Exactly! You want it?

name: woman no. 2
dialogue: Maybe. I was thinking about getting a cat, I was just going to go to the shelter  but… Okay, why not?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, terrific! That'll be $2,000.

name: woman no. 2
dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, a thousand.

name: woman no. 2
dialogue: I thought you wanted to adopt your cat.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I do, but you are just going to have to actually look at this as more of an investment than a cat.

name: woman no. 2
dialogue: Okay, yeah, I just wanted a cat.

name: rachel
dialogue: Obviously you know how to haggle, so I'm not going to try and take you on. Okay? So $800 and I don't call the cops because you are robbing me blind! Blind!  Just take cat, leave the money, and run away! Run away!  Damnit!  Cat, can't you at least smile or something?!  Okay, did anybody just hear that? Anybody?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm starving!

name: monica
dialogue: Come on guys! Suck it up! We're closing in on ten hours! It's gut-check time!

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know who made you the boss? All right? We  invented this game!

name: monica
dialogue: Please! I made this game what it is.

name: chandler
dialogue: Not fun anymore?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm still hungry!

name: monica
dialogue: All right, there's some pizza at my place, we can all eat with one hand right? Are you with me?

name: ross
dialogue: I am!

name: monica
dialogue: All right! Let's go!  Let's go Team Monica!  All right, we can work out the name later.

dialogue: Rachel! What is your cat doing in one of my bowls!

dialogue: It's not! I'm defrosting a chicken.  Oh, I uh sold Mrs. Whiskerson.

dialogue: Wow! You made a profit!

dialogue: Oh yeah, there you go.

dialogue: Thanks Rachel. And-and don't forget you-you can come visit her anytime you want.

dialogue: Oh good, great! I'll-I'll keep that in mind.

dialogue: Hey! So what is this? Some kind of snake or something?

dialogue: I really like waking up with you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I like waking up with you too.  Oh! It's such a beautiful morning.  Oh, I can stay here all day.

dialogue: That would be great!

name: phoebe
dialogue: We could have breakfast in bed

dialogue: Wait, just a second.

dialogue: Okay.  Oh! Oh no.

dialogue: All right! Come on Monica! Look alive! Come on, look alive!

dialogue: What?!

dialogue: Come on! Gary's such a great guy! Whatever the problem is, you can work it out!

dialogue: He shot a bird!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh that is over!

name: all
dialogue: that is terrible! I'm sorry!

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, are you okay?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. Yeah, I'll be alright.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh hey, here Pheebs.

dialogue: Nah, I don't feel like playing.

name: monica
dialogue: It's okay. It's okay. Just pretend that it didn't happen! Okay? No one needs to know! I mean, Phoebe's not an official ballplayer! I mean, only official ballplayers can drop the ball!

name: all
dialogue: All right. Okay. I'm starving!

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, honey, want to get some breakfast?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay! Okay, let's race! First one there wins! Ha-ha!

dialogue: You guys want to eat here?

name: all
dialogue: Yeah! As long as we're here!

name: joey
dialogue: Man that was great! Huh? Can you believe how long we threw that ball around?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, it is amazing it lasted that long.

name: ross
dialogue: I know. My arm is killing me.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I meant with the dropper over here.

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, how did I get this reputation as a dropper? Okay? I'm anything but a dropper.

name: ross
dialogue: What's going on?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, my eye is a little itchy.

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh, mine too! Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! It's really red! You should go see my eye doctor.

name: rachel
dialogue: Richard? I'm not going to go see your ex-boyfriend!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, Richard. that is all I ever hear, Richard, Richard, Richard!

name: monica
dialogue: Since we've been going out, I think I've mentioned his name twice!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, so Richard, Richard!

name: monica
dialogue: It's not Richard! Okay? It's this new guy and he's really good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I'm sorry I'm not going to an eye doctor!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh God, here we go!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Anytime anything comes close to touching her eye or anyone else's she like freaks out. Watch! Watch!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross! Come on! that is all right! Fine--Okay, I have a weird thing about my eye. Can we not talk about it please?

dialogue: All right, fine.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Rach, remember that great song, Me, Myself, and I?

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica! Come on!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, does anybody want to get some lunch? All those in favour say I?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross! Stop it! Come on!

name: chandler
dialogue: How much did I love The King and I?

name: rachel
dialogue: Chandler!

name: joey
dialogue: Me too! Me too! Me too!

name: rachel
dialogue: Just stop it! Come on!

name: chandler
dialogue: You okay there man?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I got too excited!

name: ross
dialogue: All right, I got to go. I'm taking Ben to the park.

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH, give him a kiss for me!

name: ross
dialogue: All right, bye!

name: monica
dialogue: Bye!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Bye!

dialogue: Later!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I am so sorry you got caught in the middle of that. I didn't mean to be so out there. I am furious with him!

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow umm, calm down.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm trying, but man that guy can push my buttons!

name: monica
dialogue: Why are so mad at him?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Look, I don't want to talk about it. Okay?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, it just seems that

name: phoebe
dialogue: You want to be on my list too? Keep talking! Has anyone seem my list by the way?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, no Pheebs. What's it look like?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh, it's a piece of paper and it says, "Ross" on it.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey. I just got off the phone with Estelle and guess what.  I GOT THE LEAD IN A MOVIE!!!!!!

name: chandler
dialogue: You got the lead in a movie? that is amazing! What's the movie about?!

name: joey
dialogue: It's called Shutter Speed, it's really cool! Yeah, umm, I meet this girl in the subway and we fall in love in like a day, right? And then, she disappears… But I find out where she lives and when I get there this like old lady answers the door and I say, "Where's Betsy?" Right? And she says, "Betsy's been dead for 10 years."

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH-oh, chilling!

name: joey
dialogue: And the best part is, we're filming in the desert outside Vegas!  And you know what that means buddy!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I know that means buddy!

name: joey
dialogue: Road trip! Yeah, we can rent a car! I just have to be there by Tuesday!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh wait, my grandmother's dead.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, uh, we can talk about that too Pheebs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! No, her cab! She probably won't be using it; you can drive it to Las Vegas.

name: joey
dialogue: All right! Thanks Pheebs!

name: chandler
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-whoa, what are we going to do about my job?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh umm, not go.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right, great, road trip baby!  This okay with you?

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler! You don't have to ask for my permission.  You can go.

name: chandler
dialogue: Thank you.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Rach, come on! We're going to be late for the eye doctor appointment!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right! Let's get this over with! Ugh!  oh! No! Look what I did!  Oh, I mean, look at this mess! I mean, we're probably going to have to clean this up! You know? We're going to have to reschedule!

name: monica
dialogue: No. If you thought this mess is going to bother me, you are wrong! All right, let's go Blinky!  Chandler!!!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh hey Joey! What's up?

name: joey
dialogue: I can't decide which route to take to Vegas. Hey, you've travelled a lot right?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I've been around.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, so-so which route should I take the northern route or the southern route?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, if you take the northern route there's a man in Illinois with a beard of bees. {Okay, I must protest this, I've lived in Illinois all my life and know of no man with a beard of bees! Wisconsin, on the other hand, might be a different story.}

name: joey
dialogue: Great! Problem solved!

name: phoebe
dialogue: But on the southern route there's a chicken that plays tic-tac-toe.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, back to square one.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I know a way that you can decide! All right, I'm going to ask you a series of questions and you answer as quickly as you can.

name: joey
dialogue: Yes!
