dialogue: No!

name: monica
dialogue: All right then, then nothing changes! Everything is great! Everything stays the same! And you go unpack because it’s been three days and it’s driving me insane!

name: chandler
dialogue: Jeez, relax! It’s not like we’re mar-ah-ah!!

name: chandler
dialogue: you know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here?

name: monica
dialogue: Then all your stuff would be here.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, what if all my stuff was here?

name: monica
dialogue: Then you’d be going back and forth all the time, I mean it doesn’t make any sense.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. What if we lived together and you understand what I’m saying?

name: monica
dialogue: Live together? There have been no signs for that.

name: chandler
dialogue: Me asking is kind of a sign.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay!!!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Yes! Okay! Okay! Wait-wait-wait!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Here’s your key

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh thanks.

name: monica
dialogue: Here’s your key. All right, you have to christen it! Now, go out and come back in!

name: chandler
dialogue: The door hasn’t been locked in five years, but okay!  Ready?!

name: monica
dialogue: Ready!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, a little problem. The key broke in the lock and I can’t get in!

name: monica
dialogue: Wait! Oh my God! I can’t get out!

name: chandler
dialogue: This is not a sign!

name: monica
dialogue: No, it’s not a sign! It’s a very old key!

name: chandler
dialogue: It’s an old key!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God it’s old!

name: chandler
dialogue: I love you!

name: monica
dialogue: I love you!

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you hugging the door right now.

name: monica
dialogue: No.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah-yeah, me neither.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, so did everything go all right with the annulment?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, yeah, no problems. It’s all taken care of.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, thank you. Hey, do you guys want to go see a movie?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah, why not?

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No thanks, I’ve already seen one.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, umm, I’m going to get my sweater.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.  You uh, you want to hear something weird?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Always.

name: ross
dialogue: I didn’t get the annulment.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: We’re still married! Don’t tell Rachel. See you later.

name: joey
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: chandler
dialogue: The key’s stuck in the lock.

name: joey
dialogue: I can fix it. Hold on.  Look out. Look out.

name: chandler
dialogue: It still doesn’t work.

name: joey
dialogue: I’m not finished.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh.

name: chandler
dialogue: Nice job Joe! You’re quite the craftsmen.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, so did everything go okay with the annulment?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, yeah, no problems. It’s all taken care of.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, thank you. Hey, do you guys want to go see a movie?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah, why not?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, umm, I’m going to get my sweater.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.  You uh, you want to hear something weird?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Always.

name: ross
dialogue: I didn’t get the annulment.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: We’re still married! Don’t tell Rachel. See you later.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, do you have any gum?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh? Yeah! Sure!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait! Wait! Hi! Listen, Ross can I just talk to you for just a second?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh but Phoebe, we’re going to be late for the movie.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, there’s a cab! Taxi!!  Good timing, my God, huh? Here you go.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, we’re, we’re actually just going to walk because it’s right up there at the Angelica.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, the Angelica!! Go! Go!   You didn’t get the annulment?!!

name: ross
dialogue: I know.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross?!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I tried! But when I got to my lawyer’s office all I could hear was, "Three divorces. Three divorces!" Look, I just don’t want my tombstone to read, Ross Gellar, Three Divorces.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Don’t be worried about that! Your tombstone can say whatever you want it to say! It could say, Ross Geller, Good at Marriage! you know? Mine’s going to say Phoebe Buffay, Buried Alive.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, all I know is I-I can’t have another failed marriage!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So okay what? You’re going to be married to a girl who doesn’t even know about it?!—Op, woman! Sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, okay so, I don’t have it all worked out quite yet. Just don’t say anything to Rachel, please?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rachel is one of my closest friends.  Although, being the only one who knows anything about this does makes me feel special. Okay!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, stop-stop! Phoebe?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: What was that?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sorry, mix up. Hey, how was the movie?

name: rachel
dialogue: I haven’t seen it yet!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well then you’d better hurry! The Angelica! Go! Go!

name: rachel
dialogue: No!!

name: chandler
dialogue: you know when we move in together, can I get a gumball machine?

name: monica
dialogue: Of course! Joey wouldn’t let you have one?

name: chandler
dialogue: No. When it comes to sweets, he’s surprisingly strict.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, have you figured out a way to tell him you’re moving out?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, no, I keep trying, you know? I can get out, "Joey, I have too…" but then I lose my nerve and I always finish with, "…go to the bathroom." He may think I’m sick.

name: monica
dialogue: you know, I really have to tell Rachel, but I… We just have to get it over with! you know, the next time we see them we’re just going to tell them. Okay? That’s it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, so that’s this is going to work now? You’re just going to order me around all the time?

name: monica
dialogue: Pretty much.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Monica!

name: monica
dialogue: Hi!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey man, you feeling any better?

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, we have something to tell you.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God! You’re pregnant!

name: chandler
dialogue: No-o-o!  No?  No-o-o! Look Joey, here’s the thing, Monica and I have decided to live together, here. So, I’m going to be moving out man.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow!  Well, uh… Hey! I’m really happy for you guys! Congratulations!  See you later.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait! Joey! Joey! Are you okay?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I got to go! I got an acting job.  Like you’d believe that. This sucks!

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, I-I’m just going to be right across the hall and I promise you, the minute Monica and I break up I’m moving right back in with you!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay! Look-look-look, uh, if you’re going to be moving in with him I feel it’s my responsibility to tell you the truth about him! Okay? He’s a terrible roommate! Terrible! He uh, forgets to umm… Oh-oh he always, he always umm—Oh, who am I kidding! He’s the best roommate ever!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Pheebs!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, have you seen Rachel?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, why?

name: monica
dialogue: I have some pretty exciting news!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You’re pregnant!

name: monica
dialogue: No! Chandler and I are moving in together!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh! That’s good! Wow! But now if you were pregnant, what would you name it? Hint

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: What’s up?

name: monica
dialogue: Well umm, Chandler and I are moving in together.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God. OH, my little sister and my best friend…shaking up. Oh, that’s great. That’s great.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Guys, I’m happy too.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, come here!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow! Big day huh? People moving in, people getting annulled

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I got to go find Rachel but umm, if you guys see her could you please try to give her some really bad news so that mine doesn’t seem so bad?

name: ross
dialogue: Bye.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hmm, something bad to tell Rachel… Bad news for Rachel, what could that be?!

name: ross
dialogue: Could you just, could you just lay off, please? All right? My life is an embarrassment! I should go live under somebody’s stairs!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, it’s not that big a deal! So you’ll been divorced three times, you’ll still have a life, you’ll go on dates

name: ross
dialogue: No! No, I won’t! I’ll be at the bottom of the dating barrel now. The only guys below me will be Four Divorce Guy uh, Murderer Guy, and-and, Geologists.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, you’re being ridiculous! Okay? You are cute and smart and sweet and that is much more important than three stupid divorces!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah? Have you ever dated anyone who has been divorced three times?

name: phoebe
dialogue: you know that’s really fair. you know? Most guys who have been divorced three times are like 60. Ross, nobody cares about this except you! This-this embarrassment thing is all in your head! Here, I’ll show you! Come here.

name: ross
dialogue: What?! Why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi! Hi! Listen, my friend Ross is about to be divorced for the third time, but wouldn’t you date him?

name: ross
dialogue: And if you wait right here, I’ll go get Ross.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Ugh, I thought you were Rachel!

name: chandler
dialogue: What gave me away?

name: monica
dialogue: I just tell her, I have to get it over with. I told Ross and Phoebe and she’s the only one left!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, so that’s it, everybody knows! It’s official, we’re moving in together. No turning back. Are you scared? Are you?

name: monica
dialogue: No.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow that was my scariest voice! You’re very brave.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh, the worse day! you know, you think you’re making progress at work and then your boss calls you Raquel.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey listen, for the first four years of my work everybody called me Sha-la-lap.  Seriously.

name: rachel
dialogue: I believe you. So, it was right in the middle of a staff meeting so of course no one else wants to correct her so everyone else is calling me Raquel! By the end of the day, the mailroom guys were calling me Rocky!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I-I still think you’re very-very nice and very pretty

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: All yours babe.

name: monica
dialogue: Have a seat.  Okay, listen umm, Chandler and I are going to live together, here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! That’s so great! I’m so happy for you guys!

name: monica
dialogue: Really?!

name: rachel
dialogue: And that was so sweet of you to ask! Oh my God, the three of us are going to have such a good time living together!

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, we are.

name: rachel
dialogue: And Chandler, you’re going to have to watch those long showers you take in the morning because you know Raquel can’t be late.

name: chandler
dialogue: Rach

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, he’s going to work on that.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH! This is so exciting! Oh God…  Come and knock on my door

name: monica
dialogue: We’ll be waiting for you

name: ross
dialogue: once you know the stories, it’s not that bad. First marriage, wife’s hidden sexuality, not my fault. Second marriage, said the wrong name at the altar, a little my fault. Third marriage, well they really shouldn’t allow you to get married when you’re that drunk and have writing all over your face, Nevada’s fault.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, so what do you think ladies? Who wouldn’t be interested? Who wouldn’t want to date him?

name: stephanie
dialogue: Well the divorces don’t bother me, I’d date him. But, not while he’s still married.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, what about you?  Wouldn’t you want a date?

name: karin
dialogue: Actually, I’m dating at all anymore. See, I figured out that I was only dating guys that were like you know bad for me, so until I work that out

name: phoebe
dialogue: Whatever! What about you Meg?

name: meg
dialogue: Well, I don’t care about the divorces either, but I wouldn’t date him. It’s just that he’s obviously still in love with this Rachel girl.

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: She said, "He’s obviously still in love with this Rachel girl."

name: ross
dialogue: This is crazy! I mean, yes-yes Rachel is my good friend and I-I have loved her in the past, but now, she is just my wife! Phoebe, will you-will you help me out here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I thought you loved her when you-when you married her.

name: ross
dialogue: We were drunk! I would’ve married uh, Joey with that amount of alcohol!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! You could do a lot worse than Joey Tribbiani!!

name: ross
dialogue: Look, I’m sorry, but you guys are wrong. I just don’t want to be divorced three times.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes, and now he’s using this three divorces reason because he wants to stay married to her because he loves her. I must say, "Well done!" Bravo Meg.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay! Fine! Fine! If-if this is what you think, forget about the whole three divorce thing! Okay, I-I’ll go to my lawyer’s office right now and get this marriage annulled! Okay?! Because she means nothing to me! Noth——Nothing!!

name: meg
dialogue: Okay now I wouldn’t date you because you seem a little creepy.

name: karin
dialogue: I am so attracted to him right now.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, when are we going to tell Rachel what is actually going to happen?

name: monica
dialogue: Soon! I-I just couldn’t before. You saw how upset Joey got! I couldn’t do that to her, she’s my best friend!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, Joey’s my best friend.

name: monica
dialogue: I’m not your best friend?

name: chandler
dialogue: You just said… Of course you’re my best friend. Would you please tell Rachel though?

name: monica
dialogue: All right, all right, at least I’m prepared.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.  Oh yes.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey-hey!

name: monica
dialogue: These aren’t for you! Are you upset?

name: chandler
dialogue: I am now!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey roomie!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, bye!

name: monica
dialogue: Rach, there’s something uh, important I have to tell you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you pregnant?!

name: monica
dialogue: No! But, I’m throwing this shirt away! I think there was a little misunderstanding before.

name: rachel
dialogue: Um-hmm.

name: monica
dialogue: Umm, when I said that uh, that Chandler and I wanted to umm, live together we meant alone together.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! Oh, that’s funny, I can’t believe I did that.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh no sweetie, no! This is my fault, I wasn’t clear! I’m really sorry. And listen, you take as much time as you need to move out okay? There’s absolutely no rush.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. Don’t you want a cookie?

name: rachel
dialogue: Sure?  Thanks.

name: monica
dialogue: Maybe, do you need a tissue?

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, where did you get these?!

name: monica
dialogue: I made them!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh, good God, they’re so yummy!

name: joey
dialogue: God, it’s going to so weird like when I come home and you’re not here. you know? No more Joey and Chan’s. No more J and C’s. "You want to go over to Joey and Chandler’s?" "Can’t, its not there."

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, I’m just going to be across the hall, we can still do all the same stuff.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah but we won’t be able to like get up in the middle of the night and have those long talks about our feelings and the future.

name: chandler
dialogue: Not once did we do that.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hi.

name: monica
dialogue: So I, I told Rachel it was just going to be the two of us.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah? Well, how’d she take it?

name: monica
dialogue: Really well. Yeah. Surprisingly well. Yeah, she didn’t cry. She wasn’t angry or sad.

name: chandler
dialogue: And you’re upset because you didn’t make your best friend cry?

name: monica
dialogue: I mean, all I’m asking for is just a little emotion! Is that too much to ask after six years?! I mean what? Are-are-are Rachel and I not as close as you guys?! I mean do we not have as much fun?! Don’t I deserve a few tears?!! I mean we-we told Joey, he cried his eyes out!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! I did not cry my eyes out!! Come on! It’s like the end of an era! No more J-man and Channie’s!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, I got to ask, who calls us that?!

name: russell
dialogue: You got married again.

name: ross
dialogue: Yes.

name: russell
dialogue: So that’s your second marriage in two years.

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, second in two years. Third overall.

name: russell
dialogue: Ross, I have been a divorce attorney for 23 years and never had I so much business from one client. Why don’t you tell me what happened.

name: ross
dialogue: Basically, Rachel and I were in Vegas and we got drunk

name: russell
dialogue: I’m sorry, is this the same Rachel who’s name you said at the altar in the second marriage?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes-yes-yes! But, I-I do not love her.

name: russell
dialogue: Oh, that’s better then.

name: ross
dialogue: This was just a drunken mistake and I need to get it annulled.

name: russell
dialogue: I see. Have you considered therapy?

name: ross
dialogue: I think just the annulment for today.

name: russell
dialogue: There are a couple of forms to fill out.

name: ross
dialogue: Easy.

name: russell
dialogue: And we’ll need to have witnesses who can testify that you were not of uh, sound mind.

name: ross
dialogue: No problem.

name: russell
dialogue: And we’ll need you and Rachel to testify before a judge.

name: ross
dialogue: Ooh! There’s no way to do this without her? Because I kind of all ready told her uh, it was, it was already taken care of.

name: russell
dialogue: Of course you did. Look Ross, you can’t get an annulment unless you and Rachel are both there.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-ha, what about someone who looks like Rachel?  I will think about the therapy.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey. So um, I was thinking that maybe we should start dividing up our stuff.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay!

name: monica
dialogue: you know, no point in dragging it out. Dragging out the long process of you moving out and us not living together anymore.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Rach, what about this?  Huh? Who-who gets this? See, I don’t know if I want it because it might be you know, too many memories!

name: rachel
dialogue: What the hell is that?

name: monica
dialogue: I don’t know.  Hey, Rachel, you want the big plate? I want you to have the big plate.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! Mon, thanks! I love this plate!

name: monica
dialogue: Something to remember me by!

name: rachel
dialogue: Mon, honey you’re not dying. I’m just moving out. you know, I mean we’re going to see each other all the time.

name: monica
dialogue: But still, it’s a big change. The end of an era, you might say!

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you okay? You’re not blinking.

name: monica
dialogue: I’m fine! I just, I’m thinking how much it’s an end of era.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, all right. But you know I got to say, I don’t, I don’t think six years counts as an era.

name: monica
dialogue: An era is defined as a significant period of time. Now, it was significant to me, maybe it wasn’t significant to you!

name: rachel
dialogue: What is the matter with you?!

name: monica
dialogue: What is the matter with you?!! Why aren’t you more upset?! Aren’t you going to be sad that we’re not going to be living together anymore?! I mean aren’t you going to miss me at all?!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, fine, but don’t get mad at me. It’s-it’s just a little hard to believe.

name: monica
dialogue: What’s hard to believe?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well you know, it’s you guys. You-you do this kind of stuff! you know? I mean, you-you were going to get married in Vegas and then you backed out! I guess I’m not upset because I don’t see you guys going through with it. I’m sorry.

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel, it’s going to happen. Chandler is going to move in here.

name: rachel
dialogue: But I

name: monica
dialogue: No-no, wait! Just let me finish, okay? This isn’t something that we just, we just impulsively decided in-in Vegas, this is something we both really want. And it is going to happen.

name: rachel
dialogue: It is? Really?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, sweetie.

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean we’re not, we’re not going to live together anymore?

name: monica
dialogue: No.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Oh my God! I’m going to miss you so much!

name: monica
dialogue: I’m going to miss you!

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean it’s the end of an era!

name: monica
dialogue: I know!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, bye!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh no.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So? Did you get the annulment?

name: ross
dialogue: I couldn’t.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I knew it! Because you love Rachel.

name: ross
dialogue: It’s not that. Okay? Annulments are more complicated than I

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, complicated because of the love.

name: ross
dialogue: I… I do, I do not love Rachel. I’m going to tell her right now about the whole thing so we can get this marriage annulled as fast as possible. Okay? Would I do that if I loved her?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I’ve never been more convinced of your love for her.

name: ross
dialogue: I do not have feelings for Rachel! Okay?!

name: ross
dialogue: OH, what’s wrong?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica and Chandler are really moving in here and I have to move out and everything is changing.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my—Come here! Come here!  It’s okay. Everything’s going to be okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you.

name: ross
dialogue: Of course.

name: joey
dialogue: So, Ross and Rachel got married, Monica and Chandler almost got married, do you think you and I should hook up?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh we do, but not just yet.

name: joey
dialogue: Really?! Well, when?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay umm, well, first Chandler and Monica will get married and be filthy rich by the way. Yeah. But it won’t work out.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know. Then, I’m going to marry Chandler for the money and you’ll marry Rachel and have the beautiful kids.

name: joey
dialogue: Great!

name: phoebe
dialogue: But then we ditch those two and that’s when we get married. We’ll have Chandler’s money and Rachel’s kids and getting custody will be easy because of Rachel’s drinking problem.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh-oh, what about Ross?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don’t want to go into the whole thing, but umm, we have words and I kill him.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! Check it out! This is unbelievable! Joey has been holding his breath for almost four minutes!

name: joey
dialogue: Dude! What are you—you trying to kill me?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs, I want to ask you something.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh, what?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well since I’m moving’ out and-and you’re so beautiful

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh!

name: rachel
dialogue: how about I move in with you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, that would be great but then what do we do about Denise?

name: monica
dialogue: Who’s Denise?

name: phoebe
dialogue: My roommate.

name: rachel
dialogue: You have a roommate?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes, Denise. Denise!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, what is with the secrecy Phoebe? Huh? And what about this Denise, is she cute?

name: chandler
dialogue: Pheebs, I don’t understand. How can you have a roommate that none of us know anything about?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Maybe because you never listen to anything that I say. I talk about her all the time! DENISE!!!!!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Rach, listen I was thinking’ uh, I’m going to have an extra room over at my place

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, that’s true.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, why don’t you move in with me? It’ll be great! We could stay up late, watch movies, and you know about Naked Thursday’s right?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, yeah I think I’m going to find my own place.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey-hey! I thought Naked Thursday’s was just our thing man!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, what did Rachel say when you told her you were still married to her?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, that. Umm, she took it really well.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You didn’t tell her did you?

name: ross
dialogue: No.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Of course not, because you’re in love with her.

name: ross
dialogue: I am not in love with her. She was very upset about having to move out so I eh, didn’t tell her we were still married because she would only get more upset. I-I just comforted her, as a friend.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What do you mean, comforted her?

name: ross
dialogue: It’s nothing, I just gave her a hug.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ah-ha! A classic sign of love, the hug!

name: ross
dialogue: It’s also a sign of friendship.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, not in your case Lovey Loverson.

name: ross
dialogue: It was a hug!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, just tell me this, did you or did you not smell her hair?

name: ross
dialogue: S-s-smell her hair? What if I did?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ninety percent of a women’s pheromones come out the top of her head! That’s why, that’s why women are shorter. So that men will fall in love when they hug them!  Oh come on Ross, you’re a scientist.

name: ross
dialogue: I was hugging her as a friend. It’s not my fault her-her hair got in my face, she’s got a lot of it and it smells all-all uh…coconutty.  What?! Oh, that doesn’t mean I have feelings for Rachel! Maybe it means I have feelings for coconuts!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, whatever you say. But just be careful, all right? Rachel’s not in the same place you are.

name: ross
dialogue: If the place you are referring too is being in love, then she is in the same place as me because I am not in that place!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, I didn’t understand that, but you know, maybe that’s because you were speaking the secret language of love!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!  Dude, some guy just called for you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Who was it?

name: joey
dialogue: I don’t know! How about, "Thanks for taking the message." Jeez!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay listen, you know when you move in Rachel’s room is going to be empty, you want to talk about what we want to do with it?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I was thinking we should have a beautiful guest room, right? With a mahogany sleigh bed and bedside tables with flowers on them all the time! And we could have a roll top desk with comment cards on them so people could say how much they loved staying here!! Okay, whatever, I really haven’t thought about it that much.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I like that idea. Obviously! I was thinking maybe-maybe-maybe it could be a game room, you know? I mean you can buy old arcade games like uh, like Space Invaders and Asteroids for $200, the real ones! The big-big ones!

name: monica
dialogue: No.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay so you mean no as in, "Gee Chandler, what an interesting idea. Let’s discuss it before we reject it completely."

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, I’m sorry. Of course I mean that. Interesting idea, umm, talk about it, but no.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, that’s it?

name: monica
dialogue: I just don’t think arcade games go in the beautiful guest room. The beautiful guest room is going to be filled with antiques.

name: chandler
dialogue: Which is why Asteroids is perfect! It’s the oldest game!

name: monica
dialogue: What do you have against the beautiful guest room?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don’t have anything against the beautiful guest room, especially since everybody we know lives about 30 seconds away!

name: monica
dialogue: Are you mocking me?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, I’m not mocking you,  or you beautiful guest room.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, what’s up?

name: chandler
dialogue: Nothing, Monica and I had a stupid fight.

name: joey
dialogue: But you’re still moving in together, right? Because my ad came out today.

name: chandler
dialogue: "Wanted. Female roommate, non-smoker, non-ugly." Nice!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah? I just figured you know, after living with you it’d be an interesting change of pace to have a female roommate, you know? Someone I can learn from, someone-someone who’s different than me. And what’s more different than me; a guy who’s not 19 than say a girl who is 19? Enh?  Not just a hat rack my friend!

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs, I have to ask you

name: phoebe
dialogue: Shh! I’m swamped right now.

name: rachel
dialogue: You’re just staring into space.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, I’m trying to move that pencil.

name: rachel
dialogue: This one?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It worked!

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs, this whole apartment thing is just a nightmare! Every place I can afford comes with a roommate who is a freak. I mean, look at this;  "Wanted. Female roommate, non-smoker, non-ugly." It’s just, there is nothing! The city’s full!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait, no, look at this!   "Two bedroom, two bath, must be non-smoker, Satan worshipers okay…" Oh, yeah, but it’s on the ground floor.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Rach, uh, you still looking for a place?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! Why?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, there’s this guy, Warren, from the museum and he’s going on a dig for like two years and he’s got this great place he needs to sublet. So uh, you interested?

name: rachel
dialogue: That sounds great! I’d love to live at Warren’s!! I love Warren! Thank you!

name: ross
dialogue: Don’t thank me! If you want to thank something, thank the volcano that erupted thousands of years ago, killing but perfectly preserving an entire civilization.  Here’s Warren’s number.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, this is great! I am going to call him right now!  Oh, thank you!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, you go grab it!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I saw it.

name: ross
dialogue: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, I’m talking about that which you already know but won’t admit. You love her again; you re-love her!

name: ross
dialogue: Look, I do not re-love her.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can’t believe you won’t just admit it!  Okay, just promise me that you won’t do anything stupid.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, we’re just friends now! Okay? Why would I do anything stupid?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh!!! Well, the apartment is already subletted! I mean, this is just hopeless. I’m never going to find anything.

name: ross
dialogue: You can live with me.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! Are you serious?!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: rachel
dialogue: I would love to live with you Ross; that’s-that’s great! Thank you!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I’m-I’m just glad I could, you know, help you out.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow! I’m-I’m so happy for you guys.  This is so-so, not stupid.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross-Ross, you have no idea what this means to me! I mean, I mean I was going to be homeless. You just saved me! You’re my hero!

name: ross
dialogue: Hero, I uh, I don’t know—well, all right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I have to go tell Monica what a wonderful brother she has!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh please!   You’re going to say things now, aren’t you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No. No, I won’t. But I should tell you this, this exact same thing happened to my roommate Denise. She moved in with a guy who was secretly married to her and he said he didn’t love her, but he really did, and it just blew up! And that’s how she ended up living with me!   Okay, that’s a lie.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi, listen, I’m sorry about before. I don’t need to have a game room. I mean when I was a kid I only played those games because I couldn’t get girls, and now I can ‘them—Now, I have you.  Not-not that I think that I have you or think of you as property in any sort of way, I see women

name: monica
dialogue: Stop it Chandler.  I’m sorry too.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! Oh yes!

name: chandler
dialogue: OH.

name: monica
dialogue: Listen, we don’t have to make that a guest room, we can think of something to do with the room together.

name: chandler
dialogue: That’s a great idea! We can easily think of a way for us both to enjoy the room.

name: monica
dialogue: Totally!

name: chandler
dialogue: We don’t have to come up with this now.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh good.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you know what? Why don’t we think about changes we can make in the living room?

name: monica
dialogue: Changes?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I mean we’re going to have to move around some furniture to make room for my chair.

name: monica
dialogue: You’re-you’re-you’re going to bring the Barca Lounger over here?

name: chandler
dialogue: Is that a problem?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, it’s a set and they should probably stay together.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, that’s cool. Then I’ll just bring them both over.

name: monica
dialogue: See now-now you’re taking them away from their home.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, I get it. So, I get nothing! Nothing here is mine! Everything here is yours! I’ll get up in the morning put on your clothes, and head off to work!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah-yeah, you know what? Yeah, that’s it-that’s it, everything will be mine! Nothing will be yours! That’s-that’s what I said! Oh come on, Chandler! I’m talking about the barca lounger! It just, it doesn’t match! Where is it going to go?!

name: chandler
dialogue: In the game room!

name: monica
dialogue: Look it is not my fault that your chairs are incredibly ugly!

name: chandler
dialogue: All right! That’s fine! That’s fine! I won’t bring over the chairs! I won’t bring anything over! I wouldn’t want to ruin the ambiance over here at Grandma’s place!!

name: joey
dialogue: Everything on your application looks really good—OH! Just one last question umm, are you and your friends going to be over here all the time like partying and hanging out?

name: the potential roommate
dialogue: Oh don’t worry, I’m not really a party girl.

name: joey
dialogue: Whoa!! Now look, don’t be just blurting’ stuff out. I want you to really think about your answers. Okay?

name: chandler
dialogue: You can call off the roommate search!  Hi! I’ll be living here.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh don’t listen to him, he’s just some guy who really wants the apartment, but I don’t think he’s going to get it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why did you take the shower curtain down?

name: joey
dialogue: That thing was a hazard!  I’m very safety conscious.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! Oh listen, I was just clearing some space for your stuff.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh thanks, but listen, I was just at Monica’s and she and Chandler had a big fight and they’re not moving in.

name: ross
dialogue: What do you mean, they’re not moving in? They-they’re still moving in right?

name: rachel
dialogue: No-no, they just had a big blowout over what to do with my room.

name: ross
dialogue: What?! Over a stupid room!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I feel kind of bad for them, but I’m also really psyched because I don’t have to move in here!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh no, yeah no, that part’s great!

name: ross
dialogue: What’s all this about you guys fighting?! Is this really over a room?! I mean, that is so silly!

name: monica
dialogue: Ross, we can handle this.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, apparently not, and I can’t just stand by and watch two people I care about very much be hurt over something that is so silly. I mean, enough of the silliness!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, why don’t you tell her to stop being silly!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay-okay! Two very good points, look I’ve known you both a long time, and I’ve never seen either of you one/millionth as happy as you’ve been since you’ve got together. Do you really want to throw that all away over a room? That is so silly. Now wh-what is more important, love or silliness?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, we are fond of the silliness, but we also have a soft spot for the love.

name: monica
dialogue: Love is the best medicine.

name: chandler
dialogue: That’s laughter.

name: monica
dialogue: Why do you do it?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don’t know.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay! All right! Now, Chandler you-you want to live with Monica, right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I do.

name: ross
dialogue: And Mon, you want to live with Chandler, don’t you?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes.

name: ross
dialogue: Good! A verbal contract is binding in the state of New York!

name: gunther
dialogue: So I understand you’re looking for a place.

name: rachel
dialogue: No-no, I’m staying put.

name: gunther
dialogue: Oh, I was going to offer you my apartment.

name: rachel
dialogue: Why, where are you going?

name: gunther
dialogue: I don’t know.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: ross
dialogue: You’re never going to believe it uh, Monica and Chandler are moving in again. That’s great news right—I mean for them. Right?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wow.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah but, on the bright side, we get to be roommates again.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah. you know umm, uh, umm, about that, umm, Ross I really appreciate your offer to let me move in and everything, but don’t you think it’s going to be weird?

name: ross
dialogue: Wh-why?! Why-why-why would it, why would it be weird?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, because of us! Because of our history.

name: ross
dialogue: No!

name: rachel
dialogue: No?

name: ross
dialogue: No! No! It would be weird if we were still in that place, I mean are you still in that place?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Not at all!

name: ross
dialogue: Good! Me neither! So it’s not a problem. We’re just two friends who happen to be roommates.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, but Ross, eventually you and I are going to be dating.

name: ross
dialogue: Really?! We are?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! I’m going to have a boyfriend, you’re going to have a girlfriend

name: ross
dialogue: OH! That would be great.

name: rachel
dialogue: But you know what, if you think it’s going to be okay we’ll just work out a system. you know, it’ll be like college, I’ll hang a hanger on the door and put a sign, "Come back later, I’m getting’ lucky."

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I didn’t think of that.

name: ross
dialogue: So are you sure about this whole moving in thing?! I mean it’s a really big step! And-and what’s the rush?!

name: monica
dialogue: That’s very funny!

name: chandler
dialogue: He’s being silly, because he knows that we enjoy the silliness!

name: ross
dialogue: No, I-I-I’m serious, okay? I mean, think about it. You move in, you start fighting over stupid game rooms, next thing you know you break up!

name: monica
dialogue: Ross, you were right before, it was just a stupid fight about a room.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, there are no stupid fights!! This isn’t about the room, this is about what the room…represents! And unfortunately, this room  could destroy you!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I'm not so worried.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, no, me neither.

name: ross
dialogue: Fine! It’s your life!  I just don’t want to see you guys break up! Which you will do if you move in together,  but that’s what you want, there’s nothing I can do.  DON’T DO IT!!!!!

name: monica
dialogue: You still want to move in together right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Of course!

name: monica
dialogue: Ross didn’t scare you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Scared me out of ever wanting to live with him.

name: monica
dialogue: Come here, I want to show you something!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God! Someone’s killed Square Man!

name: monica
dialogue: This is where I thought the barca lounger could go! You see you could see the TV and it’s still walking distance to the kitchen.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh that’s so sweet! I want to show you something too!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay!

name: chandler
dialogue: you know those big-big uh, road signs that say "Merge?"

name: monica
dialogue: Uh-hmm.

name: chandler
dialogue: you know? So I was thinking that we could get one of those signs and hang it over our bed. Because, that’s you and I together! Merge!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! I love that!

name: chandler
dialogue: Really?!

name: monica
dialogue: Uh, no!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I found you in my bed!                            How’d you whined up there?                            You are a mystery!                           Little black curly hair!                           Little black curly hair!                           Little black, little black, little black, little black, little black curly hair

name: phoebe
dialogue: Now if you want to receive e-mails about my upcoming shows, then please give me money so I can buy a computer.

name: ross
dialogue: So umm, where are the other guys?

name: rachel
dialogue: Umm, well let’s see Monica and Chandler are occupied.

name: ross
dialogue: Fighting?!

name: rachel
dialogue: No, the other thing. I really think it’s great they work things out.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. There’s no breaking them up, is there?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, can I borrow the key to your house so I can run across the street and make a copy?

name: ross
dialogue: Sure! Here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you.  Now are you sure? Because once I make a copy, there’s no turning back.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I’m-I’m sure.  Yeah, get out of here before I change my mind.

name: joey
dialogue: Umm, listen, Ross do you really think this moving in with Rachel is a good idea?

name: ross
dialogue: I’ve been back and forth.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah well, maybe you should go back! Okay? Rachel moves in, and before you know it you’re right where you don’t want to be! Back together!

name: ross
dialogue: Ehh, I don’t, I don’t think so. She’s already talked about you know, dating other guys.

name: joey
dialogue: That’s not going to work out! Then she’s going to come home all weepy and you’ll be telling’ her, "Oh that’s okay. You’ll find someone." And then, bam! She finds you!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, well, m-maybe you’re right.

name: joey
dialogue: I am telling you Ross, she is definitely going to fall in love with you again! Now, is that what you want?

name: ross
dialogue: Is that what I want?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes.

name: joey
dialogue: Here she comes. Hold on, I’m going to make your life much easier.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, well the place was closed. I’ll just copy it later.

name: joey
dialogue: Or not. Uh, Rach, why don’t you just move in with me?

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa, Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: No-no-no-no-no-no-no-no… It’s okay, I mean I—look Rach, I know I scared you off with that whole Naked Thursday’s thing, but we don’t have to do that!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, it would be easier to move just right across the hall. Wait a minute, unless you’re thinking about Naked Wednesday’s.

name: joey
dialogue: Thursday’s clearly not good for you, pick a day!

name: joey
dialogue: Hi!

name: the potential roommate
dialogue: Hi!

name: joey
dialogue: Come in. Thanks for coming’ back, umm, okay there have been a lot of people interested in the room, but I have narrowed it down and you are one of the finalists!

name: the potential roommate
dialogue: Great!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay now, before I make my final decision I uh, I just want to make sure our personalities match. Okay, so I made up a little test. Now, I’m going to say a word and then you say the first thing that comes to mind.

name: the potential roommate
dialogue: I can do that.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay! Here we go. Pillow.

name: the potential roommate
dialogue: Fight.

name: joey
dialogue: Very good! Okay. G.

name: the potential roommate
dialogue: String?

name: joey
dialogue: Excellent! Okay umm, doggy.

name: the potential roommate
dialogue: Kitten?

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh, sorry! No-no-no, so close though, but—bye-bye!

name: rachel
dialogue: So, which of this kitchen stuff is mine?

name: monica
dialogue: This bottle opener.

name: rachel
dialogue: And?

name: monica
dialogue: And it’s a magnet!

name: rachel
dialogue: Look at that!

name: ross
dialogue: How weird is that? you know? You’re moving in with me and have the one thing I don’t have. It’s like uh, in a way you-you complete me  kitchen.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: You complete me kitchen, matey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, I know what you’re thinking.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: That she’s going to move in with you and maybe then she’ll fall in love with you and then when she finds out you’re already married, she’ll just be happy. you know? You’re just, you’re very sad.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh…my…God! I-I see what this is! You are in love with Rachel!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!!

name: ross
dialogue: Of course! It all adds up! I mean you you’re obsessed with her. It’s always, "Ross, what are you going to do about Rachel?" "Ross, why-why are you moving in with Rachel?" "When are you going to confess your secret marriage to Rachel?" You want her!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-oh, saved by the bell.  Hello?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Rach, aren’t these candlesticks  mine?

name: rachel
dialogue: No-no, I bought those.

name: monica
dialogue: OH! Yeah, I forgot.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: That you’re a liar.

name: ross
dialogue: No-no-no, that’s great! I’ll be there Monday. And thank you again!  Okay.   Umm, that was the head of the Palaeontology department at N uh, Y, uh U!

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! Uh what, did he uh, say?

name: ross
dialogue: Well remember that paper I had published last year on sediment flow rate, huh? They loved it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, who wouldn’t?!

name: ross
dialogue: I know! Anyway, they asked me to be a guest lecturer! I mean it’s temporary, but uh, if they like me it could lead to a full time job. How great would that look great on a mailbox, huh? "Professor Geller."

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, Professor and Mrs.

name: rachel
dialogue: And Mrs.?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! Yeah, you know you and Ross are still married.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Just kidding!

name: rachel
dialogue: OH! Oh God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Saved your ass.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, what’s the matter?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, you know that psychic I see?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, she told me that I’m going to die this week, so I’m kind of bummed about that.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, and I know you guys don’t know a lot about psychic readings, but that one is pretty much the worse one you can get.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe that’s crazy!

name: joey
dialogue: I can’t believe she would say that too you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah honey you don’t believe her do you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don’t—she said you know that I’d have triplets! But she also said one of them would be black.

name: chandler
dialogue: Just out of curiosity did she tell you how you’re going to go?

name: phoebe
