name: joey
dialogue: Why not?

name: the porsche owner
dialogue: I live upstate.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, so did I.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don’t know why I was so nervous about this. And I don’t know why Frank and Alice are always complaining. This is so easy.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, two hours, a lifetime that’s the same.

name: chandler
dialogue: Check it out! Check it out! When the babies wake up, they can meet Krog!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, what are you doing? That thing can put someone’s eye out!

name: chandler
dialogue: He can do more than that! He can destroy the universe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No Chandler, they can swallow one of those little parts! And also, look at his smooth area, that’s just going to mess them up.

name: chandler
dialogue: They’re not going to swallow anything, you guys are being way over protective. When I was a kid, my mom used to just throw me into a pile of broken glass!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Glass, sand, whatever.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, look at little Leslie stretching in her sleep.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh it’s so cute. I wonder what age it is when you stop being able to put both legs over your head.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I can still do that.

name: monica
dialogue: How are you still single?!

name: chandler
dialogue: All right.  I thought about it and maybe you’re right. Maybe Krog is not a safe toy.

name: monica
dialogue: Good. What made you change your mind?

name: chandler
dialogue: I swallowed the sonic blaster gun.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How did that happen?!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I was trying to prove that I was right. you know? And it turns out I was wrong. And now it’s lodged in my throat.

name: monica
dialogue: Damnit! you know this whole time we were concentrating on watching the babies and, and no one was watching Chandler!

name: judge
dialogue: Okay you two are asking the court for an annulment?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes your honor, and here are, are forms, all filled out.

name: judge
dialogue: So based on your petition you are seeking an annulment on the grounds that Mr. Geller is mentally unstable.

name: ross
dialogue: Fine, I’m mentally unstable.

name: judge
dialogue: And based on the fact that Mr. Geller is intravenous drug user.

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh yes, heroin and crack.

name: ross
dialogue: Crack isn’t even an intravenous drug!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you would know.

name: judge
dialogue: Now it also says here that you lied about your sexual preference before marriage?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, come on!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, please, I found the magazines!

name: judge
dialogue: And finally that you were unable to consummate the marriage. Well, that makes sense since you’re gay and addicted to heroin.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, I’m sorry, this is insane! I-I-I’m not addicted to heroin, I’m not gay, and there is no problem with my ability to consummate anything! Look, I’ll consummate this marriage right here, right now!

name: judge
dialogue: That won’t be necessary.

name: ross
dialogue: And when we were dating we consummated like bunnies!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh!

name: judge
dialogue: Now if you were two involved in a serious relationship, that really creates a problem.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross! Your honor, rest assured relationship ended like two years ago!  And could you strike "Consummated like bunnies" from the record?

name: judge
dialogue: Is there, anything in this record that is actually true?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, yes, we got married in Vegas and uh, and the names I think.

name: judge
dialogue: Well, based on what I heard, you two certainly don’t qualify for an annulment. If you two don’t want to be together you’ll have to file for divorce.

name: ross
dialogue: That’s great! Are you happy now? Look what you did with your funny, funny form!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! Me?! What about you and your consummated like bunnies nonsense!

name: ross
dialogue: And what——What are you typing that for? Did you hear what she said? We don’t get the annulment. Don’t type that! What?! Stop typing!  Hey! Stop typing!  Stop typing! Stop typing!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, do you see, do you see what you’re keeping me married too?!

name: judge
dialogue: You need to get out of my chambers.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right look lady here is the deal, I came here for an annulment and I am not leaving here until I get one!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah!

name: judge
dialogue: Would you like to spend the night in jail?

name: rachel
dialogue: And thank you for your time.

name: joey
dialogue: So the Porsche guy took his car back.

name: chandler
dialogue: But you found the keys to his clothes?

name: joey
dialogue: No. No, I just uh, I just loved the way it feels when everybody thinks I own a Porsche.

name: monica
dialogue: And people will think you own a Porsche because you’re wearing the clothes?

name: joey
dialogue: Of course! Only an idiot would wear this stuff if you didn’t have the car! Right?

name: chandler
dialogue: That is true.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but only a genius would swallow a sonic blaster gun.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, I’ve been there. Yeah, I am going to go drive my Porsche.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, you know you don’t actually have one.

name: joey
dialogue: Come on! What are you doing?! I’m in character! Would you talk to her!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ahh, I think it just moved. It’s really poking me.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, that’s it, we’re going to the emergency room.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?! No, you can’t, you can’t leave me here with them! We’re baby-sitting!

name: monica
dialogue: The babies are asleep, I’m sure you’ll be okay on your own for a while!

name: phoebe
dialogue: But you-you can’t leave me with them! We-we’re a team! We’re playing a zone! They’re going to triple team me!

name: monica
dialogue: He’s got something plastic lodged in his throat, we’ve got to go to the hospital.

name: phoebe
dialogue: But no, because a doctor won’t be able to help him, it’s just going to you know naturally pass through his system in like seven years.

name: chandler
dialogue: I think that’s gum.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I’m pretty sure it’s gun.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, listen this really hurts. Let’s go.

name: phoebe
dialogue: A real man wouldn’t just run to the hospital!  No! What would, what would Krog do?

name: joey
dialogue: Why isn’t that valet back with my Porsche?

name: passerby
dialogue: Maybe because you’ve got the keys?

name: joey
dialogue: Porsche.

name: rachel
dialogue: This is totally your fault!

name: ross
dialogue: My fault?! You threatened the judge!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you ripped the paper out of the court reporter’s machine!!

name: ross
dialogue: That was the only way I could get him to stop typing!

name: joey
dialogue: Hi! How are the Gellers?

name: rachel
dialogue: Don’t call us that!

name: ross
dialogue: The judge wouldn’t let us get an annulment! Now we got to get a divorce!! Did a Porsche throw up on you?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! It’s Porsche!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Me taking care of you is no problem, huh? You guys feel safe. Right? Okay, I’m going to take that spit bubble as, "Yeah, I do!" Okay, after I get rid of this dirty diaper Leslie, I’ll set you up with a clean one.  Okay, I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to scare you. I just have to clean that up. Okay? Because let’s face it, we’re at Monica’s.  I broke it. All right. Well, that’s just the way that goes.  Okay, good.  Why are there only two of you? Where is Leslie? Well, you can’t answer.  Leslie? Where are you Leslie? Leslie, now would be a good time for your first words!  Well, look at you! Hey! You are a little bit mischievous! My gosh!  Oh, you’re a lot mischievous! Well, it’ll dry.   Okay, you sit with your brother and sister now—who aren’t there!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: How do you feel?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, let’s just say that Krog will be fully equipped to destroy the universe again in twelve to fourteen hours.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, so I totally took care of the babies all by myself! I fed ‘them, bathed ‘them, and put ‘them to bed.

name: chandler
dialogue: And protected them from a tornado?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know, the babies are asleep.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, what, what happened here?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I did it! I took care of the babies all by myself!

name: monica
dialogue: But my apartment!

name: chandler
dialogue: Was the setting of Phoebe’s triumph.

name: monica
dialogue: But the mess!

name: chandler
dialogue: Is not as important as the fact that Phoebe took care of the babies all by herself.

name: monica
dialogue: You’re right, you’re right I shouldn’t freak out. Because this is what will happen when you and I have babies! When will that be?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Phoebe, would you take a look at this mess!!!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh honey thank God you’re home, I was getting worried.

name: ross
dialogue: I picked up the divorce papers. Uh, I’ve already signed everything and I put little ‘X’s where you need to sign.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, little ‘X’s! Great! That makes up for everything!

name: ross
dialogue: you know, I-I—you’ve done a lot of stupid stuff too! Okay?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, name one stupid thing that is as stupid as this one!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, how about you flew to London to stop my wedding! Ah, how about you told me you loved me after I was already married!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! Wait a minute! That was different! I did those things because I was in love with you!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah! Right!

name: ross
dialogue: You’re right. That’s very different. So let’s, let’s just sign the papers. All right?  What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Nothing.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, can we just sign please?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-hmm.

name: ross
dialogue: Congratulations.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay Ross, we’re—wait a minute. Umm, I uh, I kind of have a little confession.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you know this whole marriage thing, kind of my idea.

name: ross
dialogue: Excuse me?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, remember how we were too drunk to remember anything the night we were married?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: And uh, yeah, I didn’t really, I didn’t want to say anything, but it kind of it just, it kind of kept coming back to me, and umm, remember we were in the casino and for some reason thought it would be funny to eat a lot of grapes. And uh, and I thought it would be funnier if we got married. So as a, as a compromise we decided first to get married, and then  to eat a lot of grapes. So umm, sorry I got us into this mess.

name: ross
dialogue: So then if-if—I mean if you think about it, this is all  your fault.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, don’t push it though.

name: ross
dialogue: I’ve got to say; I know I divorce a lot of women, never thought I would be divorcing you.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know. I always thought if you and I got married, it would be the one that stuck. And it wouldn’t be a secret, and we wouldn’t have our wedding dinner at Pizza Hut.

name: ross
dialogue: Did I, did I even treat?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, it was on the house, it was, it was a newlywed special.

name: ross
dialogue: That may be the most depressing thing I’ve heard in my life. I should probably get these to my lawyer’s office.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, thanks Ross, for taking care of all of this.

name: ross
dialogue: Eh, no problem.

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m going to need a copy of those.

name: ross
dialogue: Totally.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Hey! Be careful around my Porsche!

name: woman
dialogue: Hi Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! How you doin’?

name: woman
dialogue: He has the most amazing Porsche under there!

name: joey
dialogue: I’d love to show you, but I just tucked her in. She’s sleeping.  Hey uh, would you two girls like to go for a drink?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay!  Listen, I’m going to be moving out so you will be in charge of paying the rent.

name: joey
dialogue: Right! And when is that due?

name: chandler
dialogue: First of the month.

name: joey
dialogue: And that’s every month?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, just the months you actually want to live here.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, here is the phone bill.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God!!

name: chandler
dialogue: That’s our phone number. Now look, I know I kind of sprung this whole me moving out on thing, so why don’t I just—why don’t I just cover you for a while?

name: joey
dialogue: No-no! No way! Joey Tribbiani does not take charity…anymore.

name: chandler
dialogue: It’s not charity, Joe

name: joey
dialogue: No! Forget it! Okay—I mean thanks, but I’m done taking money from you. All right, I can take of myself. Now, what’s next? Come on.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay uh, here’s the electric bill.

name: joey
dialogue: This is how much we pay for electric?!!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, we’ll do the rest of the bills later then?

name: phoebe
dialogue: So is Joey going to have to give up the apartment?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, I hope not! I tried to offer him some money, but he wouldn’t take it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, how much do you think he needs?

name: chandler
dialogue: I figure that $1,500 would cover him for a few months, you know? But I have to trick him into taking it so I won’t hurt his pride.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why don’t you hire him as an actor? You could have him dress up and put on little skits. Whatever you want.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well that would help the pride thing.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! Wow! You look great! want to move in with me tomorrow?

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay!  So, what do you girls have planned for tonight?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, instead of being sad that tonight is my last night together with Rachel we thought we’d go out to dinner and celebrate the fact that Rachel is moving in with Phoebe.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And also, my birthday.

name: monica
dialogue: It’s not your birthday.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What a mean thing to say! I would never tell you it’s not your birthday!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! So you guys have anything planned for the big last night?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, instead of just hanging out, we figure we’d do nothing.

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-whoa, Knicks season opener tonight. I thought maybe you guys would come over and watch it.

name: joey
dialogue: I don’t know Ross, not if you’re going to talk about how you gave up a career in basketball to become a palaeontologist.

name: ross
dialogue: I did give up a career in basketball to become a palaeontologist!

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs, I was wondering

name: monica
dialogue: You’re not dressed yet?! We’re supposed to start having fun in 15 minutes!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well and clearly not a minute sooner.

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel, you are packed though right, I mean please tell me that you’re packed.

name: rachel
dialogue: Of course I packed! Monica relax! I just wanted to ask Phoebe her opinion on what I should wear tonight.

name: phoebe
dialogue: My God, I can’t get a minute of peace around this place.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! Monica’s just going to kill you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, yeah, I know.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, what you’re wearing is fine for that.

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel, I need to borrow—You’re not packed!!!! You’re not packed even a little bit!

name: rachel
dialogue: Surprise!!

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, no don’t get mad because look—this is what happened. So I-I started packing, then I realized, "What am I doing? I am lousy at packing!" Right? But you love packing! So, as a gift to you, on our last night, ta-da!

name: monica
dialogue: I’ll be coordinator! Oh my God! I’m so sorry, I didn’t get you anything! Okay, look everybody has to help! Okay? You can help, can’t you Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I have plans.

name: monica
dialogue: You’re plans were with us.

name: phoebe
dialogue: That’s right.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, Chandler can make boxes, Ross can wrap, and Joey can lift things. Now Phoebe, go tell the guys they have to help out!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay!  Oh my God, thank you!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hurry! Monica’s going to make you pack! She’s got jobs for everyone! Now, it’s too late for me, but save your selves!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay! The movers will be here in 11 hours. Rachel has not packed. Now, everybody has to help! Chandler, we’re going to start with

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh nope, I-I have plans with Joey.

name: monica
dialogue: I thought you said you were going to do nothing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, but for the last time.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay fine, now Ross

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, but-but I can’t do it.

name: monica
dialogue: Why not?

name: joey
dialogue: I’ve got Ben.

name: ross
dialogue: Because, because I’ve got Ben.

name: monica
dialogue: It’s almost 8 o’clock, it’s almost past his bedtime. Where-where is he?

name: chandler
dialogue: He’s at a dinner party.

name: monica
dialogue: Is he really coming? Because I can see right into your apartment!

name: ross
dialogue: Of course he is! What, do you think I’d just use my son as-as an excuse? What kind of father do you think I am?

name: monica
dialogue: All right, sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: I got to go make a fake Ben.

name: joey
dialogue: Here it is! Our last pizzas together as roommates.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I wish I’d know you were going to do that, I ordered Chinese.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh that’s okay. Hey, actually in a way it’s kind of nice. Me, bringing the food of my ancestors, you, the food of yours!

name: chandler
dialogue: Say, Joe, I had a strange idea of what we could do for our last night. What do you say we play a little uh, foosball for money?

name: joey
dialogue: What, are you crazy? You haven’t beaten me once since my injury plagued ’97 season. It would be easier if you just give me your money.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes it would. What do you say to $50?

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, you’re on.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, let’s play! The big game, Italy vs. China, apparently.

name: rachel
dialogue: oh, look it’s the roller blades.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh God!

name: rachel
dialogue: You remember when we got these?

name: monica
dialogue: No.

name: rachel
dialogue: I guess you weren’t there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You guys, we said we were going to have fun! Come on, hey, remember the time…  You don’t remember?

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m sorry Pheebs, I guess I’m just really said that I’m leaving.

name: monica
dialogue: I’m going to miss you so much.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, this doesn’t have to be so sad though. you know? Maybe instead of just thinking about how much you’re going to miss each other, you should like think of the things you’re not going to miss.

name: monica
dialogue: I don’t think there’s anything.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Come on, there’s got to be something.

name: monica
dialogue: Nope, she’s perfect.

name: rachel
dialogue: I have one.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Good! Great! You can go first.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh well, I guess I’m not going to miss the fact that you’re never allowed to move the phone pen.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Good that’s a good one. Okay, Monica, anything? you know? Does Rachel move the phone pen?

name: monica
dialogue: Aw, sometimes. Always, actually.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, good. There you go. Doesn’t anyone feel better?

name: monica
dialogue: Not just the phone pen. I never get my messages.

name: rachel
dialogue: You get your messages!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, well I don’t think it really counts if you have to read them off the back of your hand after you fall asleep on the couch.

name: rachel
dialogue: So-so, you missed a message from who? Chandler or your mom? Or Chandler? Or your mom?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Great! It worked! No one’s sad.

name: joey
dialogue: Yes! I win again! Ha-ha! That’s like 500 bucks you owe me! Whoo-ho-hoo!  $500 that is a lot of electricity!  Whoo-ho-ho!  I got to buy some food.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, give me a chance to win my money back. Okay? Sudden death, one goal, $1,000.

name: joey
dialogue: You serious?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, get ready to owe me!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, here we go. Ready?

name: chandler
dialogue: No! No! No! No——one can beat me.

name: chandler
dialogue: See? Now, that’s why only the little fake men are supposed to do all the kicking.

name: monica
dialogue: Hello?  Oh, hi Ross!  See? Other people call me!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh, your brother. Score!

name: monica
dialogue: What’s up?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I’m just over here with Ben. I thought we’d say hi.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, put him on!

name: ross
dialogue: Ben, say hi to Aunt Monica.  Oh, I guess he doesn’t feel like talking right now. He’s smiling though! Okay, talk to you later.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I think it was better when you guys were sad. Hey, uh, remember the roller blades?

name: rachel
dialogue: You know what else I’m not going to miss? "I’m Monica. I wash the toilet 17 times a day. Even if people are on it!"

name: monica
dialogue: "Hi I’m Rachel, is my sweater too tight? No? Oh, I’d better wash it and shrink it!"

name: rachel
dialogue: "I’m Monica, I don’t get phone messages from interesting people. Ever!"

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! I call her!

name: monica
dialogue: "Oh my God, I love Ross! I hate Ross! I love Ross! I hate Ross!"

name: rachel
dialogue: "Oh my God, I can’t find a boyfriend! So I guess I’ll just stumble across the hall and sleep with the first guy I find in there!"

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, we should get a move on if we want to make those dinner reservations.

name: chandler
dialogue: Still broken?

name: joey
dialogue: This sucks man! The last night you’re here and I lose the two most important things in my life, the foosball table and $500.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, there are other ways of winning back your money, how about a little uh, a little Blackjack?

name: joey
dialogue: Nah, not my game.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, uh, how about, how about—you know what? We could play a new game. A new game, it’s fun.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, what’s it called?

name: chandler
dialogue: Cups.

name: joey
dialogue: I don’t know how to play Cups.

name: chandler
dialogue: I’ll teach you! Come on, come on, it’s really easy and really, really fun.

name: joey
dialogue: All right.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, here you go.  I have two queens, what do you have?

name: joey
dialogue: A two and a five.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ho-ho, you win! 50 dollars!

name: joey
dialogue: Really?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah! Okay, let’s play again.  What do you got?

name: joey
dialogue: A four and a nine.

name: chandler
dialogue: You’re kidding right?

name: joey
dialogue: No. Why?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well that’s a full cup!

name: joey
dialogue: Damn! I am good at Cups!

name: monica
dialogue: I’m not talking to her!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, one of you has to take the first step! And it should be you, because she’s the one who’s leaving. It’s harder for her!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, maybe you’re right—She made fun of my phone pen!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know, I took it hard too.

name: monica
dialogue: Listen Rachel, I feel really bad about—What are you doing?

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m unpacking!

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m not moving!  Is that picture straight?

name: monica
dialogue: It needs to go about 20 blocks to the left!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, you know what? You’re the one who wants to make this big change and move in with Chandler! You should be the one to go! Why should I have to leave?!

name: monica
dialogue: Because it’s my apartment!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well it’s mine too! What else you got?!

name: monica
dialogue: How about, you’re moving!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Look! This is ridiculous. We should be packing you!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, how are you guys doing?

name: rachel
dialogue: Great! Monica’s moving!

name: monica
dialogue: I am not!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh really?! Then how come all your stuff is in this box?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, you guys. You guys I think I know what’s going on here. Okay, you guys… STOP!!  I know that, I know that you’re acting mad because you think that it’ll make it easier to leave. But deep down you’re still really sad. Deep-deep down.

name: monica
dialogue: No Phoebe I am mad!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, deep-deep-deep down!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I’m just mad!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Then keep running.

name: chandler
dialogue: You win.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, what did you have?

name: chandler
dialogue: It doesn’t matter because nothing beats a three and a six. That my friend is D-Cup. Okay, now much have you won so far?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh,  wow, 700.

name: chandler
dialogue: Not 700 exactly?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Double it!

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well you see in Cups, once you get $700, you have to double it.

name: joey
dialogue: Really?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, I didn’t make up the rules. Now, after you receive the doubling bonus, you get uh, one card. Now that one card could be worth $100 bringing your total to 1,500.  Don’t get to excited because that’s not going to happen unless you get—No way!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, this is the last box of your clothes. I’m just going to label it, "What were you thinking?"

name: rachel
dialogue: Funny, because I was just going to go across the hall and write that on Chandler.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey you guys, I don’t mean to make things worse, but umm, I don’t want to live with Rachel anymore.

name: monica and rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You’re just so mean to each other! And I don’t want to end up like that with Rachel. I still like you!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, Phoebe that’s fine because I’m not moving.

name: monica
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-whoa, Phoebe you got to take her! you know I-I-I said some really bad stuff about her, but you know Rachel has some good qualities that make her a good roommate.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh really? Like what Monica?

name: monica
dialogue: you know she has 147,000 pairs of boots

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah, good start Mon.

name: monica
dialogue: She lets you borrow them.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah and you stretch ‘them out with your big old clown feet.

name: monica
dialogue: Do you want to live outside?! Because it’s getting’ cold!  She gets tons of catalogues and umm, she’ll fold down the pages of the things she thinks that I’d like.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What else?

name: monica
dialogue: When I take a shower, she leaves me little notes on the mirror.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I do. I-I do, do that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: That’s nice. I like having things to read in the bathroom.

name: monica
dialogue: When I fall asleep on the couch after reading, she covers me over with a blanket.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well you know, I don’t want you to be cold.

name: monica
dialogue: And when I told her that I was going to be moving in with Chandler, she was really supportive.   You were so great. You made it so easy. And now you have to leave. And I have to live with a boy!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, it’s going to be fine.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay Rachel, I can’t wait to live with you! And you know what we should do? Bring Monica and then we could all live there together! We’ll have so much fun!!

name: rachel
dialogue: But honey, I think she’s moving in with Chandler.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh that’s right. You’re still set on that?

name: monica
dialogue: kind of.  Oh my God!

name: ross
dialogue: Hello?  Hey Mon, how’s the packing going?  Ben? He’s fine. Yeah, he’s right—Oh my God!  Get your head of your shirt there son!  What?  Yeah, it’s a pumpkin. I’ll come pack.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: What’s wrong?

name: joey
dialogue: Ross and I were helping the girls pack, took a little break, I lost $1,500 to him in Cups!

name: chandler
dialogue: Wh-How did you lose at Cups?!

name: joey
dialogue: The same way you lost. I started out with a King and a Queen, bam! Ross gets a 2 and a 3. Then I get a Jack and a King, boom! Ross gets a 4 and a 5! Ross was getting the Cup card, the D-Cup, the Sitting’ Down Bonus! Meanwhile, I didn’t even get half a cup! Nothing’!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh man!!

name: joey
dialogue: And he never played before either! you know what I think? I think beginner’s luck, very important in Cups.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right, let’s play one more hand! One more!

name: joey
dialogue: No, no, no more! I cannot lose another dime! I’m serious this time! In-in fact, look, there’s a—I want to give you something. And let me give it too you know before I pawn it for Cups money.  Now, I want you to have the big white dog as a kind of of a, you know, thank you for being such a great roommate.

name: chandler
dialogue: I can’t take the big white dog! You love it!

name: joey
dialogue: It’s him, not it!

name: chandler
dialogue: No, but wait—what if I bought it from you, you know? And your nice gesture would be giving it to me at a reasonable price, say  $1,500?

name: joey
dialogue: Wait a second, I see what you’re trying to do here! You-you’re trying to give me money again!

name: chandler
dialogue: When did I try to give you money?

name: joey
dialogue: Over there!  Before, with the bills! You tried to give some charity, I said "No," you dropped it. Okay? Then we had a nice last night together, we had some fun, we gambled, nobody tried to give anybody any money! Now out of the blue, you start with the charity thing again!

name: chandler
dialogue: I’m just trying to help you out! Okay? I want to make sure that you’re okay.

name: joey
dialogue: I will be okay! Look Chandler, you got to get it out of your head that I can’t take care of myself. Okay? Look, I’m not going to miss you helping me out with money. The only thing that I’m going to miss…is you. And now the dog.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey. Call me when you get there. Okay?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: I’m really going to miss you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! I have your key. Here you go.

name: monica
dialogue: Thanks.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh God! This is silly, I’m going to see you in a couple of hours!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Bye house!

name: rachel
dialogue: Bye Mon.

name: monica
dialogue: Bye.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: She really left.

name: chandler
dialogue: I know.

name: monica
dialogue: Thank you.

name: chandler
dialogue: No problem roomie.

name: monica
dialogue: Can I ask you a question?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure!

name: monica
dialogue: What the hell is that dog doing here?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I invented the game of Cups as a way to give Joey money.

name: ross
dialogue: And now you want that money back.

name: chandler
dialogue: Exactly.

name: ross
dialogue: Chandler, what kind of an idiot do you take me for?

name: chandler
dialogue: It’s not a real game! I made it up!

name: ross
dialogue: I’m sorry you lost your money, but I won it fair and square.

name: chandler
dialogue: At a fake game!!

name: ross
dialogue: Now, if you want to try to make some of it back, I’d be glad to play you for it. But I should warn you, I am very good at Cups.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay! Now I assume the Saucer card came up when you played last.

name: ross
dialogue: No.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hmm, let’s see if it comes up this time.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ready?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi...

name: phoebe
dialogue: it's...

name: rachel
dialogue: Rachel...

name: phoebe
dialogue: and

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe’s...

name: phoebe
dialogue: please...

name: rachel
dialogue: leave...

name: phoebe
dialogue: leave

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait, I-I just said "leave."

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I know because you have all the good words. What do I get? I get "it’s," "and" oh I'm sorry, I have "A." Forget it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, come on that is silly.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, so let's switch.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I have all of the good words. OK, fine, fine, we can switch.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi

name: rachel
dialogue: Everybody

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's

name: rachel
dialogue: Rachel

name: phoebe
dialogue: and

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe’s

name: phoebe
dialogue: Please...wait, how did you do that?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, you are no ordinary roommate are you?

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, come on can we finish this later? Cause I want to go running before it gets dark. Oh! Why don't you come with me?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, it'll be fun. We'll run in the park. It'll be like our first you know roommate bonding thing.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, let's go running!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah and there's really cute guys there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Let's run towards them!

name: rachel
dialogue: OK!

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, wait just one more second. Hi, it's Phoebe and Rachel's. Please leave a message, thanks!

name: rachel
dialogue: Now wait a minute. You just took all the words!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh. You've met your match Rachel Green.

name: ross
dialogue: So, I just finished this fascinating book. By the year 2030, there'll be computers that can carry out the same amount of functions as an actual human brain. So theoretically you could download your thoughts and memories into this computer and-and-and live forever as a machine.

name: chandler
dialogue: And I just realized I can sleep with my eyes open.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross and chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Honey, that is a great idea nailing the boxes to the floor!

name: chandler
dialogue: I didn't nail the boxes to the floor.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, So you can move them!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, and while I'm doing that, Ross has a great computer story for you.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey everybody! Uh, I'd like you to meet Janine. She's-she's going to be my new roommate!

name: janine
dialogue: Hi.

name: ross
dialogue: Hi!

name: janine
dialogue: Hi

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, she's going to live with me!

name: monica
dialogue: It's nice to meet you. Janine...?

name: janine
dialogue: Lecroix. Janine Lecroix

name: joey
dialogue: I didn't know that! Well, what a pretty last name!

name: chandler
dialogue: So, uh, wh-where you from?

name: janine
dialogue: Australia, I just moved here a couple of weeks ago.

name: joey
dialogue: From the land down under? I didn't know that either!

name: ross
dialogue: So uh, what-uh, what do you do?

name: janine
dialogue: I'm a dancer.

name: joey
dialogue: you are a dancer? She-she's a dancer!

name: janine
dialogue: Well, I think I'll go and unpack.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, hey let me.

dialogue: Joey, did you even interview this woman before you asked her to move in?

name: joey
dialogue: Of course I did.

name: monica
dialogue: Uh-huh, what exactly did you ask her?

name: joey
dialogue: "When can you move in?"

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you for bringing her into our lives.

name: chandler
dialogue: Unbelievable

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, so you like her too Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, look at all the boxes!

name: joey
dialogue: Ugh, I cannot wait to ask her out!

name: monica
dialogue: Wait a minute...Joey. Joey you can't ask her out, she's your roommate. It-it'll be way too complicated.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, yeah man don't do it. I mean if you date her, then-then-then I can't date her.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right, think about it. Now remember when you were going out with that girl Donna and you guys broke up. Remember how horrible it was when you guys bumped into each other at the supermarket?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh God, yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Now imagine you live at the supermarket.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay!

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, Oh, you are right! I don't want that. I can't date her!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah and you better watch the flirting too, cause you know, in such close quarters, it could be trouble.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, that is going to be tough Mon. I mean it's hard for me to be around an attractive woman and not flirt.

name: monica
dialogue: Hmm, well you are around me all the time and you don't flirt.

name: joey
dialogue: You a little sad about that sweetheart?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I have to tie my shoe, so you go ahead, I'll catch up.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.  Come on! that is not running! Let's go!

name: rachel
dialogue: You guys, I'm telling you, when she runs, she looks like a cross between Kermit The Frog and The Six Million Dollar Man.

name: ross
dialogue: Monica had such a crush on him. Yeah, she used to kiss his poster every night before she went to bed.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! I used to do that too!

name: monica
dialogue: Did you also have his album, It's Not Easy Being Green?

name: rachel
dialogue: Aw, Mon...

name: monica
dialogue: So, Phoebe runs weird huh?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, yeah and you know what, I know she's going to want to run again, I just don't know how to get out of it, I mean, I live with her.

name: monica
dialogue: Why don't you just be straight with her? Tell her the truth.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: you are right, you are right. I should just tell her the truth.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs, Monica tripped me, I don't think I can ever run again, ever!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why? Why would you do that?

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know. Rachel I'm-I'm sorry that I hurt your ankles.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ankle.

name: monica
dialogue: We'll see.

name: chandler
dialogue: OK, I'm officially unpacked. Thanks for helping me man.  Joe?  Well, I guess Joey went home. Oh and look, there's still one box that I have to unpack.

name: joey
dialogue: I Gotcha!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God! You-almost-gave-me-a-heart-attack.

name: joey
dialogue: Boy, it was so hard not to laugh, I tell you. Hey, hey, the place looks great!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, not bad right? You know what, Monica’s going to be working late, so I'm going to make this place spotless. You know what else I'm going to do, know what else I'm going to do? I'm going to go downstairs, I'm going to get her some flowers. Now who wouldn't want to live with me?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't! No, I want to live with the super-hot Australian dancer.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, now how's that going though? Are you okay with the not-flirting thing?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. Well, so far yeah. But it's tough you know? I got all this built up flirting energy and I don't know how to get rid of it.  How you doin?

name: joey
dialogue: oh man

name: janine
dialogue: Sorry, there's just more room out here.

name: joey
dialogue: No-no-no-no-no, it's-it's uh, you just uh, uh reminded me that uh, I need to do my stretches too.

name: janine
dialogue: Why don't you try to do-

name: janine
dialogue: What's wrong?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh-uh nothing. I-I-I-I didn't want you to touch me cause I'm -I'm all sweaty from the workout. I better hit the shower.  Oh my God!

name: janine
dialogue: Oh, sorry about that stuff hanging in there. It's just my thongs are too delicate for the dryer.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi! Oh yeah, uh-huh, it's me. I saw you grab your running shoes this morning and sneak out. You lied so you could run by yourself.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, no Phoebe no, I was...no. You know what, I was, I was actually just checking to, see, if I could run. And I can!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Please Rachel, I am not an idiot.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, wait Phoebe.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow, couples who live together do start to look alike. So, Mondler...uh, what uh, what are you doing?

name: chandler
dialogue: What does it look like I'm doing? I am cleaning!

name: ross
dialogue: Did you get Monica's authorization to move all of her stuff?

name: chandler
dialogue: Authorization? I don't need that. I'm going to put everything back.

name: ross
dialogue: Put it back exactly where you found it?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes I'm going to put it back  exactly where I found it.

name: ross
dialogue: ‘Kay, first of all, this attitude is not helping.

name: chandler
dialogue: She's not going to care if I put her stuff back in the same stupid place.

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa, hello, did you just meet Monica?

name: chandler
dialogue: She is going to recognize that I did a nice thing and-and, appreciate it.

name: ross
dialogue: Hmm -you know, actually this'll work out well. Cause when you have to move back in with Joey, Joey's hot new roommate can come and live with me.

name: chandler
dialogue: I see, I see, y-y-you are trying to freak me out.

name: ross
dialogue: Look Chandler, Monica is really weird about this kind stuff all right. Believe me, I lived with her for 16 years. She is going to freak…out. Oh my God, she's going to sit on you.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, she's not okay? And I'll prove it to you. I'm going to call her right now.  Phone's done eh.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey Mon, how's it going?

name: monica
dialogue: Terrible. If-if I want something done right, I have to do it myself. Other people just wreck stuff. I really think I might kill someone tonight.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh come on, come on, it can't be that bad.

name: monica
dialogue: It's worse. The only thing that is getting me through is knowing that I'm going to be seeing you soon. I think I may even try to get out of here early.

name: chandler
dialogue: No! No-no-no-no-no-no. It sounds like they really need you down there.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, are you just hanging out with Ross?

name: chandler
dialogue: It's, all good! Okay bye-bye Mon!  She's-she's going to kill me.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, the phone was facing the other way.  And that goes back up there.

name: chandler
dialogue: We should start with the big stuff. you know? That'll be the easiest. Uh, let's start with the couch.  I got it.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah that-that, doesn't look right.

name: chandler
dialogue: What are you talking about? The couch is perfectly in line with the carpet. And then I can just walk over here and casually just put my feet right up on the... OK, OK, here's what we do, we just uh, move the couch closer to the coffee table.

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa, whoa, but then the back of the couch won't line up with he back of the carpet.

name: chandler
dialogue: OK well here, we'll just move the coffee table closer to the couch.

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa, Whoa, Whoa, but then the coffee table won't be cantered in the seating area.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, but the coffee table doesn't match the… Ross!!!!

name: joey
dialogue: Look, what am I going to do? I'm not flirting but still, I'm drawing her to me like - like a moth to a flame!  What the hell's going on over here?!?!?  Monica's going to kill you! Look I need your help, I have to do something to-to repel this woman! Wait a minute, wait a minute, you guys repel women all the time.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, I've been married 3 times

name: joey
dialogue: No-no-no I've seen it happen, you-you get a rapport going with a woman but somehow you manage to kill it. What's your secret?

name: ross
dialogue: Look, we do not repel women OK? That is completely untrue.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh no, yes we do my man. Remember when we were back in college and we went to that spring dance and you walked right up to that girl you liked and you could not stop talking about the Irish potato famine?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, well what about you? You weren't you know, so hot in college either. After everything he said, he'd go "ba dum bum chessh"

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, Monica doesn't like that either, Maybe I should stop doing that.

name: ross
dialogue: OH you know what, girls don't like it when I start talking about science.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is not specific to girls.

name: joey
dialogue: This is great, this is great, what else, what else?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, they don't like it when you correct their grammar.

name: chandler
dialogue: And they don't like it when you explain why your jokes are funny.

name: ross
dialogue: They don't like it when you keep asking them if they like you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Man, I'm so lucky I have Monica.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm never going to find love again.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Phoebe, can I talk to you for a second?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, um, I... All right Phoebe look, I just wanted to say that I'm sorry. OK? I handled the situation horribly and I should not have lied to you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, what should you have done?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I-I should've told you the truth.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-Huh, Which is...?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you know, the reason I didn't want to go running with you is because um, well you know the way that you run is a little...

name: phoebe
dialogue: So?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, it's embarrassing. People were looking at us like we were crazy.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why do you care?

name: rachel
dialogue: Because they're people.

name: phoebe
dialogue: But people that you don't know and will never see again.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes, but still. They're people…with eyes.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I didn't get embarrassed running next to Miss . But no, okay. No, no, I can see why running with me would be embarrassing to you. Yeah, okay. you are uptight.

name: rachel
dialogue: I-I am not uptight—Hey-hey-hey-oh-oh! Listen, I am not uptight, man.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is okay Rachel. I'm not judging you; that is just who you are. Me. I'm more free you know? I run like I did when I was a kid, cause that is the only way it's fun. You know, I mean didn’t you ever run so fast you thought your legs were going to fall off? You know, like when you were like running towards the swings or running away from Satan?  The neighbour's dog.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, is this lamp in the same place?

name: ross
dialogue: Who cares? I repel women.

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no-no-no-no-no-no-no!!! You can't come in here! R-r-r-r-Ross is naked.

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I couldn't say that I was naked because she's allowed too see me naked.

name: ross
dialogue: Why does anyone have to be naked?

name: monica
dialogue: Why is Ross naked?

name: ross
dialogue: I-I had to show Chandler something?

name: monica
dialogue: Naked?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah-yeah I uh, I have a uh, a guy problem.

name: monica
dialogue: Is it the same thing that Chandler had?

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, uh, just come later, we'll get everything squared away and you can come back later.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, listen, there's still some of Chandler's medicine under the sink in the bathroom. Bye!

name: chandler
dialogue: Bye! Thank God

name: ross
dialogue: Dude, what'd you have?

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, we have no time okay? We must focus. We got to get everything back into its original place.

name: ross
dialogue: The photo album! There were millions of pictures of the apartment in the photo album. We just go through it and match everything to the pictures.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is perfect! that is brilliant!

name: ross
dialogue: So really, what'd you have?

name: janine
dialogue: Hey Joey, I got some beer for you.
