dialogue: Hey, do we do this too much?

name: chandler
dialogue: I think so. Yeah, get off me.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: Come on C.H.E.E.S.E., I’m not leaving without you! Try routing your backup source through your primary CPU.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can’t! My circuits are fried! They’re fried I tell you!!

name: joey
dialogue: Wow!  Well then I’ll just have to carry you.

name: ross
dialogue: That’ll be a neat trick, when you’re,  when you’re dead!

name: joey
dialogue: Ross, you don’t have to yell.

name: ross
dialogue: There was just an explosion, okay? My hearing would be impaired.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I thought you were excellent! In fact for a minute there I was like, "Ooh, where’d Ross go?"

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you! And I have to say that first scene when you meet Mac

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God. I mean

name: joey
dialogue: you know what? I think that’s enough for today. Thanks for your help!

name: phoebe
dialogue: He’s holding us back.

name: ross
dialogue: Totally.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: And your horoscope says, "On the fifth a special someone is going to give you a gift."

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, well thank you in advance.

name: rachel
dialogue: Op, but the twelfth brings a lover’s spat.

name: monica
dialogue: You are going to make a joke about my special present! Why would you do that?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, wait and on the nineteenth a secret crush announces itself.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey guys!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! It’s Joey Tribbiani of Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.!!!!!!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh that’s right. It’s your first day! So are you psyched to fight fake crime with your robot sidekick?

name: joey
dialogue: Am I psyched? The lead in my own TV series? I’ve dreamed about this for years! Why have I not been preparing?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! Joey, you’re going to be great!

name: joey
dialogue: But I got to act with a robot Pheebs, and-and I don’t know anything about technology! I can’t even use Chandler’s computer except to find porn! And-and that’s only because it’s right there when you turn it on!

name: monica
dialogue: I think our lover’s spat will start a little early this month.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I’ll be waiting.

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you judging them by their covers? Because you’re really not supposed to do that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I’m just deciding which one to use—I’m going to start writing another book!

name: rachel
dialogue: Be-because the last one was such a big seller?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, if you must know I have written 14 books. And as I am the only one who has read them, I can tell you that they all have been very well received.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: What are you guys doing later?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, Rachel and I have appointments to get our hair cut.

name: rachel
dialogue: We do?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I want to see what he wants first.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: I just found out that Elizabeth’s dad wants to meet me.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wait a minute, hold the phone! You’re not Elizabeth’s dad?!

name: ross
dialogue: Come on guys, I-I really want this guy to like me. It-it would really help me out if you guys were here to make me look good.

name: all
dialogue: Of course we’ll help! Yeah! We’ll be here!

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks!

name: monica
dialogue: We know how tough those parent/teacher conferences can be.

name: the producer
dialogue: So uh, here’s your office set!

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! Huh?  Mac Macaveli, Private Investigator!

name: the producer
dialogue: Let’s get you into wardrobe for a fitting.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. Hey uh, when do I get to meet the robot?

name: the producer
dialogue: I’m sorry, why don’t we do that right now? He’s right here.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: the producer
dialogue: Joey Tribbiani, this is

name: joey
dialogue: Oh wow! He’s so lifelike!  Unbelievable!

name: the producer
dialogue: This is Wayne, the man who created and operates C.H.E.E.S.E.

name: joey
dialogue: How do you do there, Wayne?

name: the producer
dialogue: I’ll let you two guys get acquainted, huh?

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. Sorry about that… Uh, so where’s C.H.E.E.S.E.?

name: wayne
dialogue: C.H.E.E.S.E. is right here.

name: c.h.e.e.s.e.
dialogue: Nice to meet you Mac!

name: joey
dialogue: This is like the temporary robot, right?

name: wayne
dialogue: No. Why?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I-I just, I just it was going to be like a really cool robot, you know? Like the terminator or uh, when I first saw you.

name: wayne
dialogue: I spent two years developing this machine, it’s absolutely state of the art.

name: joey
dialogue: I’m sorry, it just—I don’t know it doesn’t really look like it can do anything.

name: wayne
dialogue: It can do this.

name: elizabeth
dialogue: This is my father, Paul Stevens. Dad, this is Ross Geller.

name: ross
dialogue: It-it’s great to meet you Paul.

name: paul
dialogue: I usually prefer Elizabeth’s boyfriends to address me as Mr. Stevens.

name: ross
dialogue: Of course, of course, Mr. Stevens.

name: paul
dialogue: So Ross, what your problem?

name: ross
dialogue: Eh-wh—Excuse me?

name: paul
dialogue: Why can’t you get a girlfriend your own age?

name: ross
dialogue: That’s funny. Umm….  It’s not funny.

name: paul
dialogue: I don’t like you going out with my daughter Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay. I can, I can see that. Umm, but I think if you give me umm, one chance I can, I can change your mind.

name: paul
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: paul
dialogue: Okay. I’ll give you one chance to change my mind.  You got one minute.

name: elizabeth
dialogue: Daddy!

name: paul
dialogue: Fine! Two minutes. Go.

name: ross
dialogue: This is—you—

name: paul
dialogue: 1 minute 50 seconds.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, umm I want you to know that I have never done anything like this before. I mean, I mean I’ve been in um, relationships in general, uh but I have never done it with a student—I mean I not—not it! I mean, I mean I don’t—We haven’t done it. Uh, I mean, I mean, we’ve-we’ve-we’ve done stuff.  Okay, okay, a joke, a joke—lighten the mood. Umm, two guys go into a bar. One of them is Irish.

name: paul
dialogue: I’m Irish.

name: ross
dialogue: And the Irish guy wins the joke!

name: monica
dialogue: Ross!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ross!

name: monica
dialogue: How crazy that we’d run into you!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh God, thank you!  Umm, uh, Mr. Stevens I’d like you to meet my friends uh, this is Phoebe, Monica, and Chandler.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You’re Elizabeth’s father, huh? I can see now where she gets her rugged handsomeness.

name: monica
dialogue: Is-is-is there a-a Mrs. Stevens?

name: chandler
dialogue: There’s a Mr. Bing!

name: paul
dialogue: No, unfortunately Lizzie’s mom passed away shortly after she was born. I raised her by myself.

name: phoebe and monica
dialogue: OH!

name: paul
dialogue: I get that a lot.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay umm, why don’t we all take a seat, you know? And uh, and I’ll get us all some uh some coffees——Yeah, why don’t you.  Uh and you guys can talk about whatever, whatever you want. you know? Whatever pops into your head.

name: monica
dialogue: you know, it is so strange seeing Ross here this time of day, because usually he’s got the children’s hospital.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. Not looking for dates.

name: elizabeth
dialogue: So uh, Monica is Ross’s sister.

name: monica
dialogue: And he’s a great brother!

name: paul
dialogue: I had a sister.

name: monica
dialogue: OH!

name: paul
dialogue: She passed away.

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: OH!

name: paul
dialogue: Oh, you don’t have to do that every time.

name: chandler
dialogue: But uh Ross, Ross is a great guy! I was roommates with him in college. Uh, funny story…  You’re roommate in college died didn’t he?

name: paul
dialogue: A part of him did yes.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay here we are Paul, Elizabeth.  So I hope you guys were finding something to talk about.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, we were just

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi, I’m sorry I’m late but I am ready, ready to talk you up! When does Liz’s father get here?

name: paul
dialogue: I’m already here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! Ross is so great!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey honey, you got the kind with the little girl, you said we were going to to get the kind with the baby.

name: monica
dialogue: No, you said the baby creeps you out.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, the little girl creeps me out.

name: monica
dialogue: You said the baby.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why would the baby creep me out?

name: monica
dialogue: Why would the little girl creep you out?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You guys, I’m sorry, could you please talk a little slower?

name: chandler
dialogue: This is going in your book?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, it’s about relationships. you know? The traps, the pitfalls, what not to do, keep going. This stuff is great!

name: monica
dialogue: What?! Excuse me!

name: phoebe
dialogue: And how none of it matters when the people really love each other.  And how people will believe anything you tell them as long as it’s a compliment.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh hi!

name: paul
dialogue: Hi! Hi.  I think I left my keys here somewhere.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! Well let’s look for them.  Oh-oh-hey! Are these them?

name: paul
dialogue: No.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right!

name: paul
dialogue: Oh, here they are right here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh good.

name: paul
dialogue: Thanks for your help.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, wait! Sorry, Mr. Paul? Mr. Paul?

name: paul
dialogue: Just call me Paul.

name: rachel
dialogue: Paul. Umm, I just wanted you to know that Ross really is a great guy.

name: paul
dialogue: Well maybe you can date him then that would save me the trouble of killing him.  Are you okay?

name: rachel
dialogue: You just don’t look old enough to have a twenty-year-old daughter.

name: paul
dialogue: Well, we were very young when we had her.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. We?

name: paul
dialogue: Well yeah, it usually, it takes two people to

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh no! Yes! Of course, I know that! I just—I meant you know are you still a ‘We’ or are you just ‘You?’

name: paul
dialogue: I’m just me, my wife died shortly after Lizzie was born.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH. So you raised her all on your own?

name: paul
dialogue: Yes I did.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH.  Ooh!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: How was your first day?

name: joey
dialogue: Pretty great! Except I did get a little attitude from the robot.

name: chandler
dialogue: Damn those robots, they’re supposed to be our faithful servants!

name: joey
dialogue: Anyway, it wasn’t the robot, it was the guy who controls him. Yeah, he doesn’t like me. He had C.H.E.E.S.E. knock over the sandwich right when I was reaching for one! OH!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, why don’t you just get him fired?

name: joey
dialogue: I may have to, I hate to do it, but I’m the star! you know? There’s a limit to how many sandwiches I can eat off the floor.  Excuse me.  Joey Tribbiani.

name: estelle
dialogue: Joe! I’m glad I found you, I got an audition for you!

name: joey
dialogue: Wow!

name: estelle
dialogue: The thing is it’s kind of on the Q.T. The actor who has the part doesn’t know he might be fired. It’s the lead in a series, Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.

name: joey
dialogue: I’m the lead in Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.!!

name: estelle
dialogue: Uh-oh!

name: ross
dialogue: Joey?!

name: paul
dialogue: Hi Ross.

name: rachel
dialogue: I was just getting him to like you.

name: ross
dialogue: Joey?! Joey!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, Joey is not here.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, I’ll just wait for him in here!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, it’s okay. You can come out.

name: paul
dialogue: Yeah Ross it’s okay, it’s me, Mr. Stevens.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh! Oh my God! I didn’t even see you!

name: paul
dialogue: Sure you did! You came in, you got all awkward, and you ran into the bedroom. You were shouting, "Joey! Joey!" Bye Rach.

name: rachel
dialogue: Bye!

name: paul
dialogue: I’ll call you later. Bye Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: What-what-what the—how da-how did-what the-how did-what?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you know he lost his keys so he was looking for them

name: ross
dialogue: In your mouth?!

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Downstairs! And we got to talking you know, for like two hours, and I really liked him so I invited him up here for a cup of coffee.

name: ross
dialogue: You were at the coffeehouse!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, what’s the big deal? So I kissed the guy!

name: ross
dialogue: He is my girlfriend’s father, okay? It’s-it’s, it’s weird!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wh—You dated my sister!

name: ross
dialogue: That was different!

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Why?!

name: ross
dialogue: This is weird for me!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross look, look this is good for you. Okay? Let’s face it, so far the guy’s not loving’ you! But I can turn that around! I got the inside track! We can all go out to dinner, you know? And I can talk you up! Ross, the guy is a very, very successful lawyer!

name: ross
dialogue: How is that important?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh it’s important!

name: joey
dialogue: Apparently, there’s like a million guys out there that can play Mac, and there’s only this one robot and this one guy who controls it! I didn’t know he could get me fired! What am I going to do?

name: monica
dialogue: Well you know Joey, you’re a pretty charming guy.

name: joey
dialogue: Thanks, but I kind of have a problem to deal with here.

name: monica
dialogue: No sweetie, you’ve got to win over the guy that controls C.H.E.E.S.E.! You’ve got to kiss some serious robot ass!

name: joey
dialogue: That’s not a bad idea. Yeah. Okay, but if I got to turn on the charm tomorrow I’m not wasting anymore of it over here with you guys.  Well, actually I got a little bit saved for you Pheebs.

name: chandler
dialogue: So do you think uh, Joey’s more charming than me?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! That’s why I’m sleeping with him on the side.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, you wish.

name: phoebe
dialogue: "You wish."

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, stop writing about us!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I’m not writing about you! I’m writing about other people.

name: chandler
dialogue: Who?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Marcia and Chester.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay fine! Fine! Then you know what, I’ll just write about Phyllis! Hmm!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hmm.

name: monica
dialogue: Phyllis is sitting in a chair.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I see what you’re doing!

name: monica
dialogue: Phyllis sees what I’m doing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh-oh.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, I have tasted my own medicine and it is bitter!

name: joey
dialogue: Morning! Hey, how’s my favourite genius and my little robot buddy?!

name: wayne
dialogue: Don’t touch him!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay!  All right. Umm, all right Wayne, level with me. Okay? I-I keep hearing all these rumours that I might get fired. Okay, they even have actors coming in to read for my part! Come on man, you-you got to give me a second chance! I mean, I love-I love this little guy!  Ah-ah!!  Okay, that’s why you didn’t want me to touch him right? Here you go! Okay?  Stupid! I can’t believe it! God!   Hey, how you doin’?

name: rachel
dialogue: So it seemed that my prom date had stood me up, so Ross selflessly, offered to take me.

name: elizabeth
dialogue: What a nice story!

name: paul
dialogue: So Ross was in college and decided to jump at the chance to take a young girl to her high school prom.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! I definitely did not see that one backfiring! I’m going to go to the bathroom.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, take your time.

name: ross
dialogue: Just-just so you know I was a freshman and she was a senior. So it wasn’t as bad as-as

name: paul
dialogue: Ross, look, I know I’ve been giving you a lot of jabs and it’s partly because I’m very protective of Lizzie, and partly because well, they just keep coming to me. But I have to admit that after all the wonderful things that Lizzie has told me and the many, many,  many stories that Rachel has told me that, well  you’re not  all bad.

name: ross
dialogue: Not all bad.

name: paul
dialogue: And anyhow, I’m sorry I was so harsh before, but you have to understand that I  still look at Lizzie like she’s a twelve-year-old girl.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. You know what? I know what you mean; I do that too.

name: paul
dialogue: I beg your pardon?

name: ross
dialogue: No! No! Not—I don’t mean I-I see her as a twelve-year-old girl! I mean I-I have a son, who’s umm six and I still think of him as a baby.

name: paul
dialogue: You have a son?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, well my-my ex-wife and I share custody of Ben and umm, uh, and just so you know, Carol and I are on excellent terms as I’m sure you are with your wife!  Oh, I’m sorry!  It’s unbelievable!

name: paul
dialogue: Don’t worry about it, I just didn’t realize you were married.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh we were, but that was just a , I mean that was just a big drunken mistake.

name: ross
dialogue: You’re back.

name: paul
dialogue: You two were married?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! Whoops! I’m sorry, you were talking about Emily!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, we said we would meet at the coffeehouse at six.

name: chandler
dialogue: We said seven!

name: monica
dialogue: We said six!

name: chandler
dialogue: The only way that I said six would be if the seven’s, let meet at seven, not at six.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah and if I had seven, maybe I would’ve said something like this, "Wow! My boyfriend’s such a wise ass—seven!"

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my good God.

name: monica
dialogue: Ugh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know what time you said.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well actually, I know what time Chester and Marcia said.

name: monica
dialogue: What time?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Quite an interesting turn of events, suddenly it’s my book to the rescue, huh?  Ooh, very interesting. Yeah, well this certainly clears things up.

name: chandler
dialogue: What does it say?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I will tell you as soon as you thank me for writing my book.

name: chandler
dialogue: Thank you for writing your book. Its-its uh, great book and you are the queen of everything.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thanks! So are you.

name: chandler
dialogue: I told you I should not wear this colour.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mon…  Marcia and Chester are planning on seeing a movie on Sunday night. Marcia thinks they’re supposed to meet at six, Chester thinks it’s at seven.

name: chandler
dialogue: So you knew we were going to miss the movie!

name: phoebe
dialogue: That’s right.

name: monica
dialogue: Inside of telling us you decided to write in your stupid book!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Marcia and Chester are mad at Phyllis.

name: joey
dialogue: I can’t believe I’m going to lose this job!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh I’m so sorry man! Is there anything I can do?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! Help me get this mini-fridge past the security guard.

name: wayne
dialogue: Hey Joey, I want to talk to you.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah? Well, I don’t want to talk to you Wayne! I hate you! You ruined my life! Oh, Chandler, Wayne. Wayne, Chandler.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi, how are you?

name: wayne
dialogue: Joey, Joey, I-I-I’ll g-get you your job back if you help me out.

name: joey
dialogue: Why should I help you?!

name: chandler
dialogue: The reason he just said.

name: joey
dialogue: What do you need?

name: wayne
dialogue: I-I-I saw you on stage talking to that beautiful woman, you know Sarah?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah?

name: wayne
dialogue: I wish I could talk to her.

name: joey
dialogue: What are you in love with her or something?

name: wayne
dialogue: Yeah. Her. All of them. Anyone.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I’ve been there my friend.

name: wayne
dialogue: Listen, I-I guarantee you keep your job if you can teach me how to talk to women like you do.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh wow Wayne, it’s not really something you can teach you know? It’s pretty much something you’re born with if you——You-you can teach it! I’ll show you right how to do it.

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean if you think about it, I mean Ross did learn something from each marriage.

name: paul
dialogue: How to make the next one even shorter?

name: rachel
dialogue: Now wait a minute that’s not fair. He was married to me a hell of a lot longer than he was married to Emily, he just didn’t tell me.  Maybe I have to pee again.

name: paul
dialogue: Well, this is fun. So Ross, did you kill any of these wives?

name: ross
dialogue: you know what? I-I-I… I-I have had enough of this! you know, I-I-I care a great deal about your daughter and I have treated her with nothing but respect! So if-if you’ve got a problem with me, frankly

name: paul
dialogue: Are you yelling at me?!

name: ross
dialogue: God no!

name: elizabeth
dialogue: you know what daddy? If you don’t like Ross, that’s fine. It doesn’t matter to me, I’m going to go out with him anyway.

name: paul
dialogue: Really?!

name: ross
dialogue: Well if it doesn’t matter to her, it doesn’t matter to me!  Still not yelling!

name: paul
dialogue: Wow. What can I say?  This doesn’t make me like you any better!

name: ross
dialogue: That’s okay, I’m not so crazy about myself right now either.

name: paul
dialogue: Then we agree?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh yeah, I guess—Yeah! I guess so.

name: paul
dialogue: Neither of us like Ross!

name: elizabeth
dialogue: I like Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: oh! Kids!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait-wait-wait, I just thought of another story about how nice Ross is!

name: ross
dialogue: That’s okay Rach, we’re not liking Ross right now.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! I’ve got a lot of those too!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, it turns out you were right C.H.E.E.S.E.

name: c.h.e.e.s.e.
dialogue: The shipment never made it through Omaha?

name: joey
dialogue: You got it! And the rabbi’s beard, 100% horsehair. Nice catch C.H.E.E.S.E.!  It’s your line C.H.E.E.S.E.!  Wayne! Wayne!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi, you guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: What’s the matter?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well it’s just—it’s one of those situations that I just hate. you know? A massage client gave me three tickets to the Helmet-Pelts exhibit at the Morgan Chase museum.

name: joey
dialogue: Now you’re thinking you got to sleep with him.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! No! It’s just that he gave me three tickets and there are six of us!

name: chandler
dialogue: I’ll give up my ticket.

name: joey
dialogue: Me too.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay that’s so generous!

name: chandler
dialogue: And I think Ross is generous too.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Great! Okay then it’s just us girls!

name: monica and rachel
dialogue: Great.

Chandler’s not going to wait that long. He’s going to find somebody else, you know? Someone, someone who did put their name on the list.

I still got it. Nice and sexy. You’re just a love machine.  I’m just a love machine and I won’t work for nobody but you! Hey bab-y!  Showtime.  I’m just a love machine, yeah ba-by!

dialogue: Hm-mmm.

name: paul
dialogue: I wanted a big wheel. And instead my parents got me this little plastic chicken that you hop around on. It was embarrassing; kids made fun of me. That was a pretty tough year.

name: rachel
dialogue: That’s-that’s great! See? I already feel like I know you a little better! Thank you. Okay, come on. Now we can go eat. Let’s go.

name: paul
dialogue: It was horrible. They called me chicken boy.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!

name: paul
dialogue: And in fifth grade I got into a fight. Well, it wasn’t really a fight. Richard Darinvel bit me on the nose and, and I feel down. I still have a little scare right here  you can see it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah. Yeah, I-I-I see the scare. Listen, Paul, I think this is really great that-that you know, you shared your feelings. It’s really, it’s beautiful, but umm, what do you say we go share some food?

name: paul
dialogue: Oh, I couldn’t eat now.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! Wait! What are you talking about?! You love their Kung Pao Chicken!

name: paul
dialogue: Chicken?  Chicken boy!

name: rachel
dialogue: My God, I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I didn’t mean to do that! I wouldn’t do that!

name: chandler
dialogue: Nothing! This is the nine millionth ring store we’ve been too and I can’t find the perfect ring!  Ugly ring! Ugly ring! Ugly ring!  It’s a beautiful selection.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, so maybe you don’t get her a ring. Maybe you-maybe you do something different. you know? Maybe you get her an engagement bracelet, you know? Or an engagement tiara? Or—ooh! An engagement Revolutionary War musket!

name: chandler
dialogue: you know, I’m so glad I picked you to help me with this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Huh? Can you just imagine getting down on one knee and handing her this gorgeous piece of weaponry?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I’m going to stick with the ring.  Oh, this one’s nice!  I like this one! Sir? Uh, kind sir? Can I see this one?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait a minute, no, this is, this is the reason you brought me. Okay? I know how to haggle. So let me handle this from here on out.

name: male jeweler
dialogue: Can I help you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh-uh, yes. I would like to see that ring please.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Or not, whatever.

name: male jeweler
dialogue: This ring is from the 1920s, it’s a one and a half carat diamond with sapphires on either side.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sir, can I ask you to umm, could you…hold out that ring and ask me to marry you?

name: male jeweler
dialogue: Okay.  Will you marry me?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God that’s it, that’s the ring! How much is it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Chandler, I-I will handle this!  How much is it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: We will give you $10.

name: male jeweler
dialogue: Are you interested in this ring?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes! Yes, but I can only pay $8,000.

name: male jeweler
dialogue: Okay, I can let it go at eight.

name: phoebe
dialogue: We stand firm at $10.

name: male jeweler
dialogue: How would you like to pay?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, credit card.  Oh no! No-no, but I left my credit card with Joey.  Okay, I’ll go get it. You guard the ring.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.  Listen, I’m sorry about before. Do you have anything her for $10.

name: male jeweler
dialogue: Uh yes, I have these two rather beautiful $5 bills.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I’ll give you $1 for them.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, remember how Chandler and Phoebe blew us off yesterday?

name: joey
dialogue: No.

name: ross
dialogue: Remember? You-you were eating pizza.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay. Well, apparently Chandler’s angry at us for not getting him a ticket to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, we’re supposed to just get him a ticket?! That guy is always mooching off of us!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah! Anyway, I-I still think we should try to patch things up, you know? Like uh, maybe we could get him to get tickets to another Knicks game and invite him.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh wow that’s a great idea! And I still have his credit card.

name: gunther
dialogue: Here you go.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey-hey-hey-ho-ho, I got this one. Here you go.  you know I got to tell you, sometimes I just—I don’t get Chandler. you know, me and him do stuff all the time without you and you don’t get all upset.

name: ross
dialogue: All the time?

name: joey
dialogue: All the time!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! Oh my God!!

name: monica
dialogue: Still crying?

name: rachel
dialogue: Like a little girl. I know. I know. I know. This is all my fault; I wanted him to open up. But God, I didn’t know that I was going to unleash this-this weepy, clingy, moist monster!

name: monica
dialogue: you know, I only know of two surefire ways to shut a man up. And one of them is sex.

name: rachel
dialogue: What’s the other one?

name: monica
dialogue: I don’t know, I’ve never had to use the other one. I’m just saying you know, if we’re having sex, he’s not going to be talking.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh that’s right. You’re the talker.  Anyway uh, great idea! Umm, I got to go to the store; I told him that I would buy him some more tissues.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, we have some

dialogue: No you don’t!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay umm, I’d also like to try on the tiara.  Oh yeah. Okay.   What do you think, too much?

name: male jeweler
dialogue: A tad.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Then, take the tiara back and let me hold the musket again.  Something’s missing. It’s not… Okay oh, let me see the ring my friend picked out.

name: male jeweler
dialogue: Where’s the 1920s princess cut ring.

name: female jeweler
dialogue: I just sold it to that gentleman.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God!!  No! What?! Help me! Let me out! Now!

name: paul
dialogue: Rachel?

name: chandler
dialogue: No. How are you Paul?

name: paul
dialogue: Okay. Chandler, did your dad ever hug you?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, did he hug you?!

name: paul
dialogue: No! No! It’s just that, my dad never did. I miss my dad.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you can see my dad in Vegas kissing other dads.

name: paul
dialogue: Hey Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah?

name: paul
dialogue: Would you…….Would you hug me?

name: chandler
dialogue: I’m a little busy here Paul.

name: paul
dialogue: That’s exactly what my dad used to say!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, a quick one. Come on hug it out.  Oh hey! There you go.  Okay.

name: paul
dialogue: Five more seconds.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay!

dialogue: Hey!

name: paul
dialogue: Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-hey-hey!  Hi, Paul is it?

dialogue: Do you have my credit card?

dialogue: Yes, it’s in my… In…in my pocket.   My back pocket! My back pocket!

name: chandler
dialogue: Thank God!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh hey listen I got us tickets to a Knicks game tonight.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I can’t go.

name: joey
dialogue: Come on! It’ll be fun! Me, you, and Ross, and… Paul probably

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, that’s uh, that’s pretty nice but I’m going to go with the one I picked first.

name: chandler
dialogue: Phoebe, I asked you to guard the ring!

name: chandler

name: joey

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: I know!

name: ross
dialogue: I can’t believe it.  Can I tell you something? I’m a little mad at him now.

name: joey
dialogue: Can I tell you something? Me too.

name: ross
dialogue: you know what? He didn’t want to talk to us about being angry, well maybe we don’t talk to him at all!

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh! Freeze him out.

name: ross
dialogue: That’s right!

name: joey
dialogue: I like it!

name: ross
dialogue: Eh? We’ll show him!

name: joey
dialogue: From now on, it’s going to be Joey and Ross, best friends.  Okay! We’re going to be the new Joey and Chandler.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi. I’m back.

dialogue: Hey! I have so much more to tell you, I’ve written it all down!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ah that’s great. No actually that’s…  That’s great! That’s really great! you know, I got to tell you writing, I mean writing, gets me uh, gets me kind of hot.

dialogue: Wait! Wait! Listen! Listen to this!  you know what I wanted to be when I was that age?

name: rachel
dialogue: A lover?

name: paul
dialogue: A surfer.

dialogue: Oh yeah surfer?

name: paul

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, hold on real quick, hold on a second let me just uh,  get a little more comfortable here. Wait, now wait a second, this isn’t too revealing is it?

name: paul
dialogue: No. What ever happened to that little dude.  So full of dreams

name: rachel
dialogue: I don’t care about the little dude! I can’t! I cannot listen to anymore of this! you know, the only person who would want to listen to this is a mental health professional! And then it’s only because they get paid $100 an hour! Do you know how much money I could’ve made listening to you? $2,000! And do you know when I figured that out? While you were talking!

name: paul
dialogue: What?! I can’t believe you’re trying to stifle me! When just 14 hours ago we figured out that that is exactly what my mother was trying to do to me!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh… I’m sorry. I… I-I don’t mean—I didn’t mean to stifle you. I… This is all just a little overwhelming.

name: paul
dialogue: Oh Rachel, I’m so sorry. I didn’t mean to overwhelm you. It’s just that, when those gates open, you…  Hard to close them. But they are closed now. Believe me.

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m so glad, I’m so glad you shared.  And I’m glad that you’re done. What do you say we umm

name: paul
dialogue: I would really like that.

name: paul
dialogue: That was…so good.

Unless I look at it really closely and then I can see my own eye.  Look, this is the most important thing I’m going to do in my life. I want to make sure it’s perfect.

name: phoebe

dialogue: Wow! I would trade.

name: customer
dialogue: It is beautiful, but I’m going to use this one. Now, if you’ll excuse me.

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no! This is my fiancee  and her heart was set on that ring. You don’t want to break her heart now do you?

name: customer
dialogue: You’re dying?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, she’s dying… Of a cough apparently.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes, and it is my dying wish to have that ring. See, if I’m not buried with that ring then my spirit is going to wander the nether world for all eternity

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, that’s enough honey!

name: customer

name: chandler
dialogue: Great! Okay, here.

name: customer
dialogue: All right.

name: chandler

dialogue: Okay!  I was going to wait ‘til uh, it was official you know? But I got so excited I just had to tell you guys because you’re my best friends.

name: joey

name: chandler

dialogue: OH

dialogue: Yeah.

dialogue: Where are you going?

dialogue: Do you really see this as a long-term thing?

name: ross
dialogue: I don’t know.

dialogue: you know, you are 12 years older than her.

dialogue: Wait a minute, does-does everyone feel this way?

name: all
dialogue: Yeah! Yeah, sort of. I’m sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-uh—Wow! Uh, I thought you guys were just like making jokes, I had no idea. What you know what? You guys are wrong. Uh yes, there is a chronological age difference but I never notice it. You know why? Because she is very mature. Besides, it doesn’t really matter to me what you guys think. I mean, I’m the one dating Elizabeth, not you!

dialogue: That’s not what she said last night.

dialogue: See? Now, he could date her.

name: chandler
dialogue: Will you marry me? Will you marry me?  Hey, you marry me!  What’s going on little elves?

dialogue: Yeah, yeah you have the ring?

dialogue: Yeah, right here in my pocket.  Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! Oop!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, now will you guys get out of here? I want this is to be a surprise and she’s going to know.

dialogue: Yeah-yeah you guys. Get out of here!

dialogue: Hi guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: You are beautiful.

dialogue: Oh, thank you!   What’s going on?

dialogue: We’re just really…very excited about this charity event that we have to go to.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Here.

dialogue: Oh! Thank you!

dialogue: Uh well, uh this is a silent auction. They lay out all the stuff here and then you write down your offer and then the highest bid gets it.

dialogue: No! It’s nice!

dialogue: Oh, hi!

dialogue: So glad you brought someone.

dialogue: Well, you know what? Actually, I was about to bid on this lovely trip to Paris.

dialogue: OH, nice choice.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

dialogue: Good luck.

dialogue: Thank you.  Okay,  twenty dollars.

dialogue: Shut the door! Shut the door!!

dialogue: What’s-what’s going on?

dialogue: The guys across the hall are throwing water balloons at us.

dialogue: Oh, you have to call the police! That’s what I did to the kids in my building!

dialogue: No, it’s a water balloon fight! We started it!

dialogue: Oh!  Listen umm, I, I just stopped by to see if you wanted to see this play tonight. Umm, it’s supposed to be excellent. The director is the same

dialogue: You want some?!

dialogue: No! Okay! Okay!  Okay, look, can I, can I just-just talk to you for a second?

dialogue: Yeah, sure.

dialogue: You put your balloons down!!

dialogue: Ugh! So close!

dialogue: Hey you guys! Look!

dialogue: Hey!

dialogue: I got me some drinks!

dialogue: Well now it’s an empty bar.

dialogue: I won! That was my guess!

dialogue: What?! What?! What?!

dialogue: One nation, under God. Indivisible with liberty and justice for all.  I remembered it.  The champagne is here.

dialogue: Yes! Yes! I’m good! Are you good? Are you good? Is everything—are you—are you perrr-perfect?!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah. I’m okay. I’m actually—I’m a little cold, can I have your jacket?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, yeah.  Uh, no you can’t have my jacket! Because then I would be cold! If you thought that you were going to be cold, you should’ve brought your own jacket. But uh, other than that, are you okay? Are you okay?

name: monica
dialogue: Are you sure you’re okay?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes! I’m fine. In fact I’ve been fine for a long time now and I think, the reason is you.

name: monica
dialogue: OH that’s sweet!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay umm, before I meant you I had really little life and I couldn’t imagine growing old with

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: chandler
dialogue: I know, but just let me say it.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, Richard.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?! I’m Chandler!  Oh, that’s Richard!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh God, maybe he won’t see us. Richard!

name: richard
dialogue: Monica! Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey-hey, hey!  I don’t know why I did that!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, it’s good to see you!

name: richard
dialogue: You too, you let uh, your hair grow long.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah—Oh that’s right. You, you always wanted me too. Hey, I see you got your moustache back.

name: richard
dialogue: Well, my nose got lonely.

name: chandler
dialogue: And uh, you don’t have a moustache which is good.  I’m Chandler; I make jokes when I’m uncomfortable.

name: lisa
dialogue: Hi, I’m Lisa.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi.

name: richard
dialogue: Oh, I’m sorry.  Lisa,  Monica, Chandler. We used to date.

name: chandler
dialogue: Richard! No one supposed to know about us!  See I, did it again.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, wh-why don’t we sit down?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I’ll sit down.

name: monica
dialogue: It’s good to see you

name: matire'd
dialogue: You’re table’s ready sir.

name: richard
dialogue: Oh. Good to see you guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes.

name: matire'd
dialogue: Or if you prefer, this table is available.

name: richard
dialogue: That might be fun.

name: rachel
dialogue: What were you thinking?!

name: joey
dialogue: I didn’t know it was an auction!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wh?!

name: joey
dialogue: I figured, take a guess, help a charity, free boat!

name: rachel
dialogue: Why would a charity give away a free boat?!

name: joey
dialogue: I don’t know! Charity?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, just buy the damn boat!

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, don’t you think you’ve had enough to drink?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I’m just helping the kids!

name: rachel
dialogue: How is you drinking helping the kids?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Because the more I drink, the less there is for the kids to drink.

name: mr. thompson
dialogue: Mr. Tribbiani.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh hi!

name: mr. thompson
dialogue: Your generous contribution brings us a big step closer to building the youth centre.

name: joey
dialogue: Just out of curiosity, how-how much is that boat worth?

name: mr. thompson
dialogue: I think it was valued at 19,000

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, I was pretty close.  Uhh, so bad news. Umm, I can’t buy the boat, I don’t have any money.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey! Joey, good one!

name: mr. thompson
dialogue: That’s good. Very good!

name: joey
dialogue: So uh listen, I think I’m going to take off now.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! You…can’t…leave Joey! You agreed to buy that boat, all right?! That is a contract! And plus if you leave, my boss is going to kill me!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, what am I going to do Rach?! I don’t have that kind of money!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know. Okay.  Okay. Okay. All right. All right, this is what we’re going to do, we are going to go to the next highest bidder, and we are just going to let them buy it, and then you’re just going to pay the difference.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Look, I don’t know why the kids need a youth centre anyway! you know? They should just watch TV after school like I did and I turned out fine!

name: rachel
dialogue: Not great.

name: monica
dialogue: And so, we’re hiding in the bathroom.

name: richard
dialogue: And-and then I sneak out and before Monica can her parents come in.

name: monica
dialogue: So I hide in the shower and the next thing you know they’re going at it right on the bathroom floor.

name: lisa
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: chandler
dialogue: I got a good one, I got a good one! I once walked in on both my parents making love to the same guy.

name: richard
dialogue: It’s so great seeing you guys again. I’d like to make a toast.  Uh, as a poet once said, "In the sweetness of friendship, let there be laughter and sharing of pleasures for in the due of little things the heart finds it’s morning and is refreshed."

name: monica
dialogue: OH.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God, you guys!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Before you say anything, have we got a story for you! Guess who we bumped into at dinner!

name: ross
dialogue: Who?

name: chandler
dialogue: Richard!

name: ross
dialogue: What?  A-oh!  OH. Oh that’s right that’s right. That’s Richard’s favourite place too.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh you knew that. Good!

name: monica
dialogue: I thought you were going out with Elizabeth.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I was but uh, she was a little busy with a water balloon fight.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh Ross, sometimes grown-ups have commitments they just can’t get out of!

name: ross
dialogue: you know, maybe she is too young for me. you know, when I was over there and she was running around with her friends, I felt like I was a baby-sitter. I finally started to see what you guys were talking about. I don’t know what to do.

name: monica
dialogue: Why don’t you just weigh out the good stuff about the relationship against the bad stuff. I mean that’s what I did when I first  weighing stuff.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay umm, bad stuff. Well, I’m-I’m 12 years older than she is.

name: monica
dialogue: If the school finds out you’re fired.

name: ross
dialogue: Hmm.

name: monica
dialogue: She’s leaving for three months.

name: chandler
dialogue: For camp!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, good stuff. Umm, well she’s-she’s sweet and pretty and

name: monica
dialogue: Look Ross, the only question you need to ask is, "Do you see a future?" I mean like do you see yourself marrying her?  Oh my God! You did it already! You married her, didn’t you?!

name: ross
dialogue: No! No! I…didn’t do that. It’s just… Okay, honestly no. I don’t, I don’t see a big future with her.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay well I think…that’s your answer.

name: ross
dialogue: I’ve got to talk to her. Ugh, I hate this part.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you have to forget about Elizabeth. I mean if you’re not careful you may not get married at all this year!

name: joey
dialogue: Rach! Rachel! Okay, the next highest bidder is at table one.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh great!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh and uh the guy who got the Paris trip is at table four.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Why do you care about the guy who won the Paris trip?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It’s a trip for two!  Excuse me.  Excuse me, is the person who won the Paris trip at this table?

name: emil alexander
dialogue: That was me.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, en chante.

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh, excuse me is there a Mr. Bowmont at this table?

name: mr. bowmont
dialogue: That’s me.

name: joey
dialogue: Ahh, yes.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh well, hello. This is your lucky day Mr. Bowmont, the uh gentleman day sailor as just become available again and I believe that you made a bid of $18,000.

name: joey
dialogue: You-you have to pay that! It’s not just a guess.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Okay.

name: mr. bowmont
dialogue: I was actually relieved uh I didn’t win the boat. My wife would’ve killed me.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH

name: joey
dialogue: Are you kidding me?! She’s going to this boat!

name: rachel
dialogue: Y-Yeah! What-what is your wife’s name?

name: mr. bowmont
dialogue: It’s Pam.

name: rachel
dialogue: Pam! Oh God okay, just imagine this, "The Pam."

name: joey
dialogue: Aw-aww!

name: mr. bowmont
dialogue: I don’t think she’d like that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, uh-uh imagine this, "The Mr. Bowmont."

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh

name: mr. bowmont
dialogue: I don’t think so dear.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay look, let me paint you a little picture.  All right, you are setting’ sail up the Hudson! You’ve got the wind in your h——arms! You-you get all that peace and quiet that you’ve always wanted! You get back to nature! You can go fishing’! You can—ooh, you can get one of those little hats and have people call you captain, and then when you’re old, Cappy.

name: mr. bowmont
dialogue: What the hell, it’s for a good cause! All right!

name: joey
dialogue: No way! It’s mine!!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! What?!

name: joey
dialogue: All that stuff you just said? I want that!

name: rachel
dialogue: But Joey you don’t have $20,000!

name: joey
dialogue: Who cares?! I-I’ll make payments, whatever it takes, I want the Mr. Bowmont!!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God, you’re back!

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH, let me see it! Let me see your hand!

name: monica
dialogue: Why do you want to see my hand?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I want to see what’s in your hand. I want to see the trash.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Eww! Oh, it’s all dirty. You should throw this out.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: What did you guys just do?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What happened?

name: chandler
dialogue: Richard was there so I couldn’t do it!

name: joey
dialogue: What?! No

name: chandler
dialogue: I’m going to do it tomorrow you know, and-and surprise her, but now you’ve ruined it!

name: joey
dialogue: We didn’t ruin it!

name: chandler
dialogue: Who walks into a room and asks to see a person’s hands?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, a palm reader, a manicurist, a hand doctor

name: joey
dialogue: Glove salesman!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Good one! Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: This is terrible. What am I going to do?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Look, she only suspects something okay? She doesn’t know for sure, so just throw her off the track.

name: chandler
dialogue: That’s right, I can throw her off. I can make her think marriage is the last thing on my mind.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Yeah! Convince her that-that you’re scared of commitment! Convince her that you’re a little coward!

name: chandler
dialogue: I can do that, I’ve had 30 years of practice.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, being you is finally going to pay off!

name: monica
dialogue: I had to go all the way to the basement because some idiot keeps stuffing the trash chute with pizza boxes!

name: joey
dialogue: That guy’s still doing that?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!  Oh my God you’re here, let me see your hand!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, you’re too late!!! She already took out the trash!!!

name: ross
dialogue: Wow! I have never had such a healthy break-up! She was such a grown-up about it! She didn’t seem too immature for me! Did I just make a huge mistake?

name: elizabeth
dialogue: Ross! Wait!

name: ross
dialogue: Elizabeth, thank God! I was just thinking about

name: elizabeth
dialogue: You suck!!

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, break-up’s still on!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, okay, here she comes!  How do I look? Do I look like a guy who doesn’t want to get married?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! And also, a little like a French guy.  I never noticed that before.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi guys!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: What are you up too?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, just hanging out, talking’ about uh, websites.  Yeah, we saw this really interesting website about marriage and how totally unnecessary it is and how its just a way for the government to keep tabs on you.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, Big Brother.

name: monica
dialogue: Well that’s a little crazy. Although I am you know glad to hear that you’re branching out on what you look at on the Internet.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, well… you know, it just got me thinking though, why would anybody ever want to get married huh?

name: monica
dialogue: Why?! To celebrate your relationship! To solidify your commitment! To declare your love for one another to the world!

name: chandler
dialogue: Eh

name: monica
dialogue: Okay well that’s good to know.

name: joey
dialogue: The Mr. Bowmont’s here!!!

name: waitress
dialogue: Hey Monica, there’s a customer who wants to complement the chef, should I let him in?

name: monica
dialogue: Sure, I love this part!

name: waitress
dialogue: Come on in.

name: richard
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: Richard!

name: richard
dialogue: Actually, I’m not here to complement the chef.

name: monica
dialogue: OH… Oh, that’s okay I hate when people come back to complement the chef. Like I have nothing better to do! So what’s up?

name: richard
dialogue: Well, it was great seeing you the other night.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, good to see you too. Did you come down here to tell me that?

name: richard
dialogue: No! I came here to tell you something else.  I came here  to tell you I still love you.

name: monica
dialogue: What uh—What did you—What?!

name: richard
dialogue: I still love you. And I know I probably shouldn’t even be here telling you this, I mean you’re with Chandler a guy I really like, and if you say he’s straight I’ll believe you! After seeing you the other night I knew if I didn’t tell you I’d regret it for the rest of my life. Letting you go was the stupidest thing I ever did.

name: monica
dialogue: you know you’re really not supposed to be back here!

name: richard
dialogue: Well yeah, I’m sorry. I know this is the wrong time and the wrong place but I had to tell you! I want to spend my life with you. I want to marry you. I want to have kids with you.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh God…  Why don’t they put chairs back here?!

name: richard
dialogue: I know this is crazy but am I too late?

name: monica
dialogue: What the… Yes you’re too late! Where was all this three years ago?!

name: richard
dialogue: Well I know I was an idiot! And I tried to forget you, I really did! you know after we had lunch last year I spent six months in Africa trying to get you out of my head!

name: monica
dialogue: What were you doing in Africa?

name: richard
dialogue: Working with blind kids.

name: monica
dialogue: oh! What are you doing to me?! Oh look, I-I… I’m sorry but umm, this-this-this-this is not going to happen.

name: richard
dialogue: Okay that’s fine, I’ll walk away. And I’ll never bother you again, but only if you tell me Chandler’s willing to give you everything I am.

name: monica
dialogue: Well he is! Yeah, I mean marriage is all he talks about! My goodness, in fact, I’m the one that’s making him wait!

name: richard
dialogue: You are?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah!

name: richard
dialogue: Why?

name: monica
dialogue: Why? Because of the government.

name: rachel
dialogue: Isn’t it incredible?! Monica and Chandler, getting’ married.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know, they’re going to be so happy together.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH… I mean two best friends falling in love, how often does that happen?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Not that often!

name: rachel
dialogue: No! I’m so happy for them!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Me too! So happy for them!

name: rachel
dialogue: I’m so happy and not at all jealous.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no! No God, definitely not jealous!

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean I’m probably 98% happy, maybe 2% jealous. And I mean what’s 2%? That’s nothing.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Totally. I’m like 90/10.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah me too.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey uh, have you guys seen Chandler?

name: rachel
dialogue: Wh—no, but you know who did stop in here looking for you, Tennille.

name: monica
dialogue: So that marriage stuff that you were saying yesterday, you don’t really believe that do you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure I do. In fact, I think the whole concept of marriage is unnatural. I mean look at pigs. Let’s take a second here and look at pigs. Okay pigs don’t mate for life. I mean a pig can have like a hundred sexual partners in a lifetime, and that’s just an ordinary pig not even a pig that’s good at sports!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, but that’s pigs not people!

name: chandler
dialogue: If marriage worked, I’d be all for it. But do you know what the divorce rate in this country is? 97%.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait a minute. Are you honestly telling me that-that you may never want to get married?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, never say never but you know probably uh yeah, never.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! Then-then-then what are we even doing?! What is this?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What is all this pressure?! Is this some new kind of strategy? Why don’t you put down your copy of ‘The Rules’ huh mantrap?!

name: monica
dialogue: you know what?! I got to go! Ugh!

name: chandler
dialogue: It’s okay, I got a plan.

name: rachel
dialogue: We’re going to find love!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Definitely!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I’m pretty confident about that. That’s what makes it so easy for me to be 80% happy for Monica and Chandler! It would be nice to have a little guarantee though.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What do you mean?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well you know, some people make deals with a friend, like if neither of them are married by the time they’re 40, they marry each other.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You mean a backup?

name: rachel
dialogue: Exactly!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, yeah I got that.

name: rachel
dialogue: You do?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hm-mmm.

name: rachel
dialogue: Who?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Joey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you serious?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I locked him years ago!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wh… So… If neither of you are married by the time you’re 40, you’re going to marry Joey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yep, we shook on it. Yeah but believe me that is not how he wanted to seal the deal.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, seriously?

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH, yeah. I think his exact words were

name: rachel
dialogue: Charming.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well hey, it’s just a backup.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Monica!

name: monica
dialogue: Have you seen Rachel? Or a mirror?

name: joey
dialogue: This is for my boat, pretty cool huh?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, it’s great.

name: joey
dialogue: Whoa-whoa, what’s the matter?! Talk to the captain!

name: monica
dialogue: I’m just having one of those days where you realize you’re in a dead-end relationship!

name: joey
dialogue: Chandler giving you a hard time huh?

name: monica
dialogue: It’s not like I want to get married tomorrow! It’s just that I-I’d like to believe that I’m in a relationship that’s actually going somewhere, that I’m not just wasting my time!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, you know Chandler.

name: monica
dialogue: No I don’t know Chandler! Not anymore! It’s like it’s like something’s changed.

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe you changed?

name: monica
dialogue: I didn’t change!

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe that’s the problem.

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Chandler is a complex fellow, one who is unlikely to take a wife.

name: monica
dialogue: Is that some kind of boat talk?

name: joey
dialogue: I don’t know!  I haven’t totally decided how to talk on my boat yet.

name: monica
dialogue: What does he think? Does he think I’m just going to wait around for nothing?

name: joey
dialogue: Monica face it, Chandler is against marriage. And-and always will be!

name: monica
dialogue: Well there’s some people who do want to marry me.

name: joey
dialogue: There are?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! Richard!

name: joey
dialogue: R-R-Richard said he wants to marry you?!  And-and Chandler’s telling’ you how much he hates marriage?!

name: monica
dialogue: That’s right.

name: joey
dialogue: Chandler loves marriage!!

name: monica
dialogue: You just told me that he hates marriage! That-that he’s a-a complex fellow who’s unlikely to take a wife! That-that he’s against marriage and always will be!

name: joey
dialogue: You got that from what I said?!

name: narrator
dialogue: When the Cretaceous period ended, the dinosaurs were gone.

name: ross
dialogue: What happened you guys?

name: ross
dialogue: Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey you!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, come on in.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh thank you. Hey you know, I’m so sorry to hear about you and Elizabeth.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, thanks. Yeah, I really thought we’d be able to make it work, but uh, I guess it just wasn’t meant to be.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, love. It’s a tricky business isn’t it?

name: ross
dialogue: I guess so.

name: rachel
dialogue: So what do you say we make a pact? If you and I are both single by the time we’re 40, we get married. I mean, we know each other, we like each other, and we’ve-we’ve already slept together so you know there’ll be no surprises there! You know what I mean? No like, "What’s that?!"

name: ross
dialogue: Right. OH! You-you want me to be your backup.

name: rachel
dialogue: Exactly.

name: ross
dialogue: OH, yeah I already have one.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Who?

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe.

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe?! Wait a—but-but she just, she said that Joey was her backup.

name: ross
dialogue: OH, I don’t think so.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross! I just had a conversation with her, and she said that she and Joey made a deal!

name: ross
dialogue: That’s impossible! I mean we have had a deal for years! We-we-we shook on it, although believe me she wanted to do a lot more than that.

name: joey
dialogue: Where the hell have you been?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I was making a coconut phone with the professor.

name: joey
dialogue: Richard told Monica he wants to marry her!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! Yeah, I’ve been trying to find you to tell to stop messing with her and maybe I would have if these  damn boat shoes wouldn’t keep flying off!

name: chandler
dialogue: My—Oh my God!

name: joey
dialogue: I know! They suck!!

name: chandler
dialogue: He’s not supposed to ask my girlfriend to marry him! I’m supposed to do that!

name: joey
dialogue: I know!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well what… you know what I’m going to do? I’m going to go over there; I’m going to kick his ass!  Will you help me?!

name: joey
dialogue: Look, Chandler I don’t think us getting our asses kicked is a solution. Okay? Just go and find Monica!

name: chandler
dialogue: You’re right.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.  I’m going to get the ring! I’m going to get the ring!  I’m going to go find her and  I’m just going to propose!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay great.

name: joey
dialogue: Dude-dude-dude!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Let me know about that coconut phone, it might great for the boat.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi.

name: richard
dialogue: Hi.

name: monica
dialogue: I don’t know why I’m here.

name: richard
dialogue: I didn’t ask. You want to come in?

name: monica
dialogue: I don’t know.

name: richard
dialogue: Oh, okay. Well, I’ll just leave the door open and go sit on the couch.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler is such an idiot!

name: richard
dialogue: Drink?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, I’ll have a scotch

name: richard
dialogue: on the rocks with a twist? I remember.

name: monica

And this is my chance and I am not going to blow it because we are meant for each other! And this is all just been one stupid mistake!  I was going to propose tonight.

Then I realized the only thing that matters is that you,  you make me happier than I ever thought I could be.  And if you’ll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way.  Monica, will you marry me?

name: ross
