name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, what are you talking about?

name: monica
dialogue: My Sweet Sixteen! Remember, you went to third base with my cousin Charlie.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ahh, third base.

name: monica
dialogue: It's all everybody at the party could talk about!

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, you know what? The only reason I did that was because your party was so boring!

name: monica
dialogue: We had a caricaturist!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, your Sweet Sixteen was like a million years ago.

name: monica
dialogue: And yet, here we are doing it again.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh, Monica I don't want to steal your stupid thunder!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh please! Why else would you have made out with Ross?!

name: ross
dialogue: Got me.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, easy mimey, the moment has passed, it isn't going to happen!

name: monica
dialogue: I just thought it would be nice if I could have just this one night!

name: rachel
dialogue: I swear, I never wanted any part of your night!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, is that why you did it the secret hallway where nobody ever goes?!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, Rachel, I've been thinking. I don't think us getting together tonight is such a good idea. I'm calling it off.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why to save your dignity my man.

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, why? Why would I ever want to take away from your night?

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know! I don't-maybe you are feeling a little resentful. Maybe ah, maybe you thought you'd get married first! Maybe you can't stand the fact that your formally fat friend is getting married before you!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wow. That-You know what? That is so unfair. You know what? Now I want to steal your thunder! Come on Ross, let's go have sex!

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe you are going to have sex on my engagement night!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, somebody should.

name: ross
dialogue: Look uh, if we're going to do this...

name: rachel
dialogue: We're not going to do this, all right? She's just going to think that we're doin' it.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I see, so everybody wins.

name: rachel
dialogue: Who is it?

name: monica
dialogue: It's Monica, open up!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay well Ross! Stop it please! Wait a minute!

name: ross
dialogue: Oww!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, you like that baby?  May we help you?

name: monica
dialogue: I just wanted to say that I hope you do have sex tonight and I hope that you guys get back together, but I must warn you, the night that you announce your engagement I'm going to announce that I'm pregnant!

name: chandler
dialogue: How is that ever going to happen?!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right Monica, do you want to know why I was with Ross tonight?!

name: monica
dialogue: I know why!

name: rachel
dialogue: No you don't know why!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay! Why?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Because! Because I was sad.

name: monica
dialogue: What do you mean?

name: rachel
dialogue: Look, I am so...so happy for you guys, but you getting married just reminds me of the fact that I'm not. I'm not even close. And I don't know, maybe I just wanted to make myself feel better. And I know that that is dumb, but oh my God you were so depressed when Ross got married that you slept with Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't care, she slept with me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Anyway sweetie, I am, I'm so sorry I ruined your night.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm sorry I almost made you sleep with Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I'm going to take off.  Congratulations man.

name: chandler
dialogue: Thanks.

name: ross
dialogue: And uh, Rachel.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: What can I say, you missed your chance. From now on the only person who's going to enjoy these bad boys  is me.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! Here's a dollar, consider it a deposit. Please sing at our wedding.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh thank you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Now...  "Who will perform the ceremony! Who will perform the cer--Oh-oh! All right, I'll pound on him in the morning.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi!

name: joey
dialogue: Who wants French toast?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I'll have some!

name: joey
dialogue: Good, me too.  Eggs and milk are in the fridge. Thanks.

name: monica
dialogue: Oww!

name: chandler
dialogue: What's the matter honey?

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know, my hand feels weird. I guess it's because, I'm engaged!  How long before it starts getting annoying?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It starts?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, so let's get started on the wedding plans!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay!

name: chandler
dialogue: Already?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, we got a lot to do! We got to think about the flowers, the caterers, the music...

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I got some thoughts on that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wait Chandler, too many cooks...

name: ross
dialogue: Take from me, as the groom all you have to do is show up and try to say the right name.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay!

name: chandler
dialogue: What in God's name is that?!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God, the wedding book?! I haven't seen that since the forth grade!

name: monica
dialogue: This baby has got everything. Take you know, locations for instance.  First, organized alphabetically, then geographically, then by square footage.

name: phoebe
dialogue: That is so smart!  Break it off. Break it off now.

name: ross
dialogue: And that should conclusively prove that I had the idea for Jurassic Park first! Now let's take a look at...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, oh my God! Wh-wh-what are you doing here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I need to talk to you, it's pretty urgent. It's about Monica and Chandler.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God! Of course, of course.  Umm, would you please excuse me for a moment? Umm, do you know each other's hometowns? Why don't you...   Wh-what's going on?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, umm, not much. But, I was just thinking that since those guys just got engaged that maybe it would be nice if they had some privacy, you know? So, could I just move in with you for a couple days?

name: ross
dialogue: Umm, okay, yeah, sure. But wh-what's wrong with Monica and Chandler?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Nothing-Why?!

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, you said it was urgent!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah it is! I'm going to the movies and it starts in like five minutes.

name: ross
dialogue: Do you realize I have a classroom full of students?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm so rude. Does anyone want to come to the movies?

name: monica
dialogue: All right, so I haven't cleared the budget with my parents yet, but tell me how this is for music.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: All right umm, a string quartet for the procession.

name: rachel
dialogue: Aw.

name: monica
dialogue: A jazz trio for cocktails. The Bay City Rollers for dancing. Wait, that was from my sixth grade wedding.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you couldn't get them anyway. Ian doesn't plan anymore and Derrick...  And Derrick is a name I shouldn't know.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Mon, do you have another pillow? you know, something a little snugglyer?

name: chandler
dialogue: Why are you napping over here instead of over at your place?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, the duck...

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! The duck?! What the hell did the damn duck do now?!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh, well he did not get sick somewhere in there and it was immediately found and properly cleaned up!

name: chandler
dialogue: Now, do I get to look at this book or is it just for people who are actually involved in the wedding?

name: monica
dialogue: Of course you can look at it! Yeah, I want your opinion too!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Here you go! What do you think about centrepieces?

name: chandler
dialogue: Centrepieces!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! Roses or Lilies?

name: chandler
dialogue: Definitely roses.  Well, I just think they're a little more weddingy.  But Lilies are the clear choice.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! It's like one mind.

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh-huh!

name: joey
dialogue: Guys! Guys!! You got to let me nap! Ugh, I'm going to get cranky!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, there is a perfectly good couch across the hall!

name: joey
dialogue: Yes it is perfectly good, and it is not one of the places the duck got sick!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, I'm going to go!

name: rachel
dialogue: Now Joey, what did the duck do?!

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know! But he did not eat your face cream!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey little buddy, how are you feeling?  What the hell is in that face cream?  that is so soft.  Pillowcases!   Zelda looked at the chimney sweep. Her father, the vicar... The vicar?  ...wouldn't be home for hours. Her loins were burning. She threw caution to the wind and reached out and grabbed his... Whoa!  Whoa-ho-ho-ho! This is a dirty book!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, Phoebe...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh Ross, hi.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, what are you doing?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm sorry, I'm with a client right now.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, let's talk outside.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, you can't massage people in my apartment!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What's the big deal? I did it at Monica and Chandler's!

name: ross
dialogue: And they knew about it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, well Ross, what is this really about?

name: ross
dialogue: Look, this is my home and I want to be able to come and go whenever I want!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, I will find someplace else to do the rest of my appointments. I just don't know what the big deal is!

name: ross
dialogue: The big deal is I don't want naked, greasy strangers in my apartment when I want to kick back with a puzzle-beer! Cold beer.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Joey, what 'cha doing?

name: joey
dialogue: Sweeping'. Why? Turn you on?

name: rachel
dialogue: No.

name: joey
dialogue: Huh. What if I was sweeping a chimney?

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, did you my face cream?

name: joey
dialogue: Where are you going? The vicar won't be home for hours.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey,  where did you learn that word?

name: joey
dialogue: Where do you think,  Zelda?

name: rachel
dialogue: You found my book?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah I did!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, what-what are you doing going into my bedroom?!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, look I'm sorry, I went in there to take a nap and I know I shouldn't have, but you got porn!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey-hey, you know what? I don't care! I'm not ashamed of my book. There's nothing with a woman enjoying a little...erotica. It's just a healthy expression of female sexuality, which by the way, you will never understand.

name: joey
dialogue: You got porn!

name: ross
dialogue: Hello.

name: woman
dialogue: Hi, is uh Phoebe here?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh no-no, she-she's out for the night.

name: woman
dialogue: OH great.

name: ross
dialogue: Can I, can I help you with something?

name: woman
dialogue: Well, I don't know. Are you a masseur?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes I am.

name: woman
dialogue: Great!  Dad!  Thank you so much, I'll be back to pick him up in an hour.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: So Chandler, you are parents must've been thrilled when you told them you were engaged.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah, I should probably call them.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I remember when we first got engaged.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I don't think I ever heard that story.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh dad, really you don't need to...

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well, I'd gotten Judy pregnant. I still don't know that happened.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: You don't know how that happened?! Your dog thought my diaphragm was a chew toy!

name: chandler
dialogue: What a sweet story.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, at least you are not hearing it for the first time at your fifth grade Halloween party.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: What?! They wanted a scary story!

name: monica
dialogue: Anyway, we're really excited about our wedding plans, and well I guess pretty soon we'll be making a big withdrawal from the Monica wedding fund.  What?

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: You tell her Jack, I can't do it.

name: monica
dialogue: What happened? You still have the Monica wedding fund don't you?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: We have it. Only now, we call it the beach house.

name: monica
dialogue: I don't believe you spent my wedding fund on the beach house!

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: We're sorry honey, but we just assumed if you got married after you turned 30 you'd pay for it yourself.

name: monica
dialogue: You bought the beach house when I was 23!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Which means you had seven years of beach fun and you can't put a price on that sweetie.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: We really do feel bad about this though.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: We started saving again when you were dating Richard and then that went to hell, so we redid the kitchen.

name: monica
dialogue: What about when I started dating Chandler?

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Well it was Chandler! We didn't think he'd ever propose!

name: chandler
dialogue: Clearly I did not start drinking enough at the start of the meal.

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe it! That there is no money for my wedding?!

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: We might still have some money, if your father didn't think it was a good idea to sell ice over the Internet.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: It seemed like such a simple idea.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Stupid Jack, the word is stupid.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: All right, enough! I don't want to hear about it anymore!  Good luck, Chandler.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay! Now, I'm going to touch you.  OH, that is soft.

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe this. Do you think that your parents could help pay for it?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know, my mother spent most of her money on her fourth wedding. She's saving the rest for her divorce. And any extra cash my father has he saves for his yearly trips to  Dollywood.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well what happened at dinner?

name: monica
dialogue: My parents spent the money for our wedding!

name: phoebe
dialogue: My God! What did you order?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait, but there's no money! Well this is terrible! You guys are going to have to get married in like a, rec. centre!

name: chandler
dialogue: Honey, it's going to be okay.

name: monica
dialogue: No! No it's not! It's not going to be okay! It sucks! No swing band! No lilies!

name: rachel
dialogue: No, you know what? It's going to be okay. I mean you don't have to have this rustic Italian feast. You know? And-and you don't need, you don't need this custom-made, empire waisted, duchess, satin gown; you can wear off the rack.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, it really is going to be okay. The important thing is that we love each other and that we're going to get married.

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you even understand what off the rack means?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Look, why don't you just pay for it yourself?

name: monica
dialogue: How? I don't have any money.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I have some.

name: monica
dialogue: How much?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, close to...

name: monica
dialogue: Whoa!!! Are you kidding me?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well what?! How-how much is it?!

name: monica
dialogue: It's enough for wedding scenario eight.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH!  Really?!

name: monica
dialogue: How great are you, you little saver?! I mean, the-the amount you have is exactly the budget of my dream wedding!

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, you guys are so made for each other.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you are not suggesting that we spend all of the money on the wedding?

name: rachel and monica
dialogue: Ah, yeah!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, come on, I've been saving this money for six years and I kind of had some of it earmarked for the future, not just for a party.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow!  Hello, Mr. Chandler.

name: monica
dialogue: This is the most special day of our lives.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, I realize that honey, but I'm not going to spend all of the money on one party.

name: monica
dialogue: Honey, umm I-I love you,  but umm, if you call our wedding a party one more time, you may not get invited. Okay?  Listen, we could always earn more money, okay? But uh, we're only going to get married once.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, I understand, but I have to put my foot down. Okay? The answer is no.

name: monica
dialogue: You-you are going to have to put your foot down?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, I am!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow, money and a firm hand. Finally a Chandler I can get on board with.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Rach.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Rach, do you smell smoke?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh, I get it, smoke, chimney, chimney sweep, very funny, ha-ha.

name: joey
dialogue: No-no-no, I'm serious. You don't smell it? Something's on fire.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well no, I don't smell anything.

name: joey
dialogue: OH, you know what? It's probably just your burning' loins.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, what are you guys, what are you guys talking about?

name: rachel
dialogue: Nothing!

name: ross
dialogue: Damn, this coffee's cold! Hey Rach, do you mind if I heat this up on your loins?

name: rachel
dialogue: You know, I can not believe you told him, Joey!

name: ross
dialogue: So I guess you bought that book after we broke up huh?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh, yeah I did, because I wore out my first copy when I was with you.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah, yeah? Well uh, when we were going out, I read tons of porno magazines!   What is up?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross! How could you do that to an old man?!

name: ross
dialogue: Excuse me ladies.  I'm sorry?

name: phoebe
dialogue: My massage client, Arthur? His daughter called and said that some guy that worked for me gave him a really weird massage this afternoon.

name: ross
dialogue: I gave him an extremely professional massage!

name: phoebe
dialogue: He said you poked at him with wooden spoons.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, so it wasn't uh, a traditional massage. But I did give him accu-pressure with a pair of chopsticks. And, and I gently exfoliated him with, with a mop.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, he's never coming back! Okay? You just cost me eight dollars a week!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, you know what? This is your fault! you are the one that didn't move his-his appointment.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, it's my fault?! You didn't have to massage him! You could've sent him away! You could've not rolled Tonka trucks up and down his back!

name: ross
dialogue: He said he liked that!! Oh you are right, you are right. I'm sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: Dude, what are you massaging an old man for?

name: ross
dialogue: His daughter was hot.

name: joey
dialogue: Gotcha.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Listen umm, I've been thinking, it's not fair for me to ask you to spend all of your money on our wedding. I mean, you work, you work really hard for that.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ehh.

name: monica
dialogue: Eh, you work for that.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, I thought about it too, and I'm sorry. I think we should spend all of the money on the wedding.

name: monica
dialogue: You do?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I'm putting my foot down. Yeah look, when I proposed I told you that I would do anything to make you happy, and if having the perfect wedding makes you happy then, then that is what we're going to do.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, you are so sweet.  Oh, but wait, what about our, what about the future and stuff?

name: chandler
dialogue: Eh, forget about the future and stuff! So we only have two kids, you know? We'll pick our favourite and that one will get to go to college.

name: monica
dialogue: You thought about that?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: How many kids were we going to have?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, four, a boy, twin girls and another boy.

name: monica
dialogue: What else did you think about?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, stuff like where'd we live, you know? Like a small place outside the city, where our kids could learn to ride their bikes and stuff. You know, we could have a cat that had a bell on it's collar and we could hear it every time it ran through the little kitty door. Of course, we'd have an apartment over the garage where Joey could grow old.

name: monica
dialogue: You know what? I-I don't want a big, fancy wedding.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure you do.

name: monica
dialogue: No, I want everything you just said. I want a marriage.

name: chandler
dialogue: You sure?

name: monica
dialogue: Uh-hmm.

name: chandler
dialogue: I love you so much.

name: monica
dialogue: I love you.  Hey listen umm, when, when you were talking' about our future you said cat, but you meant dog right.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah, totally!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh good.

name: joey
dialogue: Hello, Zelda.

name: rachel
dialogue: Who are you supposed to be?

name: joey
dialogue: The vicar!

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you even know what a vicar is?

name: joey
dialogue: Like a goalie, right?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah. Look Joey, it's enough all right?! You keep making these stupid jokes and this sleazy innuendoes and it's-I'm not-it's just not funny anymore!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, I'm sorry. Rach I-Rach I'm sorry. Okay? I'm sorry! Maybe I can make up for it by, taking you roughly in the barn.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right! You know what? that is it! You want to do it?! Let's do it!

name: joey
dialogue: Huh?

name: rachel
dialogue: that is right, I want to do it with you! I've been trying to fight it, but you just said all the right things.

name: joey
dialogue: I-I-I-I did?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! OH, I've been waiting' so long to get on that body!

name: joey
dialogue: This body?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah that is right! Come on Joey; sex me up!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey-hey, you are starting' to sound like the butcher's wife there in-in chapter seven.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, come on now, don't keep me waiting. Get those clothes off! But, I would keep that helmet on because you are in for a rough ride!

name: joey
dialogue: I don't want to, I'm scared.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you guys!

name: ross and rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: So, what do you think?

name: ross
dialogue: About what?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, what?

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you kidding? Okay, I'll give you a hint; I'll give you a hint.

name: joey
dialogue: Eyes! No, no. Your eyes! No. Chandler's eyes!

name: chandler
dialogue: I got glasses!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, you-you've always had glasses.

name: chandler
dialogue: No I didn't!

name: ross
dialogue: Are you sure?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah-yeah, did-didn't you use to have a pair? They were really round, burgundy, and they made you look kind of umm...

name: joey
dialogue: Feminine.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes!

name: chandler
dialogue: No!

name: monica
dialogue: Sweetie, I think the glasses look great. They make you look really sexy.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah!

name: chandler
dialogue: You didn't think I used to wear glasses, right?

name: monica
dialogue: Of course!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So what do you guys want for an engagement present?

name: chandler
dialogue: that is okay Pheebs, we're not having a party or anything, so you don't have to get us...

name: monica
dialogue: If someone wants to give us a present, we don't want to deprive them of that joy.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, you know what you should get them? One of those little uh, portable CD players.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, I already have one.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Not unless someone borrowed it and left it at the gynaecologist.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, and-and-and by someone, she means Joey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, I know I what I want!

name: chandler
dialogue: What we want honey.

name: monica
dialogue: No, you don't want this. I want to have your grandmother's cookie recipe.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You mean the chocolate chip cookie recipe?

name: monica
dialogue: Uh-huh, yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You mean the one that my grandmother made me swear on her deathbed that I would never let out of our family?

name: chandler
dialogue: Dying people say the craziest things.

name: monica
dialogue: I wanted it for years! I was going to make cookies for my children.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Break my heart-Oh, all right.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. I'm going to be the mom that makes the world's best chocolate chip cookies.

name: chandler
dialogue: Our kids are going to be fat aren't they.

name: joey
dialogue: Ahoy!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! How's the boat?!

name: joey
dialogue: Great! I'm finally getting into this sailing stuff.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, so you finally took it out of the marina huh?

name: joey
dialogue: Why would I do that? It took three guys to get the thing in there!

name: phoebe
dialogue: If you don't sail your boat, what do you do on it?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, it's great! It's a great place to just kind of, sit, hang around, drink a few beers, eat some chips.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, it's good that you finally have a place to do that.

name: rachel
dialogue: You know Joey, I could teach you to sail if you want.

name: joey
dialogue: You could?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! I've been sailing my whole life. When I was fifteen my dad bought me my own boat.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Your own boat?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! What?! He was trying to cheer me up! My pony was sick.

name: chandler
dialogue: Do you know what I was thinking'?

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Nothing, I just like to go like this.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey Chandler, what are you doing tonight?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh why, do you have a lecture?

name: ross
dialogue: No, why?

name: chandler
dialogue: Then free as a bird. What's up?

name: ross
dialogue: My dad wanted to know if you wanted to play racquetball with us.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! that is great! Dad must really like you, he doesn't ask just anyone to play.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah and he didn't really ask for you, he asked for Chancy, I assumed he meant you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, did-did you correct him?

name: ross
dialogue: No, I-I thought it would be more fun this way.

name: monica
dialogue: This is so cool, maybe this is something you can do every week.

name: ross
dialogue: Or you can sit with him on the front porch and make sure no one steals the trash cans. He does that every week too.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, just so you know, you-you have to let him win.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: He hates to lose.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh no problem, maybe I'll play with my left hand.

name: ross
dialogue: you are not a lefty?

name: chandler
dialogue: Does anybody know me?!

name: monica
dialogue: What's wrong Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I just went to my old apartment to get you the-the cookie recipe and the stupid fire burned it up!

name: monica
dialogue: No!! Why didn't you make a copy and-and keep it in a fireproof box and keep it at least a hundred yards from the original?!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Because I'm normal! That was the one legacy my grandmother left me, and I know you wanted it as an engagement present.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, we have to get you an engagement present?

name: chandler
dialogue: Don't worry about it Pheebs.

name: ross
dialogue: No one got me an engagement present.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, here I wish you health and happiness.

name: chandler
dialogue: An old cookie?

name: monica
dialogue: This is what happens when you don't register for gifts!

name: phoebe
dialogue: See no-no, I made a batch and I froze it, and this is the only one left.

name: chandler
dialogue: We can't accept this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why not?

name: chandler
dialogue: because it's gross.

name: monica
dialogue: No! Wait! I think I can figure out the recipe from this cookie! I do stuff like this at work all the time.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really?!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! I bet I can do it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, we owe you a present.

name: ross
dialogue: Two! I've been engaged twice!

name: joey
dialogue: Look at this clown! Just because he's got a bigger boat he thinks he can take up the whole river.  Get out of the way jackass!  Who names his boat Coast Guard anyway?

name: rachel
dialogue: That is the Coast Guard.

name: joey
dialogue: What are they doing out here? The coast's all the way over there.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, just ignore the boats all right? We're not finished with the lesson yet.

name: joey
dialogue: All right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, I'm just going to go over the basic points just one more time, are you ready?

name: joey
dialogue: Come on Rach, not again. I got it! Okay? Let's start sailing, and I want to go over there  where that boatload of girls is!  Yo-ho-ho!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, okay. Is that what you want to do? You want to go over and give a little shout out to the old, hot chickas? Okay, let's do that Sailor Joe. Quick question though,  what's this called?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh, boat rope.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wrong! How do you get the mainsail up?

name: joey
dialogue: Uhh, rub it?

name: rachel
dialogue: No. What do you do if I say we are coming about?

name: joey
dialogue: I'd say, come again. No-no, wait I-I-I know this one, I know this one, uh...

name: rachel
dialogue: Time's up, now your dead.

name: joey
dialogue: And deaf!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you just go on and make your little jokey-jokes, but if you do not know what you are doing out at sea you will die at sea. Am I getting through to you sailor?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yes.

name: rachel
dialogue: Don't just say yes! This isn't a game, Joey you can really get hurt out here. Okay, so do you want to pay attention or do you want to die?!

name: joey
dialogue: I want to make a ship to shore call to Chandler.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, I definitely taste nutmeg.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You do?

name: monica
dialogue: You don't?  Well, that is the difference between a professional and a layman.

name: phoebe
dialogue: That and arrogance.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! How was sailing?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't want to talk about it. you know, you could've at least saved me a whole cookie.

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: No-wait-no-no!!!!!!!

name: joey
dialogue: Women are mean!!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can't believe that! Now the only thing left of my grandmother's legacy is this crumb.  I wish you a long and happy marriage.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! How was it?

name: ross
dialogue: Well I had a great time! Umm, Chancy on the other hand...

name: chandler
dialogue: I will tell the story! It was going great. I let him win. We were bonding. He even said I could call him dad.

name: ross
dialogue: And what did he ask you not to call him?

name: chandler
dialogue: Daddy. All right look, here's the story.  Well, we had just finished playing racquetball and we were going to take a steam. I walk into the steam room and it was really steamy.  So I take off my glasses and that is when in happened.

name: chandler
dialogue: Guys?

name: ross
dialogue: Over here.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Have a seat son.  Hey!!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God Chandler! I can't believe it!

name: chandler
dialogue: I know.

name: monica
dialogue: You gave my father a lap dance!

name: chandler
dialogue: Why do they put so much steam in there?!

name: ross
dialogue: because otherwise they'd have to call it the room room.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why? Okay? Why? Wh-wh-why did that have to happen?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Come on, it's not that big a deal!

name: chandler
dialogue: Not that big a deal? There...there was touching of things.

name: ross
dialogue: Now, I know you wanted to bond with my dad, but did you really have to bond to that part?

name: monica
dialogue: Listen, I'm sure that dad doesn't care. He probably thought this was funny; he'll be telling this story for years!

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't want him to tell this story for years.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, but he will. He still tells the story how Monica tried to escape from fat camp.

name: monica
dialogue: I wasn't escaping.

name: ross
dialogue: Then how did you get caught in the barbed wire?

name: monica
dialogue: I was trying to help out a squirrel.

name: ross
dialogue: You were trying to eat it!

name: chandler
dialogue: If that is your father calling to tell this story then the marriage is off!

name: monica
dialogue: Come on.  Hello?  I'm sorry you have the wrong number.   Okay, I'll call you later dad. I love you.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right, I'm off to see your dad.

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa-whoa, aren't you a little over dressed?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, and-and you better make sure he tips you this time.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, I figured I would try to convince him not to tell the story anymore, and I figure the best way to do that is face to face-And by face I don't mean his lap. And by face, I don't mean my ass.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey are you getting Monica and Chandler an engagement present?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know. You know, they didn't get us anything.

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well hello! So, when are we getting' back out on the water matey?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh uh, I don't know the boat way to say this, but uh never!

name: rachel
dialogue: Why not?

name: joey
dialogue: Because! you are mean on the boat!

name: rachel
dialogue: What? I was just trying to teach you.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, lesson learned! Rachel is mean!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeeeeeep... Yep-yep-yep-yep-yep. I remember when she took out on her dad's boat she wouldn't let me help at all.

name: rachel
dialogue: Excuse me, I wanted you to help, but you couldn't move your arms because you were wearing three life jackets.

name: ross
dialogue: You have to respect the sea!

name: rachel
dialogue: Look Joey, I'm sorry if-if you thought that was mean, but I got to tell you something. That was not mean. Okay, my father is mean. He used to yell at me all the time on the boat, I mean it was horrible. I was just being a good teacher.

name: joey
dialogue: Does a good teacher say, "Put down the beer pinhead!?"

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, does a good student drink seven beers during his first lesson?

name: joey
dialogue: Six and a half! You knocked that last one out of my hand! Remember?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I didn't want you to get hit by the boom!

name: joey
dialogue: Well it hit me anyway! And it would've hurt a lot less if I had finished that last beer.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, you know what? I-I'm sorry. I will try to tone it down and uh stop yelling.

name: joey
dialogue: You won't boss me around anymore?

name: rachel
dialogue: I won't boss you around.

name: joey
dialogue: And you'll be nice?

name: rachel
dialogue: And, I'll be nice.

name: joey
dialogue: And you'll be topless?

name: rachel
dialogue: And-Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Do you want me to learn?!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, here's batch 22. OH, maybe these'll taste a little like your grandmother's. This has a little bit of orange peel, but no nutmeg.

name: ross
dialogue: Let's give it a shot.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. Man, I have not made this many cookies since I was in the ninth grade.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, what was that for? Like a bake sale?

name: monica
dialogue: No, just a Friday night.

name: ross
dialogue: OH, these are pretty good.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but not as good as batch 17.

name: ross
dialogue: Which one was that?

name: monica
dialogue: The ones we had right after you almost threw up.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah! Batch 17 was good. I did not like batch 16.  I'm okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are there anymore from the good batch? Because we could just work off of those.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, ooh yeah, I think there is one from batch 17 left, uh...  It's batch 16! 16 people! Get out of the way!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay Joey honey, you are doing really good! All right, now I'm just going to need you to step to the port side.  Remember? Remember how we talked about the port side?

name: joey
dialogue: OH yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Right?

name: joey
dialogue: Nope.

name: rachel
dialogue: It's left sweetie, but that is okay sweetie, that is a tough one.

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know why you just don't say left.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, go to the left.  The left!

name: joey
dialogue: Huh?

name: rachel
dialogue: Just sit over there!!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay! Okay, you are yelling again! See that?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! No-no, no-no-no, very quiet, said with love, no yelling.

name: joey
dialogue: OH, you know what? Since I'm here, I think I'm going to have me a little beer on the port side.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay Joey, we're luffing a little bit, so could you tighten up the cunningham?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh, wow, you just said a bunch of stuff I didn't know there.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, come on! We just went over this!

name: joey
dialogue: OH, you know, when we did that was when that bird was flying overhead with the fish in his mouth. Did you see it? It was gross!

name: rachel
dialogue: No! All right?! I did not see the bird! I did not see the fish! I did not see the piece of Styrofoam that was shaped like Mike Tyson! I did not, because I was trying to teach you how to sail a boat! Which obviously is an impossible thing to do!

name: joey
dialogue: All right that is it! you are yelling and I don't see you taking your top off! I quit!

name: rachel
dialogue: What do you mean you quit?! You can't quit!

name: joey
dialogue: Why not?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Because you are not finished yet and I won't have it! Greens do not quit!

name: joey
dialogue: Greens? I'm a Tribbiani! And Tribbianis quit!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God, wait did I-I just said Greens don't quit didn't I?   Did I just say Greens don't quit?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yes! Yes! You did and you are still yelling at me!

name: rachel
dialogue: No! No! No! I'm not yelling at you, I'm just yelling near you. Oh God Joey, oh I'm my father. Oh my God, this is horrible! I've been trying so hard not to be my mother I did not see this coming'. Oh, Joey, I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. I just wanted you to learn.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, hey I did learn.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! Come on.

name: rachel
dialogue: Aww...

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, it's okay. I know what a mainsail is.  I know, I know to duck when the boom comes across. I-I know port is right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Left.

name: joey
dialogue: Damnit!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know, I bet it would actually make my grandmother very happy to know that we're trying to figure out her recipe. I bet she's l-l-looking' up at us and smiling right now.

name: ross
dialogue: Looking up?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah-No, she was really nice to me, but she's in hell for sure.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, I've tried everything. I give up. I guess I'm not going to be the mom who makes the world's best chocolate cookies. I do make the best duck confit with broccoli rabe.  Kids love that right.

name: ross
dialogue: Aww, Pheebs, come on isn't there any relative that would have the recipe? What about, what about your sister?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no-no, no, I made a promise to myself that the next time I would talk to Ursula would be over my dead body. And that is not happening 'til October 15th, 2032.

name: ross
dialogue: that is the day you are going to die? See-darn it, I've got shuffleboard that day.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is what you think.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, I mean what about friends of your grandmother's? Wouldn't they have the recipe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, you know I may have relatives in France who would know. My grandmother said she got the recipe from her grandmother, Nesele Toulouse.

name: monica
dialogue: What was her name?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Nesele Toulouse.

name: monica
dialogue: Nestle Tollhouse?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, you Americans always butcher the French language.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, is this the recipe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes!!  OH.

name: monica
dialogue: I cannot believe that I just spent the last two days trying to figure out the recipe and it was in my cupboard the whole time!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know! You see it is stuff like this which is why  you are burning in hell!!

name: chandler
dialogue: So you understand, I'd feel a lot more comfortable if you didn't tell people what happened. You know, I'm a little...I'm a little embarrassed about it.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I understand completely, there's nothing more horrifying than embarrassing yourself in front of your in-laws. As a matter of fact, when I started dating Judy I was unemployed, and her father asked me what I did for a living and I told him I was a lawyer.

name: chandler
dialogue: What did you do when they found out?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: They never did, so if ever see me giving them legal advice just nod along. Shall we?

name: chandler
dialogue: So I guess we wear swimsuits in here!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well Joey, I hate to admit it, your way of sailing is a lot more fun.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, yeah. Hey, why don't you give a pull on that rope?

name: rachel
dialogue: OH we're not sailing.

name: joey
dialogue: Just pull on it.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right.  Hey-hey-hey!!  Sandwiches!

name: joey
dialogue: What else?

name: rachel
dialogue: Here you go.

name: joey
dialogue: Thank you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wow!

name: joey
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: What you-don't hold it like that! you are letting' all the good stuff fall out.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH whoops.

name: joey
dialogue: Careful! you are wasting good pastrami!  Oh my God! I'm my dad!

name: mac
dialogue: Well, if we learned one thing today C.H.E.E.S.E. is that cheerleaders and high explosives don't mix.

name: c.h.e.e.s.e
dialogue: You can say that again Mac.

name: mac
dialogue: Well, I couldn't have done it without you buddy. you are a genius.

name: c.h.e.e.s.e
dialogue: Oh yeah? Well then how come I can't get my VCR to stop blinking 12

name: joey
dialogue: So, what did you guys think?

name: monica
dialogue: Hello?  Hold on please. Joey, it's your mom.

name: chandler
dialogue: It's your mommy. It's your mommy.

name: ross
dialogue: oh...

name: rachel
dialogue: that is nice.

name: joey
dialogue: Mom, so what did you think?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well that was umm...Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: It wasn't the best.

name: chandler
dialogue: That was one of the worse things ever. And not just on TV.

name: monica
dialogue: Wh-what are we going to tell him?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, the lighting was okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH no you don't! You got lighting last time, lighting is mine!

name: monica
dialogue: And I have costumes.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh great! That means I'm stuck with, "So, we were watching you in there  and you were sitting' right here! Whoa!"

name: rachel
dialogue: What are you going to do Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't know. I don't know. I can't lie to him again. Oh no I-no! I'm just going to press my breasts up against him.

name: chandler
dialogue: And say nothing?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh, yeah that is right.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! Well, my folks really liked it! So what-what did you guys think?  It wasn't that good.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, do you think that your favourite animal says much about you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: What? You mean behind my back?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! Hi you guys, oh my God! You'll never going to believe happened to me today! I am sitting in my office and...

name: joey
dialogue: You guys! You guys! you are not going to believe what my agent just told me!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey! kind of in the middle of a story here!

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh, sorry. Sorry. You finish, go.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, so anyway I'm sitting' in my office and guess who walks in.

name: joey
dialogue: I'm going to be on two TV shows!

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: Oh, that is great!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, you weren't finished?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! Guess who walks into my office is the end of my story.  It was Ralph Lauren!  Ralph Lauren walked into my office!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh Rach, if you are going to start another story, at least let me finish mine.

name: rachel
dialogue: It's the same story.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow, it's really long.

name: rachel
dialogue: Anyway, Ralph just came in to tell me that he's so happy with my work that he wants me to be the new merchandising manager for polo retail.

name: monica
dialogue: Still get a discount on wedding dresses?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm so happy for you!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, these really are the days of our lives.

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, since you ask. They want me back on Days of Our Lives!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh God!

name: rachel
dialogue: I got-I get a big pay raise!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh hey!

name: joey
dialogue: I'll be playing Drake Ramoray's twin brother, Stryker!

name: monica
dialogue: Ooh!

name: rachel
dialogue: I get to hire my own assistant!

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: Ah!!

name: joey
dialogue: Well-I got a head rush from standing up to fast right there.

name: rachel
dialogue: And you were at this job for four years?

name: hilda
dialogue: that is right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, well this is all very impressive Hilda, um I just have one last question for you. Uh, how did I do? Was this okay?

name: hilda
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: I've never interviewed anyone before. I've actually never had anyone work for me before. Although when I was a kid, we did have a maid, but this is-this isn't the same thing.

name: hilda
dialogue: No dear. It's not.

name: rachel
dialogue: No. Yeah, and I know that. All right, well thank you so much for coming in it was nice to meet you.

name: hilda
dialogue: Thank you! Good meeting you.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right.  I'm a total pro!

name: man
dialogue: Hello?

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! H-umm! Hi! Yes, uh I'm sorry the models are actually down the hall.

name: man
dialogue: Actually, I'm here about the assistant job.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?!  Okay well then, all right, well just have a seat there. Umm, so what's-what is-what's your name?

name: man
dialogue: Tag Jones.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh, go on.

name: tag
dialogue: that is it. that is my whole name.

name: rachel
dialogue: that is your whole name, okay of course it is! Okay, well let's-let's just have a look-see here.

name: tag
dialogue: I know I haven't worked in an office before, and I really don't have a lot of experience, but uh...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh come on, what are you talking about? You've got three years painting houses. Two whole summers at T.G.I. Friday's, come on!

name: tag
dialogue: It's lame, I know. But I'm a goal-oriented person, very eager to learn...

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, hold on just a second.  I'm sorry, it's for human resources, everybody has to do it. Could you just stand up please?

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no-no-no.  Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Anyway, I should go. Okay, bye.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey sweetie.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi sweetie. So, what was with all the whispering?

name: monica
dialogue: I can't tell you. It's a secret.

name: chandler
dialogue: Secret? Married people aren't supposed to have secrets between one another. We have too much love and respect for one another.

name: monica
dialogue: Aww.  But still no.

name: chandler
dialogue: No I'm serious, we should tell each other everything. I do not have any secrets from you.

name: monica
dialogue: Really? Okay, so why don't you tell me what happened to Ross Junior year at Disneyland?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh no-no, I can't do that.

name: monica
dialogue: If you tell me, I'll tell you what Phoebe said.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, Ross and I are going to Disneyland and we stop at this restaurant for tacos. And when I say restaurant, I mean a guy, a hibachi, and the trunk of his car. So Ross has about 10 tacos. And anyway, we're on Space Mountain and Ross starts to feel a little iffy.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God. He threw up?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, he visited a little town south of throw up.  So what was Phoebe's secret?

dialogue: Oh, Nancy Thompson from Phoebe's old massage place is getting fired.

dialogue: that is it?! I gave up my Disneyland story for that?

name: monica
dialogue: that is right! You lose sucker!!  Please still marry me.

dialogue: Chandler, you have an assistant right?

name: chandler

name: rachel
dialogue: I love him. He's so pretty I want to cry! I don't know what to do. Tell me what to do.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh. No, I hear what you are saying and-and-and that makes a lot of sense but can I just say one more thing?  Look how pretty!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Let's see.  Oh my God! Oh... But no! No! You can't-you can't hire him, because that-it's not professional. Umm, this is for me  yes? Thanks.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay you are right. I'll hire Hilda tomorrow. Dumb old perfect for the job Hilda!

name: chandler
dialogue: Let me see this guy.  W-H-Wow! Don't show this to Monica! And don't tell her about the W-H-Wow!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Terry!

name: terry

dialogue: Everybody has to audition.

name: terry
dialogue: I'm sorry Joey that is...that is the way it is.

name: joey
dialogue: Well. I guess you think you are pretty special huh? Sitting' up here in your fancy small hall building. Makin' stars jump through hoops for you, huh? Well you know what?  This is one star who's hoop... This is a star that the hoop-this hoop-I was Dr. Drake Ramoray!

dialogue: Hi! Tag. What are you doing here?

dialogue: Look, okay-okay I had food poisoning! It's not like I choose to do it! It's not like-It's not like I said, "Umm, what would make this ride more fun?!"

Now, I know what you are thinking, Chandler's not the type of guy who just goes to bars and makes out with girls, and you are right, Chandler's not the type of guy who just goes to bars and makes out with...girls.

dialogue: Hello?  Oh hey! Can you, can you hang on a second?  It's the producers over at Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E. can you excuse me for a minute?  Hey, funny you should call. I was just looking over next week's script.  Cancelled?!  Like they're taking it off the air?  OH.  All right, see you Monday.  We're not even shooting' them anymore?!!  All right, bye!  They cancelled Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E!

What is the matter with your face?! I mean this picture is supposed to say "Geller and Bing to be married," not "Local woman saves drowning moron!"  Hey! Don't laugh at him! He's my drowning moron!
