dialogue: No! You know what? No! No! You thing was so stupid anyway, this was ridiculous-We're going to flip a coin!  All right?!  Heads!

name: phoebe
dialogue: The coins have finally forgiven me!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well you know what? I hope Monica forgives you after you throw her, her vegetarian, voodoo, goddess circley shower!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rach, it's going to be okay!  You guys are the best!

name: joey
dialogue: Boy I tell you, that judging stuff took a lot out of me.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! I was thinking about maybe going upstairs and taking a little nap on my couch.

name: ross
dialogue: Why-why would I care about that?

name: joey
dialogue: No reason, I'm just saying that uh... that is where I'll be.

name: chandler
dialogue: As bad as that went I actually enjoyed myself. I think that I'm going to apologize for all of the stupid things I do.

name: monica
dialogue: Why don't you just stop doing stupid things? Then you wouldn't have to apologize.

name: chandler
dialogue: I would really love it if could do both.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, I...I have to ask.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: Are you going to break up with me if I get fat again?

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, you broke up with Julie Grath! How much weight could she have gained?

name: chandler
dialogue: A hundred and forty-five pounds.

name: monica
dialogue: In one year?! My God what did she eat? Her-her family! that is not the point.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look I know it was a stupid reason to break up with somebody, but I was 15!

name: monica
dialogue: Well... that is not the only time this was an issue. You remember when umm, you spent Thanksgiving with us? You called me fat.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. Okay, now wait a minute that was totally different.

name: monica
dialogue: How?

name: chandler
dialogue: You were not supposed to hear that! I said that behind you back!

name: monica
dialogue: What if I have babies, okay? I mean I'm going to look different. I'm okay with that, but I'm not sure that you are!

name: chandler
dialogue: Look you have to realize I don't think of you as a thin, beautiful woman.  See this is one of things that I can apologize for later! Look, what I mean is you are Monica! Okay? And I am in love with Monica.

name: monica
dialogue: Keep going.

name: chandler
dialogue: So you can balloon up or you can shrink down and I will still love you.

name: monica
dialogue: Even if I shrink down to two inches tall?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'd carry you around in my pocket.

name: monica
dialogue: I love you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Skidmark's still got a way with the ladies.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi Pheebs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! I just want to apologize. I'm really sorry I was a baby.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is ridiculous Rachel, we were all babies once.  Oh, you mean today.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah. Yeah, and you know you-you deserve to win. And-and you know I was thinking about it, if-if you are Monica's maid of honour that means I get to be yours.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! Oh, umm when-when Monica and Chandler got engaged I started putting some stuff together, you know just in case...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh that is so sweet thanks.

name: rachel
dialogue: Here is a book of poetry that I know Monica loves. And-and oh God this is funny, look, this is a picture of one Halloween where she dressed up as a bride.  And look, she made me carry her train, which was weird because I was Wonder Woman. Oh and here's a little purse that I found. you know I just thought that maybe they could hold the rings in there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH.

name: rachel
dialogue: And umm, vintage handkerchiefs you know Because, people cry at weddings.  I'm just going to grab a couple of these.

name: phoebe
dialogue: This stuff is great!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I forgot this was in here. Umm, this was the uh garter that I was saving for my wedding and I wanted it to be Monica's something borrowed and it's blue.  Yeah...

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know Rach, I think that, I think you should be Monica's made of honour.

name: rachel
dialogue: You do? Why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Because I think it means more to you.

name: rachel
dialogue: But Pheebs, you know you earned it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Its fine. I mean, this is something that you've been thinking about since you were what, 14?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I was ten. I just developed early.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Man alive!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, what's going on?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, we just decided that Rachel is going to be your maid of honour.

name: monica
dialogue: OH, wow! that is great!  Oh wow! We really have to start planning! I have, I have a lot of really specific ideas! We should probably get together like four times per week. You can come over to my place; we'll get together before work! What do you say, 6

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah okay, you laugh now, but she's going to be yours.

name: joey
dialogue: Great nap.

name: ross
dialogue: It really was.

name: joey
dialogue: Dude! What the hell are you doing?! God!

name: ross
dialogue: Excuse me.

name: joey
dialogue: Morning!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Oh, how was your date last night?

name: joey
dialogue: Pretty good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh good.  Ah! My God, sorry!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, really good. Anyway I got to go; I'm late for work.

name: rachel
dialogue: What-what?! you are going to leave this person with me?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah-Hey, don't worry, she's a terrific girl. And hey listen, could you do me a favour? When she comes out could you just mention that I'm not looking for a serious relationship; that'd be great.

name: rachel
dialogue: Why?! What?! Are you kidding?!

name: joey
dialogue: Just casually slip it in, you know lay the groundwork. Tell her uh, I'm a loner-No! An outlaw! Tell her she doesn't want to get mixed up with the likes of me.

name: rachel
dialogue: You know what? that is a lot to remember, can't I just tell her you are a pig?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, I'm going to call her later! Honest! Oh come on, Chandler used to do it! He'd even make the girl pancakes! Plus, he'd make extras and leave them for me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well forget it, I'm not telling that girl anything. That is not my responsibility.

name: joey
dialogue: Fine!  Now, where'd we land on those pancakes?

name: erin
dialogue: Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: erin
dialogue: Sorry about that, but I couldn't get that lock to work on the door.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, Joey kind of disabled it when I moved in.

name: erin
dialogue: You must be Rachel, I'm Erin.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: erin
dialogue: Hi. I don't mean this to sound like high school, but did he say anything about me?

name: rachel
dialogue: Would you like some pancakes?

name: chandler
dialogue: ...Come on! Why are we here?!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, okay take a guess.

name: chandler
dialogue: The hot chicks?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, okay, I was typing names into the library computer earlier, you know-You know for fun, and I typed mine in and guess what came up? My doctoral dissertation! It's here! Yeah, it's right-it's right down here! In the biggest library in the university!

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow that is actually pretty cool.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh umm, there's also a book here by a woman named Wendy Bagina.  What is that?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sounds like two people are really enjoying the Dewey decimal system.

name: female student
dialogue: I'm so sorry!

name: male student
dialogue: Sorry!

name: chandler
dialogue: You didn't bring me here to do that, did you?

name: monica
dialogue: She sent the chicken back again?!

name: the waitress
dialogue: She says it's to dry now and she wants to come back here and explain to you exactly how she wants it.

name: monica
dialogue: Well fine! I want to meet this chicken expert! Send the Colonel in!

name: the colonel
dialogue: OH...MY...GAWD!!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Lucky bastard!  Janice.

name: janice
dialogue: How are you Ms. Hot Shot chef with the big fancy restaurant with the best chicken ever!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm fine.

name: janice
dialogue: OH! What is that on your finger?! I'm blind!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh... Uh...

name: janice
dialogue: So, who's the lucky guy?

name: chandler
dialogue: OH...MY...GAWD! I am so sorry sweetie, are you okay? You didn't tell her we were getting married, did you?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, she saw the ring.

name: chandler
dialogue: Did she freak out?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, she was shocked when I told her, but then again so were most people.

name: chandler
dialogue: Right.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, she actually has a boyfriend you know herself, named Clark. Uh, she also kind of invited herself to our wedding. Clark too.

name: chandler
dialogue: You said no right?

name: monica
dialogue: Huh?

name: chandler
dialogue: You said no right?!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, she corned me! She asked if the wedding was in town! I mean, what was I supposed to do?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Lie!!! How hard is that?! The check's in the mail! Oh your baby is so cute! I can't wait to read your book Ross!!

name: monica
dialogue: Come on! So she comes to the wedding! I mean it won't be so bad.

name: chandler
dialogue: What do you think she's just going to sit there quietly? You don't think she's going to want to make a toast? You don't think she's going to want to grab the microphone and sing Part-time Lover?!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, she's not going to like the chicken that night either is she?!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know what? It's going to be okay. You know what? She's probably not going to even want to come.

name: monica
dialogue: Really?

name: chandler
dialogue: No! That was a lie! See how easy that was?

name: monica
dialogue: So-so you would've just lied?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes!!

name: monica
dialogue: Would it really have been that easy?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Good, so do it Saturday night because we're going to dinner with her and Clark.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! What's up?

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey-hey, who's your friend?  Hey!!

name: erin
dialogue: Hey Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Erin! Still here!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, we ended up spending the day together and had such a great time!

name: joey
dialogue: Why wouldn't you? Erin is great! Then-then there's you guys.

name: erin
dialogue: OH, listen. I've got to get going. Today was great, thanks!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay!

name: erin
dialogue: Bye Joey.  Last night was fun.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. I'll uh, I'll call you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh and I'll call you too!

name: erin
dialogue: Or I'll call you!

name: phoebe
dialogue: And call me!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, good to see you again.

name: erin
dialogue: Bye.

name: joey
dialogue: Bye-bye.

name: rachel
dialogue: Bye!

name: joey
dialogue: So, system kind of broke down huh?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Joey, I'm sorry I just couldn't tell her all those things you wanted me to tell her. And you know we got to talking and I...

name: phoebe
dialogue: We want you to marry her!

name: joey
dialogue: What?!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: She is so amazing! You have no idea.

name: joey
dialogue: No idea? Who do you think brought her here?

name: rachel
dialogue: Cupid.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Joey, she's so cool. She speaks four languages.

name: joey
dialogue: Man, do you know what guys want!

name: rachel
dialogue: Look Joey, come on she's so perfect for you! I mean she's sweet, she-she likes baseball, and she-she had two beers at lunch.

name: joey
dialogue: My beers?! Look you guys, she's a very nice girl. Okay? We had a good time, but I just-I don't see it going anywhere.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but you always say that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, maybe if you gave this girl a chance it would go somewhere.

name: joey
dialogue: Look I'm sorry you guys, I-I just don't think so.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Whatever.

name: rachel
dialogue: Fine.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, don't start judging me!  Huh? you are the one who's in love with her assistant!  Huh? And you, you are the one having the affair with the guy who keeps the pigeons on the roof!

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Secret affair!

name: ross
dialogue: People are doing it in front of my book!

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm sorry?

name: ross
dialogue: My doctoral dissertation is in the library at school, I went to see it, and there were students making' babies right in the middle of the Palaeontology section!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! Did you get to see anything good?

name: ross
dialogue: Let me ask you something, at your school was there a like uh a place on campus where students went to uh, fool around.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, there was. It was-there the corner of the library where-where all these dusty books that nobody ever read-Yes, there was.

name: ross
dialogue: Great! Because people kept showing up, I think it's like uh-a thing!

name: joey
dialogue: Now hold on a second, fifth floor against that back wall?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh for crying' out loud!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, so we should go catch our movie.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well now what's the rush?

name: joey
dialogue: I like to see the previews.  The candy.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh. Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well look who's here!

name: erin
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: erin
dialogue: Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Erin.

name: erin
dialogue: Hey Rachel.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Well, we were just about to take off and see a movie. Oh no!

name: erin
dialogue: What's wrong?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Phoebe, we forgot that party we have to go to.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no.

name: joey
dialogue: What party?

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: A birthday party.

name: joey
dialogue: Who's birthday party?

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: Allison's birthday party.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, and how is Allison?

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait a minute! Why don't you guys do something?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, look how that worked out.

name: ross
dialogue: Excuse me. Hi, I'm a professor here. Do you know the Palaeontology section, fifth floor, stack 437?

name: the librarian
dialogue: Well, yes! Just give me five minutes, I just have to find someone to cover my shift.

name: ross
dialogue: No! No!! No! Can I speak to someone in charge please?!

name: the head librarian
dialogue: How can I help you?

name: ross
dialogue: Hi, I was wondering if it is possible to increase security in the Palaeontology section? See I-I wrote a book up there and instead of reading it people are-are-are well, rolling around in front of it.

name: the head librarian
dialogue: We are aware of the problem you are referring too.  But as far as increasing security, I'm afraid the library is very understaffed. I, I can't help you.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, fine. Fine! If-if I'm the only person with any appreciation of the sanctity of the written word, I'll go up there and defend it myself!  And don't you follow me!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: How did it go with Erin?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, unbelievable! We had the best time!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yay!! Oh so, you are not, you are not mad at us anymore?

name: joey
dialogue: No! No! No! You guys were totally right! This is so much better than the first time we went out. You know? That was so awkward, we were really nervous.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Didn't you sleep together?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah that really calms me down. And! We have so much in common! She loves sandwiches, sports, although she is a Met fan, not much of an issue now but if were ever to have kids, well that is a...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! Listen to you talking' about having kids. Oh my Joey.  Oh, please don't get married before I do.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: janice
dialogue: Oh. Oh I just cannot believe Clark stood me up!

name: monica
dialogue: He might still show up.

name: janice
dialogue: Oh, what are you, stupid? It's been three hours.

name: monica
dialogue: Is that all?

name: janice
dialogue: I should just go on to happier things, okay? Umm, why don't you tell about your lovely wedding?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well actually uh, there was something we wanted to tell you about the wedding. Um, it's going to be a small ceremony. Uh, tiny! We're not even sure why we're having it.

name: monica
dialogue: It's actually going to be just family.

name: janice
dialogue: Oh...wait...you two think of me as family?! Oh, I have to ask you something now and be honest; do you want me to sing Careless Whisper or Lady In Red?

name: joey
dialogue: How can you say that?! The Mets have no closer!

name: erin
dialogue: What about Benitez?

name: joey
dialogue: What about Game 1 of the Series?

name: erin
dialogue: What about shut up?

name: joey
dialogue: You shut up!  I love arguing with her.  I'll be right back.

name: erin
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: So how's it going' with Joey?

name: erin
dialogue: Uh, okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay? Wait okay, tell-tell me that you like him, please? I mean tell me that you like him.

name: erin
dialogue: Look, he's a really great guy and I know that you really want this to work out, but I just don't see this having a future.

name: rachel
dialogue: But you said that you liked him! I mean what happened?! Did you just change your mind?!

name: erin
dialogue: kind of.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Then change it back!

name: erin
dialogue: I'm sorry I... It's just there's no real spark.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No spark? Didn't you sleep together?

name: erin
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh, tramp!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Does Joey have any idea?

name: erin
dialogue: I really don't think he does. And you know what? Maybe you guys could help clue him in. you know, tell him I'm-I'm not interested in a serious relationship or something.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, you mean like that you are kind of a loner.

name: erin
dialogue: Yeah! That would be great!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, and maybe that you are a real

name: erin
dialogue: I'm sorry?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh well, I guess Italian isn't one of the four languages you speak.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! You want to go?

name: erin
dialogue: Yeah, let's go.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. See you guys later.

name: erin
dialogue: Bye guys.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, see you.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, thank you so much.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow. Well, I guess it was Cupid who brought her here.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, just a regular old flying dwarf.

name: ross
dialogue: Yes? Yes?! How can I help you?

name: guy
dialogue: Yeah, we were...we were just looking around.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh-oh, you are-you are fellow scholars. What exactly were you looking for, hmm? Perhaps,  perhaps Dr. Chester Stock's musings on the Smiledon Californicus?

name: guy
dialogue: Uhh....

name: ross
dialogue: Ah... Ah...Get out of here!  Uh, meeting someone? Or-or are you just here to brush up on Marion's views on evolution?

name: woman
dialogue: Uh, actually I find Marion's views far to progressionist.

name: ross
dialogue: I find Marion's views far to progressionist.

name: woman
dialogue: I'm sorry, who are you?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm a professor here uh, Ross...Geller.

name: woman
dialogue: Ross Geller, why do I know that name? It's uh-Wait!  Did you write this?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes! you are the person who checked out my book?!

name: woman
dialogue: You know, you look nothing like I would've thought. you are...you are so young.

name: ross
dialogue: Well I uh, I skipped forth grade.

name: ross
dialogue: I am very...very sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So how was, how was your date?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, it was great! I mean we walked all around the village. We went to this ice cream place, split a milkshake, 70/30 but still... And guess what, I'm thinking about taking her upstate to one of those bed and breakfasts.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh really? She said she wants to go away with you?

name: joey
dialogue: No-no-no-no-no! It's a surprise, but it's going to be tricky thought because she said she was going to be pretty busy at work for a while.

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: Oh no, yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Jo-Joey, look honey we-we need to talk okay? Umm, I kind of got the feeling from her today that uh, she's not looking' for a serious relationship.

name: joey
dialogue: Where are you getting' this?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, she told me. She said she's kind of a loner.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh. Oh.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey...

name: joey
dialogue: No hey Rach, it's cool okay? You know I'm a loner too!  Right?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey Joey, you know what? You are way to good for her.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah and honey I promise next time that I will just say good-bye and tell them you are not looking for a relationship.

name: joey
dialogue: No! No. Don't do that, just next time make sure she really likes me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well that too.  Joey?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you want some pancakes?

name: joey
dialogue: Finally!

name: monica
dialogue: What are we going to do?

name: chandler
dialogue: I say we go with Careless Whisper.

name: janice
dialogue: Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Did she see us yet? Did she see us?

name: monica
dialogue: Janice, what umm, what are you doing here?

name: janice
dialogue: Well umm, I thought I was going to go back to my apartment but then I just felt I couldn't really be alone tonight.  I was wondering if I could maybe stay here with you, just I really feel that I need to be with family.

name: monica
dialogue: Our kids are going to call her Aunt Janice aren't they?

name: janice
dialogue: Please, it's because otherwise I really don't know what I might do.

name: chandler
dialogue: Aren't you just a tinsy bit curious?

name: janice
dialogue: Do you have any tissues?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, in-in-in the bathroom.

name: janice
dialogue: Okay!

name: monica
dialogue: We'll just...we'll just let her stay.

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no-no-no, if we let her stay, she will stay forever!

name: monica
dialogue: kind of like your Barca lounger.

name: chandler
dialogue: Is that what you are thinking about right now?

name: monica
dialogue: I never stop thinking about it.

name: janice
dialogue: Hey you guys, umm do either one of you want to get in there before I take my bath.

name: chandler
dialogue: Janice, I'm sorry but umm, you can't stay here tonight.

name: janice
dialogue: Why not?

name: chandler
dialogue: Honestly? Our apartment is a hotbed for electromagnetic activity. Now Monica and I have been immunized, but sadly you have not.

name: janice
dialogue: Okay, I'm going to need a comforter, but did you have a hypoallergenic one because otherwise I get very nasal.  Do you have a cat? Because it's already happening.  Do you hear that?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! Oh my God! You have to go!

name: janice
dialogue: Why?

name: monica
dialogue: Because Chandler still has feelings for you!

name: janice
dialogue: He does?

name: chandler
dialogue: Say again?

name: monica
dialogue: that is right. that is right. And that is why you can't stay here tonight. And probably why you shouldn't come to the wedding.

name: chandler
dialogue: Feelings, such strong feelings.

name: monica
dialogue: I mean, I realize that his feelings may never completely go away, but you can.

name: janice
dialogue: Oh...my Gawd, I-I understand. I-I am so sorry, I'll go.  Good-bye Monica , I wish you a lifetime of happiness with him. Chandler,  you call me when this goes in the pooper.

name: ross
dialogue: Don't sweat it, I've got this section covered. Yeah, in fact I've got this little baby  to shine in people's eye--Okay, see you later.

name: chandler
dialogue: I just wanted to show Monica your book.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey everybody! Happy Thanksgiving!

name: chandler
dialogue: No, no, no. No-no-no.

name: joey, rachel, and phoebe
dialogue: Shh!

name: ross
dialogue: What, are we keeping Thanksgiving a secret this year?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, we're playing this game I learned at work. You have to name all the states in six minutes.

name: ross
dialogue: What? that is like insanely easy!

name: chandler
dialogue: Now, that is a lot harder than it sounds. You always forget at least one, or in some cases... fourteen .

name: monica
dialogue: It's a stupid game and I wasn't playing against other people, so technically I didn't lose.

name: ross
dialogue: What? You forgot fourteen states?

name: monica
dialogue: Nobody cares about the Dakotas.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, okay, time's up!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, I got 48.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh that is not bad, Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I got tired of naming states. So I decided to list the types of celery, and I have one

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, so Rachel's got 48 and Phoebe has the lead in...vegetables, Joey?

name: joey
dialogue: Say hello to the new champ of Chandler's dumb states game.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow, how many have you got?

name: joey
dialogue: Fifty-six!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! How is New England not a state? Huh? They have a sports-team!

name: chandler
dialogue: Does South Oregon have a sports-team?  There you go.

name: rachel
dialogue: How come we have one extra place setting?

name: monica
dialogue: because you invited your assistant.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, right. Sorry. But Tag's not coming; his girlfriend came into town, so he's spending Thanksgiving with her.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh! Why didn't you tell me? I made him his own individual sweet potato stuffed pumpkin.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I was going to, but then I figured, you know... you are food is so delicious and perfect, you can never have too many of those pumpkin things.

name: monica
dialogue: Now you think I wouldn't enjoy that, because it is so fake,  but I still do.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Regular Celery!  Oh, I already have that.

name: ross
dialogue: Done! With time a-to-spare.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh that may be a New World's record

name: ross
dialogue: You know, I hate to lecture you guys, but it's kind of disgraceful, that a group of well-educated adults and Joey can't name all the states. Did you ever see a map, or one of those round, colourful things called "a globe?" Hmm?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, Magellan? You got 46 states.

name: ross
dialogue: What? that is impossible.

name: joey
dialogue: 46. Wow! Who's well educated now, Mr. I-forgot-ten-states?

name: monica
dialogue: All right, I'm out of oven space. I'm going to turn on Joey's. Please, watch him! Do not let Joey eat any of the food!

name: chandler
dialogue: I am only one man!  Okay Ross, time is up!

name: ross
dialogue: No, just give me another minute.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look Ross, if you don't know them by now, you will never know them, okay? That is the beauty of this game. It makes you want to kill yourself.

name: ross
dialogue: This-this is crazy! I can do this! All right, uhh, I bet I can get all 50 before dinner.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, but if you can't...no dinner!

name: ross
dialogue: you are on!

name: joey
dialogue: All right. Don't look at my list, Ross, Because there's a lot on there that you don't have.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, did you guys know, that your oven doesn't work?

name: joey
dialogue: But the drawer full of take-out menus is okay, right?

name: monica
dialogue: Ross, I'm going to use yours, okay?

name: ross
dialogue: Pshhshhh!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler? Can you give me a hand?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure, and Joey; do not let Ross look at any of the maps or the globe in your apartment.

name: joey
dialogue: Don't worry, Chandler, it's not a globe of the United States.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey you guys I'm going to go out and take a walk.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, why is your bag moving?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, it's not!

name: rachel
dialogue: Seriously, it's moving!

name: joey
dialogue: What the hell is in there?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's just my knitting that is all!  Yes! I knit this. I'm very good.

name: monica
dialogue: Ross's apartment is nice! How come we don't hang out here more often?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know. Maybe it's because it smells a little weird. It's like old pumpkins or something.

name: monica
dialogue: that is my pie!

name: chandler
dialogue: Which smells delicious!

name: monica
dialogue: Uh-oh! Uh-oh!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: We left Joey alone with the food!  Yep! Yep, I knew it! There he is... feeding stuffing to a dog!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi Geller-Bing residence. How can I help?

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, why is there a dog in our apartment?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm sorry, who's this?

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, there's a dog sitting on my couch!

name: chandler
dialogue: Tell her, I'm allergic, and I will sue!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, there's no dog here?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes there is! He's black and white and shaggy and he's sitting next to Rachel and licking Rachel's hand.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my god! Where are you?

name: monica
dialogue: I'll be right there!

name: phoebe
dialogue: They're here already? How are they doing this?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi Tag! What are you doing here?

name: tag
dialogue: I, uh, wanted to see if your offer to spend Thanksgiving with you is still good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, sure! Come in!  Well, what-what happened to your girlfriend?

name: tag
dialogue: We kind of broke up this morning.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry.

name: tag
dialogue: Yeah, so she went back to Ohio.

name: ross
dialogue: Ohio!! Thank you!

name: chandler
dialogue: Huh! Where is the dog?!

name: ross
dialogue: What dog? There-there's no dog here.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah that dog left!

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe! Phoebe, open up!

name: phoebe
dialogue: There's no dog in here.

name: chandler
dialogue: Phoebe, we can hear the dog barking!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No that is just me coughing!  Oh, good, there you are! Listen, um, I have a dog in my room.

name: chandler
dialogue: What is it doing here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I'm watching it for some friends who went out of town. Wait.  Hello, my name is Clunkers. May I please stay with you nice people?

name: monica
dialogue: Ooh, I wish she could stay here, but Chandler is allergic!

name: chandler
dialogue: Extremely allergic, okay? If I'm anywhere near a dog for more than 5 minutes, my throat will just close up!

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is odd, Because this dog's been living here for the past 3 days

name: chandler
dialogue: Really?

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, if that dog's been here that long, and you haven't had a reaction, maybe you are not allergic to this dog?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, it still has to go, right?

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: Why?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, it's um...

name: joey
dialogue: Don't do it!

name: monica
dialogue: Don't do what?

name: chandler
dialogue: I have to! Okay? It's time!  Okay, I hate dogs.

name: all
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are you crazy?

name: ross
dialogue: Are you out of your mind?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why?

name: joey
dialogue: Told you.

name: chandler
dialogue: They are needy, they are jumpy, and you can't tell what they are thinking, and that scares me a little bit.

name: ross
dialogue: Right, they are scary.  Ahh, she just ate a treat out of my hand!!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait a minute. Do you not like all dogs? I mean, not even puppies?

name: chandler
dialogue: Is there a puppy here?

name: tag
dialogue: You don't like puppies?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, you are new!

name: joey
dialogue: Look, Chandler, I told you, never tell anyone about this dog thing. It's like Ross not likin' ice cream.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You don't like ice cream?

name: ross
dialogue: It's too cold.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, it's just that dogs make me a little uncomfortable.

name: ross
dialogue: It hurts my teeth.

name: chandler
dialogue: And I don't want to say this, I don't you guys to hate me, but uh, I don't think, I can be around that dog anymore. Okay, so either the dog goes, or I go.  Oh my god!!

name: ross
dialogue: How can I not get this? I'm a college professor; I got 1450 on my S.A.T.s.

name: ross
dialogue: Damn, I forgot you were here.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right. We're going to take Clunkers to Ross's. We'll be back in a minute.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, wait before you guys go, can I just ask you a question?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: When a guy breaks up with his girlfriend, what is an appropriate amount of time to wait before you make a move?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I'd say about a month.

name: monica
dialogue: Really? I'd say 3 to 4.

name: joey
dialogue: Half hour.

name: rachel
dialogue: Interesting.

name: monica
dialogue: When it's your assistant, I would say never.

name: joey
dialogue: All right, Rach, the big question is, does he like you? All right? Because if he doesn't like you, this is all a moo-point.

name: rachel
dialogue: Huh. A moo-point?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, it's like a cow's opinion. It just doesn't matter. It's moo.

name: rachel
dialogue: Have I been living with him for too long, or did that all just make sense?

name: monica
dialogue: Please, don't listen to Joey, okay. Would you look at him? He-he's obviously depressed. He's away from his family; he's spending Thanksgiving with strangers.   What he needs right now is for you to be his friend.

name: rachel
dialogue: you are right, I'm sorry. Thank you. Okay, that is what I'm going to do.

name: joey
dialogue: Fine! Take their advice. No one ever listens to me. When the package is this pretty, no one cares what's inside.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: tag
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: How are you holding up?

name: tag
dialogue: Not bad.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah? I'm sorry about your girlfriend.

name: tag
dialogue: Thanks.

name: rachel
dialogue: So were you guys together a long time?

name: tag
dialogue: A year. On and off. I kind of thought we'd end up together. I don't anymore.

name: rachel
dialogue: Now that she broke up with you?

name: tag
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah. Hmm.

name: tag
dialogue: It's weird. I always used to assume, that I would meet someone and fall in love and be happy and all that was just a given. But lately it's like what if it's not. Do you ever have that feeling?

name: rachel
dialogue: No...Yeah, all the time, constantly. It's terrifying. But you know that I figure it...it has to work out.

name: tag
dialogue: Why?

name: rachel
dialogue: Because, uh-it has to.

name: tag
dialogue: You have all the answers, don't you?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I know, I do. I really do.

name: tag
dialogue: Hey, thanks for talking to me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, what is a boss for? Hug it out!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, he likes you back! Huh? Told you, you should go for it!

name: tag
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Street noise drowned any of that out?  No, all right, I see you later, okay...

name: tag
dialogue: What did Joey say? I like you back?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh, yeah, well, see, he... Joey knows, that I'm-I'm very insecure about my back and, and...you are hugging me, so obviously you are not repulsed by it, yeah!

name: tag
dialogue: Wait-wait a minute; that doesn't make any sense.

name: rachel
dialogue: No?  All right, here's the truth um, Joey said what he said, because um, I'm attracted to you.

name: tag
dialogue: Wow.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, I admit it. I have a crush on you, and uh, and, and I know that is crazy because we work together, and-and nothing could ever happen, and the last thing I want to do is-is to freak you out or make you feel uncomfortable. Which is why it would be really great if you said something right about now.

name: tag
dialogue: Oh my god! Those guys are stealing my car!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: tag
dialogue: Right there! that is my car!  Hey!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, that is going to take them a minute. Do you have anything else you want to get off your chest?

name: tag
dialogue: I can't believe this!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait, we still have time to talk and they're-they're not even in the car yet!  Oh look, there they go, okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay Phoebe, we should probably go back now.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Please don't leave me, I'll be lonely.

name: monica
dialogue: Stop it. Stop! Okay let's go. We can be strong.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my god! Did you hear that? She said Monica!  Ooh, I can't leave her!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know if you want, we can sneak the dog back in and Chandler wouldn't even know.

name: monica
dialogue: that is not going to work.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I've had that dog there for three days and Chandler had no idea. He's not so smart.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! I didn't know either.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but you kind of knew that something was going on, didn't you?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, I knew.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Where's Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Here I am.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wash your hands!!!

name: chandler
dialogue: How did you...know?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! What's she doing back here?

name: monica
dialogue: Relax, Ross. She's not made of ice cream!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey look, Phoebe. I, uh, I laid out the states geographically...

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, no, we don't really have time for this right now. Okay, we have to keep Chandler away from my bedroom.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, but, but look what I'm...

name: phoebe
dialogue: See, this is exactly what we do not have time for.

name: chandler
dialogue: Where's Monica?

name: ross
dialogue: Um, in Phoebe's room. You can't go in there.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why not?

name: ross
dialogue: Monica's crying. She's very upset about this whole Clunkers thing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I, I should go in there.

name: ross
dialogue: No. No, no. She doesn't want to see you right now.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why not?

name: ross
dialogue: Because you sent away the dog!

name: chandler
dialogue: This is ridiculous.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, is it? Is it? Look, when Monica and I were kids, we had a dog named Rover. And, uh, one day, my dad decides, he doesn't like dogs. So Monica and her friend...Phyllis...take away the dog. And that was the last time we ever saw him. Don't you see? This is just like that. Only with a few details changed.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, I'm in my sweat pants. Bring on the food!  What's the matter?

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica's all upset, because I sent Clunkers away.

name: joey
dialogue: So? Bring the dog back, you are a hero.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I can be a hero, I could do that. I could, I could do... I, w-w-what if, what if it attacks me?

name: joey
dialogue: Chandler, it's like a big gerbil.

name: chandler
dialogue: And that doesn't scare you?

name: joey
dialogue: Ross, you need some help?

name: ross
dialogue: From you?  Yes, please!

name: joey
dialogue: First of all, Utah? Dude, you can't just make stuff up!

name: ross
dialogue: I hate America! When I finish this game, I swear I am moving.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Tag's still talking to the police.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, oh! Why, damnit, why did I open my mouth?  I have a crush on you; I am attracted to you.  Gee, I-I know that I freaked him out

name: joey
dialogue: If you said it like that, you probably did, yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, is Chandler here?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, no he went for a walk.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, but you cannot tell him... but look whose back!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh No-no-no-no-no-no-no! He went over to Ross' to bring the dog back here!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no, the dog's not going to be there!

name: joey
dialogue: You think?

name: monica
dialogue: Hi, honey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Please, please, please, don't be mad at me.

name: monica
dialogue: What? Why, why would...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Shh, wait and see. Maybe we will, maybe we won't.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, I went over to Ross' apartment to bring back Clunkers. You know, for you, and... I left the door open and she must have gotten out and I looked everywhere, all over the apartment, including the roof, which FYI Ross, one of your neighbours, growing weed. I couldn't find him, and I am so, so, so, sorry. But I do know where we could all go ease the pain.

name: phoebe
dialogue: We have good news, look whose back!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: chandler
dialogue: Clunkers?! Oh my god!

name: monica
dialogue: that is right, she came back all by herself.

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's a Thanksgiving miracle!

name: chandler
dialogue: It is so good to see you!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, she came all the way back from Ross' building. Oh, the things she must have seen! And then she climbed up the fire escape and she tapped on the window with her teeny little paw and then we ran to let her in... I went to far, didn't I? When should I have stopped?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, maybe this is so hard, because there aren't 50 states. Let me tell you something, I have 49 states, and there are no more! I-I think, I should be able to eat something.

name: chandler
dialogue: It's up to you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, hi! How are you doing?

name: tag
dialogue: I'm okay. I got to go down to the police station and look at mug shots.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

name: tag
dialogue: Thanks for having me over, you guys.

name: ross
dialogue: Tag? Y-you are going?  Uh we didn't, uh we didn't get the chance to talk. Uh, so, where did you say you are from again?

name: tag
dialogue: Colorado.

name: ross
dialogue: Ah, what good are you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Look, um, I think we should talk about what happened on the terrace.

name: tag
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ah, I-I never should have said what I said. It-You know what? It just doesn't matter how I feel. I mean we work together, so nothing could really ever happen between us, and what I would love is just to go to work on Monday, and-and never talk about this again, okay? Big day Monday lots to do. So, we're okay?

name: tag
dialogue: Um, I'm not.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, god, I know it, that I freaked you out.

name: tag
dialogue: No, you didn't. The only thing that freaked me out was you saying that nothing could ever happen between us.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?

name: tag
dialogue: Yeah, so, please don't fire me for doing this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, well, that is one less thing we have to do on Monday.

name: ross
dialogue: Delaware!  Delaware!

name: chandler
dialogue: All right.

name: ross
dialogue: I want my turkey now!

name: chandler
dialogue: You got it.  You got Nevada twice.

name: ross
dialogue: I know.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ben
dialogue: I'm ready!

name: ross
dialogue: You sure?

name: ben
dialogue: Uh-huh!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, let me just straighten out your helmet there.

name: ben
dialogue: Thanks daddy.

name: ross
dialogue: No-no, one daddy, two mommies. All right, it's all yours.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: Yes! Yes! Yes!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: His first big kid's bike, this is so exciting!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh yeah, I remember mine! OH, it was my sixth birthday, my dad took me to the park, I got it, and...it bent.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I never had a bike of my own.

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, we didn't have a lot of money. But the girl across the street had the best bike! It was pink and it had rainbow coloured tassels hanging off the handle grips, and-and-and a bell and this big, white wicker basket with those plastic daisies stuck on.

name: chandler
dialogue: That sounds like my first bike.  My dad gave me his old one.

name: ross
dialogue: OH.

name: monica
dialogue: Did the girl ever let you ride it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! But she gave me the box that it came in. It had a picture of the bike on the front.  So I would sit on it and my step-dad would drag me around the backyard.

name: ross
dialogue: That is so unfair!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Not really, I got to drag him around too!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! What are you guys doing?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Making holiday candy for the neighbours.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm sorry, who?

name: monica
dialogue: I'm going to hang this basket  on the door and when the neighbours walk by they can all take a piece.

name: chandler
dialogue: But we don't know the neighbours.

name: joey
dialogue: I do. There's uh, let's see, Guy With a Moustache, Smokes-A-Lot Lady, Some Kids I've Seen, and A Red-haired Guy Who Does Not Like To Be Called Rusty.

name: monica
dialogue: See? This is exactly why I'm making this candy. We can learn their names and get to know our neighbours.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wouldn't it be easier if we just moved?

name: rachel
dialogue: Good morning!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Eh, somebody's in a good mood!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, why shouldn't I be? I have great friends! I have a wonderful job!

name: monica
dialogue: Where you can make out with your assistant.

name: rachel
dialogue: Come on, it's not a big deal! We stayed up all night coming up with a plan so that us dating will not be a problem.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh yeah, what's the plan?

name: rachel
dialogue: We... We are not... ...going to let it... be a problem.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! It took you all night to come up with that plan?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well you know, we did other stuff too.

name: monica
dialogue: Did you two...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Monica come on, you know I don't sleep with guys on the first date!

name: monica
dialogue: Matt Guire, Mark Lynn, Ben Wire...

name: rachel
dialogue: Anymore!!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi. Tag, I have a conference call today is that correct?

name: tag
dialogue: Yes, at 4

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, thank you. That'll be all.   Wait! Wait!  Did you see that? That mail guy had no idea there was something going on between us.

name: tag
dialogue: I'd better get back to my desk.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you hard worker! I'll remember to put that in your evaluation.

name: tag
dialogue: My what?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you've been here for two months now and your boss is required to hand in a performance evaluation. But you know, there is one thing that I have yet to evaluate.

name: tag
dialogue: Are you serious?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I've just always wanted to do that. Can you help me clean this up?

name: monica
dialogue: The basket is totally empty! My God, the neighbours ate all the candy!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, either that or uh...

name: monica
dialogue: Joey!!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah?

name: monica
dialogue: Did you eat all the neighbour candy?!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh well yeah, that was the plan, but by the time I got to it there was only a couple of pieces left!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, and they've been coming by all day. They love it!

name: monica
dialogue: They love my candy? Oh man!!! I've got to go make more!!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Mon, you might want to make some more lasagna too, because something might've happened to a huge chunk of it.

name: monica
dialogue: Ross! The neighbours ate all my candy!!

name: ross
dialogue: Mine stole my newspaper! It's like a crime wave!!  Pheebs, you uh, you got a second.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, ever since you uh, told me that story about that bike I-I couldn't stop thinking about it. I mean, everyone should have a-a first bike, so...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God Ross!!

name: ross
dialogue: You like it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I love it!!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH!! OH!! And I love you!

name: ross
dialogue: Ahh.

name: phoebe

dialogue: All right. If you care enough to make up that load of crap, okay.

dialogue: Okay, I think we can get the evaluation back before they see it, but we're going to have to get into Mr. Zelner's office. Now, he doesn't get in until 10, so he's no problem, but his assistant, Betty, she comes in early to eat her breakfast at her desk.

She was making candy so she could try to get to know all of you, and I'll bet that not one of you can tell me her name! Am I right?

I'm sorry, but I'm not hanging all my hopes of Rachel and I living together on-on "Probably! "you know? You got to take care of yourselves!  In this world history teaches us nothing!

dialogue: I'm sorry. But not that sorry, Because you don't have to live with it. Um, we have a reservation under the name Chandler Bing.

dialogue: Yes, but also  Hanukkah! See, you are part Jewish, and-and Hanukkah is a Jewish holiday.

dialogue: Hm?

name: rachel
dialogue: Did you get all this stuff for Joey to try and drive me out of the apartment? Honey, if you wanted to do that, you might as well just gotten him a fish, you know how fish freaked me out!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Fish!

name: rachel
dialogue: It wouldn't have mattered anyway, Phoebe, you and I are, are going to live together, we're roommates; that is the deal.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes, but I wanted you to want to live with me, but okay, if you are having so much fun over here...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, it's so much more fun with you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: We did have fun, didn't we?

name: rachel
dialogue: We did!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, anyway, they say, if we want, we can see it tonight.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I would love to!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yay, okay!

name: rachel
dialogue: Good, good, good, good, good.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Great, all right, okay, and Monica ask me to make the drumming stop.

name: rachel
dialogue: Um...  Done!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: salesman
dialogue: Hello, Sir. you are here to return those pants?

name: ross
dialogue: No, these are my pants.

name: salesman
dialogue: Oh. Okay! How can I help you?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, uh, do you have a Santa-outfit left?

name: salesman
dialogue: Two days before Christmas? Sorry, man.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay look, do-do, you have anything Christmassy? I promised my son, and I really don't want to disappoint him, um, come on, I...uh, you got to have something.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm the holiday armadillo! I'm a friend of Santa's and he sent me here to wish you  a Merry Christmas!

name: monica
dialogue: What happened to Santa, Holiday Armadillo?

name: ross
dialogue: Santa was unavailable so close to Christmas.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow, come in, have a seat. You must be exhausted coming all the way from...Texas.

name: ben
dialogue: Texas?

name: ross
dialogue: that is right, Ben. I'm Santa's representative for all the southern states. And Mexico! But, Santa sent me here to give you these presents, Ben.  Maybe the Lady will help me with these presents.

name: ben
dialogue: Wow! Thanks!

name: ross
dialogue: you are welcome, Ben. Merry Christmas, ooh, and Happy Hanukkah!

name: ben
dialogue: Are you for Hanukkah, too? Because I'm part-Jewish.

name: ross
dialogue: You are? Me, too!

name: monica
dialogue: Because Armadillos also wandered in the desert?

name: ross
dialogue: You want to wander in the hall?  Ooh, hey Ben, what if the Holiday Armadillo told you all about the festival of lights?

name: ben
dialogue: Cool!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah!

name: monica
dialogue: Come on Ben.

name: ross
dialogue: Years and years ago there were these people called the Maccabees...

name: chandler
dialogue: Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!

name: ben
dialogue: Santa!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: What are you doing here, Santa?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I'm here to see my old buddy Ben. What are you doing here, weird...turtle-man?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm the Holiday Armadillo, your part-Jewish friend. You sent me here to give Ben some presents. Remember?

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: ben
dialogue: Did you bring me any presents, Santa?

name: chandler
dialogue: You bet I did, Ben, put it there!   Well, it would have worked this time, if his hands weren't so damn small!  Ho, ho, ho!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay Ben, why don't you come open some more presents, and Santa, the Armadillo, and I have a little talk in the kitchen? There's a sentence, I never thought I'd say.

name: ross
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: chandler
dialogue: You called everyone and said you were having trouble finding a Santa costume, so I borrowed one from a guy at work!

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you, but, but you got to leave.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why?

name: ross
dialogue: Because, I'm finally getting him excited about Hanukkah, and, and you are-you are wrecking it.

name: chandler
dialogue: But I didn't get to shape my belly like a bowl full of jelly.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm sorry, Chandler but this, this is really important to me.

name: chandler
dialogue: Fine, I'll give the suit back.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, you think, you can keep it another night?

name: chandler
dialogue: Santa? Really?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, is that okay?

name: chandler
dialogue: Did your Dad ever dress up like Santa?

name: monica
dialogue: No.

name: chandler
dialogue: Then it's okay!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay Ben, Santa has to go. Say good-bye!

name: ben
dialogue: No! Why does he have to go?

name: chandler
dialogue: Because, if Santa and the Holiday...Armadillo?  ...are ever in the same room for too long the universe will implode. Merry Christmas!

name: ben
dialogue: No! Why can't the Armadillo leave? I want Santa!

name: ross
dialogue: Fine, I-I give up. Santa, Santa can stay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I'll stay, but only because I want to hear about Hanukkah. Ben, will you sit here with Santa and learn about Hanukkah?

name: ben
dialogue: Okay, Santa!

name: ross
dialogue: All right, it's time for the story of Hanukkah. Years and years ago, there were these people called the Maccabees.

name: joey
dialogue: Merry Christmas!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wow! Look at this place!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, this is terrible. Oh, they've made so many changes I can't even feel my grandmother's presence anymore-Ooh! New sconces!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, remember uh, remember how you told me that your grandmother put up that wall to make that into two bedrooms?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: And remember how you always said you were afraid the landlord would find out and then tear it down?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you really not know where I'm going with this?  It left! It's one huge room!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no!   Oh! Wow!!!

name: rachel
dialogue: See?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I guess we'll just have to put the wall back up.

name: rachel
dialogue: You can't, because of the new skylight!

name: phoebe
dialogue: There's a skylight?!  Wow!!

name: rachel
dialogue: So what should we do? Should we start looking for a new place?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know I'm-I'm sensing that um, my grandmother would not be comfortable with that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah? Starting' to feel her again there are we?

name: phoebe
dialogue: A little bit, yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Pheebs is your grandmother maybe saying that you should live here alone?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You heard her too?! You have the gift!

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, it's okay. I like living with Joey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are you sure?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh please, I hate packing, it's closer to work, and we do have fun. Although, I'm really going to miss living with you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh me too.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know.  Oh-oh, wait did you hear that-hear that? Listen, I'm getting' something from your grandmother, she said that since you get to keep the one bedroom apartment you should give Rachel the purple chair?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I do not hear that.

name: ross
dialogue: ...and the miracle was that that little bit of oil that should've just lasted just one day, burned for...

name: ben
dialogue: Eight whole days.

name: ross
dialogue: that is right, and that is why we celebrate Hanukkah today. The end.

name: ben
dialogue: Awesome!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: chandler
dialogue: My favourite part was when Superman flew all the Jews out of Egypt.

name: ross
dialogue: The Armadillo was actually not so thrilled about that part! Okay Ben, it's time to light the Hanukkah candles!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! It looks like the Easter Bunny's funeral in here.

name: ross
dialogue: Come on, come on, we're-we're-we're lighting the candles!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, I understand why Superman is here, but why is there a porcupine at the Easter Bunny's funeral?

name: rachel
dialogue: I got it!

name: joey
dialogue: Is it back in the cage?

name: rachel
dialogue: Its back in cage!

name: joey
dialogue: Cage closed?

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, would you just come out here and stop being such a baby!

name: chandler
dialogue: OH. Mmm.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you have got to try this cheesecake.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, you know I'm not that much of a sweet tooth. I--Wow. My God, so creamy. Oh my God, this is the best cheesecake I have ever had. Where did you get this?

name: chandler
dialogue: It was at the front door. When I got home. Somebody sent it to us.

name: rachel
dialogue: Chandler, this is not addressed to you. This is addressed to Mrs. Braverman downstairs.  Thief.

name: chandler
dialogue: I-no! I didn't read the box before I opened it. And you can't return a box after you've opened the box.

name: rachel
dialogue: Why, why not?

name: chandler
dialogue: Because it's too delicious.

name: rachel
dialogue: Chandler, you stole this cheesecake. That is wrong.

name: chandler
dialogue: No-no-no! It is going to be okay, because Mrs. Braverman is going to send away for a free one and that way we all win! The only losers are the big cheesecake conglomerate,  Momma's Little Bakery.  I feel terrible, I'm a horrible, horrible, horrible person.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry what?

name: joey
dialogue: All right, I should get going, big day a work. You know I'm in a coma? Today, they do this test on me and it turns out I'm not brain dead.

name: chandler
dialogue: So...

name: joey
dialogue: Ah-ah-ah Mr. Smartie Pants, it's just not my character that is not brain dead. Hey, so Pheebs, we still on for tonight?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Absolutely!

name: joey
dialogue: I'll see you at 8

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, what's at 8

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I have dinner plans with Joey. We get together about once a month to discuss the rest of you guys.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow, did not know that! May I say how lovely you look today?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Duly noted.

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks.   Oh! So for tomorrow, do you want to rent a car and drive down together or what?

name: monica
dialogue: What are you talking about?

name: ross
dialogue: Cousin Frannie's wedding, its tomorrow night.

name: monica
dialogue: You were invited?!

name: ross
dialogue: No.

name: monica
dialogue: My God, I can't believe this! I mean I knew that mom and dad were invited, but I thought that was it! I mean from the ages 7 to 9 Frannie and I were inseparable!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, maybe since the age of 9, Frannie's made some new friends.

name: ross
dialogue: Well l-look okay, it's probably just a mistake. Let me call Aunt Sheryl okay? Maybe you are invited and the invitation just got lost in the mail.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, well you call her and tell her that you know when we were kids her precious little Frannie tried to undress me several times, okay? And if I hadn't have stopped her, there probably wouldn't even be a wedding to go too.

name: ross
dialogue: You know, she tried to undress me too.

name: chandler
dialogue: I used to undress my cousin Glenn.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Joseph Francis Tribbiani are you home yet?!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Umm, I think he's still out. What's wrong?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I'll tell you Rachel Karen Green, I had plans with Joey tonight and he left me this note.

name: rachel
dialogue: "Pheebs, can't make it, got a date. Talk to you later. Big Daddy."  Big Daddy?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh that is a nickname we were trying out.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, you know what nickname never caught on? The Ross-A-Tron!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! Here's Joseph Francis!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh-Wha-Ho! What are you middle naming me for?! I left you a note!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So what?! That doesn't give you the right to ditch me!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, you can cancel plans with friends if there is the possibility for sex!

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe he's right, that is the rule.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't accept this rule. When me make plans, I expect you to show up. Okay, I can't just be a way to kill time 'til you meet someone better! You know boyfriends and girlfriends come and go, but this  is for life!

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! I'm so sorry; I had no idea it would bother you this much.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, it does.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, can I-can I make it up to you? Huh? I'm sorry.  How about uh, dinner tomorrow night?! I'll pay for myself!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, you wore me down.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey Joe, while you are over there how about another beer for the Ross-A-Tron?

name: joey
dialogue: The Ross-Is that back?!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: chandler
dialogue: Another cheesecake came! They delivered it to the wrong address again!

name: rachel
dialogue: So just bring it back downstairs, what's the problem?

name: chandler
dialogue: I can't seem to say goodbye.

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you serious?! Chandler, we ate an entire cheesecake two days ago and you want more?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well I've forgotten what it tastes like okay?!

name: rachel
dialogue: It was cheesecake. It was fine. It had a buttery, crumbly, graham cracker crust, with a very rich yet light, cream cheese filling...  Wow! My whole mouth just filled with saliva!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know what? Forget it! We are just hungry! We have not had lunch! We are just light-headed! So let us go out and have lunch and forget about the cheesecake.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah and we'll drop it off downstairs so that we're not tempted.

name: chandler
dialogue: Good idea. Where do you want to go to lunch?

name: rachel
dialogue: Momma's Little Bakery, Chicago, Illinois.

name: joey
dialogue: Aww! Mel Torme died.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, that paper's like a year old!

name: joey
dialogue: Aw! Does that mean the Sam Goody's sale is over?!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: So I finally heard back from Aunt Sheryl and apparently it wasn't a mistake. Ahh, there's-there's limited seating in the hall.

name: monica
dialogue: Limited seating?!  I am just one tiny person!

name: ross
dialogue: Well yeah, but she doesn't know that. I mean, the last time she saw you-you would've turned one of those little wedding chairs into kindling.

name: monica
dialogue: Limited seating! Oh, that is such a lame excuse! that is not the reason she's not inviting me!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh what's the big deal?! I wasn't even invited to the ceremony, just the reception. And-and you know what? If it makes you feel any better, Joan and I will just make an appearance and then, and then we'll-we'll leave early as a sign of protest.

name: monica
dialogue: Joan?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, Joan Tedeski my date. She's an assistant professor in the Linguistics department. Tall, very beautiful, and despite what some people say, not broad backed!

name: monica
dialogue: Wait a minute, you got Ross Gellar and guest?! I wasn't invited and you got "and guest?!"

name: joey
dialogue: Uh-uh, excuse me, I do have to interrupt on Ross's behalf. I-I think the rule applies here you know, since she has a chance to get on broad back...

name: ross
dialogue: Not broad backed!

name: monica
dialogue: Wait a minute, you know, you are bringing me!

name: ross
dialogue: What? I can't cancel on Joan!

name: monica
dialogue: Why not?!

name: ross
dialogue: Bec-Did you not hear me?! She's an assistant professor in the Linguistics department, okay? They're wild! Why do you want to come anyway?

name: monica
dialogue: Because! She's my cousin. I mean, we grew up together! We're family you know? Well that is important to me.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, all right, I'll take you. I'll go call Joan.

name: joey
dialogue: Aww that is nice. Family should be there, huh? This is her wedding, happiest day of her life.

name: monica
dialogue: We'll see.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, thank you for lunch.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Wait a minute, I didn't pay, I thought you paid!

name: chandler
dialogue: So apparently we just don't pay for food anymore.  Do you see what I see?

name: rachel
dialogue: Its still there!

name: chandler
dialogue: Mrs. Braverman must be out.

name: rachel
dialogue: She could be out of town. Maybe she'll be gone for months.

name: chandler
dialogue: By then, the cheesecake may have gone bad. We don't want her to come back to bad cheesecake.

name: rachel
dialogue: No that could kill her.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, we don't want that.

name: rachel
dialogue: No so we're protecting her.

name: chandler
dialogue: But we should take it.

name: rachel
dialogue: But we should move quick.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why?

name: rachel
dialogue: Because I think I just heard her moving around in there.

name: chandler
dialogue: Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! that is David!

name: monica
dialogue: David who?

name: phoebe
dialogue: David the scientist guy, David that I was in love with, David who went to Russia and broke my heart David!

name: david
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, you say someone's name enough, they turn around.

name: david
dialogue: Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: David!  What-what are you doing here? Aren't you supposed to be in Russia?

name: david
dialogue: Yeah, I'm just, I'm just in town for a conference. Umm, God you look phenomenal!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well... Yeah. You look great too. Did you get a haircut?

name: david
dialogue: Yeah. Well I-I got like thirty of them.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: david
dialogue: Umm, look I-I-I got a confession to make...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: david
dialogue: Uh, I-I-I was hoping to run into you here. I didn't know whether I should call or not, you know I-I was only in town for a few days. And you know, I didn't want to intrude on your life or-or anything like that, but I-I really wanted to see you and-but I didn't know if you wanted to see me.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, of course I would want to see you. I...I think about you all the time.

name: david
dialogue: Really? Because I think about you all the time.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really?

name: david
dialogue: I mean, there's a statue in Minsk...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: david
dialogue: That reminds me of you so much, I mean umm, it-it's actually of Lenin. But, you know at certain angles...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: david
dialogue: Umm, anyway...Do you want to have dinner tonight?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes! Oh no!

name: david
dialogue: Oh. Uh, what?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can't. I can't believe I have plans, I can't. Can you do it tomorrow night though?

name: david
dialogue: Uh no, I have to go in a few hours. I have to be on the red-eye. Well listen, you know, next time you are in Minsk umm...

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, can I talk to you for a second?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: monica
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I have plans with Joey tonight.

name: monica
dialogue: So! He'll understand!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No he won't. And that is not even the point! Monica, I made a whole speech about you do not cancel plans with friends! And now you know what? Just because, potentially, the love of my life comes back from Russia just for one night, I-I should change my beliefs?! I should change beliefs! No! No! No, if I don't have my principles, I don't have anything!

name: monica
dialogue: God, you are so strong.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Or! I should rush through dinner with Joey and I can meet David at 9

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! That is so good!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm full, and yet I know if I stop eating this, I'll regret it.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: What do you got there?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh it's umm, it's tofu cake. Do you want some?

name: chandler
dialogue: What are you doing tonight?

name: joey
dialogue: Huh? Uh...

name: chandler
dialogue: Dude! Dude!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh!  Sorry. Uh, I've got those plans with Phoebe, why?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh really? Uh, Monica said she had a date at 9

name: joey
dialogue: What?! Tonight?!

name: chandler
dialogue: that is what Monica said.

name: joey
dialogue: After she gave me that big speech?! She goes and makes a date with a guy on the same night she has plans with me? I think she's trying to pull a fast one on Big Daddy!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh here, I think this is us.  Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Limited seating my ass. Let's see who made the cut.  Hi!

name: the wedding guest
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm Monica Gellar. Who do you know the bride and groom?

name: the wedding guest
dialogue: Oh, I used to work with Frannie.

name: monica
dialogue: Used to work with her. Used to! I'm a relative and I didn't get invited! A blood relative! Blood!!

name: ross
dialogue: Stop saying, "Blood" to strangers.

name: monica
dialogue: So, how about you huh? How do you know the happy couple?

name: the second guest
dialogue: We went to college with both of them and now we live next door.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, you are fine.

name: the waiter
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: the waiter
dialogue: Are you guys ready?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes! I will have the green salad, umm the house salad, and water's fine.

name: the waiter
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: the waiter
dialogue: And for you sir?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, this slow roasted salmon, just how slow are we talking' here?

name: the waiter
dialogue: It's uh, it's already been roasted.

name: joey
dialogue: OH, then no. Maybe I should hear those specials again.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh Joey, we've heard the specials three times! Okay? There's prime rib, mahi mahi, and a very special lobster ravioli.

name: the waiter
dialogue: Actually we're out of the lobster ravioli.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh well, that changes everything! you know what Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Huh?

name: joey
dialogue: You were right before. I mean, friends are so important.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I'm very wise. I know.

name: joey
dialogue: You know-You know what I really want?

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Is to have a long, long talk. You know? Get Joey out on the open road and really open him up.

name: the waiter
dialogue: Any progress?

name: joey
dialogue: Yes! I will have the lobster ravioli.

name: phoebe
dialogue: God Joey, this is taking forever!

name: joey
dialogue: What's the rush? What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: W-w-I just-it's that-I have-You know I have-I have an appointment. And it's very important.

name: joey
dialogue: Whoa-whoa, what is it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well... It's a date.

name: joey
dialogue: A date?! No, no Pheebs you-you must be mistaken, because I know you wouldn't schedule a date on the same night you have plans with a friend!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Come on Joey, don't make me feel badly about this.

name: joey
dialogue: No, I'm going to!! that is right! Yeah, you made me feel really guilty about going' out with that girl! Like-like-like I did something terrible to you! And now Pheebs, you are doing the same thing!

name: phoebe
dialogue: That-It's not the same thing! This is totally different! This is with David! Remember David, the scientist guy? Okay, he's very special to me.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, well my girl from the other night was special. She was a scientist too!

name: phoebe
dialogue: She was?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, she graduated from high school!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, whatever. You know what? I don't have time have time to convince you because he's only here for four hours, and I'm going to go see him!

name: joey
dialogue: Fine!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: joey
dialogue: Fine!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: joey
dialogue: What are you still doin' here?! I told you, lobster ravioli!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: david
dialogue: Hey! Oh, I was just about to leave. I-I-I-I didn't think you were coming.

dialogue: Oh, I wouldn't miss this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Mm-mmm.

name: chandler
dialogue: I will give you a hundred dollars to whistle right now.  How can you eat the cheesecake without me?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, what are you going to do?! Are you going to go run tell Monica?! Are you going to tell Joey?! No! Because then you will have to tell them what we did! We are desert stealers! We are living outside the law!

dialogue: You know what? I don't trust you with this cake anymore! And I got it first, and I'm takin' it back!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! What?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait a minute!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh no-no-no-no-no, no you don't!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes! Oh yes!

name: rachel
dialogue: You think I trust you with it?! No! We're going to split it! You take half and I take half!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well that is not fair, you've already had some!

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Oh, well then you know what? I think Monica would be very interested to know that you called her cheesecake dry and mealy.

name: chandler
dialogue: What do we use to split it?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay!  All right, pick a half.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay well, this side looks bigger. Uh... There's more crust on this side. You know? So, maybe if I measured...

name: rachel

dialogue: All right, I'll pick that one.

name: rachel
dialogue: that is also the smaller piece.  Okay, there you go. Enjoy your half my friend, but that is it. No sharing. No switching, and don't come crying to me if you eat your piece to fast.  Oh!!!!

name: chandler
dialogue: oh!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, you got to give me some of your piece.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh-ho-ho-ho-no! No! No switching! No sharing, and don't come crying to me! Ha-ha-ha! I may just sit here and have my cake all day! Just sit here in the hallway and eat my...

dialogue: Ross, sweetheart!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, hey Aunt Millie.

name: aunt millie
dialogue: Isn't it a beautiful wedding?!

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, yes it is. It's uh...  Every time on the lips! Why?! Why on lips?!

dialogue: Here's Frannie. Hmm, won't she be happy to see me?

dialogue: Now wait a minute, you be nice! All right? I didn't bring you here so you can ambush her.

dialogue: Frannie was the one who found your Playboys and showed them to mom.

dialogue: That bitch!

name: frannie
dialogue: Monica! What...

name: monica
dialogue: Am I doing here? Why? Surprised to see me? Ross brought me. How do you like that?!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi Frannie, congratulations.

name: monica
dialogue: You invite my brother, you invite my whole family, and not me?! Why?! What-Why wouldn't you want me at your wedding? What could I have possibly done?!  Stuart!

name: frannie
dialogue: I believe you know my husband.

name: ross
dialogue: So it's really a question of who could you have possibly done.

name: david
dialogue: Oh, I hate this but I-I-I have to go. I-I can't miss my flight.

dialogue: Are you sure? I'll bet there's another flight to Minsk in like...

name: david
dialogue: July. Umm,

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is really beautiful. What does it mean?

name: david
dialogue: Please, clean my beakers. I don't get out of the lab much.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is good. I got to admit, I thought it was something else.

name: david
dialogue: Yeah, I... Well I really actually wanted to say umm, that, but um, I figured I probably shouldn't because you know, I...have to leave.

dialogue: you are right! you are right. Don't say it.

name: david
dialogue: I-I do though.

dialogue: I do too.

name: david
dialogue: Bye Phoebe.

dialogue: Okay, now's not the time Joey. All right? You can yell at me tomorrow.

dialogue: No! No! No Pheebs, I'm not going to yell at you. I just you know, started thinking about you and David and I...remember how bummed you were the first time he left. And I just... Oh Pheebs, come here.  Are you okay?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No I'm not okay. The only guy I've ever been crazy about has gone to Minsk and I may never...I may never see him again.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, you know you could always visit him.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh right, like they're going to let me have a passport.

name: joey
dialogue: Anything I can do? Whatever you need.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well-But-Now, if-if you can achieve positronic distillation of sub-atomic particles you know before he does, then he can come back.

name: joey
dialogue: I can give it a shot.

dialogue: Oh! Yay! Look! There's a piece that doesn't have floor on it!

name: chandler
dialogue: Stick to your side!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, what are we having'?

dialogue: Oh wait I forgot my wrap.

name: aunt millie

name: ross
dialogue: Well...

dialogue: Give us a kiss. Come on! Come on!

name: ross
dialogue: Why?! Why on the lips?!

dialogue: Ross, when's this comet thing start?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, technically it seven billion years ago...

name: all
dialogue: Oh no! Oh no!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay! Okay! Fine, I'll stop! No teaching, okay? We'll just watch the pretty light streaking across the sky.  Okay? Who's official name is Bapstein-King.

name: all
dialogue: Okay! Okay!

name: phoebe
dialogue: There it is! Oh, look at that! Isn't Mother Nature amazing?

name: chandler
dialogue: that is a plane!
