dialogue: Well, all right. 1700 bags of peanuts flying that high, that is pretty amazing too.

dialogue: Hey, I wonder if you can see my apartment from up here.

dialogue: No. No, you can't.

name: tag
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh I don't-I don't know.

name: ross
dialogue: Man, look at all those stars!  Infinite space. It really, really makes you wonder, doesn't it?

name: joey
dialogue: You know what else makes you wonder?

name: ross
dialogue: Huh?

name: joey
dialogue: Check out the rack on this chick!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, we've been out here for two hours and we haven't seen any stupid comets. Can we go now? I mean, Chandler's getting chilly.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, I'm not!

name: joey
dialogue: Then why are you wearing Monica's jacket?

name: chandler
dialogue: Because it's flattering!  Come on Monica! Come on Monica!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah actually, I think we're going to take off too. We rented a movie.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! I won't say, 'no' to a movie!

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh Pheebs, we just actually kind of wanted to be alone.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Shh! Get me out of here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

name: joey
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Come here, check this out!

name: ross
dialogue: What? Is it the comet?

name: joey
dialogue: No! No-no. Look, there's a bug stuck in tar right here.

name: ross
dialogue: Joey come-I can't believe-I bring you here to see the Bapstein-King comet, one of nature's most spectacular phenomenon, and all you care about are bugs stuck in tar and-and some woman!

name: joey
dialogue: You know, there's two women dude.

name: ross
dialogue: Show me where?

name: joey
dialogue: Right-right up here.

name: ross
dialogue: Joey where's the pipe that was holding the door open?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know!   Yeah, I do.

name: ross
dialogue: Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: What?! All right-Hey! Don't look at me! you are the one who wanted to come up and look for some stupid Burger King comet!

name: ross
dialogue: It's called the Bapstein-King comet, okay?  Hey! Hey! Bapstein was a very well respected astronomer!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh no! No! No!

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica!

name: monica
dialogue: She's sleeping.

name: chandler
dialogue: I know, just quick-quick question, quick question. Which one was Deep Impact and which one was Armageddon?

name: monica
dialogue: Deep Impact was the one with Robert Duval, Armageddon is what's going to happen to you if you wake me up.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sorry, I just...can't sleep. Ooh!  Where is that book that you are reading with the two women who were ice-skating and wearing, wearing those hats with the flowers on it? Because every time I look at that cover I'm like...

name: monica
dialogue: It is in the living room where there is also a light! And no one will kick you in the shin.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!  Ow!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Please don't be a space ship. Please don't be a space ship.  Oh thank God!  How could you be beeping?! I just disconnected you! I took out your battery! How can...

name: smoke detector
dialogue: Beep!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Don't interrupt me!!

name: ross
dialogue: Rachel!! Monica!!

name: joey
dialogue: Come on!

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe this!!

name: joey
dialogue: All right well, you know...I guess we know what we have to do to get down.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I guess we don't have a choice.  Help us! Please help us! We're stuck up on the roof and we can't get down!!!

name: joey
dialogue: Ross. I was thinking we could just go down the fire escape.

name: ross
dialogue: I know, I wasn't finished.   But don't worry! We're going to go down the fire escape!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Shh!!!  I'm sorry, I thought maybe I'd make some warm milk and it would help me sleep.

name: monica
dialogue: With a wok?  I thought you were going to read my boring book to put you asleep.

name: chandler
dialogue: It got interesting! Damn you Oprah!

name: monica
dialogue: Here, let me make the milk, I'm up anyway.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay that does sound like fun.

dialogue: Okay, so how bummed were you when the second sister died huh?

name: monica
dialogue: The second sister dies?!

name: chandler
dialogue: No. No, I-I was, I was talking about the book I was reading.

name: monica
dialogue: The second sister dies in Archie and Jughead Double Digest?

dialogue: that is correct.

dialogue: You want to go in the bedroom? It's a little more comfortable.

dialogue: Sure.

dialogue: Okay.  Oh wait! Umm, did you send those contracts to Milan?

name: tag
dialogue: If this is your idea of sexy talk?

name: rachel
dialogue: No seriously, you know the contracts I gave you, did you overnight them?

name: tag
dialogue: What contracts?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay please tell me that this is just one of your jokes that you do that I don't get.

name: tag
dialogue: Like what?

name: rachel
dialogue: You know, like the thing when you put the phone in your pants?  Tag! I'm serious! This isn't funny! Those contracts absolutely had to go out today!

name: tag
dialogue: Rach, I'm sorry, but you didn't give me any contracts!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes I did! And I put a little Post-It on it that said, "Must go out today," and underlined today three times and, and then I put a little heart in the corner because I didn't want to seem to bossy.

name: tag
dialogue: I'm telling you, you never gave them to me.

name: rachel
dialogue: You know what Tag, if we went down to the office you would see those contracts sitting on your desk.

name: tag
dialogue: No, I would see you looking embarrassed because they are not on my desk!

name: rachel
dialogue: Or maybe you would see me looking embarrassed because you are talking on the phone with your crotch!

name: tag
dialogue: You want to go down to the office right now?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Come on its late, we're not going to go down to the office.

name: tag
dialogue: Okay I understand.  I wouldn't want to be proved wrong either.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay get your coat!  Oh! When did you unhook this?  Nice work!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, it won't go down any further. It's stuck.

name: ross
dialogue: Ugh. Well, we're just going to have to jump.  Yeah. Now, we're going to have to make sure to land to the right of that patch of ice, okay? Not hit the dumpster on the other side and uh, and try to avoid that-that weird brownish red stuff in the middle. So, when you get down there...you go up to the roof and you let me in.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh whoa-whoa wait a minute! I have to do it?!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah! Oh yeah, you'll be fine! It-it'll be uh, just like bungy jumping. You know? But instead of bouncing back up you-you won't.

name: joey
dialogue: What if I smack my head on the concrete?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I'm going to lie to you Joey, it's a possibility.

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know Ross! I-I tell you what, let's flip to see who does it, okay? You-you call it in the air, all right?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, all right.  Tails!  Can you-can you see what it is?

name: joey
dialogue: No.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay. Well, you be careful.

name: joey
dialogue: What? No! No Ross! No-no! Stop! I'm not jumping! Okay, look I have an audition tomorrow and I can't go if I break my leg.

name: ross
dialogue: Well I'm jumping! I have a son! Okay? He won't have a father if-if I die!

name: joey
dialogue: Well all right so, it looks like we're even!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. So, this wire is connected to this wire which plugs into here.  Okay so, to get the beeping to stop all I have to do...  Well done, Pheebs.   What do you want from me?!!!!!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, here's your milk. What do you want to talk about?

name: chandler
dialogue: What? What? What?

name: monica
dialogue: OH! oh! Were you sleeping sweetie? I'm sorry. Here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh how can you possibly know? Look at this mess, Tag! I mean, this is what I'm talking about! You have to be organized! You've got newspapers! You've got magazines! You got-OH!  And who is this chippy? A little young for you Tag, but whatever.

name: tag
dialogue: It's my sister.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, very cute braces. Anyway you know what, the point is Tag, start looking because you are going to find those contracts on your desk.

name: tag

name: rachel
dialogue: In the afternoon. Mr. Zelner came into my office after lunch. He put them on my desk, and then I put a Post-It on it  that said, "Must go out today." So you just keep looking in there! All right?

name: tag
dialogue: It's not here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Puzzler. A bit of a puzzle. Why don't you um, check the copy room, maybe you left the contracts in there?

name: tag
dialogue: How could I have left them in the copy room?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know Tag! How can your genitals make phone calls? Okay? It's not a perfect world! Just go please.

name: tag

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you.  Hello?  I still don't get it.

name: monica
dialogue: Are you still awake?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah! You?

name: monica
dialogue: You do know that was me who just said that right?  Hey. As long as we're both up...

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah?  I hope you are not thinking about cleaning the living room.

name: joey
dialogue: Man, I'm starving! What the hell was I thinking at dinner?! "Do you want soup or salad?" Both! Always order both!

name: ross
dialogue: You know, you know I'm looking' and I don't think anyone's home here. I say we just break the window, crawl through, and-and you know explain later.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah? Really? No one's home?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't think so. Hello?  When you get in there...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, this is where you and I part ways.  Noisy bitch!

name: monica
dialogue: What?! What are you doing?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Do you know what just happened?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah. We-we had sex and then we fell asleep.

name: chandler
dialogue: No. We were in the middle of sex...and you fell asleep.

name: monica
dialogue: No! No, that is not true. No, best time ever! Yeah, you rocked me world!

dialogue: Monica?

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I was giving you some of my best moves, and you missed it. So please wake up so we can do it right!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. Okay, I'm ready. Come on big fella!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Give me the good stuff.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah!  No! No! No! Don't fall asleep! Okay, I am going to make you some coffee.  And I probably won't spill coffee grounds all over the kitchen floor.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I'm up! I'm up!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! I got you some coffee. To, uh...  ...fair enough. So! Do you got anything for me?

name: tag
dialogue: Still no luck.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! Did you check your entire desk! Did you check all the drawers!

name: tag
dialogue: Do you want me to check again?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well yeah, I wish that you would.  Well, no it's not in there!  How about that drawer?

name: tag
dialogue: Well, it's not out here. Is there any chance it could be in your office?

name: rachel
dialogue: You know, I don't-I don't know. Let me, let me check.

name: tag
dialogue: Any luck?

name: rachel
dialogue: Can I see you in my office for a minute?

name: tag
dialogue: Yeah?  You found them!! you know what? I'm not even going to gloat. I'm just really relived this whole thing is over.

name: rachel
dialogue: You put these on my desk!

name: tag
dialogue: I did not!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh really? So you are saying they just slid out of your bottom drawer, crawled across the floor, then jumped on to my desk?!

name: tag
dialogue: How did you know they were in my bottom drawer?

name: rachel
dialogue: I am so hot for you right now.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! How did you get back here?!

name: a disembodied voice
dialogue: Phoebe Buffay?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Fire alarm?  Oh! Hi, officer-fireman, can-can I help you?

name: the fireman
dialogue: We found your fire alarm in the trash chute.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is not mine.

name: the fireman
dialogue: Yes it is.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How do you know?

name: the fireman
dialogue: The next time you want to dump a fire alarm in a trash chute, don't wrap it in a blanket that says, "Property of Phoebe Buffay not Monica."

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay do you-Okay, do you have a search warrant? Because the last time I checked this was still America!

name: the fireman
dialogue: Please reattach this, it's against the law to disconnect them.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Fine!  But please God; tell me how to stop them from going off!

name: the fireman
dialogue: There's a reset button under the plastic cover.

name: phoebe
dialogue: There's a reset button?! Ugh, thank you! Thank you!  There's a reset button! My God! Why didn't I see that!  Reset button, reset button, where is there a reset button?  Oh here it is!  Oh!  OH, God!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, do-do you have a good grip?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, I'm going to start climb down you now.

name: joey
dialogue: All right! Just hurry up!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay. Now-now-now should I climb down your front so we're face to face or-or should I climb down your back so we're-we're butt to face.

name: joey
dialogue: I think face to face.

name: ross
dialogue: I would say that.

name: joey
dialogue: Face to face, yeah!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, here I go.

name: joey
dialogue: All right.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my... How much do you weigh Ross?!

name: ross
dialogue: I prefer not to answer that right now, I'm still carrying a little holiday weight.

name: joey
dialogue: You know, when we talked about face to face, I don't think we thought it all the way through.

name: ross
dialogue: So what do you want me to do?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, just shimmy down me and drop!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi.

name: joey
dialogue: Hi.

name: ross
dialogue: M-maybe I should hang and you can climb down me.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah? Maybe we should talk about that for a little while!

name: ross
dialogue: It's still looks pretty far!

name: joey
dialogue: It's not that far! Just drop!

name: ross
dialogue: Do not rush me!!

name: joey
dialogue: Ross, you should know that my pants are starting' to come down and I'm not wearing any underwear!

name: ross
dialogue: Oww!! My ankle! I really hurt my ankle! I think I twisted it when I-Ooh, a quarter!

name: monica
dialogue: That really was some of your best work.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hm-hmm, I told you!  I can't believe that I've only got two hours before I call in sick for work.

name: monica
dialogue: I have to be up in seven minutes.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you are not going to believe this, but if you have seven minutes...

name: monica
dialogue: Really?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Do you want to?

name: monica
dialogue: Okay! You get the vacuum cleaner and I'll get the furniture polish!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you know I was thinking of moving the couch over here.

name: joey
dialogue: Why would you want to do that?

name: rachel
dialogue: So that there will be a decent place for me to sit.

name: joey
dialogue: Rach, there is a decent place to...

name: rachel
dialogue: And your lap does not count! Okay? Come on help me move this.

name: joey
dialogue: No. No. No.

name: rachel
dialogue: No?

name: joey
dialogue: No. Rosita does not move.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm sorry, Rosita? As in...

name: joey
dialogue: As in Rosita does not move.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, it's just a chair! What's the big deal?

name: joey
dialogue: The big deal is that it is the exact equal distance from the bathroom to the kitchen and it's at the perfect angle so you don't get any glare coming of off Stevie.

name: rachel
dialogue: Stevie the TV?

name: joey
dialogue: Is there a problem?

name: rachel
dialogue: No!  Oh what does he know! Come on Rosita, us chichas got to stick together!  You bitch!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, you know what's weird? After you guys get married, when you introduce me to people you are going to have to say, "This is my brother-in-law Ross." Not, "My friend Ross," "brother-in-law Ross." that is weird isn't it?

name: chandler
dialogue: Couldn't I just say, "This is Ross?"

name: ross
dialogue: Sure, do whatever you want.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Ross! So, I was checking out the uh, real estate section...

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: monica
dialogue: Look at this.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, it looks like mom and dad's house. Oh, it even has a tree with a broken limb out front and the uh, the window in the attic is...Oh my God!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What? What happened to the window in the attic?!

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe mom and dad are selling the house!

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe they-they didn't even tell us!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can't believe I still don't know what happened to the window in the attic!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, hello dad! Monica and I just saw the house in the paper!  Yes we're surprised!  Who did you leave a message with?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sorry!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, Joey I am so sorry.

name: joey
dialogue: I told you not to move it! Rach, how would you feel if say, I wanted to move you mom, and you said don't, and I did it anyway and her head fell off?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, come on-Joey, I'll buy you a new one! All right? We'll go down to the store right now and we'll-we'll get you a new chair.

name: joey
dialogue: She's not even cold yet!

name: rachel
dialogue: But don't you think Rosita would've wanted you to move on? I mean you know, she did always put...your comfort first.

name: joey
dialogue: that is true.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay? You ready?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I...  I don't want Stevie to see her like this.

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe we have to say goodbye to the house we grew up in. Man, some-some stranger's going to be living in my room.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, after 15 years of mom and dad keeping it as a shrine to you, it's time the velvet ropes came down.

name: ross
dialogue: They kept your room for a while.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh please! Dad turned my room into a gym 20 minutes after I moved out! I got to say, a tanning bed and a stack of Victoria's Secret catalogues, not a gym!

name: ross
dialogue: Come on, you know they love you.

name: monica
dialogue: As much as they love you?

name: ross
dialogue: I was their first born! They thought she was barren! It's not my fault.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ugh, I hate this year!

name: ross
dialogue: What's wrong with this year?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well okay, it's already February and I've only given two massages and they were both the worst tippers in the world!

name: monica
dialogue: That was me and Ross.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh that is right!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, you know if you want to pick up some extra cash? Some friends of mine made good money doing telemarketing.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh that is a great idea. you are really good on the phone.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah and yeah, and it would probably be better than the last telephone job I had. You know, I probably wouldn't have to say spank as much.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah, like you never called!

name: supervisor
dialogue: So basically this is very easy. You read from the script and try to sell as much toner as you possibly can.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, I can do that! Oh, by the way, I love my office.

name: supervisor
dialogue: Why don't we do a trial run.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh okay. Umm, all right.  Hi, this is Phoebe from Empire Office Supplies, can I speak to your supply manager please?

name: supervisor
dialogue: I'm the supply manager.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, okay I would like to talk to you about your toner needs.

name: supervisor
dialogue: We don't need any toner.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh okay, well I'm sorry to bother you. Bye-bye.  Yeah you are right, this is easy.

name: supervisor
dialogue: Okay, what was wrong with that call?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh well, all right...um, no offense, but you were kind of rude.

name: supervisor
dialogue: They're always going to tell you they don't need toner, but that is okay because whatever they say, you can find the answer to it here in this script.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh.

name: supervisor
dialogue: So, I think you are ready to sell toner, do you have any last questions?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No.  Oh wait yes! I do, I do have one question. What is toner?

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey! Joe!  Full bag.  Beer's still cold. Something terrible must've happened here!  Oh no-no-no-no-no-no!  Stevie, I was never here!

name: ross
dialogue: Dad?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I'm here!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Hi. God, it seems like just yesterday you guys used to come out to watch me work.

name: ross
dialogue: Dad, we-we can't believe you are selling the house.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well, it's time for a new family to start their memories here and hopefully their check will clear before they find the crack in the foundation and the asbestos in the ceiling.

name: ross
dialogue: Let's grab our stuff and get the hell out of here.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I'm sorry we can't store your childhood things anymore.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, that is okay, I can't wait to see everything again! All of the memories...

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well, I don't know what's in the boxes down here, but I do know there are six or seven Easy Bake Ovens in the attic.

name: monica
dialogue: I used to love to play restaurant.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, not as much as you used to love to play uncooked batter eater.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, it is unreasonable to expect a child to wait for a light bulb to cook brownies!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: So, I think you are boxes are over here.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow! Great!  Wait, dad who-who's cigarettes are these?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I don't know. They-they must be your mother's, but please, please don't ask her. I'll throw these away.

name: ross
dialogue: Cool! Dad! My report cards! Hey, check this out dad,  Math, A. Science, A. History, A. Gym... Ooh, my rock polisher!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Oh look, look there's your old makeup kit!

name: ross
dialogue: It's a clown kit! Clown kit!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well, the white seems to be untouched.  Uh-oh.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: You know how the garage floods every Spring?

name: ross
dialogue: How are you ever going to sell this place?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I think I accidentally used Monica's boxes to keep the water away from the Porsche.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh no. Dad! Dad! What... Oh God...everything's ruined! Dad, she's going to be crushed!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: You don't secretly smoke do you?

name: ross
dialogue: No!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: So it's just your mother then.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi, this Phoebe from Empire Office Supplies, can I speak to your supply manager please?  Earl, thanks.  Hi Earl, this is Phoebe from Empire Office Supplies I'd like to talk to you about your toner needs.

name: earl
dialogue: I don't need any toner.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm hearing what you are saying, but at our prices everyone needs toner.

name: earl
dialogue: Not me.

name: phoebe
dialogue: May I ask why?

name: earl
dialogue: You want to know why. You want to know why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I surely do!

name: earl
dialogue: Okay, I don't need any toner because I'm going to kill myself.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, is-is that because you are out of toner?

name: earl
dialogue: Okay, so...no toner today. Thanks anyway, bye-bye.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No-no wait-wait! I can't just let you hang up! Just please talk to me.

name: earl
dialogue: Well...I only have one thing to do today.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Now, why do you want to kill yourself?

name: earl
dialogue: It's just that I uh, have been working for ten years now at this meaningless, dead-end job and nobody here even knows I exist!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Chandler?

name: earl
dialogue: I-I'm sorry?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No look, I-I'm sure that people know you exist!

name: earl
dialogue: Oh yeah? I work in a cubicle surrounded by people. I've been talking to you for five minutes now about killing myself and no one's even looked up from their desk. Hang-hang on.  Hey everybody! Uh, I'm going to kill myself!  I'll get back to you.  I got nothing. Wait.  Uh, hey Marge!   Ehh, nothing. Nothing.

name: chandler
dialogue: My chair. Now, if anybody asks, your name is Rosita!

name: rachel
dialogue: You will like it!

name: joey
dialogue: No I won't.

name: rachel
dialogue: You don't even know!

name: joey
dialogue: Because, I know what I like and what I don't like! It's not the same thing!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well look, if you don't like this...

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know why you say that so soon.

name: rachel
dialogue: Come on Joey, I just bought you a new chair! The most expensive one in the store! Hey, you know what I was thinking? We could name her Francette.

name: joey
dialogue: Francette? What is she? A couch?

name: joey
dialogue: Poor thing. Cut down in her prime.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, the new chair will be here in an hour. Maybe we should actually move Rosita out of here. you know, start the heeling process?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I guess you are right. Maybe, maybe I'll take her down to the incinerator. It's going to be so said, and kind of cool.  She's heeled!

name: rachel
dialogue: that is weird.

name: joey
dialogue: No it's not weird, it's a miracle!

name: rachel
dialogue: It's not a miracle Joey! I'm sure there's some explanation.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh there is! If you want something enough and your heart is pure, wondrous things can happen!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, I really don't...

name: joey
dialogue: Can you tell me how this happened?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well no.

name: joey
dialogue: Miracle!

name: rachel
dialogue: No, you know what? Maybe somebody came in here and fixed it! Or something!

name: joey
dialogue: Someone like an...angel?

name: rachel
dialogue: that is right Joey, the chair angel came in and heeled your chair.

name: joey
dialogue: Get your non-believer ass out of my chair!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well, she'll understand right? It's not like I did it on purpose.

name: ross
dialogue: Dad that won't matter to her. Look, all my stuff is safe and dry and all her is-is, is growing new stuff! See, this is exactly the kind of thing that makes her think you guys love me more than you love her.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Oh my God, does she really thinks that?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, can you blame her?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well I don't know, I-I suppose we may have favoured you unconsciously, you were a medical marvel! The doctor said your mother could...

name: ross
dialogue: Dad, dad I don't want to hear about it.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Really?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, not right now. Okay look, Monica came here for some memories and damnit, we're going to give her some! Okay, grab...grab some empty boxes. Okay? We'll-we'll take stuff from mine and whatever we can pass off as hers we'll-we'll put them in their.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Great!

name: ross
dialogue: Like  know like this! This!  She-she could've made this!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Sure!

name: ross
dialogue: Right? And this!  She-she could've won this!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: This could've been hers!

name: ross
dialogue: Sure! Ooh-ooh, what about this?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Your make-up kit? I'd feel better.

name: rachel
dialogue: I am so psyched I kept this chair for myself!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, me too.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, how's...how's the uh, miracle chair?

name: joey
dialogue: Fine.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah? Wow! You know, that this thing has speakers in the headrest!

name: joey
dialogue: No. Really?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! You can hook it up to your TV and you get radio!

name: joey
dialogue: My chair heels itself.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Earl, you are not hearing me! All I'm saying is that you are not alone all right? Everybody hates the people they work with!

name: guy
dialogue: Hey guy!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait, what was that? That sounded like someone being nice to you.

name: earl
dialogue: No! that is just the "Hey Guy" guy. He says that to everybody! He's the worst! I'd like to take him with me!

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right so Earl, let's just forget about the people at the office, okay? There-there's got to be someone else in your life worth sticking around for! What about-what about your family, your friends, or maybe your girlfriend?

name: earl
dialogue: Yeah! Right!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh sorry, boyfriend!

name: earl
dialogue: Oh no.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, whatever! Anything!

name: the "hey guy" guy
dialogue: Hey guy!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, he's got to go.

name: earl
dialogue: Okay, I should, I should probably be getting back to my thing now. See you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! I'm not finished yet! Don't! Don't you dare hang up on me!!!

name: supervisor
dialogue: The new girl's good.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey guys! Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, I just whipped us up some Easy Bake treats, they should be ready in about three days.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: that is a good one! Do you hear that Ross? Three days!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah! Yeah!  Oh, this will make a great memory.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. So, which boxes are mine?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, these. These are yours right here.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.  Oh! A colouring book!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. Yeah, oh you loved that thing. You always had it with you. You never went anywhere without-without that colouring book.

name: monica
dialogue: Really? Wow! It looks like I had some trouble staying inside the lines.

name: ross
dialogue: Nu-uh!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, an old glove?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Oh, yeah you loved that glove! You took it every place you went. You never went any place without that glove.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! Look at this!  I can't believe I even fit into this shirt!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I don't know how that got in there.

name: monica
dialogue: This isn't mine.  Hey, this isn't, this isn't my stuff! Ugh, Ross!  These are your boxes! Where are my boxes?

name: ross
dialogue: Umm, your boxes are umm...

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Dad?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well, the garage flooded sweetie and it ruined everything in your boxes. I'm sorry.

name: monica
dialogue: Just mine?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I'm afraid so.

name: monica
dialogue: So why-why wasn't Ross's stuff ruined?  And if you say the words medical marvel I'm going to Easy Bake your head!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well, I used your boxes to divert water away from the Porsche.

name: monica
dialogue: So wait, Ross's stuff is fine, but I have no memories because you wanted to keep the bottom two inches of your car away from water!!!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: There was also leaves and guk and stuff.

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe this!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Screw it! I'm having one.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: How would you like to sit in a chair that fully reclines, has a rolling massage, and speakers in the head rest?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I'd love to but I've tried that so many times they won't even let me in the store anymore.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well what if I told you, you can do it in my apartment?

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you telling me that you bought the chair that is making all other lounge systems obsolete? The chair that Sit magazine called the Chair of the Year?

name: rachel
dialogue: I just purchased the La-Z-Boy E-cliner 3000.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is awesome! that is great! What made you do it?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, it's a long story, but umm I broke Joey's chair...

name: chandler
dialogue: Whoa-whoa-whoa! You broke Joey's chair?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: I thought I broke Joey's chair! that is why I replaced it with mine!

name: rachel
dialogue: oh. that is how it got fixed!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, what did you think, that-that elves came in and fixed it?

name: rachel
dialogue: No!  Angels.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm getting' my chair back!

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Wh-hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, it looks like it wasn't heeled after all! Yeah! So, I guess this chair is mine now!

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey you broke my chair!!

name: joey
dialogue: Your chair?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, he thought he broke your chair so he switched the chairs!

name: joey
dialogue: So, there was no miracle?!

name: rachel
dialogue: No Joe, no miracle.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh no this is devastating! My faith is shaken. I'm so glad I have the new chair to get my through this difficult time in my life.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh! Nice try, but you don't get that chair anymore! All right? That is my chair now! You can sit on my lap!  No I take that back!

name: chandler
dialogue: I think I should get the chair!

name: joey
dialogue: How do you figure?

name: chandler
dialogue: Because you  broke a chair and you  broke a chair! The only one around here that hasn't broke a chair, is me!

name: rachel
dialogue: No-no-no! This chair's not going anywhere.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, where's the logic in that?!

name: rachel
dialogue: The logic is, that there are two of us and we are both strong enough to break a chair in half!

name: chandler
dialogue: So Joey breaks my chair and I get nothing!

name: joey
dialogue: that is right!

name: chandler
dialogue: What are you guys? Like a gang or something?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! We are!

name: rachel
dialogue: We're the Cobras!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Excuse me! Can you tell me where I can find Earl? He's the supply manager around here.

name: marge
dialogue: Sorry, I don't know any Earl.

name: earl
dialogue: I'm right here!!!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Earl! I'm Phoebe.

name: earl
dialogue: Phoebe? The lady who sells toner?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, look it, you-you can't kill yourself.

name: earl
dialogue: Look, um I really appreciate your coming down...

name: phoebe
dialogue: No-no I can't! I can't let you do it!

name: earl
dialogue: Why?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Because it was fate that made me call you today!

name: earl
dialogue: I thought it was toner.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No! Think about it okay? This isn't even my regular job! Okay? And my first day on the job, you are my first call! And-and somebody else might've hung up on you, but I wouldn't do that because I know about this stuff. My mom killed herself.

name: earl
dialogue: Really?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes.

name: earl
dialogue: How?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm not going to give you tips! Look don't you see that this-this...this all came together so that I could stop you from doing this.

name: earl
dialogue: Couldn't it just be a coincidence?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, it's fate!

name: earl
dialogue: It doesn't really seem like enough to be fate.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh. Well umm, okay here's a weird thing. My mother was also a supply manager.

name: earl
dialogue: I'm actually the office manager.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! So was she! And! Get this, okay? Your-your name is Earl, right? Her name was Pearl, P-Earl.

name: earl
dialogue: Well, was there anything else?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure!  Umm, where are you from?

name: earl
dialogue: Philadelphia.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! So was she! Oh, I've got-I've got goose bumps.

name: earl
dialogue: Really?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, you know I'm wearing layers and it's warm.

name: earl
dialogue: Yeah-yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: But if-no look, okay. These jerks might not care about you, but the universe does! And that says a lot!

name: earl
dialogue: Did you hear that?! I don't need you guys to care about me! Because the universe cares! The whole universe!   I really wished they'd care just a little bit though.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know, I don't-I don't think it's you. This is a freaky place.  Hey! Guys!   Oh no, it's you.

name: earl
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, this terrible! Everything is destroyed! Look at this.  It obviously meant enough for me to save it, and I don't even know what it is! OH, it's still soft.  What do you think this is?

name: ross
dialogue: All right. I think it was a mouse.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: How are you honey?

name: monica
dialogue: How do you think I am?! You've wrecked all my childhood memories. You love Ross more than me. And I just rubbed a dead mouse on my face!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Sweetheart, we love you just as much as Ross! Now, I'm sorry about everything that happened and I'd probably never be able to make it up to you, but here's a start.

name: monica
dialogue: What's this?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: It's the key to my Porsche. Well, the key to your Porsche.

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: What?!!!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I've been thinking about getting rid of it. I was driving it the other day and saw my reflection in a store window. Your mother's right, I do look like an ass.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait, you are giving me your Porsche, you are kidding me right?!

name: ross
dialogue: Well w-w-w-w-wait, w-wait, wait, wait a minute! I mean a couple of stupid boxes get wet and she gets a Porsche?!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Why don't we take it for a spin?

name: monica
dialogue: All right!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, what about me?! I'm a medical marvel!!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ahhhh....

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey guys!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Do you guys know what happened to Chandler's barca lounger?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah, Joey broke it. Had to get rid of it.

name: monica
dialogue: Are you kidding?! I get a Porsche and the barca lounger's gone?! This is the best day ever!

name: ross
dialogue: Happy birthday!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Happy birthday!!!

name: all
dialogue: Rach! Come on! Rach!

name: monica
dialogue: It's your birthday!

name: tag
dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: She's not as pretty as she was when she was 29.

name: tag
dialogue: Ms. Green would like to establish some ground rules before she comes out. She would appreciate it if you don't use the words old or downhill or  they still look pretty damn good.

name: joey
dialogue: They do!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rachel! Come on out! Monica made breakfast!

name: monica
dialogue: Chocolate-chip pancakes!

name: ross
dialogue: We've got presents!

name: rachel
dialogue: Good ones?

name: monica
dialogue: They all came from the list you handed out to us two weeks ago.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, can I keep the presents and still be 29?

name: joey
dialogue: Come on Rach! Look, turning thirty is not that big a deal.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh really. Is that how you felt when you turned thirty?

name: joey
dialogue: Why God?!! Why?!! We had a deal!! Let the others grow old! Not me!!

name: rachel
dialogue: You know, I'm still 29 in Guam.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, 30 is not that old! Do you know how old the Earth is?

name: rachel
dialogue: Late thirties? Oh come on you guys! Is it just me? Am I overreacting to this?

name: chandler
dialogue: No Rach, it's not just you. My thirtieth birthday certainly wasn't that much fun.

name: joey
dialogue: And now Chandler! We're all getting' so old!  Why are you doing this to us?!

name: monica
dialogue: Rach, you are in a great place in your life. Come on, you've got a great job! Good friends...

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, you are roommate is a soap opera star.

name: rachel
dialogue: Look, you know I know my life's going pretty well, but I look around and I just see so many people who've accomplished so many other goals by the time they're thirty.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but you shouldn't compare yourself to me.

name: all
dialogue: Come on Phoebe! You can do it Phoebe! Come on!

name: rachel
dialogue: There you go!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I did it! One mile on a hippity-hop! that is it!! that is everything I wanted to do before I was thirty. Oh, except I wanted to patch things up with my sister. But oh well. Yay!!  And-and girls this thing is a Godsend if you know what I mean.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thirty. Ugh, I mean thirty! Monica, do you remember mean, old Mrs. Kreeger in the fifth grade? She was thirty!

name: tag
dialogue: Come on, let's have some fun. Huh?  What do you want to do today?

name: rachel
dialogue: Nothing. I don't want to do anything.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, doing nothing on your thirtieth is better than doing something stupid, like Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! That was a practical purchase! I needed that car for transportation! Okay? I-I have a child!

name: ross
dialogue: How hot do I look in this, huh?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ross, a sports car? Wouldn't it have been cheaper to just stuff a sock down there?

name: ross
dialogue: that is not what this is about okay? I-I am a sports car enthusiast. I have always been into cars.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, what's the horsepower on this thing?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't know, but-but look how shiny!

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe you bought this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really! God Ross, what were you thinking?  I know it's really shallow, but a part of me wants him again.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, well get in line missy.  So, can I have a ride stud?

name: ross
dialogue: Hop in.  Get ready for the smoothest ride of your life.

name: ross
dialogue: Damnit!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, who's next?

name: rachel

dialogue: Do you really want an award you didn't win?
