dialogue: No! I want an award I did win! But nobody's giving me any of those! Plus-Hey Rach, if-if I put it up there  right? When people come over they'll see it and they'll think I won it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey is says Best Supporting Actress!

name: joey
dialogue: I can scratch that right off.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey no, this is wrong! You have to take it back, okay? You don't want to win an award this way. you are very talented. And someday you are going to win one of these for real and that one is going to mean something.

name: joey
dialogue: All right!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right?  Thank you.

name: joey
dialogue: I'll take it back tomorrow.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you.

name: joey
dialogue: If I can't have it you can't have it!

name: lewis
dialogue: Professor Geller?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes Mr. Lewis, how can I help you?

name: lewis
dialogue: I know I didn't do well on my midterms and stuff but, I was kind of hoping you could change my grade.

name: ross
dialogue: And why exactly would I do that?

name: lewis
dialogue: Because I'm in love with you.

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: lewis
dialogue: Yeah, I'm all...in love with you and stuff. So could you change my grade?

name: ross
dialogue: No!

name: lewis
dialogue: Well why not you changed Ned's grade!

name: ross
dialogue: Well that is different! Okay? Because he, he was actually in love with me!

name: lewis
dialogue: No he's not! He's totally yanking your chain! He's done this with three other teachers!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: lewis
dialogue: He's got a girlfriend!

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe someone would do that for a grade.

name: lewis
dialogue: I know! It's awful. I love you.

name: monica
dialogue: Have you seen Chandler?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No. Why?

name: monica
dialogue: Cause I just keeping thinking about all these things that I'm not going to have and it's freaking me out. I don't know what to do about it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, don't sweat it.  Chandler is nowhere around so go ahead get it out of your system. That guy's cute.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe! Come on I'm serious! I just got to talk to him about all this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No that is the last thing you want to do!

name: monica
dialogue: Why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Because you are marrying him!

name: monica
dialogue: You got to help me out here Pheebs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, I've never been engaged and I've never really been married, but I can only tell you what my mother told me. Whenever you have doubts or fears or anxieties about a relationship, do not communicate them to your husband.

name: monica
dialogue: So I'm not supposed to share my doubts and fears with the guy I'm going to spend the rest of my life with?

name: phoebe
dialogue: That is correct! Yes, you are supposed to take all of that stuff and put it in a little box in your mind and then lock it up tight.

name: monica
dialogue: Your mother told you this?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes!

name: monica
dialogue: The woman that got married a bunch of times and killed herself when you were 13?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! you are right! Go!  Go tell Chandler! Hurry before it's too late! Wait no!  Does this also mean putting out doesn't get you love?

name: rachel
dialogue: I cannot believe I'm going to meet Jessica Ashley!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay wait-wait p-please be cool! Okay? I work with this woman.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, I'm totally cool!

name: jessica ashley
dialogue: Come in.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Jessica.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Jess.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah, this is my friend Rachel.

name: jessica ashley
dialogue: Hi.

name: rachel
dialogue: What's up?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh listen, here's your Soapie. I accepted it for you.

name: jessica ashley
dialogue: Oh my God! I won! Do you have any idea what this means?!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, that-that-that is it? you are going to, you are going to put it on your self or anything?

name: jessica ashley
dialogue: No, I try to save that for real awards. Now, if you'll excuse me.

name: joey
dialogue: Take it back?

name: rachel
dialogue: Absolutely.

name: joey
dialogue: Y-y-yeah!  Yeah you do.

name: monica
dialogue: Honey, as we get closer to the wedding, is there anything that you would like to talk about or share?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. Well, I think the centrepieces are too big

name: monica
dialogue: you are wrong! The centrepieces are fine! Do you ever get scared at all?

name: chandler
dialogue: kind of. They're really big.

name: monica
dialogue: Doesn't it ever just freak you out that-that you are never going to be with anybody new again?

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: Just, I love you so much. Just...It's just sometimes it bothers me that I'm never going to have that feeling. You know when you meet someone for the first time and it's new and exciting? You know that rush?

name: chandler
dialogue: No. No, see when I first meet somebody it's uh it's mostly panic, anxiety, and a great deal of sweating.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, but all right you are a guy, does it not freak you that you are never going to sleep with anybody else?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sleeping with somebody new, anxiety, panic, and I'm afraid even more sweating.

name: monica
dialogue: Even with me?

name: chandler
dialogue: I was dangerously dehydrated during the first six months of our relationship.  Look, for me the rush is knowing that we are going to be together for the rest of our lives.

name: monica
dialogue: Really?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well yeah! But now that I know that you are having these thoughts, I'm back to panic, anxiety, and uh I'm definitely going to need some kind of sports drink.

name: monica
dialogue: Come here! Come here!  Sweetie you don't have to worry. No, besides you know what? I'm going to have a lot of new things with you. The first time we buy a house. Our first kid. Our first grandkid...

name: chandler
dialogue: Water! Water! Water!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh Mr. Morse, can I speak to you for a moment?

name: morse
dialogue: That was a great lecture today. Did you get a little hair cut?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-hmm, yeah-yeah do you like it? Do-do you love it? I just want you to know that I'm changing your grade back.

name: morse
dialogue: What?! Why?

name: ross
dialogue: Cause I know what you are trying to pull here. Okay? It's not going to work.

name: morse
dialogue: I'm not trying to pull anything. Look I love you dude.

name: ross
dialogue: You know what? I-I'm not even going to talk about this. Okay? This little thing is over. I know you have a girlfriend! Okay--Yeah! And I know about the other professors! How do you think that makes me feel Ned?! You used me! You don't love me and you never did!  Ah Professor Winston, Professor Fredrickson, I'll be right with you.  Don't make this worse and I'll give you a C.  Shall we?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rach?

name: rachel
dialogue: I'll be out in a second.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh.  It's just so unexpected! I...I uh...Boy I'll tell you it's just such an honour to be nominated for a Nobel Prize and you know to win one for a massage. Especially after having just won a Tony award for best actress in...

name: rachel
dialogue: Honey, we have to go. Our reservations are at 8

name: phoebe
dialogue: ...in Reservations at 8

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay honey, you can finish this later we're going to be late. We got to go.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Please, don't play the music. Just uh one more. LIVE FROM NEW YORK! IT'S SATURDAY NIGHT!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh hey! How was your audition?

name: joey
dialogue: I'm sorry, do I know you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: joey
dialogue: Nothing, I'm just practicing blowing you off because I'm going to be a big movie star!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! You got it?!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, no not yet. But the audition went really good.

name: monica
dialogue: What was it for?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, it's this big budget period movie about these three Italian brothers who come to America around the turn of the century. It's really classy! Oh, and the director is supposed to be the next, next Martin Scorsese.

name: phoebe
dialogue: The next, next?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, there's this guy from Chicago who's supposed to be the next Martin Scorsese, all right? But then this guy's right after him.  Hello!

name: estelle
dialogue: Joey! It's Estelle! I just talked to the casting people; they loved you!

name: joey
dialogue: They loved me!

name: estelle
dialogue: Yeah, they want to see you again tomorrow.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: estelle
dialogue: There's just one thing. Do you have a problem with full frontal nudity?

name: joey
dialogue: Are you kidding me? I never rent a movie without it!  Oh.  Uh, okay uh let me call you back.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What's the matter?

name: joey
dialogue: They want me to be totally naked in the movie!

name: monica
dialogue: Wow!

name: joey
dialogue: I know! My grandmother's going to see this!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Grandma's going to have to get in line.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey the wedding is so close! Are you getting nervous?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah. But a part of me also can't wait 'til it's over. Chandler and I have this pact not to have sex again until the wedding.

name: ross
dialogue: A no sex pact huh? I actually have one of those going on with every woman in America.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Phoebe, will you give me a hand?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure.

name: monica
dialogue: I got to make up the guest bedroom.  Hey, Cousin Cassie is coming to stay with us a few days.

name: ross
dialogue: Cassie?

name: monica
dialogue: Uh-hmm.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow, I haven't seen her for like forever. I wonder if she still carries that Barbie everywhere she goes.

name: monica
dialogue: Ross, she's 25 years old.

name: ross
dialogue: So what! I still have-No you are probably right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Pheebs, can I talk to you over here for a second?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: monica
dialogue: Subtle guys!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!

name: monica
dialogue: I know you are planning my surprise bridal shower.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well okay-Well don't ruin it! Just play along at least!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. Sorry.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! We have to throw her a shower?!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! What did you decide to do about the movie?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know! It's not like it's porn! This is a serious, legitimate movie. You know? And the nudity is really important to the story.

name: monica
dialogue: that is what you say about porn.

name: joey
dialogue: you are right. Maybe I shouldn't even go on the call back.

name: monica
dialogue: No! No you should! A lot of major actors do nude scenes! I mean the chance to star in a movie? Come on!

name: joey
dialogue: Well that is true. And I am only naked in one scene. Plus it sounds really great. My character's catholic and he falls in love with this Jewish girl. Who run away together and they get caught in this big rainstorm. So we go into this barn and undress each other and hold each other. It's really sweet and-and tender.

name: monica
dialogue: Plus, everyone's going to see your thing.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well when can we have this shower?

name: rachel
dialogue: She has got so much going on we-we have only two options. We have Friday...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well that is only two days away. What is the other option?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yesterday!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well if we make it yesterday, woo-hoo! We're done!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God Phoebe, this is impossible! We can't do this by Friday! We have to find a place. We have to invite people! We have to get food! There's just too much to do! It's impossible! We can't do it! We cannot do it! We cannot do it!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rachel, calm down!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. I'm sorry. you are right, you are right.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Just calm down woman!

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe, I already, I already did.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh okay. All right, then I need to calm down a little.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Okay.  I think we can do this if we just get organized. All right? We have two days to plan this party. We just need to make fast decisions! Okay? All right, where are we going to have it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh, here. What time?

name: rachel
dialogue: 4 o'clock. Food?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Finger sandwiches and tea.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh great! Very Monica.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And chili!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ah you went one too far. Uh, flowers or balloons?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Both!

name: rachel
dialogue: We're paying for this you know.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Neither.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Umm, what should we do for the theme?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Lusts of the flesh.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't know.  A cowboy theme?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know I'm-I'm really glad we decided not to sleep together before the wedding.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh boy me too!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know I was thinking if we had a...a big fight and uh we broke up for a few hours...

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah?

name: chandler
dialogue: Technically we could have sex again. What do you think, bossy and domineering?!

name: monica
dialogue: The wedding is off, sloppy and immature!

name: chandler
dialogue: that is me! Come on!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.  But wait, we can't. My Cousin Cassie is in the guest room, we're supposed to have lunch.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well get rid of her, obsessive and shrill.

name: monica
dialogue: Shrill?! The wedding is back on!

name: cassie
dialogue: I thought I heard voices. You must be Chandler.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi! Nice to meet you!

name: cassie
dialogue: Nice to meet you too.

name: monica
dialogue: So, are you ready to go?

name: cassie
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'll be right with you.

name: monica
dialogue: Cassie needs to stay at your place.

name: ross
dialogue: What-why?

name: monica
dialogue: Because Purvry Perverson over here can't stop staring at her.

name: ross
dialogue: What?! Chandler she's our cousin!

name: chandler
dialogue: I was not staring at her. Okay? I was just listening intently. It's called being a good conversationalist. Watch.  Say something.

name: monica
dialogue: You were staring about eight inches south of there.

name: ross
dialogue: Fine, she can stay at my place. By the way, what-what does Cassie even look like now.

name: monica
dialogue: She looks exactly like Aunt Marilyn.

name: chandler
dialogue: Umm, so this Aunt Marilyn is-is-is-is she coming to the wedding?

name: monica
dialogue: Wafer thin ice!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, I'm back!

name: the casting director
dialogue: Hi-hi Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Uh so, will-will I be reading the same scene again?

name: the casting director
dialogue: Actually, I tried to call to you. You didn't need to come down here today.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh great! You know I would've been perfect for this part, but whatever! You know, thanks for making a bad decision and ruining your movie! Good day!

name: the casting director
dialogue: Wait Joey! You didn't need to come down because the director saw your tape from yesterday and loved it.

name: joey
dialogue: And scene! Huh? Wasn't that fun? We did a little improv there. Yeah! Okay! So you-you-you-you were saying?

name: the casting director
dialogue: Well, the director thinks you are really right for the part and wants to meet you tomorrow.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! Sure! that is great!

name: the casting director
dialogue: Oh and your agent said you were okay with the nudity.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! Yeah sure, just long as it's handled tastefully and that barn is not too cold.

name: the casting director
dialogue: Terrific! Well uh, there's one more thing. Uhh, uh it's really important to the director that everything in this movie is authentic. Yeah and so in your love scene with Sarah she talks about how she's never seen a naked man who wasn't Jewish. So...

name: joey
dialogue: So...What?

name: the casting director
dialogue: So uh well the director is insisting that whoever play that part be authentically, anatomically not Jewish. Do you know what I'm saying?

name: joey
dialogue: Yes!

name: the casting director
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: No. What?

name: the casting director
dialogue: An Italian Catholic immigrant at this time would not be...

name: joey
dialogue: Barmifsaed?

name: monica
dialogue: So to get this part you can't be?

name: joey
dialogue: Nope.

name: monica
dialogue: But you are?

name: joey
dialogue: Yep.

name: monica
dialogue: But you told them you weren't?

name: joey
dialogue: that is right.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! Wow! And it's definitely all gone? There's nothing there to work with?  What were you thinking?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know! I really want this part! And they tell you no matter what you get asked at an audition you say yes. Like if-if they want you to ride a horse, you tell them you can! And just figure out how to do it later.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey! This is not like learning to ride a horse! This is like learning to...grow a turtleneck!

name: joey
dialogue: I kn-I know! I know! Okay? And apparently tomorrow when I go in to meet the director I have to take off my clothes so that they can see what my body looks like.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, what are you going to do?!

name: joey
dialogue: I just have to call my agent and tell her I can't do the part.

name: monica
dialogue: Unless!

name: joey
dialogue: Unless what?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, this may sound crazy, but there maybe something we could fashion.

name: joey
dialogue: Like what?

name: monica
dialogue: Well I'm not sure yet, but umm of the top of my head I'm thinking double sided tape and some sort of luncheon meat.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! I've got a great idea for party favours for the shower. Okay, we get some uh mahogany boxes and carve everyone's names in them and inside is everyone's individual birth stone.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Okay. All right, you take care of that. And meanwhile, the party is tomorrow and we still don't have a guest list.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Okay! Well okay, who do we know that is coming? Me. Are you?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! What's up Mon?

name: monica
dialogue: Well uh, I'm trying to make something for Joey. Do you mind if I raid your fridge?

name: rachel
dialogue: Have at it.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.  All right, turkey. Eh, that won't work. Cheese?  That won't work. Olive loaf?  I hope that won't work.

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you making' him a sandwich?

name: monica
dialogue: No it's umm, more like a wrap. Okay so uh, I'm going to go guys.

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: I guess you can get back to deciding on what to get me for a present!

name: rachel
dialogue: We have to get her a present?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay but look! Look at what I got! It's her address book!  We have a guest list!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God you are amazing! Did you just pull that out of her purse?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh, and a little seed money for the party.

name: ross
dialogue: Cassie?!

name: cassie
dialogue: Hey Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: cassie
dialogue: It's been so long! Last time I saw you, you were setting up your tent in line to see Return of the Jedi.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh. Oh, that is right. So-so you did see me that day because it seemed like you didn't.

name: cassie
dialogue: Ah yeah, sorry about that.

name: ross
dialogue: It's okay. Come, come on in.

name: cassie
dialogue: Thanks for letting me stay here! I mean Monica's place was nice, but her fiancee sure stares a lot.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh.

name: cassie
dialogue: Oh my God! You do a great Chandler!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh. Yeah I-I have a knack for impressions.

name: cassie
dialogue: Well, maybe after we get reacquainted uh, you can do me.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah-No!!

name: ross
dialogue: Cassie, how you-how you doin' on that...hot dog.

name: cassie
dialogue: I'm all done.

name: ross
dialogue: Thank God.

name: cassie
dialogue: I guess the last time we really hung out was when our parents rented that beach house together.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh right. Right. Ooh, remember the time I uh, I pinned you down and tickled you 'til you cried?  We're probably too old to do that now.

name: cassie
dialogue: I'll always remember that summer, because it's when I got all of these freckles.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh! Uh-huh! And-and-and I'll always remember that summer because that is when I realized that we are related.

name: cassie
dialogue: It took you that long to figure it out, huh?

name: ross
dialogue: Well I'm, I'm a little slow.  Just as our children would be.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi!

name: woman
dialogue: Hi!

name: phoebe
dialogue: How are you?  Good.  Hi, thanks for coming.

name: woman
dialogue: Oh thank you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thank you.  No?  All right.  Oh, it's so nice to see you.

name: woman
dialogue: No.

name: the other woman
dialogue: No thanks.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.  Hey Rach?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Who the hell are all these people?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I don't know. I called all the people in Monica's phone book and these are the only ones who could show up on 24 hours notice.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hmm, you know there's another word for people like that. Losers!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! I'm Rachel. This is Phoebe. I'm the maid of honour. How do you know Monica?

name: woman
dialogue: I was her accountant four years ago.

name: rachel
dialogue: oh!

name: woman
dialogue: I'm very interested to find out who's been doing her taxes these last four years.

name: rachel
dialogue: that is great!

name: woman
dialogue: So, what time is Monica supposed to get here?

name: phoebe and rachel
dialogue: I don't know.

name: rachel
dialogue: Excuse us for a minute.  You didn't tell her to come?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You were supposed to tell her!

name: rachel
dialogue: No I wasn't! You were supposed to tell her to come and I was supposed to bring the cake!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Fine, I'll go call her.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes! And please tell her to bring a cake!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, we have a lot of options here, a number of prototypes for you to try on.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! This looks great!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! Okay, this one is a mushroom cap.  Umm, this one is made of bologna.

name: joey
dialogue: And-and-and-and-and the toothpicks?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, just until the glue dries.

name: joey
dialogue: Thank God!

name: monica
dialogue: Now, these are-are more realistic, but perishable.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay?  Over here we have pink suede, which is nice. But umm, if it gets wet then you know it's going to shrink.

name: joey
dialogue: Well maybe we just take that one away.

name: monica
dialogue: I also, did a little something in fur. But umm, that is really just for me.  Okay. So, why don't you go into your room and try these on and we'll see-get a better idea of what's going to work.

name: joey
dialogue: Thanks, you are such a good friend. And this is so weird.

name: joey
dialogue: Ow!

name: monica
dialogue: Toothpick?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: What are you trying on now?

name: joey
dialogue: The fruit roll up.

name: monica
dialogue: And?

name: joey
dialogue: Delicious.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Wait a minute! Wait a minute! We have a winner!

name: monica
dialogue: What?! Which one?!

name: joey
dialogue: The Silly Putty! It's not so silly anymore!

name: ross
dialogue: She's your cousin. She's your cousin! If she knew what was going on in your head she'd think you were sick!  Or would she? Let's back up a second. She was the one who suggested opening a bottle of wine. She was the one who turned down the lights. She was the one that wanted to rent Logan's Run, the sexiest movie ever.  Oh, I know that look. Forget it. I want it. She wants it. I'm going in.

name: cassie
dialogue: Hey! What the hell are you doing?!

name: ross
dialogue: Say something clever!  Okay, doesn't have to be clever, it just has to be words. Say some words.  Any words will do.  Oh my God! This is the longest that anyone has not talked ever!  There is nothing you can say to make this worse!! So just say something!!   I-I, I uh haven't had sex in a very long time.   Yeah, you really shouldn't have said anything.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe! Rachel! It's Monica! I wonder what you could possibly need me for on such short notice!  Oh.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Monica, we are so sorry.

name: monica
dialogue: For what?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well first, for forgetting to throw you a bridal shower.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And then for forgetting to invite you to it.

name: monica
dialogue: You al-you already had it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. Well, we called everyone in your phone book and bunch of people came, but it took us so long to get you here that they-they had to leave.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, we wanted to throw you a big surprise and a great shower, and now you don't have either.

name: phoebe
dialogue: We ruined everything.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh...

name: monica
dialogue: Well no wait a minute that is not true! No, what did, that was really sweet. And it kind of works out for the best.

name: rachel
dialogue: What do you, what do you mean?

name: monica
dialogue: Well now, I get to spend my shower with the only people I really love! I mean, I get all those presents  without having to talk to people I don't even like!

name: rachel
dialogue: Surprise...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sur-surprise.

name: rachel
dialogue: ...Monica.

name: joey
dialogue: And what's cool is, the character is from Naples, right?

name: the director
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: My whole family's from Naples!

name: the director
dialogue: Oh that is great! Okay, well I've heard everything I need to hear. I just need to uh, Leslie...

name: the casting director
dialogue: Joey, this is awkward part.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh! Hey right! Not a problem.  I totally understand. You need to you know make sure I don't have any horrible scars or tattoos. Don't you worry; I have nothing to hide.  So there you go, that is me.  One hundred percent natural!   I tell you, that has never happened before.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Cassie, are you finding everything okay in there?

name: cassie
dialogue: Yeah! Thank you so much for letting me stay here.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! No problem! I...

name: cassie
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Say something! Say anything! Ask her out! She's not your cousin!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! Out of all of us, who do you think is going to get married next?

name: joey
dialogue: Probably Monica and Chandler.

name: woman
dialogue: Hi. Could I have a pack of Newport Lights, please?

name: gunther
dialogue: Oh umm, uh we don't sell cigarettes, but they have them at the newsstand across the street.

name: woman
dialogue: That'd be great, thanks.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God, Melissa Warburton. I don't think I have the energy for this.

name: melissa
dialogue: Oh my God! Ray-ray Green?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Melissa!

name: melissa
dialogue: You have been M.I.A for the past seven sorority newsletters, what's up with you?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wh--Why don't I tell you over here?

name: melissa
dialogue: So last I heard you were going to get married.   Oh poor Ray-ray.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh no-no, no! It's good! It's all good! I-I actually work at Ralph Lauren!

name: melissa
dialogue: Shut up!

name: rachel
dialogue: I will not! I'm the divisional head of men's sportswear!

name: melissa
dialogue: Oh shut up more! Now, are you friends with Ralph?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh please...

name: melissa
dialogue: Are you?!

name: rachel
dialogue: No.

name: melissa
dialogue: Listen, we-we have to have dinner. What-what are you doing tomorrow night?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh tomorrow, oh I don't know. Um...

name: melissa
dialogue: You do now. you are having dinner with me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Shut up.

name: melissa
dialogue: I-I've got to go. This has been so great Ray-ray!  Oh, there you are.   Umm, so listen, just call me. Here's my card.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, wow thanks!  Oh you are in real estate!

name: melissa
dialogue: Oh no, that is-that is an old card. Umm, I wanted to get out of that and-and do something where I can really help people and-and make a difference.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! What do you do now?

name: melissa
dialogue: I'm a party planner. I'll see you tomorrow.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey guys! Look who's back! It's Ray-ray!

name: rachel
dialogue: Shut up that was my friend Melissa from college.

name: ross
dialogue: She seems really, really fun!

name: rachel
dialogue: She's actually very sweet and we used to be very close.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait a minute, she isn't... She's not the one who you...

name: joey
dialogue: Who you what? Who you what?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow!

name: joey
dialogue: Wow? Wow what?! Wow what?! Who you-what?!!

name: rachel
dialogue: It's not a big deal!

name: monica
dialogue: They were lovers.

name: ross
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: No we weren't! It was nothing! It was one night, senior year we went to a party, had a lot of sangria and you know, ended up...kissing for a bit.

name: ross
dialogue: So that is two of my wives.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay so this is where the band is.  And this is where the bar is.  And all these pins have people's names on them.  And Rach, here you are.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wow. Why don't we just take me  and put me with a Manhattan in my hand, talking to the cute bartender.  These pins aren't for playing are they?

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, the red ones are my guests and the blue ones are yours.

name: chandler
dialogue: This is so sad. I mean, I only have like ten pins.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, relax it's not a contest.  Certainly not a close one.

name: joey
dialogue: Hello!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Rach.

name: rachel
dialogue: Stop picturing it!!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I think that is it. The seating chart is done. This is our wedding. They all look like they're having fun don't they?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, so where are my parents going to be?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh!  Let's see, well...if this is the wedding hall then umm  you are parents will be at home in Queens.

name: joey
dialogue: What they're not invited?! Oh no, that is terrible! They're going to be crushed!

name: monica
dialogue: Why would they think they're invited?

name: joey
dialogue: You got me. I don't...

name: monica
dialogue: Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I'm sorry. I thought parents were coming! You know? Your parents are coming'! Chandler's parents are coming'! Ross's parents are coming'!

name: monica
dialogue: Ross's parents are my parents!

name: joey
dialogue: Well-well-see? Parents are coming'!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know I think we should invite them.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh please, you just want more blue pins.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well this is just sad!

name: monica
dialogue: All right, all right. Maybe I can fit them in if I just do some rearranging. But uh, Rachel may actually have to sit at the bar!

name: rachel
dialogue: That is not a problem.

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe you'll order a little sangria?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, get out of here!

name: rachel
dialogue: So now, these are all the tuxedos that we make and if there's anything that you like, we can make you a deal. Anything at all.  But these are the three that Monica pre-approved.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, thanks a lot for hooking' me up Rach. I want you to know that I want you to attend our wedding as my guest.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm Monica's maid of honour. Okay? Don't try to blue pin me!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, what's the deal with these? These-these look nice.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh they are nice. We-we custom-make tuxedos for celebrities and then when they're done with them they just send them back.

name: chandler
dialogue: You mean like for award shows?

name: rachel
dialogue: Some of them.

name: chandler
dialogue: You mean these tuxes have been down the red carpet with people yelling, "You are you wearing?! You look fabulous!"

name: rachel
dialogue: Honey, might I suggest watching a little more ESPN and a little less E!?

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, who wore those?

name: rachel
dialogue: Umm, well let's see uh, this one is Tom Brokaw.

name: chandler
dialogue: Not bad.

name: rachel
dialogue: This one is uh Paul O'Neil.

name: chandler
dialogue: Who's that?

name: rachel
dialogue: He plays for the Yankees. Seriously, ESPN! Just once and a while, have it on in the background.  Ooh, this one was Pierce Brosnan!

name: chandler
dialogue: Pierce Brosnan?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you serious?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: 007?! This is James Bond's tux?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I have to get married in James Bond's tux!

name: rachel
dialogue: It's a pretty cool tux.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, it's not just that, I would be England's most powerful weapon. Jet setting heartbreaker on her majesty's secret service. A man who fears no one; with a license to kill.  Would Monica let me wear this?

name: joey
dialogue: We should really learn how to play the real way.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I like our way. Oh!  Chess!

name: joey
dialogue: Nice move.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: So Joey I just hooked Ross and Chandler up with some tuxedos for the wedding, do you need one?

name: joey
dialogue: No, I'm performing the ceremony. I'm not wearing a tux.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, what are you going to wear?

name: joey
dialogue: Multi-coloured robes! Ooh, and maybe a hat.

name: rachel
dialogue: Huh. Does Monica know about this?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't think so.

name: rachel
dialogue: Can I please be there when you tell her?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey oh, Rach wait! Do you want to go to a movie tonight?

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, you know what? I can't. I have to have dinner with that Melissa girl.

name: joey
dialogue: Can I come?! I won't even talk! You'll just hear the noise from my video camera.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What is this? What's going on?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh good! Can I tell her?! Can I tell her?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, do you want to hear what actually happened or Joey's lewd version?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Joey's!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay...

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, come on! I had this friend from college and I made the stupid mistake of telling Joey that one time...she and I you know...kissed a little bit.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I'm sure that happened.

name: rachel
dialogue: It-it did!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.  It happened!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, it was senior year in college. It was after the Sigma Chi luau and Melissa and I got very drunk! And we ended up kissing! For several minutes!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Which means she had a couple spritzers and a quick peck on the cheek.

name: joey
dialogue: Why are you taking this away from me?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, why is it so hard for you to believe?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay! I just-I didn't know that you are a lesbian.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm not saying that I'm a lesbian! I'm just saying that this happened!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, it just seems pretty wild and you are so-You know so...vanilla.

name: rachel
dialogue: Vanilla?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm not vanilla! I've done lots of crazy things! I mean I got-I got drunk and married in Vegas!

name: phoebe
dialogue: To Ross.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, you know what? If you don't want to believe me about this, why don't you just come with me to dinner tonight and she will tell you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay! All right! Yeah! Because I just can't picture it.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh-ho, you should get inside my head.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! Guess what I got for your wedding!

name: chandler
dialogue: A freakish thin date with a hanger for her head?

name: ross
dialogue: No. Rachel hooked me up with a tux! But not just any tux, Batman's tux!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: that is right! Made expressly for Val Kilmer and worn by him in the hit film...that Batman film he was in.

name: chandler
dialogue: You can't wear that! I'm wearing the famous tux! James Bond's tux!

name: ross
dialogue: So?

name: chandler
dialogue: So-If you wear that you'll make mine less special.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, you need something to make this day special? Hello! You-you-you have the most special thing of all! You are marrying the woman you love.

name: chandler
dialogue: Please, don't take away my cool thing. Please?! Pretty please?!

name: ross
dialogue: Pretty please? Not very uh, 007.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, it's my wedding day okay? If you were getting married I would never do anything to upset you.

name: ross
dialogue: When I got married you slept with my sister.

name: chandler
dialogue: That was pretty 007.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey. Oh good-good you are here! All right, I figured it out. I'm going to take two tables of eight, I'm going to add your parents, and I'm going to turn them into three tables of six. Okay? And I called the caterer; I added two extra meals, we are good to go!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, they're not coming.

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Somehow they got the idea that you only invited them because of me. They...feel a little unwanted.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh that is too bad. It's true, but too bad.

name: joey
dialogue: Look Mon, if you could just call my mom...

name: monica
dialogue: Oh Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Come on! Look just-just tell-let her know that you really want them to be there. Let's not forget, this is a woman that has sent you many lasagnas over the years.

name: monica
dialogue: No she hasn't.

name: joey
dialogue: Is it her fault that some of them didn't make it to you?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, what am I going to say?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know. Just uh, just tell them it was a mix-up with the invitations, or-No-no-no! Blame it on the post office. They hate the post office. And the Irish! But I don't think you can blame it on them so...

name: monica
dialogue: Hello?  Yeah, hi! Mrs. Tribbiani?  Hi, this is Monica Geller.  Yeah I'm just calling to say that Chandler and I uh, really hope you can make it to the wedding. Yeah, apparently a bunch of invitations that we sent weren't delivered. Umm, I guess there was some screw up at the damn post office!   T-Tell me about it!  Yeah, yeah, the US Post Office? No, more like US lost office!  What are they Irish?!

name: melissa
dialogue: ...anyway, his name is Allan and we've been going out for three years. He was my first client when I became a party planner. He was planning a party for his girlfriend at the time. Oh well.  And he was Theta Beta Pi at Syracuse.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh. Oh, that is great!

name: melissa
dialogue: Hmm Phoebe, were you ever in a sorority?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Of course! Yeah, I was uh, umm Thigh Mega Tampon.

name: melissa
dialogue: What one?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! you know, we were really huge too, but then they had to shut us down when Regina Phalange died of alcohol poisoning.

name: melissa
dialogue: Oh, isn't a shame when one girl ruins it for the whole bunch?

name: rachel
dialogue: Anyway, speaking of drinking too much. I was uh, telling' Phoebe about that one crazy night after the Sigma Chi luau where you and I uh, we made out.

name: melissa
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Remember?! We-come on both had the sarongs on, and we had the-the coconut bikini tops...

name: melissa
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: ...we went back the house and we got really silly and we...we made out.

name: melissa
dialogue: Oh wow, Ray-ray I have no idea what you are talking about.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ross is Batman!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, he did manage to keep his identity secret for a long time.

name: chandler
dialogue: Rachel got Ross the tuxedo that Val Kilmer wore in Batman. Okay Batman is so much cooler than James Bond!

name: monica
dialogue: What are you talking about?! 007 has all those gadgets!

name: chandler
dialogue: Batman has a utility belt!

name: monica
dialogue: 007 has a fancy car!

name: chandler
dialogue: Batman has the Batmobile!

name: monica
dialogue: 007 gets all the ladies.

name: chandler
dialogue: Batman has Robin!  We get ESPN right?

name: monica
dialogue: How about you go put on your 007 tuxedo and I'll make you a nice martini.

name: chandler
dialogue: Actually, I don't like martinis.

name: monica
dialogue: How about a Youhoo with a funny straw?

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh, yum!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Listen, I know the invitation says 6

name: monica
dialogue: The show?!

name: joey
dialogue: Right. Right. The wedding, gotcha. But I mean, it's going to start a little late right? I mean, weddings start late. Right?

name: monica
dialogue: Have you ever been to one of my weddings?

name: joey
dialogue: Ah. Yeah. Well look, the thing is it's the same day as my niece's christening and I really want my parents to be there in time to see me. Because my part's just in the beginning I'm not even in the rest of the show-Wedding!

name: monica
dialogue: The wedding starts at six.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. Okay, I totally hear you. Ooh how about this? I vamp a little 'til they get there?

name: monica
dialogue: You'll vamp?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! Yeah you know, like warm up the crowd. Ask them where they're from. Because in Joey Tribbiani you get a minister and you get an entertainer. I'm a minis-tainer!  There is no one better! There is no one greater!

name: rachel
dialogue: How can you not remember us kissing?!

name: melissa
dialogue: I don't know. I don't remember a lot of things that never happened.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wh... Come on! Remember? We were on the sleeping porch! We couldn't stop giggling? And our coconuts kept knocking' together?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, somewhere Joey's head is exploding.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah-but come on-Listen, I'm sorry I don't want to make you uncomfortable, but I told Phoebe that it happened and she doesn't believe me.

name: melissa
dialogue: I'm sorry Ray-ray. I mean if I thought it happened I would say it. Maybe I passed out and you did stuff to me while I was sleeping.

name: rachel
dialogue: No!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rachel, it's okay. You don't have to do this. I believe you. All right? Okay, if-if you say that you kissed Melissa, then you kissed Melissa.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you Phoebe.

name: melissa
dialogue: She didn't.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: You just carry that around?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes. I find it to be something of a conversation piece.

name: monica
dialogue: Between you and...

name: ross
dialogue: Gunther.  Hey-hey! Why don't we put them on? You know get a picture of Batman and James Bond together.

name: chandler
dialogue: I would but mine doesn't fit. The pants are a little tight.

name: monica
dialogue: A little tight? I could see double-oh and seven in those pants.

name: ross
dialogue: Well that stinks. I was looking forward to us wearing our celebrity tuxes together.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, does that mean that you are not going to wearing yours?

name: ross
dialogue: What are you kidding? It's Batman's tux!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Let me try it on!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, but just the jacket. Double-oh and seven are not getting' in there.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. Holy double-vented comfort Batman!  What's this?

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: An invitation for the At First Sight premiere? Oh my God! Val Kilmer didn't wear this in Batman! He wore it to the premiere of some tooty-fruity love story where he played a blind guy!

name: ross
dialogue: Let me see that!  Oh man!

name: chandler
dialogue: The only superpower you have is a slightly heightened sense of smell.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Uh, Monica? Chandler? Can I talk to you guys for a second?

name: monica
dialogue: All right that is it, I give up! Whatever you want you can have it! You want to sing a song? You want to do a dance? You want your mom stand at the Alter and scream racial slurs? I don't care!

name: joey
dialogue: No! No, I-I just want to thank you guys for what you did for my parents, that was really sweet. They're so happy they get to be a part of your special day.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you are welcome. And tell them we're really glad they're coming.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. I will. OH! Check out what they got me to wear for the ceremony!  Huh? I wear it like this when I marry you guys, and then this  is for party time.

name: rachel
dialogue: It happened! I am telling you it happened!

name: melissa
dialogue: Okay.  Well, it was great meeting you. And uh Rachel, I-I don't think I'll be calling you  because umm, you know you've gotten weird.  Take care you guys.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! Wait a minute! No wait a minute!  Okay? Look, that night was the one wild thing I have ever done in my entire life, and I'm not going to let you take that away from me! Okay, so if you don't remember that, maybe you will remember this!

name: melissa
dialogue: My God! You love me!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: melissa
dialogue: Of course I remember our kiss. I think about it all the time. I can still hear the coconuts knocking' together I...  I just didn't want to tell you Because I didn't think that you'd return my love, and now that you have...

name: rachel
dialogue: Whoa! Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! Whoa! Whoa!

name: melissa
dialogue: Aww, look who's being suddenly shy. You can't tell me you don't feel what I feel. Nobody can kiss that good and not mean it.

name: rachel
dialogue: I-I-I-I'm just...I'm just a good kisser!

name: melissa
dialogue: Shut up!

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm sorry!

name: melissa
dialogue: Oh you don't have to be  sorry. I'm...I'm obviously kidding. I'm not in love with you.  I'm not in love with her. I don't hear coconuts banging together. Yeah, I don't...picture your face when I make love to my boyfriend. Anyway, I got to go. Eh...kiss good-bye?  No? Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! I mean I had no idea that that was going to...

name: rachel
dialogue: What the hell was that?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I just wanted to see what all the fuss was about.

name: rachel
dialogue: And?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I've had better.

name: chandler
dialogue: All right! I found one that fits!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well you know what they say, the 23rd time's the charm.  Aww, look at you all handsome!

name: chandler
dialogue: Whose is it?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh does it matter?! All that matters is that you look so handsome.

name: chandler
dialogue: Whose is it?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't want to say.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, come on! I don't care! Come on! Whose is it?

name: rachel
dialogue: Diane Keeton.

name: monica
dialogue: Do you realize that four weeks from today we're getting married? Four weeks baby!! Four weeks!!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Do you realize you get louder each week?

name: monica
dialogue: There's still so much to do. Have you written your vows yet?

name: chandler
dialogue: I figured I'd buy those. Pat, I'd like to buy a vow.

name: monica
dialogue: Sweetie, you know I have no sense of humour when it comes to the wedding.

name: chandler
dialogue: Right. So uh, have you written yours yet?

name: monica
dialogue: No! But I know exactly what I'm going to say.

name: chandler
dialogue: Do you happen to know what I'm going to say?

name: monica
dialogue: Let's just do it right now. Okay? It won't be hard. Just say what's in your heart.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look at her go! She must love me more than I love her! What's wrong with me? Ooh, don't open that door.

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica, there are no words...  There are no words! This should not be this hard!

name: joey
dialogue: All right, uh...  Oh hey, you've done this before Ross, well what did you say when you made up your vows?

name: ross
dialogue: Well with Carol, I promised never to love another woman until the day I die. She made no such promise.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm so pathetic! Monica knows what she wants to say! You should've seen her. Writing, writing, writing!

name: rachel

dialogue: Yeah but, maybe it's not what we think. Maybe it's tell Monica I'm sorry I...drank the last of the milk.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Or maybe he-he was writing to tell her that-that he's changed his name, you know? Tell Monica I'm sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: I think it means he freaked out and left!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Don't be so negative! Good God! Isn't it possible that Sorry is sitting in there  right now?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Phoebe, I-I think Ross is right. What are we going to do?

name: ross
dialogue: Look-Okay, I'm just going to-I'm going to have to go find him and bring him back! Okay? You-you make sure Monica does not find out, okay?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay but if you don't find him and bring him back, I am going to hunt you down and kick your ass!

name: ross
dialogue: I will, I will find him.

name: richard
dialogue: Hey Joey, could you uh, go through these lines with me?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh man! They-they just redid my make-up!

name: richard
dialogue: Just the last two pages.

name: joey
dialogue: All right.

name: richard
dialogue: I found the picture!

name: joey
dialogue: Picture? What picture?

name: richard
dialogue: Could you uh, could you lower your script? I need to see your face so I can uh, play off your reaction.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay uh, look I know you are a great actor, okay? And you play all those Shakespeare guys and stuff...

name: richard
dialogue: Oh, thanks.

name: joey
dialogue: But you are spitting' all over me man!

name: richard
dialogue: Well of course I am!

name: joey
dialogue: You know you've been spitting on me?!

name: richard
dialogue: that is what real actors do! Annunciation is the mark of a good actor! And when you enunciate, you spit!

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! Didn't know that.

name: richard
dialogue: Great!

name: joey
dialogue: Thanks! Okay-okay check it out!  Picture? What picture?  Eh?

name: ross
dialogue: Gunther have you uh, have you seen Chandler?

name: gunther
dialogue: No. No, I haven't seen him.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh damn!

name: gunther
dialogue: He's getting married tomorrow right?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes. Yes. Don't worry. Everything's fine. We'll uh, we'll see you tomorrow at the wedding.

name: gunther
dialogue: I wasn't invited.

name: ross
dialogue: Well then we'll-we'll see you the day after tomorrow.  Mom?! Dad?!  What-what...what you guys doing here?!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Well you kids talk about this place so much, we thought we'd see what all the fuss is about.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: I certainly see what the girls like coming here.

name: ross
dialogue: Why?!

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: The sexy blonde behind the counter.

name: ross
dialogue: Gunther?!

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Your mother just added him to her list.

name: ross
dialogue: What? Your-your list?

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Yeah, the list that-of people we're allowed to sleep...

name: ross
dialogue: Yes! No-no! I know, I know what the list is! Mom! Look if you see Chandler, could you just let him know I'm looking for him?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: And if you see Rita Moreno, let her know I'm looking for her.

name: the director
dialogue: Action!

name: richard
dialogue: I found the picture!

name: joey
dialogue: What picture?!

name: richard
dialogue: The picture of my wife! In your pack!

name: joey
dialogue: You went through my personal property?

name: richard
dialogue: Why do have a picture of Paulette in your pack?!

name: joey
dialogue: Because Vincent, we were lovers.  For two years!

name: the director
dialogue: Cut! Wonderful!

name: joey
dialogue: Great scene yeah?

name: richard
dialogue: Oh you are awesome! And, in that last speech? You soaked me.

name: joey
dialogue: Thanks a lot.

name: the assistant director
dialogue: Here's your call sheet for tomorrow.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, I'm-I'm not working tomorrow.

name: the assistant director
dialogue: You are now.

name: joey
dialogue: No! No! I can't! You got to get me out of it! I've got plans!  Important plans!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross said there's still no word from Chandler.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh man.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh but he did say that they found the grandmother wandering down fifth avenue.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Well there's one down.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm getting married today!!!   I think I just cracked a rib. But I don't care because today's my wedding day! My day is finally here!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know she might not even notice he's gone.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm going to start getting ready!

name: rachel
dialogue: God! Don't-We can't let her start getting ready! This is too awful! Oh God, but wait she'll be in the gown and then he won't show up and then she's going to have to take off the gown...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Shh! Stop it! Stop it Rachel! You can't do this here!

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm sorry. I'm sorry. It's just...It's just so sad!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, but you've got to pull yourself together! Monica can't see you like this! Then she'll know something's wrong!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know. I know. Oh God.  There's no tissue! Can you grab me some toilet paper?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.  Oh, that is gone too. This is Monica's bathroom right?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No-no! I-I...I found one.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh thank you!  Oh God!  Can I have another one?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure.  Do you need some floss?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh God I just can not imagine what is going to happen if Chandler doesn't show up!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh here's a whole bunch.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I mean she's going to be at the wedding waiting for him and people will be whispering, "Oh that poor girl. "you know? Then she'll have to come back here and live all alone.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: There was a pregnancy test in the garbage, and it's positive. Monica's pregnant.  So I guess she won't be totally alone.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know! Monica's going to have a baby! Hey, can this count as her something new?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, do you think this is why Chandler took off?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, she had to have just taken that test because I took out the trash last night.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh God, this is turning into the worst wedding day ever! The bride is pregnant. The groom is missing. And I'm still holding this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay Phoebe, we can not tell anyone about this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, okay. Hey, wait. Do you know what kind of birth control she was using?

name: rachel
dialogue: No. Why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Just for the future, this is hardly a commercial for it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Anything?

name: ross
dialogue: No! I talked to Joey on the set, he hasn't heard from him. I-I-I talked to Chandler's parents again!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You told them he was missing?

name: ross
dialogue: No! I made it seem like I was just calling to chat. Pretty sure, they both think I'm interested in them.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, we've got to tell her he's gone.

name: ross
dialogue: No! Hey! Hey! We can't!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, she's going to start getting ready soon!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, can't you at least stall her a little? I'll-I'll go back to some of the places I went last night.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, well how much time do you need?

name: ross
dialogue: Well how much time before she absolutely has to start getting ready?

name: rachel
dialogue: One hour.

name: ross
dialogue: Give me two.

name: rachel
dialogue: Then why do you ask?!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, wish me luck.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. I'm going with you.

name: ross
dialogue: Why?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, you are tired. You've been looking all night. And clearly you suck at this.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, I'll see you guys later.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Wait, do you know how you are going to stall her?

name: rachel
dialogue: I'll figure something out.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right. Good luck.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thanks.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! Okay, so I thought we'd start with my make up and then do my hair.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay uh, but before you do that. I-I, I need you to talk to me.

name: monica
dialogue: About what?

name: rachel
dialogue: Umm... I'm never going to getting married!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah you will! The right guy is just around the corner! Okay, are we done with that?

name: rachel
dialogue: No Monica! I'm serious! Oh, maybe I should just forget about it. Become a lesbian or something.

name: monica
dialogue: Any woman would be lucky to have you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well maybe it would make me feel better if I slept with Joey.

name: monica
dialogue: Rachel! You okay?

name: joey
dialogue: Excuse me, Aaron?  Hi! Umm, I have a little problem with the schedules. Originally, I wasn't supposed to work today, and I have this wedding that I really have to be at. It's my best friend's, and I'm officiating so I really can't work past four.

name: the director
dialogue: Joey, you got to stay until the end. We can't stop filming just for you. It's not like it's your wedding.

name: joey
dialogue: I'm having surgery!

name: the director
dialogue: What?!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I-I just made up the stuff about the wedding because I didn't want you to worry about me. But, I'm having surgery today.

name: the director
dialogue: What kind of surgery?!

name: joey
dialogue: Transplant.

name: the director
dialogue: But you are supposed to work on Monday.

name: joey
dialogue: Hair transplant.

name: the director
dialogue: But you are not bald.

name: joey
dialogue: It's not on my head.

name: the director
dialogue: Look Joey, there's nothing I can do. Besides, you are probably going to be out by four anyway. We've just got one short scene. It's just you and Richard, and God knows he's a pro. You'll be fine.  Morning Richard.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! you are here! Great! Great! Great! Let's get going buddy, we've got a scene to shoot!

name: richard
dialogue: I'm wearing two belts.

name: joey
dialogue: Are you drunk?

name: richard
dialogue: No!

name: joey
dialogue: Yes you are!

name: richard
dialogue: All right.

name: ross
dialogue: We are never going to find him! He's one guy in a huge city!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! Is that him?

name: ross
dialogue: That is an old, Chinese woman!

name: phoebe
dialogue: He could be in disguise, you know.

name: ross
dialogue: Aww, you know...You know, maybe we're-we're just approaching this all wrong. If you are Chandler and-and you want to hide, where is the last place on Earth people would think you'd go?

name: ross
dialogue: So this is your office?

name: chandler
dialogue: How did you guys find me? I knew I should've hid at the gym!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What the hell are you doing?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Panicking! And using the Internet to try to prove that I'm related to Monica. How is she?

name: ross
dialogue: She's fine. She doesn't know you are gone. And she doesn't have to know, okay? Now come on, we're going home.

name: chandler
dialogue: No! No! No! I can't do that!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why not?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Because if I go home, we're going to become the Bings! I can't be the Bings!

name: ross
dialogue: What's wrong with being the Bings?

name: chandler
dialogue: The Bings have horrible marriages! They yell. They fight. And they use the pool boy as a pawn in their sexual games!

name: ross
dialogue: Chandler, have you ever put on a black cocktail dress and asked me up to your hotel room?

name: chandler
dialogue: No.

name: ross
dialogue: Then you are neither of your parents!

name: chandler
dialogue: It's not just their marriage! I mean, look at yours. Look at everybody's! The only person that can make marriage work is Paul Newman! And I've met me; I am not Paul Newman. I don't race cars! I don't make popcorn! None of my proceeds go to charity.

name: phoebe
dialogue: But look Chandler, right now, no one has a lower opinion of you than I do. But I totally believe you can do this.

name: chandler
dialogue: I want to. I love her so much, but I'm afr...It's too huge.

name: ross
dialogue: You know, okay. you are right. It is huge. So why don't we take it just a little bit at a time? Okay? Umm, forget getting married for a sec; just forget about it. Can you just come home and take a shower?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well yeah, but then...

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah-No-but-but-but-but! We're just going to go home and take a shower. Now, that is not scary right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Depends on what you mean by we.

name: rachel
dialogue: The nights are the hardest.  But then the day comes! And that is every bit as hard as the night. And then the night comes again...

name: monica
dialogue: The days and nights are hard! I get it! Okay? Look umm, Rachel I'm sorry! I have to start getting ready! I'm getting married today!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know. At dusk. that is such a hard time for me.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm going to go put my make up on, we have to be at the hotel in an hour!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. But wait!

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Let's go to lunch.

name: monica
dialogue: I can't go to lunch!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh good God! I've fallen down!

name: monica
dialogue: What's going on?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. All right.  Honey listen. When I tell you what I'm about to tell you, I need you to remember that we are all here for you and that we love you.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, you are-you are really freaking me out.

name: rachel
dialogue: We can't find Chandler...-'s vest. We can't find Chandler's vest.

name: monica
dialogue: How can that be?! Oh wait! Wait! Are you, are you serious?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Found the vest! I mean we're going to have to keep an eye on it, you know make sure we don't lose it again...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh wow! Okay. Don't scare me like that okay? I mean for a minute there I was like, "Oh my God! The worst has happened!"

name: joey
dialogue: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

name: richard
dialogue: That can be arranged.

name: the director
dialogue: Let's reset.

name: joey
dialogue: What?! He got me! Owwwwww!!!

name: the director
dialogue: Let's take it from there.

name: richard
dialogue: Are you a little off today? It's going terribly slowly.

name: joey
dialogue: Look, my best friends are getting married in like an hour. Okay? And I'm the minister. Please! Please! Can you pull it together?

name: richard
dialogue: Of course! I'm-I'm sorry. I-I'd hate you to miss anything like that on account of me. I can do this!

name: joey
dialogue: Thank you. Thank you.

name: the director
dialogue: Still rolling, and action!

name: joey
dialogue: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

name: richard
dialogue: Now, that can be arranged!  Slippery little bugger!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So-so you two were married huh? What happened? You just drift apart?

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Here comes the bride.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God Monica!

name: monica
dialogue: I want to wear this everyday.

name: rachel
dialogue: You look so beautiful.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm so happy for me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hello?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Did Chandler show up yet?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, we got him back. Everything's fine.

name: joey
dialogue: Damnit!

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Why? Where are you?

name: joey
dialogue: I'm still on the set!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey! The wedding is in less than an hour!

name: joey
dialogue: I know! I'm sorry! The guy's drunk, they won't let me go until we get this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! I'm going to have to find another minister.

name: joey
dialogue: No! No, I'm the minister! All right, look-look, put them both on the phone, I'll marry them right now.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh! Joey, I have to go.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! Don't you hang up on me! I'll marry you and me right now! I have the power!

name: ross
dialogue: There you go. You put on a tuxedo! Now that wasn't so scary, was it?

name: chandler
dialogue: No.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm telling you, just a little bit at a time.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah okay. Well, what's the next little bit?

name: ross
dialogue: Getting married.  Okay. Okay. You can, you can do that too! Just like you've done everything else!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah. you are right. Hey I-I can do that.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, excuse me for a minute.

name: ross
dialogue: Wh-Hey-Whoa-whoa, where, where you going?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ross, I am not going to run away again! I just want to get a little fresh air.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh fresh air!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait! Maybe, maybe you are overreacting! You do that you know.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well Phoebe, we got to do something!  Well, you know. I mean there's no way Joey's going to make it in time. So I'm going to through the hotel and see if there's any other weddings going on.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Oh but don't tell them Monica's pregnant because, they frown on that.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Anastassakis/Papasifakis wedding, excellent! {It's a good thing Jennifer Aniston is Greek, because she had to pronounce those names. Luckily for me, they were written on a sign.} Congratulations.  Mazel Tov!  Hi! Oh, great hat.  Listen umm, I need you to perform another wedding. Can you do that?

name: the rabbi
dialogue: I don't know. Are they Greek Orthodox?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! Yeah. They're...they're-they're my friends, uh, Monica Stephanopoulos and uh, and Chandler Acidofolus.

name: ross
dialogue: Hi!  Hi!  Hi. Has umm, anyone seen Chandler?

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I thought he was with you.

name: ross
dialogue: He-he was with me umm, we're playing a little game, you know? Hide and seek.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: You can't ask us son, that is cheating.

name: ross
dialogue: you are right, thanks for keeping me honest dad.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Well, he better not come by here. He can't see the bride in the wedding dress.

name: mrs. bing
dialogue: As I recall when we got married, I saw the groom in the wedding dress.

name: mr. bing
dialogue: But that was after the wedding, it's not bad luck then.

name: mrs. bing
dialogue: Honey, it isn't good luck.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God! Monica!

name: monica
dialogue: I know! Hey, how's Chandler doin'?

name: ross
dialogue: Great. He's doing great. Don't you worry about Chandler.

name: monica
dialogue: Are you okay?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, you are-you are sweating.

name: ross
dialogue: These-these are beads of joy.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh that is sweet. Don't touch me.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh Phoebe, can I see you for a second?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What's going on?

name: ross
dialogue: Chandler's gone again!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! Why would you play hide and seek with someone you know is a flight risk?!

name: joey
dialogue: Aaron! You got to let me go. The guy's hammered!

name: the director
dialogue: I'm sorry Joey, as long as he's here and he's conscious we're still shooting.

name: richard
dialogue: You wouldn't happen to have a very big fork?

name: joey
dialogue: So I uh, I just talked to the director. that is it, we're done for the day.

name: richard
dialogue: Well have we finished the scene?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! You...you were wonderful.

name: richard
dialogue: As were you.

name: joey
dialogue: So I got your car, it's right outside.

name: richard
dialogue: Why? Are we done for the day?

name: joey
dialogue: that is what you told me.

name: richard
dialogue: Oh, thank you. you are welcome.

name: joey
dialogue: No-no-no! We got to go! Come on!  Here we go.

name: richard
dialogue: Is that my ass?

name: ross
dialogue: There he is!!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! Oh!

name: ross
dialogue: you are not getting away this time mister! Unless you want that ass kicking we talked about!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: Hiiii-Ya!!  I'm serious! you are not walking out on my sister!

name: chandler
dialogue: that is right! I'm not!

name: ross
dialogue: Then where the hell have you been?!

name: chandler
dialogue: I know about Monica.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know?!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I heard you and Rachel talking.

name: ross
dialogue: What?! What?! Talking about what?!

name: chandler
dialogue: You don't know?

name: ross
dialogue: Know what-If somebody doesn't tell me what's going on right now...

name: phoebe
dialogue: What? You'll hi-you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica's pregnant.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God. Oh my God! And you are-you are...you are not freaking out?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well I was! Then I went down to the gift shop because I was out of cigarettes...

name: phoebe and ross
dialogue: Cigarettes?!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Big picture please! So I was in the gift shop, and that is when I uh, saw this. Yeah, you know what? I thought anything that can fit into this, can't be scary.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well you obviously didn't see Chucky 3.

name: chandler
dialogue: But come on, look at how cute and small this is! So I got it to give Monica so she'd know I was okay.

name: ross
dialogue: Dude.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: Way to go son! I knew you'd find him!

name: mr. bing
dialogue: Our little boy is getting married.

name: mrs. bing
dialogue: Oh look at you! So handsome!

name: chandler
dialogue: You look beautiful mom.  You look beautiful too dad. I love you both.  I'm so glad you here.

name: the rabbi
dialogue: Are you Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you Joey?

name: ross
dialogue: Huh. This is nice.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: I've never walked down the aisle knowing it can't end in divorce.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Oh I wish you are grandmother had lived to see this.

name: monica
dialogue: She's right there.

name: mrs. geller
dialogue: Not that old crow, my mother.  Congratulations darling.

name: mr. geller
dialogue: I love you sweetheart.

name: chandler
dialogue: You look beautiful. Is this new?

name: monica
dialogue: Not now.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Who is this?

name: the rabbi
dialogue: I am Father Kalebasous.

name: chandler
dialogue: He's Greek Orthodox.

name: rachel
dialogue: As are you...

name: the rabbi
dialogue: Let us begin. Dearly beloved...

name: joey
dialogue: that is my line!  I can take it from here, thanks.  Dearly beloved, I'm sorry I'm a little late. You may be confused by this now,  but you won't be Memorial Day weekend 2002. Well, let's get started before the groom takes off again. Huh?  We are gathered here today, to join this man and this woman in the bonds of holy matrimony. I've known Monica and Chandler for a long time, and I can not imagine two people more perfect for each other. And now, as I've left my notes in my dressing room. We shall proceed to the vows. Monica?

name: monica
dialogue: He took off?

name: rachel
dialogue: Go on! Go on.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, for so long I...I wondered if I would ever find my prince, my soul mate. Then three years ago, at another wedding I turned to a friend for comfort. And in stead, I found everything that I'd ever been looking for my whole life. And now...here we are...with our future before us...and I only want to spend it with you, my prince, my soul mate, my friend. Unless you don't want to. You go!

name: joey
dialogue: Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, that is okay.  Monica I thought this was going to be the most difficult thing I ever going to had to do. But when I saw you walking down that aisle I realized how simple it was.
