dialogue: Yes! Remember? Right before we cut the cake, I went up to you and I said-

name: ross
dialogue: Oh-oh yeah, you-you came up to me and asked if I could do you a favour, and my Uncle Murray came up to you and handed you a check. And then you said, "Why do they call it a check? Why not a Yugoslavian?"  Yeah, then you did that.

name: chandler
dialogue: So you don't have the cameras?!

name: ross
dialogue: No. Sorry man.

name: chandler
dialogue: So? What? What? They're gone! Monica's going to freak!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I'm sure they're still somewhere here in the hotel. I'll-I'll help you look for them.

name: chandler
dialogue: Great.

name: ross
dialogue: In-in three minutes.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are you going to open the presents without Chandler?

name: monica
dialogue: No!  But, they're calling' out to me! I mean this little guy  even crawled up into my lap. Oh come on, Chandler wouldn't mind if I opened just one present! What do you think it is?

name: phoebe
dialogue: A little mirror that when you look into it you see yourself as an old woman.

name: monica
dialogue: A tiny salt shaker!!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: oh! My God! For tiny salt!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh wow! Okay. Well that was fun.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Good. Okay, I'm just going to wait for Chandler to open the rest of them.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Whew. Although you know, this is part of a salt and pepper set. I mean- I guess you know it may just count as a half a present. What do you think?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well I guess it's okay to open one more if it's part of a set. You know, it's probably this one.

name: monica
dialogue: Or this one!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, how are you feeling'? Any morning sickness?

name: rachel
dialogue: Shh-shh-shh! The guys don't know yet do they?

name: monica
dialogue: No! Joey and Ross don't know anything and Chandler still thinks that Phoebe's pregnant.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah that is right Chandler does still think I'm pregnant. He hasn't asked me how I'm feeling or offered to carry my bags. Boy, I feel bad for the woman who ends up with him.  After you of course.

name: rachel
dialogue: Don't worry I promise that you will only have to be pregnant for a few more hours, Because I'm going to tell the father today.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, is it someone in this building? Is it that tall guy from the first floor?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ew! No!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?! I think he's cute.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well then you have his baby.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Believe me I'm trying.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow. You know it is so weird. I mean, you are going to tell this guy today and he has no idea what's going to happen.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. you are just going to knock on his door and change his life forever. you are like Ed McMahon except without the big check, or the raw sexual magnetism.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Pretty big? It's huge! God, this guy doesn't have a clue! He's just walking down the street thinking, 'I had sex with Rachel Green. I rock!' then bam! He's a father and everything's different.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well it's only different if he wants it to be. I mean, I'm not going to ask him for anything.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay. Then he still has this huge decision to make. Now he's walking around thinking, 'Do I want to be a dad?' and then bam!

name: monica
dialogue: What was that bam?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't. He got-he-he-he-he's hit by a bus.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Joey, what would you do if someone that you slept with told you that she was pregnant?

name: joey
dialogue: Who called here? Did she sound blond? Huh? Did-did-did she have an accent? I got to make a call!  I should have never walked into that Sunglass Hut!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Joey! Joey! No, it's not you! You didn't get anybody pregnant!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh. Why would you scare me like that? What the hell is going on?  Is somebody pregnant?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah. that is me.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God Pheebs! you are going to have a baby?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes. Yes I am. Oh my God, I'm going to have a baby!

name: joey
dialogue: Whoa, wait a minute. Who's the father?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You don't know him. It's not important. He wants nothing to do with me or the baby.

name: joey
dialogue: Well who is this guy?! Huh? Who is he? Because I will track him down and kick his ass!

name: phoebe
dialogue: David Lynn.

name: joey
dialogue: David Lynn! David Lynn! David Lynn!!

name: monica
dialogue: Who's David Lynn?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh some guy from my gym. A little annoying.

name: ross
dialogue: Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! Did you find the cameras?

name: ross
dialogue: No. Did you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes! And that is why I'm under the table. Celebrating.

name: ross
dialogue: Well I checked in the uh, lost and found, I talked to the manager, no-one's turned them.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well this is great. You know, those cameras were the only thing that was going to cheer Monica up today, she's really depressed.

name: ross
dialogue: Now you guys just got married, why is she so depressed?

name: chandler
dialogue: All my energy is going into not asking that question. I can't believe I screwed this up!

name: ross
dialogue: I'm sorry man.  Here's a thought. This is the same ballroom. There's a band. There's going to be plenty of dressed up people.

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you suggesting we dance our troubles away?

name: ross
dialogue: No-no-no, I'm saying we-we buy more of this  at the gift shop, throw our tuxes back on, and take a few pictures. All we have to do is make sure not to get anybody else's faces.

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you serious?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm just thinking about your new bride at home. Okay? Do-do you really want to start your life together by letting her down?

name: chandler
dialogue: Marriage advice? Really?!

name: ross
dialogue: I'm telling you, this looks exactly like your wedding! Aren't these the same flowers?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know, Monica picked out the flowers.

name: ross
dialogue: What about the chairs?

name: chandler
dialogue: She picked those out too.

name: ross
dialogue: How about the place settings?

name: chandler
dialogue: That was her.

name: ross
dialogue: What did you do?

name: chandler
dialogue: I was in charge of the cameras! Gift shop?

name: ross
dialogue: Hmm.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! Ooh, did you do it yet?

name: rachel
dialogue: Not yet.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, well what are you doing here? Are you about to do it?  Is it Gunther?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Phoebe, it's not Gunther.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thank God, Because that hair on a baby-

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe the father is not here okay? I haven't told him yet and I don't think I can tell him at all now!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why not?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know, let me think. I was walking down the street thinking, 'I'm going to tell the father today' and then bam!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Bus?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, you! Phoebe you freaked me out. You kept saying how huge this all is!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well-well but it is huge.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know, but I was just thinking about how huge this is for me. I didn't even go to how huge this was going to be for the father.

name: phoebe
dialogue: you are thinking about this way too much. Just tell him and get it over with. It's like, it's like ripping off this Band-Aid.  Quick and painless, watch.  Oh mother of-See?

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh-ooh-ooh! Are we opening presents?

name: monica
dialogue: No! No! I shouldn't have even opened these! I mean I-Joey I am out of control!! Joey, you have to do me a favour. No matter what I say, no matter what I do, please do not let me open another present! Okay?

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Give me one more.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh good, uh you are here. Uh Pheebs? Listen uh sit down. I-I got something I want to say.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right.

name: joey
dialogue: Umm, now uh- It's a scary world out there, especially for a single mom. You know, now I always thought you and I had a special bond so-  Phoebe Buffay, will you marry me?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! Joey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hell yeah! I'll marry you!

name: monica
dialogue: You can't marry him!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey lady, your day's over! It's my turn!

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe!

name: joey
dialogue: Why?! Why can't she marry me?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can and I will!

name: monica
dialogue: She's not pregnant. It's Rachel. Rachel's the one who's pregnant.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe I think he would notice if you didn't have a baby in nine months!

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Now I can't believe it! What? Rachel's pregnant?  Who's the father?

name: phoebe
dialogue: We don't know.

name: joey
dialogue: OH- I wonder if that dude.

name: monica
dialogue: There's a dude?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Who? Who is it?

name: joey
dialogue: About a month ago this guy spent the night with Rachel, I didn't see who it was but-

name: phoebe
dialogue: Was that story over?

name: joey
dialogue: The guy left this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! I know who the father is-

name: monica
dialogue: People have got to finish their stories!

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, excuse me? Could you take a picture of us?

name: woman at the wedding
dialogue: Oh! Of course.

name: man at the wedding
dialogue: Uh, would you take one of us?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uhh- Yeah sure.  Click!

name: woman at the wedding
dialogue: It didn't click.

name: ross
dialogue: I heard it. I heard it.

name: man at the wedding
dialogue: But there was no flash.

name: woman at the wedding
dialogue: Why won't you take our picture?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah. I'll take, I'll take your picture.

name: man at the wedding
dialogue: Uh, your finger was covering the lens.

name: chandler
dialogue: Who are you? Ansel Adams?! Get out of here!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Look, I feel really bad about how I freaked you out before, so I called the father and asked him to meet you here so you can tell him. Go!

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Hey wait a minute! Phoebe, how do you even know who the father is?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I may play the fool at times, but I'm a little more than a pretty blond girl with an ass that won't quit.  I believe this belongs to the father of your baby.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh God- Oh, he's in there right now?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh. Now you can turn around or you can go in there and rip the Band-Aid off. What to you want to do?

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh, let's rip!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really? Are you sure?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Phoebe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, sorry. Yeah.

name: tag
dialogue: Hey Rach.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why don't you go up on stage. I'll get a picture of you doing the speech.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay. Okay!

name: ross
dialogue: Will the owner of a 1995 Buick LeSabre please see the front desk? Your car is about to be towed.

name: anxious wedding guest
dialogue: that is my car!

name: ross
dialogue: A '95 LeSabre?!

name: anxious wedding guest
dialogue: Yes!

name: ross
dialogue: A green LeSabre?

name: anxious wedding guest
dialogue: Yes!

name: ross
dialogue: I'm sorry, I meant a blue LeSabre.

name: anxious wedding guest
dialogue: Yes! Green-blue!

name: ross
dialogue: Well go! Go move it!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, you ready for the last picture?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Get ready to run.  Congratulations on your wedding.

name: tag
dialogue: So, what's this about?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rachel has something that she wants to tell you and umm, I believe that this is your red sweater.

name: tag
dialogue: No.  This is my red sweater.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no. Could I get anyone a coffee or-poison? No? Just for me? Okay.

name: tag
dialogue: What's going on Rach?

name: rachel
dialogue: Nothing! Phoebe kind of made a mistake. But you know you do wear that sweater a lot, are you involved in some kind of dare?

name: tag
dialogue: You know, I'm actually glad Phoebe called.  I know we broke up because you thought I wasn't mature enough, but I've really grown up and think we should get back together.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, it's just not the right time.

name: tag
dialogue: It is the right time.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: tag
dialogue: I'm ready for more.

name: rachel
dialogue: Tag-

name: tag
dialogue: Come on Rach, let's give it another try.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm having a baby.

name: tag
dialogue: Oh.

name: rachel
dialogue: You can go.

name: tag
dialogue: Thank you.

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know how any of these got opened?!

name: joey
dialogue: You opened them all?

name: monica
dialogue: I know! I know! I am a terrible person! I mean, Chandler is never going to trust me with anything ever again!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh hey! You got my parent's gift!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah. What is that?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I don't know. I think it does something to salami.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! How'd it go?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. What-what did Tag say?

name: rachel
dialogue: Tag is not the father! And Joey knows now?

name: joey
dialogue: I do Rach. I do, and I so happy for you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh wow, you didn't even try to unhook my bra!

name: monica
dialogue: So are you ever going to tell whoever it is?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I will. I'm just not up for it tonight.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Rach listen, no matter what this guy says I want you to know you are not going to be alone in this.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm not?

name: joey
dialogue: Listen I uh-  It's a scary world out there especially if you are a single mom. You know, I always felt like you and I have this-this special bond. You know? So,  Rachel Green will you marry me?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: What?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!!

name: joey
dialogue: Pheebs, give me the ring back!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No!!

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Joey, oh you are so sweet. you are so-so sweet, honey. But I'm not, I'm not looking for a husband.

name: joey
dialogue: I understand.

name: rachel
dialogue: Now, if you will excuse me I am going to go and lie down.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I can't say that didn't hurt. But I'll take you back Joey Tribbiani.

name: joey
dialogue: Uh yeah. Pheebs, listen about that. I only offered-

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh! A Salami Buddy!

name: joey
dialogue: There you go!

name: chandler
dialogue: We're back!

name: monica
dialogue: Great! We're hanging' in the kitchen!  Let's stay in the kitchen!

name: chandler
dialogue: It's picture time.

name: ross
dialogue: Now you are going to love these.

name: chandler
dialogue: Here's a picture of Ross.  And that is me.  And that is me and Ross.  Oh-ho, that is a picture of our first kiss as a married couple.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! That is a great picture!

name: chandler
dialogue: Eh?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! Oh and interesting because I found the cameras in one of our bags!

name: ross
dialogue: Huh, didn't see that coming.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, so this isn't a picture of our first, but it is a picture of my first kiss with-with this lady. Which by the look on your face I'm sure you'll remember. So we don't need--There's no need to have this picture. How about I take the real pictures and get them developed right now.

name: monica
dialogue: That would be a good idea.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.  You opened all the presents without me?! I thought we were supposed to do that together!

name: monica
dialogue: You kissed another woman!

name: chandler
dialogue: Call it even?!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I'm going to go get these  in some water.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait you stole those from these people's wedding?

name: ross
dialogue: No-no, I took them from the hotel lobby. Yeah, they think they can charge me for some dirty movie and a bag of Mashuga nuts, they got another think coming.  Hey! My sweater! I've been looking for this for like a month!

name: monica and phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God!!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! How you doing?

name: tag
dialogue: Good! Good, long time no see.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: tag
dialogue: Like your sweater.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh hey, right back at you.

name: tag
dialogue: Oh, it's crazy about Rachel huh?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. She-Well, she's one crazy lady?

name: tag
dialogue: So whose is it?

name: ross
dialogue: Umm, I don't some Italian guy. Come on, read your own label. See you later.

name: tag
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: He is so weird.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! Babe! Aren't you excited we're going on our honeymoon?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah I am!

name: chandler
dialogue: Bermuda, Bahama, come on pretty mama-

name: monica
dialogue: that is right. Get it out of your system while we're alone.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Have a great honeymoon!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'd better go pack.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh no, I already packed. The only thing I couldn't find though was your Speedo.

name: chandler
dialogue: A Speedo? Uh, I don't have a Speedo. I'm going to go pack my regular long bathing suit.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh good you are still here!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: I want to tell you to have a good honeymoon!

name: monica
dialogue: Thank you.

name: rachel
dialogue: And I also wanted you guys to know that I am telling the father today.  What? What? What?

name: joey
dialogue: We know its Ross!

name: rachel
dialogue: How?! How do you know?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It was his sweater, but-Oh my God!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I so wanted Ross to know first, but I'm so relieved you guys know.

name: monica
dialogue: This is so great! And I'm going to be your baby's aunt!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Me too!

name: joey
dialogue: I'm going to be an uncle! Come here!

name: rachel
dialogue: you are all going to be aunts and uncles.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, but I'm the only one related by blood.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Great! So now that you guys all know you can help me. Give me some advice on how I'm going to tell Ross!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, what were you going to say?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well I was going to tell him that I'm-I'm going to have the baby and he can be as involved as he wants.

name: joey
dialogue: Well that, that sounds good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah but how do I start? I mean, what's-what's the first thing that I say?  Okay great! Thanks.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! Good luck!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, bye.

name: joey
dialogue: Bye.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, what was that all about?

name: monica
dialogue: Well I guess there is no harm in telling you now, Rachel and Ross are going to have a baby.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?! I didn't even know that-Why didn't you tell me?!  Why am I talking like this?!

name: monica
dialogue: I didn't think you could keep it a secret.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?!  I am an excellent secret keeper. I have kept all of our secrets.

name: joey
dialogue: What secrets?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh no-no Joey, I am not going to tell you because I am an excellent secret keeper.

name: joey
dialogue: You'll tell me later?

name: chandler
dialogue: You already know.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, it's so romantic to send people off on their honeymoon.

name: joey
dialogue: You know, Monica and Chandler are married. Ross and Rachel are having a baby. Maybe you and I should do something.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All in good time my love. All in good time. Oh shoot! I left my guitar in their apartment. Well you can let me in later.

name: joey
dialogue: I don't have a key, they took mine to give to you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?! They took mine to give to you!

name: joey
dialogue: Why would they take away our keys?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Maybe they don't trust us.

name: joey
dialogue: No that is not it. They let me keep my key the last time they were out of town.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You mean the time you broke the ketchup bottle and cleaned it up with Monica's guest towels?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, I washed those!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No you didn't.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah that didn't sound like me.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, what am I going to do? I really need my guitar!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I have stuff in there too.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What stuff?

name: joey
dialogue: Monica's chicken parm! I'll take care of it.  Hey Mr. Treeger, it's Joey Tribbiani. Listen, I need to get into Monica and Chandler's apartment. It's an emergency.  Uhh, gas leak! Yeah oh, and bring garlic bread.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Did Rachel find you?

name: ross
dialogue: No why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh she was looking for you.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh well, I guess I'll catch up with her later.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, she really wanted to talk to you now.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, it seemed pretty important.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh no.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: I think I might know what this is about.

name: joey
dialogue: Really?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. Uh, uh we promised we weren't going to tell anybody this but uh, about a month ago Rachel and I slept together.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And?

name: ross
dialogue: Wow! I thought you would be a little more shocked.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh sorry.  And?!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, we-we said we'd just do it that one time but, but now I think she may want to start things up again.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I don't think that is what it is.

name: ross
dialogue: Why? What-what else could it be?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh wow, I don't feel well.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm telling you. I'm telling you. that is what it is. No wonder she was looking at me all funny during the wedding. She didn't say anything to you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Maybe it's something you ate?

name: joey
dialogue: Please, just-just, just go and talk to Rachel.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I guess I should.  Man, you know what I have to realize? Maybe I'm just not the type of guy women can have just one night with. You know, they-they always seem to want a little bit more. I should remember that.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Next?

name: monica
dialogue: They're kissing let's just go around them.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh honey, leave them alone, they're in love.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm in love too! But in an orderly fashion.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Next?

name: monica
dialogue: Hi! Can you do that and walk? Because she said, "Next."

name: woman
dialogue: Sorry. We didn't hear you; we're on our honeymoon.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Oh, let me see what I can do.  There are some first class seats available.

name: monica
dialogue: Did you hear that?! They bumped them up to first class because they are on their honeymoon! Come on! Let's act like we're on our honeymoon.

name: chandler
dialogue: We are on our honeymoon.

name: monica
dialogue: Grab my ass!

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Next?

name: monica
dialogue: Hi, sorry. I almost didn't hear you, because you know I'm just so in love with my new husband. We're on our honeymoon.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: Congratulations. Okay, Mr. Bing you'll be in 25J and Mrs. Bing you'll be in 25K.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh no, you see we're on our honeymoon. So umm, can you do your little thing and bump us up to first class?

dialogue: Oh, I didn't know you liked football.

dialogue: Well normally I don't, but you know--Green Bay is playing.

name: monica
dialogue: You like Green Bay?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well it's only like my favourite bay! {Actually, it's not bad. It just gets a little cold in winter, but in Wisconsin winter only lasts from August to June. J }

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: will
dialogue: Hey!

name: will
dialogue: Happy Thanksgiving!

name: monica
dialogue: Aww thanks! God Will I'm so glad that you came! You look great! You must've lost like-

name: will
dialogue: 150 pounds. Yeah, I'm going to be in one of those Subway sandwich commercials.

name: monica
dialogue: A pie!

name: will
dialogue: Oh right. All right, it's no fat, it's no sugar, it's no dairy-it's no good. Throw it out.

name: monica
dialogue: You want to meet some people? This is uh; this is my husband Chandler. Chandler, this is Will.

name: will
dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh hey. I'd shake your hand but uh; I'm really into the game. Plus, I think it'd be better for my ego if we didn't stand right next to each other.

name: monica
dialogue: This is Phoebe.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.  Wow!  Well done.

name: monica
dialogue: want to give me a hand?

name: will
dialogue: Sure! Monica, I can't get over how great you look! You look stunning!

name: monica
dialogue: Well you look incredible too! you are just-you are so fit!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm watching the game, but I'm not deaf!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh umm, I meant to tell you, Ross is coming.

name: will
dialogue: Ross is coming. Great! I love Ross!

name: monica
dialogue: Good. And Rachel Green too.

name: will
dialogue: Oh.

name: monica
dialogue: Is there a problem?

name: will
dialogue: Nope. Uh, it's okay. It's just uh, God I hated her.

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: will
dialogue: Yeah, I hated her. She was horrible to me in high school. But hey, it was a long time ago, I'm in a good place, it might be actually fun to see her again. You got any cakes or cookies or something?  No Will no!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, it's been a while since we've screamed something. Maybe we should.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh come on!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No!! Damn you ref! You burn in hell!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, what are you doing? You got to save room, you've got almost an entire turkey to eat.

name: joey
dialogue: Let me explain to you how the human body works. I have to warm my stomach first. Eating' chips is like stretching.

name: monica
dialogue: All right.

name: joey
dialogue: Don't worry, Tribbianis never get full.

name: will
dialogue: I actually know what you are talking about. I'm here to tell you something my friend, you can eat and eat and eat but nothing will ever fill that void.

name: joey
dialogue: Who the hell is this guy?

name: monica
dialogue: Will! From high school.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Joey.

name: will
dialogue: Hello.

name: ross
dialogue: Will!

name: will
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey-hey you came! Man you look incredible! Hot stuff!  Hot stuff?

name: will
dialogue: It's good to see you man.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, you too. Man, so-so what are you up to?

name: will
dialogue: I'm a commodities broker.

name: ross
dialogue: Really? Yeah that-that sounds interesting.

name: will
dialogue: Yeah, it's not. But I'm rich and thin.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh! Man I don't think I've seen you since uh, Lance Davis' graduation party.

name: will
dialogue: That was such a fun night!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. It would've been good if we had gotten in, but still real fun.

name: will
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: will
dialogue: God we were lame back then. Do you remember how into dinosaurs we were?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: will
dialogue: So what do you, what do you do now?

name: ross
dialogue: So how long are you in town?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey sweetie. Oh good.

name: will
dialogue: Rachel Green.

name: ross
dialogue: Aw-oh, that is right. Are-are you going to be okay?

name: will
dialogue: Oh, I'll-I'll be fine. Just God I hate her Ross! I hate her!

name: ross
dialogue: Will, high school was-was a long time ago.

name: will
dialogue: Look at her standing there with those yams! My two greatest enemies Ross

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God Monica, who is that?

name: monica
dialogue: that is Will from high school!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! I do not remember him! Wow! He's really got that sexy, smoldering thing going on.  Oh my God, he's- Look at the way he's just staring at me. I think he's trying to mouth something to me, but I can't make it out.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, dinner's ready!

name: chandler
dialogue: Good game!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah. Solid effort. Solid effort.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, so who won?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Green Bay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Detroit.

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well the Lions technically won, but it was a moral victory for the Green Bay-Mermen.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Will, right?

name: will
dialogue: Right.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! I'm Rachel Green.

name: will
dialogue: Oh I-I remember you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?! Aren't you sweet! I got to tell you though, I am, I am having the hardest time placing you. Oh-oh hang on! Did we umm, did we fool around at Lance Davis' graduation party?

name: will
dialogue: You are unbelievable.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you!

name: monica
dialogue: Uh Rachel? Rachel, why don't you sit here?  And Will you sit way over there.

name: joey
dialogue: that is it?! Even if nobody helps me I can eat that no problem. At least give me a challenge!

name: monica
dialogue: This is Chandler's chicken. This is the turkey.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh. How-how big is that?

name: monica
dialogue: About nineteen pounds.

name: joey
dialogue: It's like me when I was born.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, who would uh, like some yams? Will?

name: will
dialogue: Oh, you'd like that wouldn't you?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?  OH you know what? Can we please keep the chicken and the turkey and everything on the other side of the table? The smell is just yuck!

name: will
dialogue: Typical.

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm sorry. What?

name: will
dialogue: I said it was typical. Typical of you, Rachel Green, Queen Rachel does whatever she wants in little Rachel land.

name: joey
dialogue: Seriously, who is this guy?

name: rachel
dialogue: Umm, I'm sorry. Do you-do you have a problem with me?

name: will
dialogue: I don't know? Do I? Do I?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I think you do.

name: monica
dialogue: Apparently you were umm, a little mean to him in high school.

name: will
dialogue: A little mean? You made my life miserable!

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm-I'm-I had no idea. I'm sorry. I-

name: will
dialogue: Well you should be. Screw it! Bring on the yams!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh Will. But you-you've worked so hard-

name: will
dialogue: Yams!!!!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh Will umm, I just want to say that I'm real sorry for whatever I-I did to you in high school-

name: will
dialogue: Oh, it wasn't just me. We had a club!

name: rachel
dialogue: You had a club?!

name: will
dialogue: that is right, The I Hate Rachel Green Club!

name: rachel
dialogue: Whoa! My God! So what, you all just joined together to hate me?! Who else was in this club?

name: will
dialogue: Me and Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: No need to point, she knows who Ross is.

name: rachel
dialogue: So you were in an I Hate Rachel club?

name: will
dialogue: Yes he was.

name: ross
dialogue: No. No.

name: rachel
dialogue: So who else was in this club?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh actually, there-there was also that exchange student from Thailand but I-I don't think he-he knew what it was.

name: rachel
dialogue: So Ross, we went out for two years, and you never told me you were in an I Hate Rachel club.

name: will
dialogue: You went out with her?! We had a pact!

name: ross
dialogue: That was in high school! It's not like it was binding forever.

name: will
dialogue: Then why did it have the word eternity in it?

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay Monica, did you know about this?!

name: monica
dialogue: I swear I didn't.  Hey! Is that why you guys used to go up to your bedroom and lock the door?

name: ross and will
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Hmm, a little relieved, I got to say.

name: ross
dialogue: Look Rach I-I'm sorry, okay? I-I was a stupid kid, okay? The only reason I joined-

name: will
dialogue: Co-founded!

name: ross
dialogue: -co-founded. Co-founded the club was because I was insanely in love with you. Obviously I didn't handle it very well. But if you think about it the I Hate Rachel Club was really the I Love Rachel Club.

name: will
dialogue: Uh, except that it was really the I Hate Rachel Club.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. So what? You guys would just like get together and like just say mean things about me?

name: will
dialogue: Well, we did a little more than that.

name: ross
dialogue: No-no! No-no. No-no.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?! What else did you do?

name: will
dialogue: We started a rumour.

name: rachel
dialogue: What rumour?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, come on Will! Just take off your shirt and tell us!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: It was no big deal. We-we-said that the rumour was-that umm-you had both-male and female reproductive parts.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: will
dialogue: that is right! We said your parents flipped a coin, decided to raise you as a girl, but you still had a hint of a penis.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: monica
dialogue: You started that?!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! You heard that?!

name: monica
dialogue: Everyone at our school heard it!

name: chandler
dialogue: Everybody at my school heard it! You were the hermaphrodite cheerleader from Long Island?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh no!!!! Oh my God!! This is all making so much sense to me now! This is why Adam Carter wouldn't go out with me! This is why Billy Tratt would just stay in this region!

name: ross
dialogue: Actually, Billy Tratt is gay now. So-so that one's not really our fault.

name: rachel
dialogue: Monica, how come you never told me this?!

name: monica
dialogue: I thought it might be true. And I was afraid that you were going to cry and then show it to me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey stop staring! There's nothing there! It's not true!

name: joey
dialogue: I'm afraid I'm going to need proof.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!

name: joey
dialogue: You are my Everest.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, you don't have to finish that.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh yes I do. Otherwise what's next? Today I'm just a guy who can't finish a turkey, but tomorrow I'm the guy who eats half a Powerbar, wraps up the rest, and puts in the fridge? No! No, I just-I just-I got to change my pants.  Jeans have no give.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay! Okay! Listen to what Sean McMahon wrote in my yearbook senior year, "Dear Rach, you are such a good person." Not girl! Person!

name: ross
dialogue: Rach, I think you are reading a little too much into it.

name: rachel
dialogue: "Dear Rach, you are a great person. Sorry about your tiney-wienie."

name: ross
dialogue: Look, what do you want me to do? Do you want me to call everyone in the entire school and tell them it wasn't true?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes!

name: will
dialogue: Could you also tell them I'm skinny now?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh! Me too!

name: ross
dialogue: Well look-look I'm not calling anybody! Okay? It was like a million years ago!

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't care how long ago it was! You told people that I was half and half! You know what? I just want to point out I never did anything to hurt you in high school.

name: monica
dialogue: that is not totally true.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: Well you-you did start that rumour about Ross making out with Mrs. Altman, our 50-year-old librarian.

name: ross
dialogue: How did you know that?!!!!

name: monica
dialogue: It's true?!!

name: ross
dialogue: No.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes it is! I saw you guys going at it behind the card catalogue!

name: will
dialogue: Mrs. Altman? She also made out with Takaka Ci-Kek the night before he went back to Thailand.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm sorry. When you were in high school you made out with a 50-year-old woman?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! She didn't look 50!

name: chandler
dialogue: Did she look 16?

name: rachel
dialogue: OH, there's a picture of her in the yearbook actually.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh!  Wow!

name: ross
dialogue: She didn't photograph well!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, she probably wasn't familiar with the process having spent most of her life sitting for oil paintings!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So how did this happen? Did she, did she lure you to an early bird dinner?

name: ross
dialogue: I was working late in the library one afternoon. It was just the two of us. She needed some help with her word jumble. And one thing led to another. If you must know, Anita was very gentle and tender. May she rest in peace-

name: monica
dialogue: Didn't she walk with a cane?

name: ross
dialogue: Only when it was damp!!  I can't believe you-you told people about this?! Everybody knew?!you know what?  I'm back in the club!

name: will
dialogue: Yeah!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I want to join!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wh-Phoebe!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I never got to be in a club. I-I didn't go to high school, but three of us would meet behind a dumpster to learn French. Bonjour.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, you know-Fine! You guys have your stupid little club, but I would just like to say is what you did to me is way worse than what I did to you! You gave me a tiney-wienie!

name: monica
dialogue: All right, listen you are just being silly. Rachel, even with that rumour you were one of the most popular girls in school and everyone wanted to be like you. One girl wanted to be like you so much she stuffed her pants with a Tootsie Roll!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow-

name: monica
dialogue: And Ross, if it weren't for Rachel's rumour I mean no one in high school would even know who you were. She put you on the map!

name: ross
dialogue: As a romancer of the elderly.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! Mrs. Altman was the kind of woman you could tell she used to be pretty.

name: ross
dialogue: The eyes-did still sparkle.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey guys this stuff is just so way in the past. You-you've been through so much since then. And right now you've got so much more important stuff going on in your life. Can't you just let this go?

name: rachel
dialogue: She's right.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. I mean we are having a baby together.

name: will
dialogue: Hold on! You got her pregnant?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: will
dialogue: Are you getting married?

name: ross
dialogue: Nope.

name: will
dialogue: So you knocked her up but you are not going to marry her. Dude!  Anybody?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.  It's exactly how I'd imagined it would be.

name: joey
dialogue: All right where's that turkey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Joey! Those are my maternity pants!

name: joey
dialogue: Not now! These are my Thanksgiving pants!

name: joey
dialogue: Well that is it. I'm done. Whew!  There come the meat sweats.

name: monica
dialogue: Well Joey, we're all-we're all very proud of you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, I believe we can expect a call from the President any moment now.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Is there anything we can do for you?

name: joey
dialogue: No just, nobody press on my stomach.

name: rachel
dialogue: You can keep those pants by the way.

name: joey
dialogue: Whoa-hey-who-who-what do you got there? What is that? Pie?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, you want some?

name: joey
dialogue: Ah, just cut me a little sliver.  A little bigger.  Little bigger.  What?! Are you afraid you are going to run out?! Cut me a real piece!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! So what do you think?

name: chandler
dialogue: New haircut?  Necklace?  Dress?  Boots?  Boots!

name: monica
dialogue: Yes! Now, they're a little more than I normally spend on boots 'or rent

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: monica
dialogue: I know.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm going to miss being able to afford food.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm sorry, they just, they just look so good! And the saleswoman was looking at me like, "Oh, these are way too expensive for you."

name: chandler
dialogue: She had a point.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!  Oh Monica! Those boots are amazing!

name: monica
dialogue: They're mine!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah well, too bad we're going to have to return them.

name: rachel
dialogue: Return them?! Shh! They're going to hear you!

name: monica
dialogue: Honey, I'm not returning them. Okay? I mean I-I know they cost a lot, but I'm going to wear them all the time. You'll see. Besides, I love the compliments. I mean, have you ever had something so beautiful everyone wanted it?

name: chandler
dialogue: I have you.

name: monica
dialogue: Nice try; I'm keeping the boots.

name: ross
dialogue: that is right, I love you! And-and I'm going to play with you all the time.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How can you let him talk to your crotch like that?

name: rachel
dialogue: He's talking to the baby.

name: phoebe
dialogue: OH! Okay! Okay, cause when-when he said, "I can't wait to hear your first words," I thought, "There's a trick."

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Well, I got to go you guys. I'll see you later.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: Bye.

name: rachel
dialogue: Bye.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh hey Rach, listen-Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: joey
dialogue: Umm, can you do me a favour? I was talking' to my sister and she knows you work at Ralph Lauren'

name: rachel
dialogue: No, forget it! No way! I am not sending anymore Ralph Lauren clothes to prison. It is a waste.

name: joey
dialogue: No-no-no-no-no-no, not her, not her. My youngest sister, Dina, she's really interested in fashion, and she wants to talk to someone successful, you know, to give her some advice.

name: rachel
dialogue: I guess I can talk to one of my supervisors'

name: joey
dialogue: Oh no-no-no-no, she wants to talk to you!

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?! Oh my God! I'm successful!

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, so will you meet with her?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes! I'd love to! Have her come by the office.

name: joey
dialogue: Great! Thanks! you are going to love her so much. And-Oh, she's the smartest of all the Tribbiani children. Hey, you know the S.A.T's?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: She took them!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey Ross! Doesn't Ben go to the Smithfield Day School?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. Why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sting has a son that goes there too!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah I know; he's in Ben's class.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You knew this and you never said anything?! With all the stupid dinosaur stuff you tell us?!

name: ross
dialogue: Fine! No more dinosaur stuff! Can I talk about fossils?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sting's son, seven years old and there's a picture.

name: ross
dialogue: What are you reading? The Kidnappers Guide to Manhattan Private Schools?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, it's New York magazine. It's an article about the best schools in the city. So how well do you know Sting?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, I actually haven't even met him.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh, yeah that is too bad. I really want to go to his concert Friday night, but it's totally sold out. I know! Why don't you meet him and get tickets?! If you get two I'll take you.

name: ross
dialogue: Well actually, I'm picking Ben up tomorrow, maybe he'll be there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: There you go! Oh, you are so lucky! You might actually get to meet Sting tomorrow! that is why you have kids!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey guys!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey-hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi Monica!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi boots.

name: monica
dialogue: See Chandler? I'm getting a lot of use out of them already! They're very practical. See, you can wear them with dresses, with skirts, with pants'

name: chandler
dialogue: You can wear them with shorts on a street corner and earn the money to pay for them.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow! They're beautiful!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ahh'

name: monica
dialogue: They hurt so much!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?!

name: monica
dialogue: The guy who made these hates feet and wants to see them die!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well-well you can give them to me! I haven't felt my feet in years!

name: monica
dialogue: I can't! I spent so much money on them and I told Chandler that I'd wear them all the time, I just can't give them away!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well then get your money back and return them!

name: monica
dialogue: I can't do that either! The soles' are already a little scuffed up and the insides are filled with my blood.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey I uh just picked up Ben from school'

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't think you did a very thorough job!

name: ross
dialogue: I dropped him off at Carol's.  Anyway, it turns out that I'm not going to be able to get those tickets though.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no! Why not?

name: ross
dialogue: Well it turns out that Ben and Sting's son do not get along.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How come?!

name: ross
dialogue: Apparently, Sting's son made fun of the fact that Ben's moms are lesbinims.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait! But Ross if they don't get along then you should smooth things over. Make them be friends.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, you can't force kids to be friends.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure you can! Give them some blocks, put them in a playpen!

name: ross
dialogue: Playpen?! Ben's seven!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Your kid is seven?!   He's really small.  Please! Please get the tickets!

name: ross
dialogue: Look I'm sorry Pheebs, I can't do it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes you can! Sting says so himself!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross can!

name: ross
dialogue: Look Phoebe, I'm sorry it's just'

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross can!

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, I'

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross can! Give me the tickets! Ross can give me the tickets!!

name: joey
dialogue: Here she is! Future fashion superstar!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Joey, I'm hardly a'

name: joey
dialogue: My little sister Dina!

name: rachel
dialogue: Right! Hi Dina!

name: dina
dialogue: Hi.

name: rachel
dialogue: Nice to meet you.

name: dina
dialogue: Thanks so much for meeting' with me. Joey's told me so much about you!

name: joey
dialogue: This is so exciting for her. Well, I'll let you two fash'ists get down to business.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. All right Dina, well let's talk about the different areas of fashion that you could get involved in. Let's see, there's design, but you may need a whole other degree for that. Uh, there's-there's sales, which is great because you get to travel'

name: dina
dialogue: I'I don't care about fashion! I'm pregnant! And I know you are too, so you got to help me!

name: rachel
dialogue: And there's marketing'

name: monica
dialogue: Ah!

name: chandler
dialogue: What's wrong?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh nothing I'm just-just was yawning.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh don't forget, my office holiday party is tonight.

name: monica
dialogue: Honey, we don't really have to go to this thing tonight do we?

name: chandler
dialogue: Now sweetie, I know you don't like my office parties, but you can wear your new boots. See? Every cloud has a'supple leather lining.

name: monica
dialogue: I-I don't-I don't think that I'm going to wear the boots tonight.

name: chandler
dialogue: Why not?

name: monica
dialogue: Well you know, I'm just-I'm just worried that bosses will see them and think they pay you too much money. Or! Or your assistant will see them and-and want a raise!

name: chandler
dialogue: Do you think I work at some kind of boot pricing company?

name: monica
dialogue: Anyway, I picked up this outfit that I want to wear and the, and the boots don't really go with it.

name: chandler
dialogue: You said that you paid all that money because those boots go with skirts, dresses, and pants!

name: monica
dialogue: Fine! If you want me to wear the boots, I'll wear the boots. In fact, I'll go into my room right now and you know try the outfit on.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay?  Ooo wee! Christmas party in my boots!

name: dina
dialogue: I-I can't go in there. I can't tell him!

name: rachel
dialogue: Honey, it's going to be okay. He's been incredibly supportive of me, and if he gets a little upset; that is what the meatball sub is for.

name: dina
dialogue: Thank you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! It's my fashion girls!  What's wrong?

name: rachel
dialogue: Honey, why don't you sit down? Dina has something that she wants to tell you.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh. What's, what's going on? Is it mom? Is she sick? Is it dad's heart? Is that a sandwich?

name: dina
dialogue: Joe, mom and dad are fine'

name: joey
dialogue: Is that a sandwich?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey 'there's something that you 'should know. Dina?

name: dina
dialogue: I'm pregnant.

name: joey
dialogue: What?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Now! Give him the sandwich! Give him the sandwich!

name: joey
dialogue: Well obviously this is a mistake! You can't be pregnant! Because you have to have sex to get pregnant!

name: dina
dialogue: Joe, I tried to wait until I was 25 like you did!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?! Dina'

name: joey
dialogue: Bub!!!   I can't believe this! you are the good one! You went to college! Both years! Who did this to you?!

name: dina
dialogue: Bobby Corso, but he's a real nice guy. I like him a lot. He's real funny.

name: joey
dialogue: You got pregnant for funny?! Dina, if he's funny, laugh! All right, I'll be back in a little while! You stay here!

name: dina
dialogue: Why? Where are you going?

name: joey
dialogue: I can't look at you right now!

name: dina
dialogue: Wow.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, there you are Ben!

name: ben
dialogue: Aunt Phoebe, what are you doing here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I heard you are having a problem with one of the boys in your class. And so I thought I would just come down here and sit you both down, have a little talk and make it all okay. Now umm, the boy's name is Sting's son.

name: ben
dialogue: Jack? I hate him! He's a jerk.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Now Ben, sometimes people may seem like jerks on the outside, but they have famous fathers.

name: ben
dialogue: I have to go. My friend Doug is waiting for me over there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Him you are friends with.

name: the teacher
dialogue: Excuse me. Can, can I help you with something?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes! Yes you can, I'm looking for Jack's parents.

name: the teacher
dialogue: Are you with one of the students?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh, I'm with Ben.

name: the teacher
dialogue: Are you one of Ben's mothers?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I am one of Ben's mothers. I'm a lesbian. It was, it was difficult coming out to my parents.

name: the teacher
dialogue: Well hi, I'm Jenny Boone. I'm the new teacher here.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh.

name: the teacher
dialogue: I've only met your partner Carol.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ah! Okay so that would make me Susan.

name: the teacher
dialogue: Right. Are you looking for Jack's parents to discuss the problems he's having with Ben?  Yeah. Because I really do think the parents should sit down and have a conversation.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Let's do that!! That-that sounds good. We should sit down and talk, just me, my lover Carol, and the Stings. Umm, how-how will I get in touch with them?

name: the teacher
dialogue: Oh, their number is on the contact sheet.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Umm, could-could I get a copy of that? Because Carol threw it out, she lost ours. She's such a scatterbrain, but man what a hot piece of ass.

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, that party wasn't bad.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah! I didn't know there would be dancing. That was a fun surprise!

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't see any uh, cabs. Maybe we should just walk?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh no, we can't walk!

name: chandler
dialogue: What honey, it's like fifteen blocks to the subway. Let's go.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! Do you think that we can get to the subway right there if we climb down through the manhole cover?

name: chandler
dialogue: What's going on?

name: monica
dialogue: I can't walk. Okay? Okay? These boots were a huge mistake!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: Okay you were right! All right, I never should have bought them! They're killing me! One toe at a time!

name: chandler
dialogue: So I was right. This is what it feels like to be right.  It's oddly unsettling.

name: monica
dialogue: How are we going to get home? Maybe a piggy-back ride?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hop on.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay. Wait, just give me a second, I need to just get my boots off first.  Ah Ooh Ooh Ooh Oh God Oh Oh Oh oh'

name: chandler
dialogue: Honey, I know you are in pain right now, but I'm a little turned on.

name: dina
dialogue: Do you ever worry that you'll be walking and your baby will just like slip out?

name: rachel
dialogue: What college was that Dina?

name: dina
dialogue: Oh my God! Bobby!

name: bobby
dialogue: Hi Dina. Good to see you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, what are you doing?

name: joey
dialogue: Just what needs to be done! Dearly beloved, we are gathered here to join this man and this woman'

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Joey this is crazy!

name: joey
dialogue: Don't interrupt me when I'm talking' to God! Now where were we? Oh right, okay. Do you Dina, take this man'

name: dina
dialogue: No!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh you'll take them!

name: dina
dialogue: No I won't!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! You don't get a say in this!

name: dina
dialogue: Yes I do!

name: joey
dialogue: Ah! I heard "I do", we're halfway there! Okay!  You!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right Joey! That is enough!  Listen, as beautiful and moving as this ceremony is, it's not legal. Okay? They-they don't have a marriage license, they don't have any witnesses, and the groom only has on one shoe!

name: bobby
dialogue: Yeah, he took the other one off and hit me with it.

name: joey
dialogue: Well what am I supposed to do?

name: rachel
dialogue: you are supposed to realize that they are adults! And that they can make their own decisions.

name: joey
dialogue: No they can't! They were stupid enough to get knocked up!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! Contraceptives are not always effective!  Right?

name: bobby
dialogue: Yeah we kind of didn't use any'

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, come on kids! A little help here!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow! This place is incredible!  Sting's pen that he gave to Phoebe.  Come on! Secret passageway!

name: trudie styler
dialogue: Hi!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hi!

name: trudie styler
dialogue: I'm Trudie.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: trudie styler
dialogue: You must be Ben's mum.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why else would I be here?

name: trudie styler
dialogue: Do sit down.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: trudie styler
dialogue: I gather Jack and Ben haven't been getting along lately.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: trudie styler
dialogue: I'm told there are two sides to this story, but all I've heard is that Ben's a bit of a poo-poo head.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Umm, I'm sorry. Won't-won't Jack's father be joining us?

name: trudie styler
dialogue: Oh I'm sorry, Jack's father is not available.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-hmm. Okay. Well then, could we reschedule? For say, Friday night perhaps at 8 o'clock?

name: trudie styler
dialogue: Oh no, I know that wouldn't work. My husband's in concert.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Concert. Yeah. That does put us in quite a pickle. Because you see I'm very busy before and after the concert, and he's obviously busy during.

name: trudie styler
dialogue: So, I guess you and I should talk about Jack and Ben right now.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Unless! Unless umm, okay I-I would be willing to go to the concert, umm, all the while thinking about the children of course.

name: trudie styler
dialogue: Are you here for tickets?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, thank you. Four would be great.

name: trudie styler
dialogue: I'm not giving concert tickets to someone who'd use their son like this!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh good! Then you are in luck! Ben's not my son!

name: trudie styler
dialogue: Look, I've just pressed a button, triggering a silent alarm. Any minute now, the police will be here!

name: phoebe
dialogue: The Police? Here? A reunion?!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, ten blocks down. Five to go.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh wait! Stop! Stop! Stop!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh I'm sorry! Do you need a break?

name: monica
dialogue: My boots in tan! Hey! Can you get a little closer so I can see the price?

name: chandler
dialogue: I can see it from right here. It'll cost you one husband.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I'm sorry. I think I can walk the rest of the way now. Just-just give me my boots.

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't have your boots.

name: monica
dialogue: Well I don't have them either. Where are they?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, why don't you check in one of my saddlebags while I chew on a bale of hay!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.  God well, we got to go back and get them!

name: chandler
dialogue: Honey, are you seriously ever going to wear the boots again?

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I am never going to wear them again. I just didn't get a chance to say goodbye.

name: chandler
dialogue: You know what? You can say goodbye to the tan ones.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.  All right.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Bye boots-Wait! Half off?!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, just because they're not getting married doesn't mean this is going to be a disaster. Maybe they have a plan!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh? Oh! Okay! Okay! Let's hear their plan! Now, what's the future look like for Dina and Bobby?

name: bobby
dialogue: Well I really have high hopes for my band.

name: joey
dialogue: You were right. He is funny.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, now wait a minute! I get when you told people at first that you wanted to be an actor they laughed at you! Now come on Bobby, why don't you tell us a little bit about your band?

name: bobby
dialogue: Well it's just me and my pal Rooster, the band's name is Numb Nuts.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?

name: joey
dialogue: Dina, if you are having a baby you should be married! Even if it is to Bobby!  Dude, that is not a compliment!

name: dina
dialogue: No Joey! I knew you wouldn't be supportive!

name: joey
dialogue: So whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! What are you going to do? you are going to have the baby and-and raise it by yourself, without a husband?! You can't be a single mother alone! you are going to ruin your life!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh excuse me! Am I ruining my life?

name: joey
dialogue: No! No! No! It's different for you. you are so strong and together. you are not some dumb kid who doesn't know what she's doing.

name: dina
dialogue: Excuse me?

name: joey
dialogue: One pregnant woman at a time, please! I just want you to be okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: So forcing her to marry Bobby is going to make that happen?

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe!  Well! Well, so-so uh, what kind of music does Numb Nuts-Oh forget it! I can't!

name: dina
dialogue: Joey, I am scared to death about this. But I really think I can do it, I'm just going to need some help. And Bobby's going to be here the whole time.

name: bobby
dialogue: You bet I am!  And to answer your earlier question, we're straight-up gangster rap.

name: dina
dialogue: Look, Rachel's told me how much easier you've made all this on her. Why can't you do that for me?

name: joey
dialogue: Because! Because, because you are my baby sister!

name: dina
dialogue: And you are my big brother! I mean, you are my favourite guy in the whole world. I'm not even scared to tell mom and dad. I was scared of telling you.

name: joey
dialogue: Well I'd be scared of them, but all right.

name: dina
dialogue: Joey, I can't stand the thought of having this baby with you mad at me. I want him to have his uncle. Is my baby going to have his Uncle Joey?

name: joey
dialogue: Of course he's going to have his Uncle Joey!

name: dina
dialogue: We're going to be all right. I mean, even if we're not married this baby is going to be so loved. Not just by us.

name: joey
dialogue: that is right! By his uncle too!

name: bobby
dialogue: And by you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay Bobby, why don't we just come over here and let them have a little moment.

name: joey
dialogue: Come here!

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Seriously! What's wrong with you?!

name: ross
dialogue: you are going to love me so much. I got Sting tickets!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God! I do love you! How did you do it?!

name: ross
dialogue: Well, let's just say Ross can!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oo, where are the seats?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, middle balcony.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, now would you say that that is more than 50 yards away from Sting, his wife, or a member of his family?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Then that is not breaking the law! I'm there!

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: rachel
dialogue: Look at that guy by the window, wow!

name: phoebe
dialogue: He's awfully short and I think he's talking to himself. And to  be completely honest, he's not that good in bed.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, what is wrong with me lately? I mean it's like every guy I  see-I mean look here.  Look at that guy for example, I mean normally that is not someone I would-would be attracted to, but right now, with the  way I'm feeling, all I want to do is rip off his sweatpants and fanny pack.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait a second! This is about the fourth month of your pregnancy, right?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: This is completely normal, around the fourth month your hormones start  going crazy.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really?! So this has happened to you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh absolutely yeah! Oh and keep in mind, now, I was carrying triplets so  in, you know, medical terms I was-I was thrice as randy.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! This explains so much! Last weekend, I went from store to store  sitting on Santa's lap.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. Yeah, I remember trying to steal a cardboard cut-out of Evander  Holyfield from a Foot Locker.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, you know what? I go see my doctor tomorrow, I'll ask her  about this. Maybe she can give me a pill or something.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. Yeah, that is what you need a good-pill.

name: mona
dialogue: Hey!  Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi!

name: mona
dialogue: Hi! Look! I got our pictures developed from Rockefeller Centre.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh great! Hey-hey Joey, do you want to check out pictures of me and Mona  ice skating?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh uh, ordinarily I would love too, but I am just swamped right now.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey where-where are the pictures that creepy pretzel vendor took of us  together?

name: mona
dialogue: Oh yeah, probably at the end.  Oh my God! He only took  pictures of my breasts!

name: joey
dialogue: I'm missing' picture time?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know she has a face Ross!

name: mona
dialogue: Okay. Okay, here's a good one of us.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow! That is a good one! Wow, it looks like a, like a holiday card you know, with the tree in the middle and the skaters and the snow.

name: mona
dialogue: You know, every year I say I'm going to send out holiday cards and I  never do it. Do you want to, do you want to send this one out together?

name: ross
dialogue: Together? Like-like to people?

name: mona
dialogue: Yeah, you know. Happy holidays from Mona and Ross. It'll be cute,  okay?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.

name: mona
dialogue: Oh, I got to get to work. So call me later?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh sure, sure.

name: mona
dialogue: Bye guys.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Bye.

name: joey
dialogue: Congratulations! You just got married!

name: ross
dialogue: I know. Can you believe that?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait, I'm-I'm sorry. What's the big deal about a holiday  card?

name: ross
dialogue: Married couples send out cards, families send out cards, people who have  been dating for a couple of months do not send out cards! What-what is she crazy?!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey-hey-hey, hey that is your wife you are talking about!

name: doug
dialogue: Bing! Ho! And the Bing-ette!

name: chandler
dialogue: Honey, you remember my boss Doug right?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, hi.

name: doug
dialogue: Hi. So good news, the divorce is final. I signed the papers this A.M.

name: chandler
dialogue: I didn't know you and Carol were getting divorced, I'm  sorry.

name: doug
dialogue: Sorry? Finally chewed my leg out of that bear trap. Hey, congratulations  to you guys though!

name: monica
dialogue: No leg-chewing for us sir.

name: doug
dialogue: Oh well, give it time. So the divorce, the marriage, we've got a lot  to celebrate. How about we all go out to dinner tomorrow night?

name: monica
dialogue: I can't think of anything we're doing.  Why  can't I think of anything we're doing?

name: doug
dialogue: Tomorrow night it is then, I should be out of court by six. They keep  throwing these sexual harassment cases at me and I keep knocking them out of the park!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I'll see you tomorrow!  Just so you know,  we're not seeing him tomorrow.  I-I cannot spend another  evening with that man. Do you remember how he behaved at our wedding?

name: chandler
dialogue: No.

name: monica
dialogue: that is because he wasn't invited because of the way he behaved  at our engagement party.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah. Boy, urine cuts right through an ice sculpture  doesn't it?

name: mona
dialogue: Hi!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: mona
dialogue: Hey, I went by the photo shop, take a look, here is a mock-up of our card.  What do you think?

name: ross
dialogue: Huh. Wow, this is great.

name: mona
dialogue: Now, do you think it should say, "Love Ross and Mona?"

name: ross
dialogue: Well, we-we haven't said that to each other yet, but I guess its okay  to say it to other people.

name: mona
dialogue: How many did you want? I'm getting a hundred.

name: ross
dialogue: A hundred?! Well, I-I guess I'll take a-Mona, uh-I-I'm  not sure about the whole uh, card thing.

name: mona
dialogue: Really? Why not?

name: ross
dialogue: Sending out a holiday card, together, I mean I just don't know if  we're really quite there yet.

name: mona
dialogue: OH you know, I didn't think of it that way. you are right.  you are right. So, can I ask you a question?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: mona
dialogue: Where are we?

name: ross
dialogue: Huh.

name: mona
dialogue: You know, like where are we? Where is this relationship going?

name: ross
dialogue: Hmm-

name: mona
dialogue: I mean I love spending time with you, you know I just-I hope  we're moving forward. I mean, we should probably talk about that. Don't you  think?

name: ross
dialogue: Let's do the card!

name: mona
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: The card! I think we're there!

name: mona
dialogue: Okay. I-But I think we should still have this conversation.

name: ross
dialogue: Really?! I mean, even with the card?

name: nurse
dialogue: Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: nurse
dialogue: Just so you know, Dr. Long can't be here today, she was called to  the hospital, so Dr. Schiff will be seeing you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, okay. Hey, can I ask you a question? Was it me, or-or was the guy  who took my blood sample really cute? You know who I'm talking about, bald  haircut, hairy fingers-

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: Hi Rachel? I'm Dr. Schiff.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes, you are.

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: So, how's it going?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, really, really good. But enough about me, come on! Where-where are  you from? What do you do?

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: I'm a doctor.

name: rachel
dialogue: Right! Right! I-I actually meant in your spare time, do you cook? Do you  ski? Or do you just hang out with your wife or girlfriend?

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: Uh, I don't have a wife or girlfriend, but I do like to ski.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I love to ski! How amazing is this?!

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: So, are you experiencing any discomfort?

name: rachel
dialogue: No. I'm very comfortable.

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: Any painful gas?

name: rachel
dialogue: No! Shoot, Dr. Schiff what kind of question is that?!

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: Okay then, would you like to lie down on the table?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well would you like me to lie down on the table?

name: dr. schiff
dialogue: I'm sorry, is there something going on here?

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you feel it too?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh hey! So, how did your doctor's appointment go?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, let's see. Uh, they gave me cute doctor today and in the  middle of the exam I put my pinky in his chin dimple.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God.

name: monica
dialogue: Why did you do that?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, remember that little problem I was having during my  fourth month of  pregnancy?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh yeah, the Evander Holyfield phase. Oh man you were so hard up you  practically came on to me.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You wish.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, I could've had you if I wanted you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah? Come and get it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, even this is turning me on!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh hey! Hey Ross! Hey how's it, how's it going with you and  Mona? Are you guys still together?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah, yeah we're moving forward. You'll be getting our card!

name: monica
dialogue: You and Mona are doing a holiday card together?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, we're not just doing a card! You know, she-she also wants to  have the conversation about where the relationship is going.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ugh! Women!

name: ross
dialogue: I know! I know! Why do you guys need to have this conversation?! Huh? I  mean no self-respecting man would ask a woman, "So, where is this going?"

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh Ross? You asked me that.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! You were a closed book! Okay? I'm not a mind reader! Besides, I  hate those conversations. I'm horrible at them. Really! Maybe-maybe I need kind of a  gesture. You know, something that says we're moving forward without having to talk  about it.

name: monica
dialogue: Like asking her to move in with you?

name: ross
dialogue: Smaller than that.

name: monica
dialogue: Making her a mixed tape?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, bigger than that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Give her a key to your apartment.

name: ross
dialogue: Whoa-hello! We were closer with the mixed tape.

name: monica
dialogue: All right. Have you said, "I love you?" You could say, I love  you.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah I-I don't-I don't think I'm quite there yet, but I  could say I love spending time with you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, we hate that.

name: monica
dialogue: That is a slap in the face.

name: ross
dialogue: Forget it. I-I-You know what? I'll just have the  conversation. I'll just say I like things the way they are, and hope for the best.  What do you think Rach?

name: rachel
dialogue: I think, if it was a little colder in here I could see your nipples  through that sweater.

name: doug
dialogue: Bing! We're all set for tonight, 8 o'clock.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh uh, as it turns out, we can't do it. Monica has to work.

name: doug
dialogue: Oh, my ex-wife didn't work, unless you call turning into her mother  work. Fine. Tomorrow night then.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh uh well tomorrow's no good for her either.

name: doug
dialogue: Oh? Why not?

name: chandler
dialogue: It's the semi-finals-of her-botchy ball tournament.

name: doug
dialogue: What's going on Bing? Does uh, your wife have a problem with me or  something?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well now-now you are just talking crazy.

Ah! that is-that is the real question. And-and  the answer is-is it's going somewhere-fun. I mean-you-you look like you are getting younger by the  second-What's your secret?

dialogue: Yeah. So you know, I have all of these feelings and I don't know  what to do about them, because I can't date like a normal person, which is fine  because I don't need a relationship, I mean all I really want is one great night.  Just sex, you know? No strings attached, no relationship, just with someone that I feel  comfortable with and who knows what he's doing. For just one great night, I mean is  that really so-hard-to find.  So how was your day?

Now, this is just a loan. Okay? I'm going to, I'm going to  want him back. So-  I'm going to go now.     I'm sorry, I thought I could do it and I can't!
