dialogue: Yeah. And look, I just want you to know that with Rachel staying       here and everything, all my feelings from before are totally over, okay?       And even if they weren't, when you accidentally walk in on a woman using       a breast pump...

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, that'll do it.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow! So, how are you?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm, I'm okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Really?

name: ross
dialogue: Sure, I mean, do I wish me and Rachel living together would have       worked out? Of course. You know, I'm disappointed, but it's not like it's       a divorce.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, actually it...

name: ross
dialogue: No, it's not a divorce, it is not a divorce! Anyway, I think Rachel       and I need to, you know, get on with our lives, maybe, maybe start seeing       other people.

name: joey
dialogue: Wow, really?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, sure, why not? In fact, if you know anyone that would be good       for me...

name: joey
dialogue: Sure, I know lots of girls.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah? Any names come to mind?

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh, names?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey. I was just going to get something to eat. You want something?

name: phoebe
dialogue: What you got?

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, let's see, we got strained peas,       strained carrots... Ooh! Strained plums. We haven't tried that yet.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Goodie! Thanks. So, how is it living with Rachel again? I mean, apart       from the great food.

name: joey
dialogue: I'm fine, I'm fine, it's just, it's just weird what's happening with       her and Ross. You know, yesterday he asked me to fix him up with somebody.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my god, Rachel asked me if I knew anyone for her too.

name: joey
dialogue: Why are they doing this?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't know. They're so perfect for each other; it's crazy.

name: joey
dialogue: You know what's crazy? These jars. What is it, like two bites in       here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I just wish they'd realise they should be together.

name: joey
dialogue: I know, I know. And when they moved back in together, I figured you know,       that is where things were headed.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know. They should be a family. They should get married and have       more children.

name: joey
dialogue: Yes, and they should name one of their kids Joey. I may not have       kids; someone's got to carry on the family name.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know what? Maybe once they start dating, and they see what's       out there, they'll realise how good they are for each other.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, because it is slim pickings. I had this date last night

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, what are we going to do? Are we just going to go ahead and set them       up with people?

name: joey
dialogue: I know; that just pushes them further and further apart.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.  Oh, I know what we can do. We could set Ross and Rachel       up on horrible dates, so that they'll realise how good they are together.

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh, that is a great plan!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, you know what the best part of it is? I get to do my "plan-laugh."

name: joey
dialogue: Shh! Not so loud, we don't want to wake up, uh...

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: You guys aren't doing anything tonight, are you?

name: chandler
dialogue: See, now, why would you assume that? Just because we're married?       I will have you know that we are very hip, happening people. Now, if you'll       excuse me, I have to get back to reading the obituaries.

name: rachel
dialogue: I was just asking Because I need someone to watch Emma tonight.

name: monica
dialogue: Sure, we'll do that. What are you up to?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, Phoebe set me up on a date.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my god.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow.

name: rachel
dialogue: Why? What's the big deal?

name: monica
dialogue: Just figured, Because you and Ross are...

name: rachel
dialogue: What, slept together a year and a half ago? Yeah, I'm all set.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I think it's great that you are going on a date, you know? I       mean, it sounds healthy. I mean, you have needs. Embrace your womanhood!

name: monica
dialogue: You want a job? Turn off "Oprah," and send out a resume!

name: rachel
dialogue: So I'll bring her by around seven? Is that okay?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, it's perfect.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, you guys are going to have so much fun! She's at such a cute age.       Oh, a couple things. Now that she's eating solid food, she poops around       the clock. And watch out for your hair, Because she likes to grab it. And       oh, she's also in this phase where if you leave the room, she screams bloody       murder, but ah... Thanks, you guys. Have fun!

name: chandler
dialogue: Suddenly I wish I was reading my own name.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey. I'm so excited; I just set up Rachel with the worst guy tonight.

name: joey
dialogue: All right! Who is he?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, it's this guy I used to massage. And by massage, I mean hold       down so he wouldn't turn over and flash me.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, okay. Wait till you hear who I got       for Ross.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: She's this really boring woman. She's a teacher!

name: phoebe
dialogue: A teacher?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, yeah, she's really into history and foreign movies... And oh,       oh, she loves puzzles. Huh? Come on, who loves puzzles?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, Ross does. What... you are - you are ruining the plan! Joey,       you've - you've fixed him up with his perfect woman!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my god, you are right!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: She even reads for pleasure!

name: phoebe
dialogue: How do you even know a woman like that?

name: joey
dialogue: What? I'm not allowed to know smart women?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: I met her at the library. I went in to pee.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So now what do we do?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, okay, I'll - I'll just call her and tell her the date's cancelled,       and find him somebody else.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What if we don't find him somebody else? We'll just tell her the       date's off, but we don't tell Ross, and he goes to the restaurant and gets       stood up!

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh...I hear that is bad.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, so this is great! Rachel's going to have a terrible date, Ross       gets stood up, and then they'll realise how good they have it together.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah, yes, The Plan!

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's not Santa's plan. No, it's...

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, you know, it's not that fun.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, I think we killed it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Emma? Emma? Look at me! Well, I think I'll go downstairs for a while.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, no, no, no! No, no, no, no! It's okay, it's okay. I didn't go.       Don't cry, it's just a bit! I'm your uncle Chandler; funny is all I have!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, just so you know, I'm going to be ovulating from tomorrow until       the sixth, so don't touch yourself in the next 48 hours.

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't do that.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'll try to stop. Wait, did you say until the sixth?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Today is the sixth.

name: monica
dialogue: No, it's not.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, it's also 2003.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my god. Today's the sixth?! I may be done ovulating! I may have       also served some very questionable meat at the restaurant.

name: chandler
dialogue: It's okay. Go take the test and see if we're okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Tough crib.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, where are all my ovulation-sticks? There's only one here.

name: chandler
dialogue: I might have checked to see if I was ovulating a couple times.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: I am not working. There's not much to do around here!

name: ross
dialogue: Excuse me, is there a woman waiting at the bar? Someone average height,       dark hair, perhaps doing a puzzle?

name: waiter
dialogue: Uh, there's a drunk Chinese guy.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, if I'm still here in an hour, buy him a drink on me.

name: waiter
dialogue: Can I get you another glass of wine?

name: ross
dialogue: Nah, I don't know if I should. I don't want to be drunk when I go home       alone.

name: waiter
dialogue: Got stood up, huh?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, it's no big deal. It's just a blind date.

name: waiter
dialogue: Are you worried your date came, saw you, and left?

name: ross
dialogue: No!

name: monica
dialogue: We're okay. I'm still ovulating.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, good, because as of four o'clock this afternoon, I am not.

name: monica
dialogue: So, let's do this.

name: chandler
dialogue: I - I don't think I can.

name: monica
dialogue: Come on. I know you are not eighteen anymore, but give it a minute.

name: chandler
dialogue: Because of Emma.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my god, Emma. Oh, sweetie, I forgot you were here. Oh, you are       right, we can't do this. We can't leave her alone.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sorry.

name: monica
dialogue: Unless... Maybe we do it here. I mean, how much can she even be aware       of at this age?

dialogue: Well, she's aware when we leave the room. She may notice if we start...       canoodling in it.

name: monica
dialogue: Canoodling?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I can't say "hump" or "screw" in front       of the B-A-B-Y.

dialogue: I don't know. I mean, I guess having sex in front of a baby isn't       so...

dialogue: Horrifying? Scarring? Something people go to jail for?

dialogue: I guess you are right.

dialogue: Wow, everything looks so good! I think I'm going to have the chicken.

dialogue: Oh, well, that is - that is very sweet. Thank you.

dialogue: I silk-screen t-shirts now.

dialogue: Really? What's that like?

dialogue: Hey, Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, four times.

name: phoebe
dialogue: My dear, sweet Rach.

dialogue: Well, our plan is working. Rachel is having a miserable       time, and Ross is just stood up somewhere at a restaurant all alone.

dialogue: Oh, great, pretty soon they'll be back together.

dialogue: By the time anyone's figured out what we've done, we'll be in sunny       Mexico.  Oh, wait, that is the end of a different plan.

dialogue: She's asleep. Chandler?

name: monica
dialogue: What are you doing?

name: chandler
dialogue: Emma was doing it!

name: monica
dialogue: She's asleep.

dialogue: Ooh, she's asleep, that means we can...

dialogue: Okay, I'll try. And you can't make any noise.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, I'll try.

dialogue: Hello?

dialogue: Emma? Hey! Hi!

dialogue: How are you? How are you? Where are your babysitters, huh? Why's the       bedroom door closed?

dialogue: You can't have S-E-X, when you are taking care of the B-A-B-I-E!

dialogue: I've got bad news. The Chinese guy left.

dialogue: Look; you got stood up, who cares? We're going to show you a good time.       Just sit and relax. In fact, let me bring you a crab cake appetizer on       the house.

dialogue: Wow, free crab cakes. Well, that is nice. Although I was hoping to       have sex tonight.

dialogue: Ooh...

dialogue: Just the crab cakes.

name: waiter #2
dialogue: What are you       doing? Are you trying to get him to stay? Because you can't do that.

dialogue: Just get out of here, okay?

dialogue: What's - what's going on?

dialogue: Eh, okay, the waiters have a little pool going. We have a bet on       how long it'll take before you give up and go home.

name: waiter
dialogue: Well, if you stay till 9

dialogue: Well, that was weird. You were loud, and I was fast.

dialogue: I think we may have really done it this time.

dialogue: Really?

name: rachel
dialogue: Don't touch my coat!

dialogue: Oh my god, this is the worst date ever!

dialogue: Hey, did you stop by here?

dialogue: No.

dialogue: Oh my god, then...

dialogue: Oh, we were playing "peek-a-boo." She just“ she loves  it when I'm dramatic.

dialogue: Hey, I may never have kids, and somebody's got to carry on my family       name.

dialogue: Your family name is Tribbiani.

dialogue: You almost had me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, uh...

dialogue: Look, I think I know the answer to this question, but... Would you       like to make love to me?

name: rachel
dialogue: Really, really not.

name: steve
dialogue: Eh, it's just as well. Doesn't work anyway.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, well that is good to know. Good night, Steve.

dialogue: Hey, what's wrong?

name: rachel
dialogue: I just had a rough night.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh. Crab cake?

name: rachel
dialogue: Eww!

dialogue: Well, what happened?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, well, I...It's kind of weird talking to you about this, but...

dialogue: Monica told me you had a blind date.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

dialogue: I did, too.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

dialogue: But is it technically a date if the other person doesn't show up?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, oh no. Do you think she walked in, saw you and left?

name: ross
dialogue: Why does everyone keep saying that?

dialogue: Well, if it makes you feel any better, I wish my date hadn't shown       up.

dialogue: That bad?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, he makes t-shirts for a living, and he thought it would be       appropriate to give me this.

dialogue: Female body inspector? What size is that?

dialogue: Now, wait a minute. So, they're going to name their first child Joey?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh-huh.

dialogue: How - how do I get them to name the next one after me?

name: joey
dialogue: It's easy, you just walk in on them having sex.

dialogue: Oh, so they owe me like, three Phoebes.

dialogue: Oh my god! Look, it's Ross and Rachel. Oh, the plan is working.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Don't, don't do the plan-laugh.

dialogue: The first date we've had in months, and they were both such disasters.

dialogue: Oh. Huh. You know, it is weird that Phoebe would       set me up on a date that was awful on the same night that Joey set you       up on a date that didn't even show.

dialogue: Wait a minute; you don't think it was intentional? I mean, that is       just stupid.

name: joey
dialogue: We're geniuses! Yeah, look at them, look at them, they're really       bonding.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, yeah, they're falling in love all over again.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, they see us! Oh, they, they look mad. Oh, they figured it out.       They're coming this way. Run!

name: joey
dialogue: Where?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mexico!

name: joey
dialogue: Can you believe they're still not here?

dialogue: I know. A double blind date, and we both get stood up. What are the       chances?

name: joey
dialogue: I know, I'm so bummed. Can we have our free crab cakes now?

name: waiter
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: We've been stood up.  And we want our free crab cakes.

name: waiter
dialogue: Guys, give it a rest. Nobody's betting on you tonight. Although we       do have a pool going to see how long it takes that guy to cry.

name: steve
dialogue: I have such fat hands!

name: chandler
dialogue: Guys, guys, I've got great news! Guess what-

dialogue: Uh, ah, Monica's pregnant?!

dialogue: Really?  Let's get past the moment.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What's your news?

name: chandler
dialogue: Thank you. I got a job in advertising.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, honey, that is incredible!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Gosh, what's the pay like?  Oh, come on people-  come on, now, if I don't know who makes the most, how do I know who I like the most!  Hey Joey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Actually, it pays nothing. It's an internship.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, that is cool. We have interns at 'Days Of Our Lives'.

name: chandler
dialogue: Right. So, it'll be the same except- less sex with you.

name: ross
dialogue: So, uh, what kind of stuff do you think they'll have you do there?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, it's a training program, but at the end, they hire the people they like.

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is great.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I mean, there's probably going to be some ground work which will probably stink, you know, grown man getting people coffee is a little humiliating

name: chandler
dialogue: Humiliating and noble!

dialogue: You know, if I didn't already have a job, I think, I would have been really good in advertising.

dialogue: Ross, you did not come up with "got milk?"

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, I did, I did!  I should have written it down!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Where's Chandler? I want to wish him good luck on his first day.  ... and I smelled bacon.

dialogue: He just left.

dialogue: Who did?

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey! You never going to believe it

name: joey
dialogue: She did?

dialogue: You got it!

name: joey
dialogue: I did?

dialogue: What is she talking about?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know, but it sounds great.

dialogue: Your agent called. You got that audition.

name: joey
dialogue: With Lennart Haze?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my god, that is great! That is *** for a play on Broadway- and in a real theatre, not that little one underneath the dally like last time.

dialogue: Is it a good play?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, it must be, because I read and I didn't understand a singe word.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, and Lennart Haze is starring in it-

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, yeah, and directing.

name: monica
dialogue: He was so good in that movie of MacBeth.

dialogue: You saw that?

name: monica
dialogue: No, but- I saw the previews. They played it right before Jackass.

name: rachel and joey
dialogue: Ah!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, he's done some amazing works.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, yeah. Oh, I loved him in those cell phone commercials.

name: joey
dialogue: I know. When the monkey hits him in the face with that giant rubber phone.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! Maybe the monkey will be at the audition!

name: joey
dialogue: Don't make me more nervous than I already am!

dialogue: Good morning, everybody.

name: intern
dialogue: Can I get you a cup of coffee, Sir?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, no, no, I'm an intern, just like you guys- except for the tie, the briefcase- and the fact that I can rent a car.

dialogue: Seriously, you are an intern?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, well, I'm kind of heading into a new career direction and, you know, you got to start at the bottom.

name: intern
dialogue: Dude!

name: chandler
dialogue: Right. Look, I know I'm a little bit older than you guys, but it's not like I'm Bob Hope

dialogue: The comedian? USO?!

dialogue: Uhm, it's USA, sir.

dialogue: Oh wow wow wow!! Make room for your friend!

name: mike
dialogue: So how've you been?

name: monica
dialogue: I've been pretty good!

name: mike
dialogue: You look really beautiful.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thanks, you look good too.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh no no no no... this is dangerous territory. Keep it clean!

name: phoebe
dialogue: So how's the piano playing going?

name: mike
dialogue: Actually I've been playing a lot of love songs lately. I've missed you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I've missed you too.

name: monica
dialogue: You know, on the way over here, I saw this drunk guy throw up. And then a pigeon ate it!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, Ross, I just wanted to apologize... ..don't tell me you actually made those gay pictures of me?

name: ross
dialogue: uhu uhu, check this out.

name: chandler
dialogue: Huh! So that is what I would look like if I worked out... and was being serviced by a policeman. you are not actually going to send these out are you?

name: ross
dialogue: Eh.. actually no, I don't need to because your little "Ross is dead" joke didn't work, ok, there were no responses. Nobody posted anything on the website, nobody called my parents, so the joke my friend is on you. Nobody called, nobody wrote anything, nobody cares that I'm dead.  Oh my God! Nobody cares that I'm dead!?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, come on, you know that is not true.

name: ross
dialogue: What are you talking about? You get sixty responses just for coming out of the closet! I didn't get one response! And I'm dead!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, the gay community is a lot more vocal than the dead community.

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe this. Not even my geology lab partner? And I carried that guy!

name: chandler
dialogue: Alright look, let's think about this, ok, do you really think that people are going to stir up your family at this tragic time? That people are going to post condolences on a website? This is not about people not caring that you are dead .This is about people not having a decent outlet for their grief.

name: ross
dialogue: you are right. There isn't a decent outlet.

name: chandler
dialogue: Right, I mean, come on, I'm sure that if you had a funeral or a memorial service, tons of people would come.

name: ross
dialogue: Exactly!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ross, what're you... what're you... what are you doing? you are having a memorial service for yourself!?

name: ross
dialogue: No! That would be stupid! you are having it for me!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ross, don't press send, don't press se... !

name: ross
dialogue: oh, too late, too late! It's sent... oops sorry and so is the picture of you and the police man...

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm trying to put Emma down for a nap, have you seen Hugsy?

name: joey
dialogue: Original or crappy?

name: rachel
dialogue: Original.

name: joey
dialogue: No, sorry haven't seen him.

name: rachel
dialogue: Then what's that big lump under your covers?

name: joey
dialogue: It's Monica, ok?

name: rachel
dialogue: that is not Monica!

name: joey
dialogue: Alright!! Fine! It's original Hugsy! No, now I know that Emma wants him but he's mine and I need him..

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh God.

name: joey
dialogue: ... she's being unreasonable!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, there is a reason that Emma loves that stupid penguin so much  Oh don't cover its ears!  It's because it reminds her of her uncle Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: It does?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah! And she's comforted by him because she loves her uncle Joey so much.

name: joey
dialogue: Really? She... she loves me?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah! But you know what? If you need Hugsy, don't worry. Emma will totally understand. I won't... but whatever .

name: joey
dialogue: Ok, wait wait wait wait a minute wait a minute, I mean Rach, I mean if if... . If Hugsy means that much to Emma then...  well she can have him.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh... you are sweet, I knew uncle Joey would step up.  Look Emma, look who's back!

name: joey
dialogue: Look forget it forget it...  I can't do it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you going to...  you are going to take Hugsy away from a little child?

name: joey
dialogue: How do you think I got him in the first place?

name: monica
dialogue: Alright you two, I'm going to go to the bathroom. Now I don't want anything going on while I'm gone. Here's a few things you can discuss

name: mike
dialogue: I've missed you so much! No, I'm not going to ask you to get back together because I know we want different things, but just to be with you one more night.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know, I want that too, but IS that going to make it too hard?

name: mike
dialogue: It can't be any harder than this... I mean, If I had known the last time I saw you would be the last time, I... I would have stopped to memorize your face, the way you move, everything about you. If I had known the last time I kissed you would have been the last time...  I never would have stopped.

name: monica
dialogue: Kiss him, you fool!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: Didn't you hear that speech? If you don't kiss him then I will!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I missed you so much!

name: strange man
dialogue: I knew you'd be here!

name: mike
dialogue: Oh, crap!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Who is this?

name: mike
dialogue: My friend Manny. I asked him to keep me away from you.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi, that is what I'm doing for Phoebe!

name: manny
dialogue: Well, you are not doing a very good job!

name: monica
dialogue: Excuse me?

name: manny
dialogue: What's with the kissing?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, at least I knew where my guy was.

name: manny
dialogue: Oh yeah yeah, thank God you were here to oversee all the kissing!

name: monica
dialogue: You didn't hear the speech!

name: manny
dialogue: I've heard the speech

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, it was very moving! you are just heartless!

name: manny
dialogue: you are weak!

name: monica
dialogue: you are... weird!

name: manny
dialogue: Your pants are undone!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh !

name: manny
dialogue: Where did they go?

name: monica
dialogue: Damn it!

name: manny
dialogue: Oh we blew it. I blame myself.

name: monica
dialogue: And I blame you too.

name: ross
dialogue: It's been an hour and not one of my classmates has shown up! I tell you, when I actually die some people are going to get seriously haunted!

name: chandler
dialogue: There you go! Someone came!

name: ross
dialogue: Ok, ok! I'm going to go hide! Oh, this is so exciting, my first mourner!

name: monica
dialogue: Hi, glad you could come.

name: chandler
dialogue: Please, come in.

name: tom
dialogue: Hi, you are Chandler Bing, right? I'm Tom Gordon, I was in your class.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yes, yes... let me... take your coat.

name: tom
dialogue: Thanks... uh... I'm so sorry about Ross, it's...

name: chandler
dialogue: At least he died doing what he loved... watching blimps

name: ross
dialogue: Who is he?

name: chandler
dialogue: Some guy, Tom Gordon.

name: ross
dialogue: I don't remember him, but then again I touched so many lives.

name: monica
dialogue: So, did you know Ross well?

name: tom
dialogue: Oh, actually I barely knew him. Yeah, I came because I heard Chandler's news. D'you know if he's seeing anyone?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, he is. Me.

name: tom
dialogue: What? You... You... Oh! Can I ask you a personal question? Ho-how do you shave your beard so close?

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok Tommy, that is enough mourning for you! Here we go, bye bye!!

name: tom
dialogue: Hey, listen. Call me.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok!

name: ross
dialogue: I'm dead and no one cares?

name: monica
dialogue: I look like a man??

name: chandler
dialogue: Please, one ridiculous problem at a time!

name: ross
dialogue: It isn't ridiculous, look around! No one's here!

name: chandler
dialogue: You gave them one day's notice, not everyone in our class checks the web site everyday and Monica... it's probably the way you stand!

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, you are right. Still somebody must have seen it... I mean, I went to that school for 4 years, I didn't have an impact on anyone?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, that is not true. You had an impact on me, I mean, it's 15 years later and we're still best friends. Doesn't that count for something?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah...

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm sure it's somebody for you. Now, go hide.

name: kori
dialogue: Hi. I'm here for Ross Geller's memorial service.

name: chandler
dialogue: Kori? Kori Weston?

name: kori
dialogue: Yeah...

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow! You look amazing!

name: kori
dialogue: And you are...

name: chandler
dialogue: Chandler, Chandler Bing. I'm not gay, I'm not gay at all.

name: monica
dialogue: You are married though.

name: chandler
dialogue: Don't listen to him, he's in a really bad mood!

name: kori
dialogue: I can't believe that Ross is gone. It is just so sad.

name: chandler
dialogue: I didn't know Ross and you were so close.

name: kori
dialogue: We weren't but we had one class together. He was such a great guy and he talked so passionately about science. I always remembered him.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm sure that would mean a lot to him. And if heaven has a door, I'm sure he's pressing his ear up against it and listening intently.

name: kori
dialogue: I thought so many times about calling him and asking him out. I guess I really missed my chance.

name: ross
dialogue: But you didn't! I'm still alive!! Kori, I know this is a big surprise for you. It's a long story but the things you just said really made my day! I mean, the fact that you are here means more to me than if this room were filled with people!

name: kori
dialogue: You sick freak, who does that? I can't believe I had a crush on you!

name: ross
dialogue: Did you hear that? Kori Weston had a crush on me!!

name: ross
dialogue: No Mum, I'm not dead. I know it's not something to kid about. It was just a practical joke between Chandler and me, but it's over, ok?  Actually no, even if I had died, you would not be left childless.  Monica?

name: joey
dialogue: Monica, hey, can I borrow the Porsche?

name: monica
dialogue: Ok.

name: joey
dialogue: Alright!

name: monica
dialogue: But ehm...what is it not?

name: joey
dialogue: A place to entertain my lady friends.

name: monica
dialogue: And what else is it not?

name: joey
dialogue: A place to eat spaghetti.

name: monica
dialogue: Very good!  What do you need it for anyway?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh well, the powerball lottery is up to 300 million and they don't sell tickets here in New York, so...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! So you are driving up to Connecticut?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah Connecticut...Not West Virginia.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, maybe I'll drive you up there! I'd like to buy some tickets myself!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah with Chandler not getting paid, we could really use 300 million dollars.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, because if I was at my old job we'd say 300 million? No thank you!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey will you get me tickets too?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah me too. oh! I have an idea. Why don't we all pitch in 50 bucks, we'll pool our money together and then if we win, we'll split it!

name: everyone almost simultaneously except ross
dialogue: yeah that's a great idea!

name: ross
dialogue: No thanks!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You don't want to win the lottery?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh...sure I do, and I also want to be King of my own country and find out what happened to Amelia Earhart.

name: chandler
dialogue: Still on Amelia Earhart?

name: ross
dialogue: The woman just vanished!

name: joey
dialogue: Seriously, Ross, you don't want in on this?

name: ross
dialogue: No! Do you know what your odds are of winning the lottery? I...I mean you have a better chance of being struck by lightning 42 times.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes but there's six of us so we'd only have to get struck by lightning 7 times.

name: joey
dialogue: I like those odds!

name: ross
dialogue: Seriously you guys, I can't believe you are going to spend 250 dollars on the lottery, I mean that is such a bunch of boohaki.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'll ask.  Boohaki?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh oh, we think Emma is about to start talking so we're trying to be careful about what words we use in front of her.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah so get ready to hear a lot of ehm...boohaki, gosh darn it and brother pucker.

name: monica
dialogue: How do you know she's going to start talking?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well when I talk to her I almost feel like she understands what I'm saying.

name: chandler
dialogue: kind of like Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: What's that now?

name: monica
dialogue: God! Look at all these tickets! It's so exciting! You know I haven't won anything since the sixth grade.

name: chandler
dialogue: Pie eating contest?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh! You assume because I was heavy that is the only way I could win something?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, I saw a picture of you covered in blueberries.

name: monica
dialogue: That was a good day!

name: ross
dialogue: They're towing your car, they're towing your car!!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm parked in a garage on Morton!

name: ross
dialogue: They're towing a car. And I am seeing...spots.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my god Ross! You don't have Emma! And Rachel you don't have Emma!  Where's Emma? Who has Emma!?

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey relax! My mother picked her up two hours ago. You were there!

name: joey
dialogue: I was?

name: racel
dialogue: Yes and you talked to her...

name: joey
dialogue: I did?

name: rachel
dialogue: She dropped off a casserole?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh yeah! The casserole lady.

name: monica
dialogue: So, did you come by to watch us win the big bucks?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, uh... and then I figured after you win, we could all go out to the balcony and see a night rainbow with gremlins dancing on top of it!

name: chandler
dialogue: Don't touch the phone! I'll get it, I'll get it, I'll get it!!

name: ross
dialogue: Think he washed his hands?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hello? Hey Charlie, what do you know?

name: rachel
dialogue: What's going on?

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler is supposed to find out if he's getting an assistant job at his ad agency. But out of the 15 interns, they are only hiring three.

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh! Tough odds!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah if only it were a sure thing like your 24 state lottery!

name: joey
dialogue: Look who's coming around!

name: chandler
dialogue: Damnit. Alright call me when you know more.

name: joey
dialogue: Did you get it?

name: chandler
dialogue: One of the slots got filled.

name: joey
dialogue: By you!?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sense the tone! No that kid Nate got it.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh! I hate that guy! I mean come on kid! Pull up your pants!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah I know.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, there's two spots left right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah...I mean I want this so much! I mean, I want to get one, I want my friend Charlie to get one...Except I don't care about Charlie.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey you guys! Ok, you are not going to believe this! I just saw my psychic and she said I was definitely going to win the lottery tonight!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey that reminds me, I thought we could use some extra luck so I brought a wishbone home from work.

name: ross
dialogue: A psychic AND a wishbone? Guys! Give someone else a chance!

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, who wants to do it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh can I? Vegetarians never get to do the wishbone. It's really not fair either! You know, just because we don't eat the meat doesn't mean we don't like to play with the carcasses!

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, hey Rach?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh no, I'm good, I don't want to get that turkey smell all over my hands.

name: joey
dialogue: I'll do it!! It'll get the casserole stink off of mine.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I hope I win!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, it doesn't really matter ... you are both wishing for the same thing, right?

name: joey
dialogue: I can't tell you what I'm wishing for! Else...you know...won't come true!

name: monica
dialogue: Right! .. but we "know" what you are wishing for!

name: joey
dialogue: Can't really say!

name: monica
dialogue: I understand, but you are wishing for what we think you are wishing for, aren't you?

name: joey
dialogue: I'm not really comfortable with these questions!

name: rachel, chandler and monica
dialogue: Please, just do it!

name: phoebe
dialogue: One, two, three!

name: joey
dialogue: I won, hey!

name: ross
dialogue: You know what, I'm sure your wish is going to come true, but, you guys - just in case, maybe a genie will come out if we rub this lamp!  Ah!! That thing gets hot!!

name: rachel
dialogue: You know, Ross, just keep making your jokes. How are you going to feel if we actually do win?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, you are not going to win.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I know, I know, the odds are against us, but somebody has to win, and it could be us! And then how you going to feel? You know, we're going to be all like "oh everybody, let's take our helicopters up to the cape" and you are going to be all like "oh, I can't guys, I'll meet you guys up there, I got to gas up the Hyundai"

name: ross
dialogue: Ok, I've heard myself on tape and I sound nothing like that.

name: chandler
dialogue: I can see the headline now

name: ross
dialogue: Why would I eat my own arm?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well you wouldn't, but we own the paper, we can print whatever we want.

name: monica
dialogue: You know what, Ross? I'm going to throw in 50 bucks for you.

name: ross
dialogue: Why?

name: monica
dialogue: Because I know that you think the lottery is "boohaki" but we're all here and going to watch the numbers and have fun. And you are my brother, and I want you to be a part of this.

name: ross
dialogue: You don't have to do that, I'll pay for myself. But just the fact that you want me to have fun with you guys - that is so sweet! Come here

name: phoebe
dialogue: Get a room!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok, so now that you are in, what are you going to do if we win?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't know, probably just invest it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh! Calm down ...

name: joey
dialogue: Seriously, that is your fantasy? To invest it?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry, did I say "invest it"? I meant "be cool and piss it all away"

name: joey
dialogue: Ooh, ooh, I know! We should pool all own money and buy the Knicks!

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't really care about the Knicks.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, you will when I pick you as starting forward.

name: rachel
dialogue: You would do that? I never get picked!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, I'm not sure a sports team is the way to go.

name: joey
dialogue: you are not going to let me buy the Knicks?? I can't believe you are taking this away from me!

name: chandler
dialogue: you are right, it has been you dream for over 15 seconds.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, how long until they announce the numbers, Mommy?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'll take this one too  Uh ... Mommy?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I've gotten into the habit of calling Rachel "Mommy" when we're around Emma. Which I now realize we are not ...

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm hoping that if she hears it enough it will be her first word.

name: ross
dialogue: Although if we're going to do that, we should probably call me "Daddy" too.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, I like that, "daddy"

name: ross
dialogue: I ... I was just talking about Rachel.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, is daddy getting angry? Is daddy going to spank me?

name: ross
dialogue: Well that depends ... have you been a bad gi ..  no I can't.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hello? Hello? Oh, hey Charlie. Did anybody else hear? ... What? Susan got it?? How? Oh man, I would have slept with him!! .. Alright, bye.

name: joey
dialogue: Dude, I'm sorry. But hey, there's one spot left, right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well no, Charlie's going to get that.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, don't say that! You got just as good a chance as anybody else of getting that job!

name: chandler
dialogue: He's the boss's son.

name: monica
dialogue: Come on, lottery!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh, you guys, it starts in like 20 minutes.

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, here we go. We need to sort out the tickets as quickly as possible to see if we've won. So does anybody have any ideas how to organize this?  Ok, how about this

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh, I have another idea!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm sorry, idea time is over.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ok, well, are all the tickets in the bowl?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: What about the ones you have on the nightstand?

name: monica
dialogue: There are no tickets on the nightstand!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes there are, I just saw them a few minutes ago.

name: monica
dialogue: Un, no you didn't! You must be mistaken!

name: chandler
dialogue: Honey, there are like 20 tickets on the nightstand!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, sense the tone!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, well, well, look what mommy found!!

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, fine!! I bought 20 extra tickets for me and Chandler.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh! The psychic also said that I would be betrayed.

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe this, I thought we were all in this together!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, you just got in 5 minutes ago!

name: ross
dialogue: 3 minutes ago!!! I don't know why that is important ...

name: joey
dialogue: I was with you the whole time we were in Connecticut, when did you even get those?

name: monica
dialogue: When you were reading the dirty magazines without taking off the plastic!

name: joey
dialogue: I'll show you how.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, well Monica, suppose one of your "special" tickets win? How are you going to feel when you win the lottery and you lose all your friends?

name: monica
dialogue: Please ... if I win the lottery, you guys are not going to leave me. Someone gave me a basket of mini-muffins last week and I couldn't get rid of you for 3 days!

name: rachel
dialogue: Chandler, would you just tell her what she did was wrong?

name: chandler
dialogue: She's right, you shouldn't have bought tickets just for us ...

name: monica
dialogue: Ah!

name: chandler
dialogue: Let me finish ...  however, it doesn't look like I'm going to get this job so I can't afford to have principles, so screw you, the tickets are ours!!

name: monica
dialogue: There's the man I married!!

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, believe me. If you win the lottery, it's the last you are going to hear from us!

name: monica
dialogue: Fine! Don't be my friends! I'll buy new friends! Yeah, and then I'll pay for their plastic surgery so they'd look just like you!

name: rachel
dialogue: OH! Alright, you know what? that is it! I want my share of the tickets !

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I want my tickets too ! And I'm buying the Knicks! And Steffi Graff, ah ah!

name: ross
dialogue: Than I want mine, too ! And if I win I'm going to put it all into a very low-yield bond.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, you guys! We've got to keep all the tickets together

name: monica
dialogue: No, no! We should divide them up  and I should get extra because we used my card to buy them!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, if anybody gets extra tickets, it should be me! This all thing was my idea!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, yeah! Thanks for inventing the lottery!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, that is it! Just give them to me! I'll split them up!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, hey!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh!  Fine, I can't take it anymore! I'm putting an end to this!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, if she jumps, I get her tickets.

name: joey
dialogue: No, no!

name: phoebe
dialogue: If we are not doing it together, we're not doing it at all! So, say goodbye to your tickets! .

name: everyone
dialogue: NO!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Don't come any closer!

name: chandler
dialogue: Can I come a little bit closer, valuable things are getting squished...

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, what's more important, your friends or money?

name: everyone but monica
dialogue: Friends!

name: monica
dialogue: Money!  Friends...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey Monica, what about your extra tickets?

name: monica
dialogue: They're all in there! Even these five that I hid in my bra ...

name: ross
dialogue: Monica!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ok, good!  You guys were so scared! There was no way I was going to dump this... Oh God, no!  I think I broke your bowl.

name: ross
dialogue: Go, go, go!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What a beautiful night to be running around the street, looking for tickets. And the wind sure made it fun.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, we lost half of them.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, what? Monica, we have the winning ticket! My psychic said I  was going to win, remember?

name: ross
dialogue: Weird.. your psychic didn't mention anything about the scary pigeon...

name: phoebe
dialogue: As a matter of fact she said that is how I am going to die.  So, excuse me for being a little skittish.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, there's two messages. These could be from work!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, play them!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok, here we go!

name: message
dialogue: "Hello. Th-this is the pigeon from the balcony calling to apologise"  "I sh.. I shouldn't have knocked the tickets out of the pretty lady's hand. It-it was all my fault. Not hers. Bye. Coo."

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I bet that was very hard for him to do.

name: second message
dialogue: "Hey Chandler, it's Charlie"

name: chandler
dialogue: This is.. shhh!

name: second message
dialogue: "Listen, oh... it turns I got the last spot. I'm really sorry man, it was a lot of fun working with you. Give me a call if you want."

name: monica
dialogue: Oh God, I am so sorry honey...

name: all
dialogue: Oh, so sorry man! Sorry!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, it is so unfair. It's like that time they promoted Sandra over me at work.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, is she related to Ralph Lauren?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, she was just much better at job than me!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Guys, the drawing is about to start!

name: rachel
dialogue: You know what? We should call my mum's house and say goodnight to Emma before she goes down.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah, it's a good idea!

name: monica
dialogue: Honey, you've been really strong about this, I know how badly you wanted that job.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, you know, I really thought I deserved it.  But... let's go win the lottery... I mean, we still have 130 chances to win, right?

name: ross
dialogue: Goodnight sweetheart! I love you. And remember, you are daddy's little girl...  Phoebe's totally ruined that for me...

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi mum, put her back on!

name: joey
dialogue: Rach, come on! They are announcing the numbers! My God, I can already feel myself changing.

name: tv
dialogue: "Here we are, the official Powerball numbers! We have 53"

name: chandler
dialogue: I got that!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, we have one too!!

name: monica
dialogue: We are on a roll, people!!

name: ross
dialogue: Come on!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Mum, please! I know you love your new lips, but I can barely understand you! Would you, please, just let me say goodnight to my daughter?

name: tv
dialogue: "And number 29! Here we go! The Powerball is 7"

name: monica
dialogue: Check your numbers! Make me rich!

name: rachel
dialogue: Guys, you are not going to believe this! I was just saying goodnight to Emma and she said her first words!!

name: all
dialogue: Wow!

name: joey
dialogue: And what did she say?

name: rachel
dialogue: She said "gleba"!!

name: monica
dialogue: Make me rich!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Isn't that amazing?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah, no no no...that is great!

name: rachel
dialogue: Why-why aren't you more excited?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, Rach...oh..."gleba" is not a word.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, but of course it is!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, what does it mean?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know all the words.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm just, I'm just glad I didn't miss my daughter's first words .

name: ross
dialogue: Yes you did, gleba is a word!

name: ross
dialogue: Ok, use it in a sentence.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok... "Emma just said gleba"!

name: ross
dialogue: It's not a word!

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, okay, okay, fine, I'm going to look it up .

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, oh, ok, great. You know what, while you are at it she said another word the other day, why don't you, why don't you look up

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright, okay, okay, gleba, gleba...  Gleba! Ha! Here it is

name: ross
dialogue: She's going to be a scientist!

name: joey
dialogue: Damnit! anybody got anything?

name: chandler
dialogue: No.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm still looking through mine...

name: monica
dialogue: Just double checking ...no, no, no... No!

name: monica
dialogue: Hello? Hold on. It's your boss.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ah, the "I'm sorry I rejected you" phone call. I'm not used to getting it from guys.  Hey, Steve.

name: steve
dialogue: Chandler, hi! I'm sure you've heard we filled the three positions. We just felt that with your maturity and experience, you wouldn't be happy being someone's assistant.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh no no no no, I'd love to be somebody's assistant! Answering phones, getting coffee, I live for that stuff! And I'm not too mature... farts, boobies, butt cracks!

name: steve
dialogue: Chandler, you were the strongest person in the program. We're offering you the position of junior copywriter.

name: chandler
dialogue: Me, that guy who just said butt cracks?

name: steve
dialogue: Yes, that is right. We're excited about the level of sophistication you'll be bringing to the job.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok well, thanks, you won't regret it. I'll see you tomorrow .

name: chandler
dialogue: What?  Oh, yeah, I'm going to be a junior copywriter.

name: everybody
dialogue: Oh my God, congratulations!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh sweetie, I'm so proud of you!

name: chandler
dialogue: Does that mean I get the good loving tonight?

name: monica
dialogue: You bet! No TV or anything!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, that is so great about the job.

name: chandler
dialogue: Thanks, man.

name: joey
dialogue: And I like to think I had a little something to do with it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really? What?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, before, with the wishbone... I didn't wish we would win the lottery, I wished you'd get the job.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah?  Listen, don't tell Monica, she'll rip your heart right out.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: You know what? There is a little part of me that really thought we were going to win.

name: ross
dialogue: Me too. So much for my dinosaur/Amelia Earhart theme park.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You guys, what was the Powerball number again?

name: monica and ross
dialogue: Seven.

name: phoebe
dialogue: We won.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: We won!

name: monica
dialogue: Let me see!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Don't tear it.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, you don't have any of the first five numbers.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I know that, but look, we've got the Powerball number, we've won 3 dollars!

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow, you'd think we should get that over 20 years or go for the big payout.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't care, I've never won anything before, I can't believe this!

name: rachel
dialogue: So Pheebs, what are you going to do with your $3?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's not all mine. We all get 50 cents.

name: monica
dialogue: You know what? You can have mine.

name: chandler
dialogue: Me too.

name: joey
dialogue: Me too.

name: rachel
dialogue: Me too.

name: ross
dialogue: I guess if everybody else is...

name: joey
dialogue: Hey guys, so I just called the Powerball hotline, can you believe it? Nobody won.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I beg to differ .

name: gunther
dialogue: Maybe nobody won the jackpot, but there was this guy in here earlier, and he found the ticket on the street, right outside, and won $10,000 .

name: phoebe
dialogue: Coo, again. Don't blame the pretty lady. It was not her fault. It was me, the pigeon, coo!  Seriously, stop staring at her.

name: joey
dialogue: God, you are beautiful...why are we fighting this? You know you want it to happen as much as I do.

name: joey
dialogue: I want you. I need you. Let me make love to you.

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't want to stand in the way of true love or anything, but I think a  cantaloupe might hurt less.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, ehm...I'm...I'm rehearsing my lines. They gave me a big romantic story on Days Of Our Lives. It's the first time my character's got one. I'm so nervous, you know, I really want it to be good!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow! I haven't seen you this worked up since you did that dog food commercial and you thought you were going to be with a real talking dog!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, that was a disappointment... Oh, hey! do you want to come down to the set and tell me if I'm doing ok?

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you serious?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! Hey, you just have to promise not to get yourself thrown out again.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, that was an honest mistake!

name: joey
dialogue: Right! "OH my God, is this the men's room? Oh, I feel so foolish, have you always known you wanted to be an actor?"

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, that was an awesome day!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi!

name: monica
dialogue: So, do you guys want to come and eat dinner at the restaurant sometime in the next few weeks?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure!

name: ross
dialogue: I'd love to!

name: monica
dialogue: Well you can't! We're booked solid for the next month!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I can't give you a massage, because my licence has been revoked again!

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, what happened?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, it was an accident...You know, it's a lot of oil and sometimes the hand just slips!

name: chandler
dialogue: Have I got a surprise for you? Pack your bags!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh no! You guys aren't supposed to get divorced for 7 years!

name: chandler
dialogue: What? No, I'm taking Monica to a romantic inn in Vermont !

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, good! Ok, good for you! Try to recapture the magic!

name: chandler
dialogue: So, what do you say? Can you get out of work?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, honey! I can't. I was just telling these guys that things are crazy at the restaurant!

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you really that busy?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, I'm sorry. I really am.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, that is ok. I'll just try and reschedule.  "Hi, this is Chandler Bing. I made a reservation there and I need to change it  Oh, what do you mean it's not refundable? Can I just come some other time?  Oh, can't you make an exception?"

name: monica
dialogue: Tell them I'm a chef in a big New York restaurant!

name: phoebe
dialogue: And tell them that in 2 weeks I will once again be a masseuse in good standing!

name: chandler
dialogue: "Look, this is ridiculous! I'm not paying for that room! Ok?"  "Oh, thank you very much!"  Yeah, I'm going to Vermont...

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, don't worry about it! Just use your travel insurance.

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't have travel insurance.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, this is what happens when people live on the edge!

name: monica
dialogue: Why don't you take Ross?

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, don't you think that would be a little weird? I mean, two guys in a romantic inn...

name: monica
dialogue: No, not if their room has two beds!

name: ross
dialogue: I guess...It still seems a little... moonlight boat ride!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey Joey, is this the bed where Olivia lost her virginity?

name: joey
dialogue: I don't know, but one of the extras sure did!  Hey, listen Rach. Thanks again for coming down to watch my scenes!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, please! Honey, just the fact that you want me here to support you, I'm...OH MY GOD!Is that Christian Sanders? He's so gorgeous!

name: joey
dialogue: Also so gay!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, in my head he's done some pretty "not-gay-stuff"!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, at the Christmas party him and Santa did some definitely gay stuff!

name: director
dialogue: Joey, Joey! We're ready for you!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, wish me luck!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, not that you need it but good...GOD!Is that Chase Lassiter? He's straight, right?

name: joey
dialogue: Rach, I got to say...if you weren't here wondering if these guys were gay I don't know if I could do this!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry, you are right. I'm sorry, good luck!

name: director
dialogue: On a bell please! Quietly.. and ACTION!

name: actress/olivia
dialogue: Drake! What are you doing in here?

name: joey
dialogue: Stopping you from marrying the wrong man and making the biggest mistake of your life.

name: actress/olivia
dialogue: Get out!

name: joey
dialogue: You don't love him!

name: actress/olivia
dialogue: What do you know about love?

name: joey
dialogue: I know what I felt that night when we kissed under the bridge.

name: actress/olivia
dialogue: That kiss never happened.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, what about this one.

name: rachel
dialogue: OH!

name: actress/olivia
dialogue: No, I told you...get out!

name: joey
dialogue: Fine. I'll go. But let me ask you one question...

name: chase lassiter
dialogue: You look familiar, have we...

name: rachel
dialogue: SSSHHHHTTT!!He's asking her a question!!

name: joey
dialogue: Can you really live the rest of your life never knowing what we could have been?

name: actress/olivia
dialogue: I don't have a choice...

name: joey
dialogue: Yes, you do. Yes...you do. I'm the one who doesn't have a choice because I...because I can't stop loving you.

name: actress/olivia
dialogue: Don't say that...

name: joey
dialogue: Tell me to stop, just...tell me to stop.

name: director
dialogue: CUT!

name: rachel
dialogue: NO!  Or, cut! You know, that is your call!

name: monica
dialogue: Thank you!

name: monica
dialogue: Thank you! You haven't said anything...

name: monica
dialogue: Oh..please! I-I welcome criticism.

name: monica
dialogue: What musician?

name: phoebe
dialogue: And there's a country called Argentina, it's a place I've never seen. But I'm told for fifty pesos you can buy a human spleen. Human spleen.

name: monica
dialogue: What are you doing here!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, you said that you had customers lined up in the street, so I am here to entertain!

name: monica
dialogue: Great!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! It really has been great too, you know, some of this people must have seen me play before because they were requesting a bunch of my songs! Yeah, "You suck" and "shut up and go home".

name: monica
dialogue: Listen Phoebe...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: You know how much I love listening to your music, you know, but...

name: phoebe
dialogue: But what?

name: monica
dialogue: This is kind of a classy place.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ok, say no more.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hi, Chandler Bing, I have a reservation.

name: receptionist
dialogue: Welcome to the Chestnut Inn Mr. Bing, so where are you joining from?

name: chandler
dialogue: New York.

name: ross
dialogue: The big apple!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm sorry, he's a little bit wound up, we had to stop at every maple candy stand on the way here.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I ate all my gifts for everybody.

name: receptionist
dialogue: I am sorry Mr. Bing, there's no record of your reservation in the computer.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, that is impossible, can you check again, please?

name: ross
dialogue: Check again please!

name: receptionist
dialogue: I'm sorry, it's not here.

name: ross
dialogue: Not there.

name: chandler
dialogue: Let me get this straight. I called yesterday trying to cancel my reservation and I was told it was not refundable, then we drove six hours all the way up here and now you tell me that we don't have a reservation?

name: receptionist
dialogue: I don't know what to say.

name: ross
dialogue: She doesn't know what to say!

name: chandler
dialogue: Just give us the cheapest room you have.

name: receptionist
dialogue: Unfortunately the only thing we have available is our deluxe suite, the rate is six hundred dollars.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is insane!

name: ross
dialogue: Totally insane. Dude, let's drive home, we'll hit all the maple candy stores on the way back and if...if they're closed maybe we'll tap a tree and make some ourselves.

name: chandler
dialogue: Does that room have a closet I can lock him in?  We'll take it.

name: receptionist
dialogue: Great.

name: chandler
dialogue: What!? They are totally ripping us off!

name: ross
dialogue: Dude, don't worry 'bout it! I know how we can make your money back! This is a nice hotel, you know, plenty of amenities, we just load up on those! Like those apples. Instead of taking one, I'm... I take six!

name: chandler
dialogue: Great, at a hundred dollars an apple, we're there!

name: ross
dialogue: C'mon, you get the idea, ow-ow-ow we'll make our money back in no time!

name: chandler
dialogue: Dude, you are shaking!

name: ross
dialogue: I think it's the sugar, could you hold the apple?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, I got to tell you, I've been thinking all day about that scene you did, I mean, you were amazing!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, you know, the writing was good, and the director is good, and... and my co-star's good but they're not as good as me!

name: rachel
dialogue: God, you have to tell me what happens tomorrow!

name: joey
dialogue: Ow, I'm just going over the script now! You want to read lines with me?

name: rachel
dialogue: Me? Oh, no, I am not an actress.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, all right, I can ask Monica.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh screw her, that part is mine!

name: joey
dialogue: Right...  ok, so just from the top of the page, right here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. . Hello Drake, I'm surprised to see you here.

name: joey
dialogue: I can't believe you married him.

name: rachel
dialogue: But what choice did I have. He was keeping my sister in a dungeon!

name: joey
dialogue: So what about us? Everything we feel for each other.

name: rachel
dialogue: It's over! You have to accept that.

name: joey
dialogue: How can I? Knowing I'll never hold you in my arms again, or touch your skin, or feel your lips, knowing I'll never make love to you? How can I accept that... I can never kiss you again when it's all I can do not to kiss you right now.

name: rachel
dialogue: Kiss me.

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Kiss me.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah, Rach, it doesn't say that!

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I'm saying...

name: joey
dialogue: but, but..

name: rachel
dialogue: just... don't talk...

name: rachel
dialogue: Eh, aw! . Well, that is new!

name: ross
dialogue: Hi, this is Ross Geller in suite 206. It seems you forgot a couple of things. Could you have some complimentary toiletries sent up to my room?  Thank you! Ok. Toothbrush, toothpaste, razor, mouthwash, deodorant, dental floss, band aids, shaving cream, after shave... and I feel like I am forgetting something... Is there anything else you have that I haven't asked for already?  Yeah, go ahead, send up some tampons.

name: ross
dialogue: What did you get?

name: chandler
dialogue: USA Today

name: ross
dialogue: Nice, put it with the others.

name: chandler
dialogue: And I also got... two more apples.

name: ross
dialogue: We are four short of a bush-o . God I feel so alive, I love being in the country!

name: chandler
dialogue: I also got this great salt and pepper shaker from the restaurant.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, that is not cool.

name: chandler
dialogue: Dude, none of this is cool.

name: ross
dialogue: No, Chandler, you have to find the line between stealing and taking what the hotel owes you. For example

name: chandler
dialogue: I think I know what you mean though...the lamp is the hotel's, but the bulbs ...oh, you already got that.

name: ross
dialogue: Not my first time in a hotel, my friend.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok, how about this ?

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, no, you can't take the remote control!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, but the batteries...

name: chandler
dialogue: Thank you, thank you very much!

name: ross
dialogue: Let's celebrate with some maple candy!

name: chandler
dialogue: No!

name: ross
dialogue: At least tell me where you hid it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Can I ask you a question?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Have you ever had any weird romantic dreams?

name: monica
dialogue: Let me think. Oh, when I was younger I used to dream that I got married to Mayor McCheese, and on our wedding night I ate his head.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, well this is like that...in no way. I had a...I had a dream last night that I wanted to kiss Joey.

name: monica
dialogue: Wow, do you mean like kiss him-kiss him?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh yeah! I mean, that was pretty intense.

name: monica
dialogue: What do you think brought than on?

name: rachel
dialogue: I don't know! I mean, maybe that is something to do with the fact that I saw him do a love scene yesterday.

name: monica
dialogue: A love scene? With who?

name: rachel
dialogue: Olivia.

name: monica
dialogue: Olivia? I thought she was marrying Connor!  Oh right, real life more important.

name: rachel
dialogue: So do you think that my dream means anything?

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know. I mean, you saw him do a love scene, so maybe you don't have a thing for Joey, maybe you have a thing for Drake.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ah! Well it was Joey reading Drake's lines in the dream...

name: monica
dialogue: Of course it was! Trust me, when it comes to psychology I know what I'm talking about. I took two psych classes in college.

name: rachel
dialogue: You took the same class twice.

name: monica
dialogue: It was hard!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel and monica
dialogue: Hi.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Here, Monica, look what I got to wear when I play at the restaurant  uh, huh wait!  Right? I mean, this might even class up the ballad of the uncircumcised man.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh...Phoebe? Maybe I wasn't clear before. I really love listening to your music here, but my restaurant is sort of an upscale place.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Right, yeah, ok, I'll ask the butler to fetch my diamonds out of the vault.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, it's not what you wear. It's sort of your songs... I just don't think you should play at the restaurant anymore.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, ok. Fine, I'll just, I'll take the hat back .

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey, so you guys, the funniest thing happened, at work...

name: phoebe
dialogue: My songs aren't good enough for your restaurant?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, we're still on that.

name: monica
dialogue: I didn't say your songs were not good enough.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Then what's wrong with them? Would they not go with your tiny portions of pretentious food?

name: monica
dialogue: Tiny portions?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah well, "excuse me, I ordered the smoked salmon appetizer, but  I can't see it, I can't see it"!

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe, it's not about quantity.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well...it's not about quality.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh really, you want to talk about quality? Have you heard of a key? It's what some people sing in.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well at least all my songs don't taste like garlic. Yeah, there are other ingredients Monica.

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, so that is what we're doing. You know, when I'm in the coffee house bopping along to one of your songs, I'm wearing ear plugs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ear plugs, or cloves of garlic?

name: monica
dialogue: You know what? I take back what I said before. You keep playing at the restaurant, because with your music driving people inside, my bar sales are going up like crazy.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What are people having, the garlic Martini?

name: receptionist
dialogue: Here's your copy of the bill, we hope you enjoyed your stay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh we did, and you still have all your lamps.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I didn't factor in the room tax.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh dude, don't worry about it, I found an unattended maid's car. We're way ahead of the game.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my god.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: There's something new in the bowl.

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, we have enough, just walk away.

name: ross
dialogue: No, but I want...I want the pinecones!

name: chandler
dialogue: There's a forest right outside.

name: ross
dialogue: It's not the same.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok, go quick!

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you for a delightful stay.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, my maple candy!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Food here at 'Javu'..will kill you.. the food here at 'Javu' ...will kill you..

name: monica
dialogue: Thank god, it's just you! I thought someone was swinging a bag of cats against the wall.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You'd better get back in that kitchen Monica, the garlic is not going to overuse itself.

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, you have to stop playing now.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why? The only person my playing is bothering is you!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh yeah? Ok, let's settle this, come on!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Get your garlic-peelers off me!

name: monica

And I remember all those mornings before you even put on your make-up, when I would think to myself, my God, she...is... beautiful...  and it hurts so much, because I knew I could never tell you  but it was worth it just to be there looking at you.

dialogue: Oh, I so can't believe this! My uterus is an inhospitable environment? I was trying so hard to be a good hostess!

dialogue: Oh, I can't believe my sperm have low motility because, let me tell you, when I was growing up they sure seem to be in a hurry to get places!!

dialogue: Hi there.

name: chandler

name: monica
dialogue: Hi.

name: monica

dialogue: Ok, given your situation, the options with the greatest chances for success would be surrogacy, or insemination using a sperm donor.

name: monica
dialogue: Ok.

name: doctor connelly
dialogue: And, of course, if you feel that neither of those is right for you, you can always adopt.

dialogue: Hi! Ok, you are ready to go pick up Phoebe and go shopping?

dialogue: Umh... Kurts Baley?

dialogue: ah-ha!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: What? NO! I am not going to give them Ben!

name: professor sherman
dialogue: Mmm-mm.

name: ross
dialogue: I mean, we've been accepting Leakey's dates as a given, but if they're off by even a hundred thousand years or so then you can - you can just throw most of our assumptions, you know, right in the trash.  So-so what I am saying is - is is that  is that the repercussions could be huge! I mean, not just in palaeontology, but if-if you think about it, in evolutionary biology, uh, genetics, geology, uh, I mean, truly the mind boggles!

dialogue: No, I know, this way when I go to the party later Mike will know I am over him cause I'm going to smell like another guy.  Yeah.

dialogue: Ok. Oh good, I'm dating a Russian cab driver. . Seriously does anyone buy this? I smell like beets!

name: rachel
dialogue: On Melanie Griffith in "Working girl". I think what you want is over here.

dialogue: Oh my God!

dialogue: Hi honey!

name: ross
dialogue: Barbados.

dialogue: Uh! that is a tough one. Oh! Wait a minute, this happened to me before! Yeah, I was auditioning for a play and the producer fell asleep and...  no wait a minute... it was me who fell asleep... Yeah I mean hey, Shakespeare, how about a chase scene once in a while!?

dialogue: Hey guys! Dinner's ready!

dialogue: Oh! I'm going to go wash up first.  Thanks!

dialogue: Ok.  Wha...? where? Where are you going?

dialogue: Oh! I'm sorry Rachel, I don't have time for your childish games, ok? I still have to go find something incredible to wear so I can beat Mike at "who's more over who"!

dialogue: Well, remember how I was trying to achieve the positronic distillation of subatomic particles?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

dialogue: Well, after eight years of research I discovered that it can't be done.

name: phoebe

dialogue: Good, good, life is good...

dialogue: Ah well, I-I'm seeing someone.

dialogue: She's also a scientist, so she's very smart and pretty and... well, it's actually because of you, really, that we're together, I mean, I saw what you had with that Mike guy, and I just said "Boy, I want that".

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mike and I broke up.

name: david
dialogue: you are kidding me. Because I'm not seeing anybody, I've just totally made that up.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really?

name: david
dialogue: Yeah, I don't know why, I'm sorry, I guess I just didn't want to lose face.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I understand. Yeah. Ok so then ok, so we're both living in New York, not seeing anyone. that is so not like us!

name: david
dialogue: Yeah, I know. Well... this is probably a stupid question, seeing that you look like that, but do you have some place that you need to be right now?

dialogue: Well...  no.

dialogue: Great.

dialogue: Ok.

dialogue: You sure you don't want to stick around a little longer?

name: zack
dialogue: No, no, I should get home, I'm kind of tired.

dialogue: No it's just tiring having to figure out the age at which all my grandparents died. I'll see you tomorrow.

dialogue: Ok.

dialogue: I think we've found our sperm!

dialogue: Does seem pretty perfect.

dialogue: Yeah, you think so, well? Should I ask him?

dialogue: Why not, just because his great-grandmother was obese, our kids are going to get that from you anyway!

dialogue: No, that is not it. It's just that when we were asking him all those questions before, I just... I just realized I don't care if he's the most perfect guy in the world... he's not you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, he's better!

name: monica
dialogue: No, he's not. And if I can't get pregnant with you, then I don't want to get pregnant by... him or anyone else.

dialogue: Really? Are you sure?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, I'm sure.

name: chandler
dialogue: Thank God, because I don't want to do this either. You know, I was just doing because I thought that was what you wanted to do. You know, I'm the husband, I'm supposed to... bring the sperm.

dialogue: That is so sweet. I love you.

name: chandler
dialogue: So you know this leaves us with...

dialogue: How do you feel about that?

name: monica
dialogue: I think I feel ok about it. Actually I think I feel really good about it.

dialogue: Me too. I want to find a baby that needs a home and I want to raise it with you. And I want to mess it up in our own specific way.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, we're going to be parents!

name: chandler
dialogue: We are going to be great parents.

name: monica
dialogue: And it could be soon. I mean, think about it

dialogue: Hey Chandler.

dialogue: No you didn't.

name: zack
dialogue: No you did.

dialogue: My wife and I have some boundary issues, you know, sometimes we ask inappropriate questions. We're working on it.

dialogue: Mmh-mmh.

dialogue: Barbados!

dialogue: Ok, I got to say. I mean, it means so much to me that you guys are coming all the way over there to hear me do my speech! UH! And I've a surprise, uh... I had to pull some strings but I was able to get everyone passes to the entire conference! that is right!  This babies will get you into all the palaeontology lectures and seminars.
