dialogue: Ok, we got to go, yeah? So, we'll see you guys tomorrow.

name: joey
dialogue: All right, let's do it! 5 hour flight with Charlie, have a couple of drinks, get under that blanket and do what comes naturally.

name: ross
dialogue: It's a blanket Joe, not a cloak of invisibility!

name: charlie
dialogue: Wow! This place is beautiful!

name: ross
dialogue: Look at all these palaeontologists!!

name: joey
dialogue: I know, there are going to be some pasty folks by the pool tomorrow!

name: woman
dialogue: Oh my God, I can't believe you are here!

name: joey
dialogue: I think I've been recognized, this happens all the time!

name: woman
dialogue: Doctor Geller, I'm such a huge fan!

name: joey
dialogue: That... never happens...

name: woman
dialogue: I've been following your career for years, I-I can't wait for your keynote speech.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow! This is very flattering, uh...

name: woman
dialogue: I would love your autograph.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, uh... Sure! Uhm... "Dear..."

name: woman
dialogue: Sarah.

name: ross
dialogue: "... Sarah. I dig you", Uh? "Doctor Ross Geller".

name: sarah
dialogue: Thank you so much!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, oh and Sarah... I'd like to introduce you to my colleague, uh, Professor Wheeler, a-and this is Joey Tribbiani.

name: sarah
dialogue: Are you a palaeontologist?

name: joey
dialogue: No, God, no! No! No no, I'm an actor. You'd probably recognize me from a little show called "The Days of Our Lives".

name: ross
dialogue: Dude, it's just "Days of Our Lives"... there's no the.

name: joey
dialogue: Ok, Ross! It's... It's fun, yeah! No, I-I play Doctor Drake Ramoray.

name: sarah
dialogue: I'm sorry, I don't own a TV.

name: joey
dialogue: You don't own a TV? What's all your furniture pointed at??

name: monica
dialogue: David, can you help me?! I'm trying to explain to Chandler how a plane stays in the air.

name: david
dialogue: Oh, certainly. that is a combination of Bernoulli's principle and Newton's third law of motion.

name: monica
dialogue: See?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, that is the same as "it has something to do with wind".

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, I'm going to go pick up a few things for the trip.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I should go, too. Oh, now... tomorrow do you guys want to share a cab to the airport or should Mike and I just meet you there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mike?? Who's Mike?

name: david
dialogue: Mike is your ex... uh... boyfriend!

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is right! Oh, yeah... Well, I've totally forgotten about im! AH! that is-that is... a blast from the past!

name: david
dialogue: It's ok. Ho-honest mistake.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really, it doesn't mean anything. I mean, you know, Monica refers to Chandler as Richard all the time!

name: chandler
dialogue: She does?

name: monica
dialogue: Let's get you out of here!!

name: monica
dialogue: At least you took me down with you!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm so sorry!! I just... I keep thinking about Mike! I'm crazy about David, and we're having so much fun together. Why-Why do I miss Mike? that is-that is going to go away, right?

name: monica
dialogue: I guess, in time.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: I mean, my feelings for Richard are certainly gone.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You just did it again. Chandler, your feelings for Chandler are certainly gone!

name: david
dialogue: Well, Phoebe's still pretty hung up on that Mike, uh?

name: chandler
dialogue: I wouldn't read too much into it.

name: david
dialogue: Still you know, a girl calls you by your ex-boyfriend's name, that-that is not a good thing, right?

name: chandler
dialogue: David, let me stop you there Because I think I see where this is going. I'm not very good at giving advice. So if you want advice, go to Ross, Monica, or... Joey, if the thing you want to advice about is pizza toppings or burning sensation when you pee.

name: david
dialogue: Sorry, I just... I wish there was something I could do, you know? Well, you know Phoebe...

name: chandler
dialogue: Seriously, we're going to do this?

name: david
dialogue: I'm sorry, uh... I just wish I could make her forget about Mike already, you know... Why did Phoebe and Mike break up?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, because his penis was too big.  Oh, I'm sorry, that is the kind of thing I do.  They broke up because Mike didn't want to get married. Hey, what if you just let Phoebe know you'd be open to marriage?

name: david
dialogue: that is great! that is great! I-I'll propose to her!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: david
dialogue: Well, I was probably going to do it at some point.

name: chandler
dialogue: I didn't mean now...

name: david
dialogue: Why not? It's brilliant!  Goodbye Mike, we'll see you at the wedding, fella!  well, we probably won't invite you to the wedding...  Thank you, Chandler. Sincerely.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you are welcome! Glad I could help.

name: david
dialogue: How do you think I should propose?

name: chandler
dialogue: David, I'm pretending to read here!!

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah! How you doin'? Yeah alright!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, hey! You said you are going to wear a thong, where's the thong?

name: charlie
dialogue: I didn't mean a thong... I meant thongs...

name: joey
dialogue: You really should have been more clear about that!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: you are never going to guess who I just saw downstairs!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh! ah! eh... Britney Spears!?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, she never misses these conferences!  No, I just saw Dr. Kenneth Schwartz!

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh my God! Did you talk to him?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah... what am I going to say to Kenneth Schwartz?

name: joey
dialogue: You could say

name: ross
dialogue: Ready to go?

name: charlie
dialogue: Yeah!

name: joey
dialogue: Wha...? you are going to go now? I thought we could hang out?

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh I can't... I have seminars all day and I promised Ross I would look at his speech.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: charlie
dialogue: But maybe we can have dinner later? On the balcony? Will be romantic.

name: joey
dialogue: Will you wear a thong?

name: charlie
dialogue: I will if you will.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh... you got yourself a very weird deal!

name: ross
dialogue: I'm good, I have dinner plans .

name: charlie
dialogue: So you'll be ok?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, yeah. I've got tons of stuff I could do. I'm going to hit the beach, go swimming...

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, Joe, have you looked outside?

name: joey
dialogue: No, why?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh man!

name: charlie
dialogue: There's an indoor pool, you can swim there!

name: joey
dialogue: I wasn't going to swim, I was going to dig a hole!

name: monica
dialogue: Wow! That Mike thing was interesting! I don't know what's going to happen with Phoebe and David.

name: chandler
dialogue: I do! Want a hint? huh? "I do"  "I do".

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, I'm sensing that this is some kind of word play, because you are pink with barely controlled glee.

name: chandler
dialogue: David is going to propose to Phoebe.

name: monica
dialogue: What?  Why?

name: chandler
dialogue: Be-cause, we were talking about ways that he could beat Mike and I told him that Phoebe wanted to get married.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, we have talked about this. You are not supposed to give people advice! Now couldn't you just have made some sort of inappropriate joke?

name: chandler
dialogue: I did! A penis one! Look, just so I know, what was so wrong about what I said?

name: monica
dialogue: They've only been going out for a few weeks and Phoebe is completely hung up on Mike! She'll say "No", David's heart will be broken, it will be too hard for them to recover from and then Phoebe will end up alone again.

name: chandler
dialogue: Man, that is some bad advice!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh! Hey! Thank God you guys are here!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey! Hey what's going on?

name: joey
dialogue: Everything is upside down here! It rains all day long, nobody watches tv and Ross is famous!

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright, I don't want to alarm anybody, but Monica's hair is twice as big as it was when we landed!

name: monica
dialogue: Ok! When I go places with high humidity, it gets a little extra body, ok?!

name: chandler
dialogue: that is why our honeymoon photos look like me and Diana Ross!

name: joey
dialogue: Come on, I'll show you guys where to check in

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, honey, can you make sure we get a King size bed!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! David, get one for us too! Oh, oh, and see if they have a heart-shaped one! And with mirrors on the ceiling!

name: monica
dialogue: And make sure our room isn't next to theirs .

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh! You guys are so lucky you are here with people, you known it's such a romantic place. that is all, I just wish I could  share that with a guy.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Not Joey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Not Joey, no, I was just lusting after Chandler.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, right!

name: david
dialogue: So, ehm... I'm proposing to Phoebe tonight.

name: chandler
dialogue: Tonight?!  Isn't an engagement ring supposed to have a diamond?  Oh, there it is!

name: david
dialogue: Yeah, well, being a failed scientist doesn't pay quite as well as you might think. that is uhm... one seventieth of a karat. And the clarity is uhm... is quite poor.

name: chandler
dialogue: Nice!

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica, can I talk to you for a sec?

name: monica
dialogue: Ok!

name: chandler
dialogue: David is going to propose to Phoebe tonight!

name: monica
dialogue: See what happens when you give people advice? I hope you told him not to?

name: chandler
dialogue: That would be advice!!

name: monica
dialogue: Ok fine. I'll handle this.  Phoebe?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah?

name: monica
dialogue: I need to talk to you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are you leaving "The Supremes"?

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, my husband just gave your boyfriend some very bad advice. Look, David is going to propose to you tonight.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow? Really? that is fantastic!

name: monica
dialogue: What are you serious? You want to marry him? Wha... What about Mike?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, ok, you want me to marry Mike? Alright, well, let's just gag him and handcuff him and force him down the aisle. I can just see it

name: monica
dialogue: Do you really think marrying someone else is the right answer?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure! Look, ok, bottom line

name: ross
dialogue: By using CT scans and computer imaging we can in a very real way, bring the Mesozoic era into the 21st century.

name: charlie
dialogue: It's great. you are going to be the hit of the conference.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh and you know what, it will be even better tomorrow, because I won't be constantly interrupted by Joey checking to see if they put chocolates on my pillow yet. .

name: joey
dialogue: Hey guys!

name: ross
dialogue: The chocolates aren't here yet.

name: joey
dialogue: Damnit!

name: charlie
dialogue: Ross just read me his speech. It's fantastic!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, is it on the computer, because I'd love to give it a read...?

name: ross
dialogue: If you want to check your email, just ask!

name: chandler
dialogue: What?  May I?

name: rachel
dialogue: What's with the rain, Geller? I mean, when I signed up for Dino Week, nobody said anything about it being monsoon season.

name: charlie
dialogue: Actually the wet season is June to December.

name: rachel
dialogue: It's not the time Charlie.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, no, no, no dear God, no!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh what, did someone outbid you for the teapot?  Oh! Secret teapot?

name: chandler
dialogue: Your computer, I don't know what... everything's gone!

name: ross
dialogue: Wha... what do you mean?

name: chandler
dialogue: It must be a virus. I think it erased your hard drive.

name: ross
dialogue: What, oh my God. What did you do?

name: chandler
dialogue: Someone I don't know sent me an e-mail and I opened it.

name: ross
dialogue: Why, why would you open it?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, it didn't say "This is a virus"!!

name: ross
dialogue: What did it say?

name: chandler
dialogue: Nude... ... pictures of Anna Kournikova. I'm so sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: What... what am I going to do? My speech is gone, Chandler!

name: chandler
dialogue: It's not gone! I mean, I'm sure you printed out a copy. You have a hard copy, right?

name: ross
dialogue: NO! I don't!!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you must be pretty mad at yourself right now...!

name: joey
dialogue: It's really gone?

name: ross
dialogue: Yep! I'd like to thank you guys for coming down here to complain about the rain and ruin my career!

name: chandler
dialogue: I just feel awful.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, well you should! I mean, nude pictures of Anna Kournikova? I mean, she's never even won a major tournament!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I tried Billy Jean King, but...  you know, you and Monica have the same "I'm going to kill you" look...? I can usually make it go away by kissing her...

name: ross
dialogue: Get out!

name: rachel
dialogue: You know, this happens all the time to my computer at work.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, what do you do?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I usually go... play Tetris on somebody else's computer.

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe this. I can't believe this is happening. I have to give the keynote speech tomorrow! Ok? I have to stand up in front of all these people. What am I going to say?

name: joey
dialogue: I could teach you a speech that I memorized for auditions.

name: ross
dialogue: I don't think that your monologue from Star Wars is going to help me right now, Joe!

name: charlie
dialogue: Ross, we can solve this. I just heard your speech. We can recreate it! We've got all night!

name: ross
dialogue: Wha... what you really think we can do that?

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh wait, Joey and I are supposed to have dinner .

name: joey
dialogue: Hey don't worry about that! I mean, Ross needs you! And Rachel and I will stay and help anyway we can.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh.

name: ross
dialogue: Alright, ok, let's do it.  Uhm, I know we start by discussing the shortcomings of carbon dating... uhm, and then, then I move on to what is clearly the defining moment of the Mesozoic era, the breakup of Pangea, hello!  And then, there's the... eh... there's the overview of the Triassic.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, oh! Any chance any of this happened in a "Galaxy far, far away"? .

name: mike
dialogue: Hello?

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, Mike, enough is enough, now you love Phoebe and she loves you, so you need to get over your whole "I never want to get married" thing and step up!

name: mike
dialogue: Who is this?

name: monica
dialogue: This is Monica! I'm Phoebe's friend. Listen, Phoebe is back with David and he's going to propose to her, and she is going to say "yes" but I know she really wants to be with you!

name: mike
dialogue: He... he's going to propose?

name: monica
dialogue: I... I'm sorry, did you say something? I can't hear through all this damned hair!

name: mike
dialogue: Look, if Phoebe wants to marry David, she should, I'm not going to stand in the way of that and neither should you.

name: monica
dialogue: You don't tell me what to do! I tell you what to do! Just call her. She's at the Paradise Hotel in Barbados. And while I've got you, you've got curly hair. What do you do in humidity?  Damnit!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, I hope you are happy!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh! I hope you are happy too, honey!

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe is going to say "Yes" to David. See, that is what happens when you meddle in people's lives!

name: chandler
dialogue: Phoebe is going to say "yes"? that is, that is great!

name: monica
dialogue: No it's not, because she's still in love with Mike!

name: chandler
dialogue: And there's not chance that will work?

name: monica
dialogue: No, I called him. It's not going to happen.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh! Meddler! Meddler!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, if you hadn't meddled to start with, I wouldn't have had to go in there and meddle myself. Now, no matter how much we meddle, we will never be able to un-meddle the thing that you meddled up - in the first place!

name: chandler
dialogue: This vacation sucks!!

name: joey
dialogue: I'm so bored! Stupid rain, we... we can't do anything.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I've brought some books. We could read.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, it hasn't come to that yet.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey hey hey! Don't mind if I do!

name: waiter
dialogue: I'm sorry sir, these are for the pharmaceutical convention

name: joey
dialogue: Hey Rach, do you feel like going to a convention?

name: rachel
dialogue: We can't. We're not pharmacists!

name: joey
dialogue: I know we're not, but  Frank Medeio and...  Eva Trorro... womba...

name: rachel
dialogue: Kate Miller?

name: joey
dialogue: Kate Miller it is.

name: rachel
dialogue: And... that is the most sex I'm going to have this weekend.

name: joey
dialogue: In that case should I make sure it's on real good?

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you.

name: charlie
dialogue: And then, and then you said that thing about, about bringing the Mesozoic era in the 21st century.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, that is it?

name: charlie
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God, we did it!

name: charlie
dialogue: Actually I did it Ross. You remembered shockingly little of your own speech.

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, but I did make a pyramid out of the bath products. This is amazing, thank you, thank you so much.  that is a pretty necklace.

name: charlie
dialogue: Thank you.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, what do you say we celebrate? Champagne?

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh yeah! Hey, save the cork and then we can fill the bottle with water and put it back so they don't charge you.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God, I love you.

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh, this is such a cute picture of Emma. And is this your son... or just some kid whose picture you bring on vacation?

name: ross
dialogue: that is Ben, my son from my first marriage.

name: charlie
dialogue: Your first marriage?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: charlie
dialogue: you are married more than once?

name: ross
dialogue: No.

name: charlie
dialogue: So, why did you break up?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, it was... it's complicated, you know? She... she was... eh... gay.

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh my God, this is so cool!

name: ross
dialogue: Ok, odd thing to get excited about!

name: charlie
dialogue: No, it's just... I was engaged to a guy who turned out to be gay!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! High-five!

name: charlie
dialogue: Didn't you feel so stupid that you didn't see the signs? My fiance was always going away on these long weekends with his tennis partner.

name: ross
dialogue: My wife had a workout friend she went to the gym with everyday for a year. She didn't get any fitter.

name: charlie
dialogue: Right and then everybody finds out and they're like

name: ross
dialogue: I know! It's like, if you knew, why didn't you tell me, you know? I mean, call, or leave a note

name: charlie
dialogue: I know!

name: ross
dialogue: And then, you try to make the best of a bad situation, so you float the idea of a threesome?

name: charlie
dialogue: I didn't do that.

name: ross
dialogue: Me neither.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, who knew? Pharmacists are fun.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know, that old lady at the end was ready to take you home.

name: joey
dialogue: Not enough pills in the world, Rach. What about you, you are the single one, seen anybody in there you like?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, let's see. There was a really big guy that I was talking to, with the really nice breasts...

name: joey
dialogue: But what about back home, anything going on there? Anybody you like?

name: rachel
dialogue: No.

name: joey
dialogue: There it is, you are blushing!

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I'm not blushing, I'm sunburnt! From, you know, the rain.

name: joey
dialogue: You like someone. Tell me who it is. Who is it?

name: rachel
dialogue: No.

name: joey
dialogue: Tell me who it is.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey!

name: joey
dialogue: Come on who? Who do you like? Tell me. you are not getting away that easy. Who do you like, who?

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, come on! It doesn't matter, you know, it's not like anything's going to happen.

name: joey
dialogue: What? Why not? Rach, who can you not get?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!  Ok. Ok, you really want to know who it is?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, who is that?

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross and charlie
dialogue: Hey!

name: charlie
dialogue: I just left you a message! Ross and I were going to go grab a bite, but now that you are here, maybe we can go have that dinner.

name: joey
dialogue: Right, of course. Hey, did you guys finish the speech?

name: ross
dialogue: Yep, we got it, we got it.  Thank you so much.

name: charlie
dialogue: I had a great time.

name: joey
dialogue: Alright, hey look, and this isn't over, because I really want to know who...

name: rachel
dialogue: Later! La...

name: charlie
dialogue: So, shall we?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok. See you, bye.

name: charlie
dialogue: Bye.

name: ross
dialogue: Good night.

name: joey
dialogue: Night.

name: ross and rachel
dialogue: Ok, good night!

name: monica
dialogue: I can't believe she's going to say yes to David. She's clearly in love with Mike.

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, it's very hard to take you seriously when you look like that.

name: david
dialogue: Uh, Phoebe, uh, I have... something I want to say.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, he's going to do it now. Please, I cannot watch this, let's go.

name: chandler
dialogue: I think we have some time. Have you ever heard him talk?  "Uh, Phoebe, uh, I would be honoured, uh..." Spit it out, David!

name: david
dialogue: Uh, Phoebe, uh...  you are an amazing woman, and the time we spent apart was, was unbearable. Of course the sanitation strikes in Minsk didn't help!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure, ok, yeah.

name: david
dialogue: But well, now that we're together again, I don't ever want to be apart. So, to that end...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my God, Mike!

name: david
dialogue: It's David, actually!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, Mike's here.

name: david
dialogue: Hi Mike!

name: mike
dialogue: Hi David. Chandler. Monica...  Oh!

name: monica
dialogue: IT'S THE HUMIDITY!

name: mike
dialogue: Hi Phoebe.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What are you, what are you doing here?

name: mike
dialogue: I have a question I need to ask you.

name: david
dialogue: I have a question I was kind of going to ask her myself.

name: mike
dialogue: Yeah, I understand, but before you do, she really needs to hear this.

name: david
dialogue: Ok, would you care for my seat as well?

name: mike
dialogue: Actually yeah, that'll be great.

name: david
dialogue: that is fair, you've had a long trip.

name: mike
dialogue: Phoebe, I love you. I mean, I missed you so much these last few months and I thought we were apart for a good reason, but then I suddenly realized that there was no reason good enough to keep me from spending the rest of my life with you.

name: david
dialogue: kind of stepped on the toes of what I was going to say.

name: mike
dialogue: Sorry David, but she really has to know this.

name: david
dialogue: Alright, but after this I want to see you outside. If the rain stops.

name: monica
dialogue: you are the most incredible woman I've ever met. How can I lose you?  Now, I don't actually have a ring...

name: david
dialogue: I have a ring.

name: chandler
dialogue: I wouldn't brag too much about that thing, big guy.

name: david
dialogue: Phoebe, will you marry me?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No!

name: david
dialogue: Uhm... Ha ha!

name: phoebe
dialogue: I love you. But I never needed a proposal from you. I just needed to know that we were headed somewhere, you know, that we had a future.

name: mike
dialogue: We can have any future you want.

name: david
dialogue: Ok, I'm going to take off.

name: phoebe
dialogue: David, I'm so sorry, I'm sorry.

name: david
dialogue: Just so I know, if I had asked first...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I might have said yes, but that would have been wrong.

name: david

dialogue: I don't know!

dialogue: Well, if you are having a hard time, you should talk to my   friends, Bill and Colleen. They adopted a kid. I'm sure they'd help   you.

name: monica
dialogue: Thanks, that would be great. Hey, honey, wouldn't that be   great?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Alright, alright, alright. Remember what we talked about.   When we're in a public place, there are certain rules.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: that is not what we talked about!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Hey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Good to see you.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Good to see you, too.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi Frank.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Hi, how you doin'?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, my goodness, they've all gotten so big!

name: monica
dialogue: Which one is which again?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Oh, that is Frank Jr. Jr. pulling the tampons out of the   lady's purse. And that is Chandler climbing on Chandler, and that is   Leslie throwing bagels at him.

name: monica
dialogue: "Willing to adopt triplets?" No!

name: joey
dialogue: Ah, can I just say I know we're doing this for Ross, and that is   cool, but if it was up to me, this is not what we'd be doing on our   first date.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, what would we be doing?

name: joey
dialogue: I'd take you out for a romantic night. Some champagne, fancy   dinner, feel you up on the carriage ride home...

name: rachel
dialogue: Feel me up?

name: joey
dialogue: In a carriage!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, Charlie!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey.

name: charlie
dialogue: Hi, hi. So.. Dreading this?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, you bet.

name: joey
dialogue: So, did you bring a little something for Ross?

name: charlie
dialogue: Actually.. It's stuff you left at my apartment.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh. Oh, thanks.

name: charlie
dialogue: And you know, you can just give me my stuff whenever you   want.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I didn't throw any of that out..

name: ross
dialogue: I thought I heard voices! Hi Charlie!  Hi Joey.    And.. Oh! you are going to have to introduce me to your new   girlfriend.  I'm just kidding, I know Rachel, I know.  Come, please come in. Come in.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, well, we brought you some wine.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh! That is so thoughtful.  She's a keeper. And what   did you bring me?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh, actually, that is..

name: ross
dialogue: Underwear, a toothbrush, and Van Halen CD. I can use all these   things!!

name: charlie
dialogue: Gosh, Ross, you know, you seem a little...

name: ross
dialogue: What? Fine? Because I am! Aren't you? Aren't you? Aren't you?   You see? Who else is fine?

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, listen, hey, Ross. Why don't you try to relax, okay? Maybe   have a drink.

name: ross
dialogue: You know what? That is a very good idea. I'm going to go make a   pitcher of Margaritas.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, god. So adorable. Look at them sleeping there like angels.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Yeah, I really cherish these moments, Because before you   know it, they're going to be awake again.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, they may be a handful, but they're so cute.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, god, the last time I babysat them, they did the funniest   thing..

name: frank jr.
dialogue: I haven't slept in four years!

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is a, that is a long time.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: You just don't know how hard it is, Phoebe. There's just so   many of them. You know, two I can handle. Two's great. You just hold   one in each hand, but what do I do when the third one runs at me with   his bike helmet on. I've got no more hands to protect my area! There's   three of them, Phoebe, three!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I know, Frank. I counted them when they were coming out   of my area.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Sometimes I think that.. Oh, no, no, no, I can't say it,   it's too horrible. No.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: No, I can't.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh my god, Frank, are you thinking of leaving? Because I   didn't have those triplets so you could just run out on them!

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Oh, no! I would never do that. No. I just was thinking   that, you know, maybe you could take one.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?! You can't separate them! that is terrible. Which one?

name: monica
dialogue: Thank you so much for seeing us. Phoebe has told us such great   things about you guys.

name: colleen
dialogue: Oh, please, we're happy to help.

name: bill
dialogue: We went through the same thing when we were adopting.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, a lot of malfunctioning wee-wees and hoo-hoos in this   room, huh?

name: chandler
dialogue: I mean, you have a lovely home.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, we appreciate anything you can tell us.

name: colleen
dialogue: Well, actually, I think this might help.

name: colleen
dialogue: It's pretty much all the information you need.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my god!

name: colleen
dialogue: Everything is broken down into categories, and then   cross-referenced, and then colour-coded to correspond with the forms   in the back.

name: monica
dialogue: Thank you.  I think I just had a tiny orgasm.

name: bill
dialogue: I know the process is frustrating, but it's so worth it.   Adopting Owen was the best thing that ever happened to us.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is great.  Can I see the book?

name: chandler
dialogue: You want me to wash my hands first, don't you?

name: monica
dialogue: It's.. It's just so pretty and white.

name: colleen
dialogue: The bathroom is down the hall, to your left.

name: colleen
dialogue: I would have told him to do it too.

name: monica
dialogue: Can I adopt you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you must be Owen.

name: owen
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm Chandler. Hey, I was in the scouts too.

name: owen
dialogue: You were?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, in fact my father was a den-mother.

name: owen
dialogue: Huh?

name: chandler
dialogue: You know how to use a compass?

name: owen
dialogue: I have a badge in it.

name: chandler
dialogue: You do? that is fantastic!

name: owen
dialogue: You want to see it?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'd love to, but I got to get back to talking to your   parents. They're telling us all about how they adopted you.

name: owen
dialogue: What?!?

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: owen
dialogue: I'm adopted?

name: chandler
dialogue: I got nothing.

name: ross
dialogue: The first batch of margaritas was not so great, but the second   batch is good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, maybe the next batch, we could all get some.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, guys, this is fun, isn't it? You know? Just the four of us.   Just hanging'.

name: joey
dialogue: Dude, are you okay? And when are the fajitas going to be ready?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm fine! Hey, I'm great! I'm just.. I'm just proud of us.   There's no weirdness, no tension.

name: rachel
dialogue: No awareness.

name: ross
dialogue: We make a great foursome. We should do more stuff together. Ooh!   Let's take a trip. Okay, where do you think we - we can go?

name: ross
dialogue: My fajitas!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Look, Charlie, I just want you to know. Ross is just having a   little trouble adjusting to the thought of Joey and me. You know, he   normally doesn't drink like this.

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh, you know what? This is nothing. My father is a raging   alcoholic.

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry, have I made this evening uncomfortable?

name: ross
dialogue: Fajitas! Be careful, very hot plate, very hot plate!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, you don't even have oven mitts on!

name: ross
dialogue: That is going to hurt tomorrow!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, well, this is crazy. Can't seriously be talking about me   taking one of your kids, can we?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: No, of course we're not.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Insane.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: I know.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Alice would never go for it, right?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Oh, I don't know, she's pretty tired, too, I think we've   got her onboard.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, just you know, for argument's sake, you know,   hypothetically. Which one would you be willing to give up?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Huh.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Frank Jr. Jr.?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Oh, you'd be getting a really good one. I mean, you know,   he's really funny. Like, the other day he made up this joke.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: What's green and says "hey, I'm a frog"? A talking frog!    Oh, no, you can't have him, he's too funny.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, alright, that is fine. What about Leslie?

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Oh, no, no. Not Leslie. No, she's, she's the only one that   knows how to burp the alphabet.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Alright, so that leaves Chandler.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Oh, no, no, you can't have Chandler, no. No, no. She's my   little genius. I got big hopes for her. She's going to be a doctor or a   realtor..

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow, Frank. I think we just ran out of kids.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Oh, I think you are right. Oh, wow. Phoebe, I don't think I   can give one of them up. I mean, you know, they drive me crazy, but   they're my babies.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm sorry, Frank. I didn't realise things were so bad. You   know, I'll help out more. I can - I can babysit any time you want. You   name the day, and I'll be there.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: How about tomorrow?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, that is not good. But you know, I can move some stuff   around, and I'll be there. You and Alice just take the whole day   together.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: You'd do that for us?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Are you kidding? that is what sisters are for.

name: frank jr.
dialogue: Look at them! Aw. I love you so   much.  Oh crap, don't   wake up, don't wake up!

name: chandler
dialogue: Where are Bill and Colleen?

name: monica
dialogue: They're in the kitchen getting something to eat. Can you   believe how nice they are?

name: chandler
dialogue: We have to leave!!

name: monica
dialogue: Why? What did you do in the bathroom?

name: chandler
dialogue: I didn't get to the bathroom. I bumped into Owen on the way,   and he didn't know he was adopted. And there's a slight chance I may   have told him.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my god, where's my purse? No, you know what? I can replace   everything in there. Get that binder, and let's go!

name: colleen
dialogue: Hey.

name: bill
dialogue: Some little snacks for everybody. Oh, you don't have to eat the   sour worms. Those are for Owen.

name: colleen
dialogue: I'll go get him in a second. By the way, you should know we   haven't told him he's adopted yet.

name: chandler
dialogue: But kids are so intuitive. Don't you think on some level he   already knows?

name: owen
dialogue: I'm adopted?!

name: chandler
dialogue: See? Intuitive!

name: bill
dialogue: What? Where did you hear that?

name: owen
dialogue: He told me! And he paid me 50 dollars not to tell.

name: chandler
dialogue: Which technically now you should give back!

name: colleen
dialogue: You told him he's adopted?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm so sorry, but you should have a sign out there or   something. Or at least whisper it to people when they come in the   door. "Owen doesn't know he's adopted, and he also thinks that Santa   is real."

name: owen
dialogue: He isn't?!

name: chandler
dialogue: We have to get out of here, baby!

name: ross
dialogue: Everyone? I would like to make a toast to Rachel and Joey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooy.

name: ross
dialogue: And to love. Ah, love. L-O-V-E, love. L is for life. And what is   life without love?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my god, are we supposed to answer?

name: ross
dialogue: O is for "oh, wow!" The V is for this very surprising turn   of   events, which I'm still fine with by the way. E is for how extremely   normal I find it. That you two are together. And now one day you might   get married and have children of your own.

name: joey
dialogue: Dude, are you okay?

name: ross
dialogue: Totally.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, you don't seem okay.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm sorry, it must be the pressure of   entertaining. I think everyone would feel better if we had some flan.

name: charlie
dialogue: Wait, Ross. Ross. I - I have to take off.

name: ross
dialogue: No!

name: charlie
dialogue: I'm sorry, I have a really early class in the morning, but   this has been lovely.

name: ross
dialogue: Wasn't it? And you thought it would be awkward with Joey and   that you never really liked Rachel.

name: charlie
dialogue: you are on fire! I'll call you in the morning, okay?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.

name: charlie
dialogue: Alright.

name: charlie
dialogue: God, Rachel, what Ross just said that is just so..

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, that is okay, girls tend not to like me.

name: charlie
dialogue: Bye.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, I guess it's just flan for three! Hey, hey, that rhymed!

name: rachel
dialogue: You know what, Ross? I think we're going to take off too.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, oh. Of course. God, I'm so stupid. You guys are a couple   now. I mean, you probably just want to be alone.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, no, it's just that it's getting late...

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, hey, it's fine. It's totally fine. We've got plenty of   margaritas. It's all good.

name: ross
dialogue: I don't even know what that is for.

name: joey
dialogue: You know what? I think I'm going to stay here and make sure he's   okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, that is probably a good idea.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. I'll see you in the morning.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh. Okay. You know what, Joey, I don't think he's ever   going to be okay with this.

name: joey
dialogue: It doesn't look good, does it?

name: joey
dialogue: Morning. Here you go.

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks. Did you stay here all night?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: So you took off my pants and shoes?

name: joey
dialogue: No, no, no. You actually did that when you were dancing to the   Chicago-soundtrack. Look, Ross, about, about Rachel and I. Listen, you   don't have to worry about that, okay? Because nothing is going to happen.

name: ross
dialogue: What do you mean?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, she and I said from the beginning that we weren't going to do   anything unless you were okay with it. And clearly..

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, what are you talking about? I'm fine!

name: joey
dialogue: It's okay, Ross, alright? I totally understand. Of course you are   not fine. you are.. you are Ross and Rachel.

name: ross
dialogue: Except we're not. I mean, we haven't been a couple in like, six   years. Oh my god, is that right? Has it been that long?

name: joey
dialogue: that is what I hear, yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: This is crazy. I mean, six years? And because of me you guys   aren't going to be together? Can I ask you something? Really, what is   this thing with you and Rachel?

name: joey
dialogue: Come on, I mean, you know me, you know...

name: ross
dialogue: Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: I'm crazy about her.

name: ross
dialogue: And she feels the same way?

name: joey
dialogue: I think so.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, then, maybe it's time we all moved on.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, but, Ross, I mean, you are not okay with it.

name: ross
dialogue: No, but I want to be. Hey, I will be. Besides, I'm with Charlie,   right? Oh my god, I'm still with Charlie, aren't I? I mean, she didn't   see the dance, did she?

name: joey
dialogue: No, no, no, no, that was - that was just for me. Are you sure   about this?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I'm sure.

name: joey
dialogue: And we're okay?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, Pheebs

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Uhm, we just want to give you a heads-up. Bill and Colleen hate   us.

name: chandler
dialogue: Owen didn't know he was adopted, and Monica told him.

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Still, he had to find out sometime.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, but how would you like it if someone told the triplets   that you gave birth to them?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm going to go tell Emma she was an accident.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, you and Rachel tonight, huh?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. It's actually our first official date

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow! So tonight may be the night! you are nervous?

name: joey
dialogue: Naa, no. This is the part I'm actually good at.

name: chandler
dialogue: What must it be like not to be crippled by fear   and self-loathing.

name: joey
dialogue: It's OK!

name: chandler
dialogue: How can you be so confident?

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I... I know exactly what I'm going to do!

name: chandler
dialogue: Really? Like you have a routine?

name: joey
dialogue: No, no no no no. See. Each woman is different. You have   to appreciate their uniqueness.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really?

name: joey
dialogue: No, I do six things! First, I look deep in her eyes.   Then, I kiss her. Next I take my hand and I softly graze her thigh.

name: chandler
dialogue: You mean like this?

name: joey
dialogue: NO! Not like that, no no. No, like this.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, I see what you mean, that is quite nice.

name: joey
dialogue: More foosball?

name: chandler
dialogue: ...and beer!!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross and chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey sweetie!

name: ross
dialogue: WOW!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! Stop staring at my wife's legs! No no! Stop   staring at your sister's legs!

name: ross
dialogue: I'm sorry, it's just... how did you get so tan?

name: chandler
dialogue: She went on one of those spray-on tan places.

name: ross
dialogue: Eh, you got a spray-on tan?

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler gets pedicures!

name: ross
dialogue: Why, why you do, like with the-the toe separators?

name: chandler
dialogue: Why...why?

name: ross
dialogue: Still, I can't believe that is sprayed on... I mean,   it looks really good. I wonder if I should get one!

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure, then you should get a mini skirt so you can   really show it off.

name: ross
dialogue: So, do you get colours or just French tips?

name: monica
dialogue: There. Here's their card.

name: ross
dialogue: Thanks.  Hey, I know where this   place is! It used to be an X-rated video...  florist.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey Pheebs!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Phoebe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, you won't believe who moved back to town.

name: monica
dialogue: I know, Amanda! Ah! She called me   too! She's the worst!

name: chandler
dialogue: Who's Amanda?

name: monica
dialogue: She's this girl who used to live   in the building before you did. Then she moved to England and she picked up   this fake British accent. On the machine this is her message.  "Monica, darling! It's Amanda calling!"

name: chandler
dialogue: Are you trying to do a British accent?

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler gets   pedicures!

name: chandler
dialogue: Just so I know, how many more of those can I expect?

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know what Amanda said to me when she got me on   the phone?  "Oh, so sorry to catch you   on your Mo-Bile!" If-if you don't want to get me on my mo-Bile, don't call   me on my mo-Bile!"

name: monica
dialogue: I know, and she's always bragging   about all the famous people she's met.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, I know! "Oh...I slept with Billy Joel".   All right, who hasn't?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, what are we going to do! I don't   want to see her!!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ugh, Let's just cut her out!

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Cut her out of our lives! Just ignore her calls and   dodge her 'till she gets the point!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, I guess we could try that, but...   it seems so harsh!  Have you ever done that?

name: chandler
dialogue: No, had it done to me though. Feels good !

name: ross
dialogue: Well... I like how you look, what are you?

name: assistant
dialogue: Puerto Rican.

name: ross
dialogue: Two, I think a two.

name: assistant
dialogue: You've got to face the red light.   When the red light goes on the spraying is about to start so close your eyes.   When the spraying stops, count to five. Pat yourself down to avoid drip marks   then turn around so we can get your back. Got it?

name: ross
dialogue: Spray, count, pat, then turn, spray, count and pat.

name: assistant
dialogue: Wow, you catch on quick.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I have a PhD, so...

name: ross
dialogue: One Mississippi, two Mississippi, Three Mis... WAIT! WAIT! I'm not-I've   not finished counting!!

name: ross
dialogue: You sprayed my front twice!

name: assistant
dialogue: You've never turned?

name: ross
dialogue: No, I barely even   got to three Mississippi.

name: assistant
dialogue: Mississippi? I said count to   five'!

name: ross
dialogue: Mississippilesly?  Well, how   bad is it?

name: assistant
dialogue: Isn't that bad yet, but it keeps   getting darker for the next four hours.

name: ross
dialogue: So, how dark is it   going to get?

name: assistant
dialogue: You got sprayed with two two'   s and...

name: ross
dialogue: I'm a four?

name: assistant
dialogue: Yeah, but you are back's a zero.   you are going to want to even that out.

name: ross
dialogue: Really!

name: assistant
dialogue: You might want to get back in there.

name: ross
dialogue: Ok!

name: ross
dialogue: Wait, wait a minute, there's no light   on the back wall! How do I know when it's going to start? Hello?  Ah, oh, ah!  Ah!  The same thing   happened again!

name: assistant
dialogue: You got two more twos?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm an eight!

name: joey
dialogue: I thought you paid.  Ha, guess we won't be going back there!

name: rachel
dialogue: So.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey what do you say, we move this onto the likes of   the couch?

name: rachel
dialogue: I say cheesy line', but ok.

name: joey
dialogue: What's the matter?

name: rachel
dialogue: I am sorry, I don't know, I am sorry, I don't   know why I did that!

name: joey and rachel
dialogue: Okay

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, so sorry.

name: rachel
dialogue: I am sorry! Again... I don't know, I don't   know what happened, I must be nervous!

name: joey
dialogue: I don't get it, Chandler loved it!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, ok, ok. I promise, I promise, I promise, I won't   do it again. I really do. I promise. This is going to be great.

name: joey
dialogue: Ok.

name: joey
dialogue: Uh, was that good for you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, yeah. Could be Rachel asking if someone could   baby-sit again.

name: monica
dialogue: It could be Amanda!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, you are right! I was just kidding about   Rachel. Babysitting is a gas!

name: amanda
dialogue: Hello Monica. It's Amanda calling again. I   am in the neighbourhood hoping I can pop by your flat!

name: monica
dialogue: you are from Yonkers! Your last name   is Buffo-Martisis!

name: amanda
dialogue: Let's see.. to assure you get this directly,   ring me back on my mobile.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ok, don't hold thy breath!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hello? Is someone on the line?

name: amanda
dialogue: Yes, I was looking for Monica.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hang on, she's right here.  Someone's on the phone, for you.

name: monica
dialogue: We weren't picking up, it's   Amanda!

name: chandler
dialogue: I get pedicures!

name: monica
dialogue: Hi Amanda! Actually now... it's...   is not a good time. Dinner tomorrow night?  Ok, Phoebe   and I will see you then!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why, why, why didn't you just say no!

name: monica

dialogue: Ok.  B - O - S ...

name: benjamin
dialogue: No, it starts with a silent "M".

name: ross
dialogue: Oh come on!!

name: chandler
dialogue: I can't believe Joey. I hate being called a liar!

name: rachel
dialogue: But you are a liar.

name: chandler
dialogue: What did I just say?

name: joey
dialogue: You still here?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yes, and I have to say, I am not just hurt. I am    insulted. When I tell somebody I did something...

name: joey
dialogue: Ok whoa-hey... Let me just stop you right there, ok?    First, you lied, right? Then, you lied about lying, ok? Then you lied about    lying about lying, ok? So before you lie about lying about lying about lying    about... lying...   Stop lying!

name: chandler
dialogue: Why are you so sure I didn't watch this tape?

name: joey
dialogue: You want to know wh...? You want to know why?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, this is going well.

name: joey
dialogue: Here's how I know you didn't    watch the tape, ok?  If you had seen what was on this    tape, believe me, you would have some comments. Alright, now remember, I    got paid a lot of money for this and it only aired in Japan.

name: chandler
dialogue: He really is a chameleon.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, Gladys say hello to    your new home!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, my!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow!  Oh,    she's so nice and big! Oh, Monica, where are you going to display Gladys oh    so proudly?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, hey! How about right above the TV? . That way, it will be    the first thing that you see when you walk in the door!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, yeah! And you can    get rid of that French poster.

name: monica
dialogue: I like that poster!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really? It doesn't have anything coming out of it.    Or maybe there is some place for her in your bedroom?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! There's    nothing above your bed!!

name: monica
dialogue: Are you still here?

name: benjamin
dialogue: I've come here to apologize. I think I may have    let my feelings for Charlie interfere with the interview process.

name: ross
dialogue: No! Stop!

name: benjamin
dialogue: Anyway, I've decided to offer you the grant.

name: ross
dialogue: Really?

name: benjamin
dialogue: Well... there is just one small... stipulation...

name: ross
dialogue: I have to break up with Charlie?

name: benjamin
dialogue: Hey, you got one right!

name: ross
dialogue: you are crazy.

name: benjamin
dialogue: Crazy, or... romantic?

name: ross
dialogue: Crazy!

name: benjamin
dialogue: Or...

name: ross
dialogue: Get out!

name: rachel
dialogue: O-oh my God!

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, what... is... this...thing... doing here?

name: joey
dialogue: I got it from Monica. She sold it to me for a very    reasonable price.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, we're not keeping this!

name: joey
dialogue: But it's an original Buffay...

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright, fine. You can keep it. As long as you don't    mind that she's haunted.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey? what? what? wey! whoo! what? what!?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, legend has it Joey, that... she comes alive    when you are asleep.

name: rachel
dialogue: She climbs out of the frame, and then drags her half-a-body    across the floor, just looking for legs to steal.     And then with her one good hand, she slo-o-owly re-e-a-aches up and turns your    doorknob.

name: joey
dialogue: GET THAT LEGLESS WITCH OUT OF HERE!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! I sold that to Joey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, why I told him it's haunted. Two can play at    this game.

name: monica
dialogue: No, too late. You can't give it back!

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes I can!

name: monica
dialogue: No you can't. She's yours!

name: rachel
dialogue: She's yours!

name: monica
dialogue: SHE'S YOURS!

name: rachel
dialogue: She's yours!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: She's mine!

name: monica
dialogue: She's m-i-i-ne!

name: rachel
dialogue: She's mine!

name: monica
dialogue: She's mine!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You guys! You guys! You don't have to fight over her    anymore.  Whoever doesn't get Gladys gets Glynnis.

name: rachel
dialogue: I want Gladys!

name: monica
dialogue: She's mine!

name: rachel
dialogue: She's mine!

name: monica
dialogue: She's mine!

name: rachel
dialogue: She's mine!

name: chandler
dialogue: Look, I'm sorry I didn't give them your tape. And    I promise, next time to submit you whether I think you are right for the part    or not.

name: joey
dialogue: that is not the point Chandler. The point is that you    lied.

name: chandler
dialogue: I know. you are right. What's it going to take for you    to forgive me?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: rachel
dialogue: Excellent!

name: joey
dialogue: Now, what do you say?

name: chandler
dialogue: Lying is wrong!

name: joey
dialogue: And?... AND?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm a pretty little girl.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I knew it!

name: ross
dialogue: Your ex-boyfriend is insane.

name: charlie
dialogue: Did you get the grant?

name: ross
dialogue: No I didn't, and you want to know why? Because your    ex-boyfriend is still in love with you.

name: charlie
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. He wouldn't give me the grant, because I wouldn't    give you up.

name: charlie
dialogue: Benji isn't in love with me. I mean, he broke up    with me. And besides, he's a very ethical man.

name: ross
dialogue: Really? Is it ethical to ask someone in a grant review,    who was the voice of "Underdog"?

name: charlie
dialogue: I'm sure he was just joking, Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: If you don't believe me, let's go talk to him, okay?    I'm telling you, he didn't ask me one paleontological question.

name: charlie
dialogue: Seriously?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry, no. He did ask me one. Uhm... How do    you spell Mboscodictiosaur?

name: charlie
dialogue: Well, if it's like the lake Mbosco in Congo, then    M-B-O...

name: ross
dialogue: Damnit!

name: benjamin
dialogue: Dr. Geller...? Charlie... What are you... what are    you doing here?

name: ross
dialogue: I want you to tell her everything. About the deal you    tried to make with me, about the crazy questions you... Wally Cox! that is the    voice of Underdog!

name: benjamin
dialogue: Like I tried to tell you in the interview Ross,    this grant is not based on your knowledge of pretty useless trivia.

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, no. Don't do that! I want you to look her in    the eyes, and tell her the truth.

name: charlie
dialogue: Benji?

name: benjamin
dialogue: Alright, it's true. I behaved horribly. But it's    only because I still love you. And I would do anything to have you back in    my life.

name: ross
dialogue: Too little, too late, Benji!

name: charlie
dialogue: I can't believe this.

name: benjamin
dialogue: I never should have broken up with you. I think    about you all the time. I mean, do you ever still think about me?

name: ross
dialogue: No!

name: charlie
dialogue: Yes!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: charlie
dialogue: I don't know what to say, Benji. This is all so....    romantic.

name: ross
dialogue: or...

name: benjamin
dialogue: Listen, I know, I may be way out of bounds here,    but is there any chance you will take me back?

name: charlie
dialogue: Maybe...

name: ross
dialogue: Sweetie, this conversation is starting to make me a    little uncomfortable.

name: charlie
dialogue: Oh God! I am so sorry, but...  I mean it's... there's so much history between us, you know...

name: benjamin
dialogue: I'm sorry    too...

name: benjamin
dialogue: I love you!

name: charlie
dialogue: I love you too!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, that is it. WE ARE SEEING OTHER PEOPLE!

name: joey
dialogue: Gladys?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ha ha ha, third time this week. Man, this does not    get old.

name: joey
dialogue: you are mean!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, don't be such a baby!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey you guys!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, what are you doing?

name: mike
dialogue: Oh, figuring out our wedding plans.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is funny, we were doing the same thing!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah!

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's really crazy! The hall, the dress, the food... I-I had no idea    how expensive this stuff was!

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah it is really pricey. I mean, I freaked when I first heard the    numbers.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So what did you two do about it?

name: chandler
dialogue: It was pretty simple actually, I came up with a couple of cost-cutting    solutions, wrote out a list and Monica told me to go to hell.

name: ross
dialogue: There's no way around it Pheebs, you just going to have to accept the fact    that this is going to cost you a lot of money.

name: mike
dialogue: I heard that weddings are like a 40 billion dollar a year industry.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, and I'm responsible for just like half of that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: But really, it does seem like this money could be put to better use?

name: mike
dialogue: Are you serious?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Now, how would you feel if we gave all the wedding money to charity    and we just got married at City Hall?

name: mike
dialogue: I think it would make me want to marry you even more.

name: ross
dialogue: I've got to say you guys, that is an incredible gesture!

name: chandler
dialogue: Maybe you do that next time you get married!

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, no. The next time it's going to be a Hawaii at sunset. But maybe the time after that!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: What's going on?

name: chandler
dialogue: Our adoption social worker is coming by today so we are cleaning    the apartment.

name: monica
dialogue: We?

name: chandler
dialogue: You know you don't want me to help. You can't have it both ways!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, is this person who decides whether or not you... get a baby?

name: chandler
dialogue: Kind of. She's coming by to interview us and see where we live.

name: monica
dialogue: And it has to go perfectly, because if she doesn't like something about    us she can keep us off every adoption list in the state.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, maybe I should stop by! She could be a soap opera fan! It's very    impressive when the little people know a celebrity.

name: chandler
dialogue: Little people?

name: joey
dialogue: Celebrity.

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, so I think I'm just about done here, unless you have any bad stuff    hidden somewhere, like... porn or cigarettes?

name: chandler
dialogue: What...? NO!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't, and I'm offended    by the insinuation!

name: monica
dialogue: Ok, so there's not a magazine under the couch, or a pack of cigarettes    taped to the back of the toilet tank, or a filthy video in the VCR?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'll admit to the cigarettes and the magazine, but that tape is not    mine.

name: monica
dialogue: It isn't mine!

name: joey
dialogue: Well, I guess we'll never know whose    it is!

name: charity guy
dialogue: May I help you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes. We're here to make a rather sizeable donation to the children.

name: charity guy
dialogue: Well, any contribution, large or small, is always appreciated.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I think you are going to appreciate it the crap out of this one

name: charity guy
dialogue: Well, this is very generous!

name: phoebe
dialogue: And we don't want any recognition. This is completely anonymous.

name: mike
dialogue: Completely anonymous. From two kind strangers.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mr. X and Phoebe Buffay.

name: charity guy
dialogue: Well if you like, we can include your names in our newsletter.

name: mike
dialogue: Not necessary.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Buffay is spelled B-U-F-F-A-Y.

name: mike
dialogue: And "X" is spelled uhm... "Mike Hannigan".

name: charity guy
dialogue: Right. Well, on behalf of the children

name: phoebe
dialogue: Sure, I so glad we did this. It feels so good!

name: mike
dialogue: It does. It feels really good!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, look! And we get these free t-shirts!

name: charity guy
dialogue: Oh, actually, that is the shirt I wore to the gym.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Mhm... it's moist.

name: ross
dialogue: Hi!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Emma will be up in a minute!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, good!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh hey Ross... Listen, I heard about you and Charlie. I'm really sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, that is OK. I'm sure there are tons of other beautiful palaeontologists    out there.

name: rachel
dialogue: Absolutely.

name: ross
dialogue: There was one! She's it! All the rest look like they should live under    a bridge!

name: rachel
dialogue: So, uhm... what are you going to do today?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I was thinking of taking Emma to the playground!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God, what!?

name: ross
dialogue: Like I said I was thinking of taking Emma to the museum of knives and    fire!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, look, Ross. I do not want Emma going to the playground.

name: ross
dialogue: Because...

name: rachel
dialogue: All right, well, if you must know... I had a traumatic... swing    incident... when I was little.

name: ross
dialogue: Seriously?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes, I was 4 years old and I was on the swing and then all of a sudden    my hair got tangled in the chain. And to get me out my mom had to-had to cut    a big chunk of my hair!  And it was uneven for weeks!

name: ross
dialogue: And you made it through that? I wonder who's going to play you    in the movie!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, fine! You can make fun of me. I do not want Emma going there. And    I was thinking Claire Danes.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, I'm sorry to hear about your tragedy, ok? But the swings are perfectly    safe, and besides Emma loves them. You know what, you should come with us and    you'll see!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, those things go like 40 miles an hour! Ok? When you are... and    there is that moment when you are at the top, when you just don't know if you are    going to return back to earth!

name: ross
dialogue: Space is filled with orbiting children.  Look, please, just come    on, you know, when you'll see the look on Emma's face, I swear you    won't regret it.

name: rachel
dialogue: All right!

name: ross
dialogue: Good, you don't want to be one of those mothers who pass on their    irrational fears on their children, do you?

name: rachel
dialogue: Irrational, huh? All right, well, I'll remember that the next    time you freak out about a spider in your apartment!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, yeah, that is the same, I am sure there are thirty different    species of poisonous swings!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, the adoption lady is early!

name: chandler
dialogue: Ok, ok, here we go.

name: monica
dialogue: Ok.

name: chandler
dialogue: Here we go. Stand up straight.  Big smile.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hello, is this the creepy residence?

name: monica
dialogue: We're waiting for the adoption lady, but, hey, I'm glad    you are here. I was cleaning this morning and I found this . I don't know if you want to use it, but-

name: phoebe
dialogue: Awe, this is so sweet of you! But you know what? I won't be needing    a veil, I actually won't be wearing a dress at all!

name: monica
dialogue: I told you! I am not coming to a naked wedding!

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, no, no, we're not having a big reception, we took the money    we were going to spend on a wedding and we donate them to the children charity.

name: monica
dialogue: that is crazy! . I am sorry. I just can't    imagine giving up my one wedding day like that!

name: phoebe
dialogue: We, you know, we're different! We don't care about having    a huge party.  This is really nice for you, but, oh,    please, I put this on?  And, ow, I look , why, well, radiant.  All right, well, who cares,    I don't need a pretty veil and a fancy dress.

name: monica
dialogue: that is right. you are making a commitment and that is    the same, whether you do that at the Plaza or, where are you going to do it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: City Hall.

name: monica
dialogue: Ow!  Oh, that sounds nice! I am just    there for jury duty. They really spruce that place up!

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's ok, it's ok. I made my decision. What I really want    is a great big wedding

name: monica
dialogue: Yay!

name: chandler
dialogue: But you already gave all your money to charity!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I'll just ask for it back!

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't think you can do that!

name: monica
dialogue: Why not! This is her wedding day, this is way more important than some    stupid kids!

name: chandler
dialogue: that is sweet, honey, but save something for the adoption Lady.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, careful.

name: ross
dialogue: Ok.

name: rachel
dialogue: Careful, watch her hair. WATCH HER HAIR!

name: ross
dialogue: Rach, she's got like three hairs!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know  but they're just so beautiful!    Oh, my God, I just pulled one out.

name: ross
dialogue: I promise you she's safe! No watch how much she loves this.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok.

name: ross
dialogue: Ready sweety?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok.

name: ross
dialogue: Here we go!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, careful, ok.  Oh, she's smiling! Oh my God,    she does like it!

name: ross
dialogue: See, I told you!

name: rachel
dialogue: Awe!  Oh my God! Looks, she's a little dare-devil!    Oh, let me push, can I push?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, absolutely!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok. Oh God.  Get the camera, it's in the diaper bag.

name: ross
dialogue: Ok!  See? Scared    of swings, I bet you feel pretty silly  Ow!

name: mike
dialogue: We're seriously asking for our money back?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's for our wedding day! Right, now, is this guy gay or straight,    because one of us going to have to start flirting.

name: charity guy
dialogue: Wow! Are you here to make another donation the same day? I don't    think that that is ever happened before.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Gay, go.

name: mike
dialogue: Oh my God, I love your shirt!

name: phoebe
dialogue: The donation we made earlier, we k-, we w-, we want it    back.

name: charity guy
dialogue: Excuse me?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. See, that money was for a big wedding, that we thought we didn't    want, but it turns out we do.

name: charity guy
dialogue: So you are asking us to refund your donation to the children?

name: mike
dialogue: Yeah! This feels really good.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I am sorry. I am, but this wedding is just really important to me.

name: charity guy
dialogue: Hey, it's not my business,  besides it's probably a good thing. We really would have been    spoiling the children, all those food, and warm clothing-

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, that is not fair! A person's wedding is important!    And especially to me! Ok? I didn't have a graduation party! And I didn't    go to Prom. And I spent my sweet sixteen being chased round a tire yard by an    escaped mental patient who is his own words wanted to kill me or whatever. So I deserve a real celebration and I am not going to let some sweaty    little man make me feel badly about it.

name: mike
dialogue: She could have been talking about either one of us.

name: laura
dialogue: Hi, I am Laura, I am here for your adoption interview.

name: monica
dialogue: Hi, I am Monica and this is Chandler. Please come in.

name: laura
dialogue: Thank you!

name: monica
dialogue: Would you like something to drink?

name: laura
dialogue: Oh, water would be fine.

name: monica
dialogue: Ok. Great. I am so glad that you are here. We're really excited    about getting this process started.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, because we love kids. Love them to death. Well, not actually to death, that is just a figure of speech - we love kids the appropriate amount...    as allowed by law.

name: laura
dialogue: Your place is just lovely.

name: monica
dialogue: Ah, thank you. This building does have a wholesome family feel to it.

name: laura
dialogue: You know, I... I feel like I've been here before. Are any other couples    in the    building adopting?

name: monica
dialogue: Is that that couple on the first floor? Because we should get a baby    before    them. Yeah! That guy tried to sell me drugs.

name: chandler
dialogue: But other than that... wholesome, wholesome building.

name: laura
dialogue: Oh...

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: laura
dialogue: I just realized why I remember this place.

name: monica
dialogue: Really? What is it?

name: laura
dialogue: Oh, it's nothing. I went on a date with a guy who lived in this building    and it    didn't end very well.

name: monica
dialogue: OH... that wouldn't by any chance be... Joey Tribbiani?

name: laura
dialogue: Yes!

name: chandler
dialogue: Of course it was!

name: laura
dialogue: Yeah, we had a really great night and in the morning he promised he    would call    me and he didn't.

name: chandler
dialogue: RAT BASTARD!

name: laura
dialogue: So you are not friends with him?

name: monica and chandler
dialogue: OH GOD NO! Nope, no, no, no. No! No, no. Nope! No, no,    no, no, no, no, no, no, no. NO!  No!

name: laura
dialogue: Well, I'm sorry I brought it up. So, are either one of you planning    on staying at    home with your child...

name: joey
dialogue: Hello? Anybody in there order a celebrity?        OW!

name: laura
dialogue: What was that?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, it's just some crazy guy who roams the halls here. He's great    with    kids though.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, oh Ross, oh my God, are you okay?

name: ross
dialogue: SON OF A BITCH!      Oh relax! I didn't say the 'F' word!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, see! I told you, those swings are evil! Alright, that is it.    That is    the last time Emma is getting on one of those things for her entire life.

name: ross
dialogue: No! No, no, no, no, okay, it wasn't the swing's fault. It was my fault    and kind    of that  kids fault. Who is still laughing.    Nice.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, c'mon, please. Can we just get out of here, before somebody else    gets    hurt?

name: ross
dialogue: No wait, okay, okay, I have an idea. I want you to get on the swing,    okay? And    you'll see that there's nothing to be afraid of.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know what this is all about... You've    always been    jealous of my hair.

name: ross
dialogue: Look, I just think you are an adult, okay? And you should get over your    silly    fears.

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright fine. I'll do it.

name: ross
dialogue: Good.

name: rachel
dialogue: If you hold a spider.

name: ross
dialogue: WHAT?    WHERE? WHERE?

name: rachel
dialogue: IF you hold a spider.

name: ross
dialogue: I know.

name: joey
dialogue: Guys? Everything ok? It's me, Joe...

name: chandler
dialogue: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA......AAAaaa-doption!!

name: laura
dialogue: What's going on?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, just like I said. That crazy... Bert... roaming the halls.

name: joey
dialogue: Guys!?

name: monica
dialogue: Keep on roaming Bert! We don't want any crazy today!

name: joey
dialogue: What's going on?

name: chandler
dialogue: WE'LL TALK TO YOU LATER, BERT. EVERYTHNG'S FINE!!

name: joey
dialogue: Everything doesn't sound fine!

name: laura
dialogue: Is he alright out there by himself?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah! He has a caretaker. His older brother... Ernie.

name: laura
dialogue: Bert and Ernie!

name: chandler
dialogue: You can't make this stuff up!

name: mike
dialogue: You never told me about that guy on your sweet sixteen. Oh, ugh. I'm    sorry about    that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! It ended okay. One of my friends shot him.

name: mike
dialogue: Well, hey, at least you are getting a proper wedding. I mean, you really    deserve that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I really do. You know, I had nothing growing up.  Just like the kids I took the money from.

name: mike
dialogue: No! No, no. I see where this is going. Don't make me go back there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Look, I can't have a wedding with this money now. It's tainted.

name: mike
dialogue: Alright, fine. We'll give the money back.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And if that guy at the charity gives us a hard time, my friend hasn't    shot    anyone in a really long time.

name: laura
dialogue: Well, I must say, this seems like a lovely environment to raise a child    in.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, by the way, you are more than welcome to look under any of the    furniture,    because, believe me, you won't find any porn or cigarettes under there!

dialogue: Ok!

name: joey
dialogue: No, no! Don't try to turn this around on me, ok? I'm not some kind of...    social work, ok, that you can just... do.

dialogue: Well, I'm pretty sure I gave    you my number.

dialogue: Hello...? Oh hi... Oh my God...! Really...? I can't wait to tell Chandler...    Ok, goodbye.

dialogue: A-alright! I can do this.

dialogue: It's not?  When was she born?

dialogue: Thank you, Pheebs!

dialogue: Sure. It's just as well... I mean, last year wasn't very good. I think she's losing her touch.

dialogue: Am I? Really? Am I? Well, why don't you cook Thanksgiving dinner and prove me wrong! Well, think about it, think about it, you'll be trying to top than you did last year. You'd be in competition... with yourself.

dialogue: that is my favourite kind! Okay, we are doing this!

dialogue: Alright, Emma is napping...  what happened to your shirt?

dialogue: Oh, God. This is bad. This is so bad.

But my wife... she's already there. She's a mother... without a baby... Please?

dialogue: Hey.

dialogue: Hey.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, hey, when she gets here, is it ok if I introduce you two as "my wife" and "the woman who's carrying my child"?  No? Divorce?

dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey.

dialogue: You guys know where Rachel is?

name: monica
dialogue: Hey!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica

name: monica
dialogue: Well, I want he baby to come out all cute and fat!

name: ross
dialogue: So, why is Erica coming to visit?

name: monica
dialogue: Well, because we want to get to know her better and she's never been to New York so she wants to see all the tourists' spots... you know, Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building...

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, those places! There's always so many people, their being corralled like cattle, and... you know, there's always some idiot who goes "Mooooo"!

name: monica
dialogue: Well, if it annoys you so much, then why do you do it?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, hi! Hi! Thanks for showing you up thirty minutes late!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross...

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, no, I'm sure you have a great excuse, wh-was it a hair appointment, a mani-pedi or was there a sale at Barney's?

name: rachel
dialogue: My father had an heart attack...  ...while I was at Barney's.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God.

name: monica
dialogue: Honey.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm so sorry...

name: ross
dialogue: Is-is he ok?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, they said he's going to be fine, but he's still heavily sedated.

name: ross
dialogue: Ok, ok. I'm going to come out to Long Island with you, I mean, you can't be alone right now.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, come on, I'm totally ok.  I don't need you to come! I can totally handle this on my own.

name: ross
dialogue: Still-still, let me come... for me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok. If you really need to.

name: ross
dialogue: I bet someone could use one of Monica's freshly baked cookies.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I really could.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ohh...

dialogue: All right, it seems pretty simple. Your first line is "My name is Claude", so, just repeat after me. "Je m'appelle Claude".

dialogue: Je de coup Clow.

dialogue: Ok.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

dialogue: All right, let just try it again. Really listen.

dialogue: Hi.

dialogue: Monica. Calm, self.

dialogue: Thank you. It's really nice to meet you guys, I can't believe I'm here!

dialogue: Why would you say that?

dialogue: Oh yeah, let's do that!

dialogue: Great!  This baby'd better to be really good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, uhm, excuse me, I'm here to see my father. My name is Rachel Green.

name: ross
dialogue: And I'm Doctor Ross Geller.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, please, this is a hospital, ok? That actually means something here.

name: rachel
dialogue: Can somebody please go in?

dialogue: Absolutely.

name: ross
dialogue: Rach, I think I'm going to wait out here, because my throat is feeling a little scratchy, I don't want to infect him.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, please, don't be so scared of him!

name: ross
dialogue: I'm not scared of him, I'm really sick!

name: nurse
dialogue: He's under sedation, so he's pretty much out.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm feeling better.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!  Oh! Oh my God! oh, oh, wow, that ear and nose hair trimmer I got him was just money down the drain, huh?

name: nurse
dialogue: Miss Green, your father's doctor is on the phone if you'd like to speak to him.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, great, Are you going to be ok?

name: ross
dialogue: He's unconscious, I think we'll be just fine!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok.

name: ross
dialogue: Did the TV wake you?

name: dr. green
dialogue: No, when you put your feet up in my bed, you tugged on my catheter.

name: ross
dialogue: Ouchy.

name: dr. green
dialogue: What are you doing here, Geller?

name: ross
dialogue: Well, I came with Rachel, who should be back any second!  So what's new?

name: dr. green
dialogue: Ooh, I have a little heart attack.

name: ross
dialogue: Right, is it painful?

name: dr. green
dialogue: What, the heart attack or sitting here talking to you?

name: dr. green
dialogue: So what's new with you, uh, knocked up any more of my daughters lately?

name: ross
dialogue: Nope, just the one. RACH!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Je m'appelle Claude.

name: joey
dialogue: Je do call blue!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Noooo! Ok, maybe if we just break it down. Ok, let's try at one syllable at a time. Ok? So repeat after me. "je".

dialogue: je.

dialogue: m'ap

dialogue: je.

dialogue: m'ap
