dialogue: I, I have to go before I put your head through a wall.

name: joey
dialogue: Don't move! Don't go! I need you! My audition is tomorrow! Shah blue blah! Me lah peeh! Ombrah! . Pooh.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: ross
dialogue: I was going to make us some dinner but all I found in your dad's fridge was bacon and heavy cream.  I think we solved the mystery of the heart attack.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh.  Did you call your parents?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, yeah. Emma's doing great.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh good.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Just can't believe I'm in Rachel Green's room.

name: rachel
dialogue: What do you mean? You've been in my room before!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, sure, right! Like I've ever been in Rachel Green's room.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok I got to tell you, it's really weird when you use my whole name.

name: ross
dialogue: Sorry. . You ok?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: ross
dialogue: You had a rough day, uh?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, just so weird seeing him like that, you know? I mean he is a doctor, you don't expect doctors to get sick!

name: ross
dialogue: But we do!  It's going to be ok, Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ow. I don't want him to wake up alone! I should go to the hospital!

name: ross
dialogue: What? No, no! Hey, hey, hey look...

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: They gave him a lot of medication, ok? He wouldn't even know if you were there. Look, we'll go see him first thing in the morning, ok?

name: rachel
dialogue: Really, I shouldn't feel guilty?

name: ross
dialogue: No, God! Hey, Rach, you've been an amazing daughter, ok? Right now you just need to get some rest.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok, maybe you are right.

name: ross
dialogue: Good night.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait, wait, wait, wait. Would you stay here with me for a little while?

name: ross
dialogue: Sure!

name: rachel
dialogue: Ok.  Thank you for coming with me today.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, of course...

name: rachel
dialogue: Rachel Green is very happy you are in her room!

name: ross
dialogue: Me too. Come here.

name: rachel
dialogue: I just don't want to be alone tonight.

name: ross
dialogue: Ok, well, uh, I can maybe grab a sleeping bag, or... Oh, oh. . No, Rach! I'm sorry, I just don't think this, this, this is a good idea.

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait, we won't know that until we do it, will we?

name: ross
dialogue: No, look, uh. You are upset about your father and you are feeling vulnerable and I just don't feel it would be right, I'd feel like I'd be, you know, taking advantage of you.

name: rachel

name: ross
dialogue: Look, I'm sure it would be great, but I-I think one of us has to be thinking clearly, so, I'm going to go!

name: rachel
dialogue: Wow. Ok.

name: ross
dialogue: I'll see you in the morning .

name: rachel
dialogue: Mhm-mh!

name: ross
dialogue: Haven't had sex in four months, I should get a medal for that!

name: erica

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, I'm glad. Listen, I want to apologize about Chandler, though. I just did not see this coming.

name: chandler
dialogue: New York is awesome!

name: monica
dialogue: What is with you?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I've been to these places before, but I've never really seen them, you know.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, you miss a lot, when you are moo-ing.

name: erica
dialogue: Thanks so much for showing me around.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh! It was our pleasure. We are so much enjoying getting to know you.

name: erica
dialogue: Well, if there is anything else you want to know...

dialogue: Oh, uhm, okay, uhm, do you mind if we ask you some questions about the father?

name: erica
dialogue: Oh, sure. Yeah, well, he was my high school boyfriend. Captain of the football team, really cute and he got a scholarship and went off to college.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is great.

name: erica
dialogue: Yeah... it's almost definitely him.

name: monica
dialogue: How's that now?

name: erica
dialogue: Well, there is a chance it's another guy. I mean, I have only ever been with two guys, but they sort of overlapped.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, what does the other guy do? Does he go to college too?

name: erica
dialogue: No, he's in prison.

name: monica
dialogue: Was he falsely accused of something?

name: erica
dialogue: No... he killed his father with a shovel.  But other than that, he's a great guy.

name: chandler
dialogue: I'll bet his dad doesn't think so.

name: monica
dialogue: Are you awake?

name: chandler
dialogue: Of course I'm awake. Assume from now on that I'm always awake!

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, we don't know that it's him. I mean, it could be the football guy.

name: chandler
dialogue: Honey, it's us. Of course it's the shovel-killer.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, lets say that it is him, would we not want the baby? No! Would we treat him any differently?

name: chandler
dialogue: I'd keep an eye on him! We have to find out which one the father is.

name: monica
dialogue: How?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know, aren't there tests for these things, right?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, but maybe we're just over-reacting.

name: chandler
dialogue: Pff, easy for you to say, he's a father killer. He probably loves him mommy. He's probably got a tattoo that says "mom" on his shovel-wielding arm!

name: tape
dialogue: We will now count from one to five. Un, deux, trois, quatre, cinq.

name: joey
dialogue: Huh, un, blu, bla, flu, flenk!

dialogue: Good job.

name: joey
dialogue: Thank you.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Listen, I feel really badly about yesterday and I thought about it a lot and, and I know, I was too impatient. SO lets try it again.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, no, that is okay, I don't need your help. I worked on it myself and I got to say, I am pretty good!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Really, can I hear some of it.

name: joey
dialogue: Sure, sure. Ok,  "Bleu de la bleu, de la blu bla bleu"  See?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, you are not,  you are not... you are not... again, you are not SPEAKING FRENCH!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh well I think I am, yeah and I think I'm definitely going to get the part.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How could you possibly think that?

name: joey
dialogue: For one thing, the guy on the tape said I was doing a good job!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey Rach, can you grab me a cup of coffee?

name: rachel
dialogue: Sure.

name: ross
dialogue: You've been quiet all morning. Is everything okay?

name: rachel
dialogue: Hmm-hmm.

name: ross
dialogue: You sure you are alright?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yep.

name: ross
dialogue: O-kay. Well, I'm going to go grab us some breakfast.

name: rachel
dialogue: FYI..

name: ross
dialogue: There it is...

name: rachel
dialogue: In the future, when a girl asks for some ill-advised sympathy sex... just do it.

name: ross
dialogue: Wait, wait,  you are mad at me about last night? I was just trying to do the right thing.

name: rachel
dialogue: Really? Well, it seems to me if you'd done the right thing, I would not have woken up today feeling stupid and embarrassed, I would have woken up feeling comforted and satisfied!

name: ross
dialogue: Well...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh stop that!

name: ross
dialogue: I can't believe this. I was just being a good guy. I treated you with respect and understanding.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, that is so hot.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, I was looking out for you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, really, well Ross, you know what? I am a big girl. I don't need someone telling me what is best for me.

name: ross
dialogue: I got to say, I have not had sex a lot of times before, this is the worst ever.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, really, really? Well, it wasn't very good for me either.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey you know what? You know what? To avoid this little thing in the future, let's just say, you and me, never having sex again.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: that is right, sex is off the table.  I am never having sex with you again.  Dr. Green, are you feeling better?

name: chandler

name: erica
dialogue: We had a good time. By the way, I wanted to ask you something. It would really mean a lot to me, if the baby was a boy, that you name him after my father, Jiminy Billy Bob

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, really?

name: erica

dialogue: O-okay.  So, is she going to take the test?

dialogue: Nope, she doesn't have to, I found out who the father is.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh God. It's shovely-Joe, isn't it?

name: monica
dialogue: No it's not.

name: chandler
dialogue: How do you know?

name: erica
dialogue: Well, it turns out that Erica didn't pay much attention in Sex Ed class, because the thing she did with that prison guy... it'd be pretty hard to make a baby that way.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh God! What was it? The thing that we hardly ever do or the thing we never do?

name: monica
dialogue: The thing we never do.

name: chandler
dialogue: Shovely Joe!

name: director
dialogue: Whenever you are ready Joey.

name: joey
dialogue: Right.  Dja bu bu Claude. Uh, c'est la pu les la lu blah bloo.

dialogue: I'm sorry, what's going on?

name: joey
dialogue: Dude, come on! French it u-up!

dialogue: Joey, do you speak French?

name: joey
dialogue: Toutes la smore! Bu blu-ay bloo blah ooh! Pfoof!

dialogue: You know what. I think this audition is over.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh, excuse me. Uh, I am Regine Phalange. I was passing by when I heard this man speaking the regional dialect of my French town of Estee Lauder.

name: director
dialogue: You really think this man is speaking French?

name: joey
dialogue: Sa-sa-saw!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Listen, I will tell you the truth. He's my little bother. He's a bit retarded

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, would you please just humour him?

name: director
dialogue: Good job, little buddy. That was some really good French. But I think we're going to go with someone else for the part.

name: joey
dialogue: Ah. All right. But my French was good?

name: director
dialogue: It was great.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh-hoh! Ha-hah! See!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Merci. Au revoir.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah-hah. Toute-de-le-fruit.

name: ross
dialogue: Emma's down for the night.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, good.

name: ross
dialogue: So uh... I guess I want to take off.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay... Hey listen, just before you go I-I again, I just want to say "thank you" for coming with me.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, no problem.

name: rachel
dialogue: And also, you know I uh, I was thinking about what you said, you know, about the whole sex thing and... it's probably not a great idea to go down that road again.

name: ross
dialogue: Thank you. I'm glad you agree.

name: rachel
dialogue: It's a shame though, I mean, when we did it, it was pretty good.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah... Yeah, that is true.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey uhm, do you remember that one really great time...?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, ye-ah!

name: rachel
dialogue: You know it was you are uhm... birthday...

name: ross
dialogue: ...Valentine's day...

name: both
dialogue: Oh yeah!

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I guess that is all in the past, now.

name: ross
dialogue: Hmmm-mmmm.

name: rachel
dialogue: Not even one more time?

name: ross
dialogue: Not even once.

name: rachel
dialogue: No matter how much we want it.

name: ross
dialogue: Even if we want it really bad.

name: rachel
dialogue: that is what we decided.

name: ross
dialogue: Uhm, right!

name: rachel
dialogue: ...It's kind of hard though!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: rachel
dialogue: You know, when two people have a connection, you know, that is... just seems like such a... waste.

name: ross
dialogue: ...I hate waste.

name: rachel
dialogue: ...Ross?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes?

name: rachel
dialogue: Just so you know... With us... it's never off the table.

name: ross
dialogue: Damn it. It's never off the table.

dialogue: Okay, can you really tapdance?

name: joey
dialogue: No.

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's off the resume.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Archery?

name: joey
dialogue: No.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Horseback riding?

name: joey
dialogue: Would fall off a lot.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You can drink a gallon of milk in 10 seconds?

name: joey
dialogue: That I can do.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Come on! You can drink a gallon of milk in 10 seconds?

name: joey
dialogue: All right, watch me!  Okay, you time me. Ready?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ready... GO!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You did it!

name: mike
dialogue: Thank you guys for having us over.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh! Yeah, this is fun, couples night.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I don't know why we hang out with married couples more often.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, because every time we do, you make jokes about swinging and scare them away.

name: chandler
dialogue: You mean that Portuguese couple? Yeah, like you wouldn't have done it.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, you guys... I have great news.

name: monica
dialogue: Ross, we're kind of in the middle of diner here.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, well, er, I already ate, but sure...!  Guess what happened at work today...

name: chandler
dialogue: A dinosaur died a million years ago?

name: ross
dialogue: Try sixty-five million years ago, and then try sssshhhhhh.... My tenure review board met today and I hear it's looking really good.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah. Do you have any idea what this means in academic circles, uh? I am going to get laid.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi you guys.

name: all
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh, Italian!

name: monica
dialogue: No one wanted seconds, right?

name: ross
dialogue: No, no. I-I'm good.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey you guys... you are never going to believe it. This headhunter called me. I have a meeting tomorrow with Gucci. Gucci wants me.

name: ross
dialogue: I'm up for tenure.

name: rachel
dialogue: Congratulations!

name: ross
dialogue: You too! What are the odds?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ooh!

name: joey
dialogue: Guess what?  I finally got that seed out of my teeth.

name: monica
dialogue: I don't know who I'm happiest for...

name: phoebe
dialogue: I do, he's been working on that all day!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey Mon? Was it weird changing your name to Geller-Bing?

name: monica
dialogue: No, no. It felt nice to acknowledge this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Where did you go to do it?

name: monica
dialogue: Uhm the... the ministry... of names... bureau...

name: chandler
dialogue: YOU NEVER DID IT!

name: monica
dialogue: I'm sorry. It's just the idea of being an official Bing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey! I will have you know that... aah, who am I kidding. Let's call the kid Geller and let Bing die with me.

name: mike
dialogue: Here you go.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thanks! Honey, would you want me to take your name?

name: mike
dialogue: Oh, it's just... It's up to you. It's your name. You've got to live with it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, let's see, call me Mrs Hannigan.

name: chandler
dialogue: Mrs Hannigan?

name: phoebe
dialogue: What? Can't you see I'm in the middle of something? Ooh, I like it.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey Joe! We've got a couple of things we've got to check out at the new house. You want to come with us?

name: joey
dialogue: No, thank you.

name: monica
dialogue: All right. I know you are not happy about us moving, but you are the only one who hasn't seen the house.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, come with us. You'll see how close it is to the city.

name: joey
dialogue: But no, it's not close. You said it was in escrow? I couldn't even find it on the map.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, please come. It would mean so much to us.

name: joey
dialogue: You know what? You are my friends, I want to be supportive, I will come with you. SHOTGUN!

name: chandler
dialogue: Damn it.

name: monica
dialogue: See you guys later.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay!

name: monica
dialogue: I'll pick you up at eleven. So glad you are coming.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Good for you. That was really mature.

name: joey
dialogue: What? No, the only reason  I'm going to their stupid new house, is so I can point out everything that is wrong with it, so they don't move. I'm going to make them stay here.

name: mike
dialogue: you are a strange kind of grown-up.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Joey, you can't make someone do something they don't want to do. Believe me, there's something I've been trying to get Mike to do in bed and there's... he's just...

name: mike
dialogue: Woo-wo-hey-hey-hey... Can we not talk about that right now?

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, prude... Look, Monica and Chandler really love this house. You are not going to talk them into staying here.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, hey... I can convince people to do anything, you know. I bet I can even get Mike to do that "thing". What is it?

name: joey
dialogue: I AM NOT going to HELP YOU DO THAT! Goodbye!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi, I'm here to see Mr Campbell... with Gucci. The reservation is probably under Gucci. It's spelled like Gukki, which could be confusing.

name: maitre d'
dialogue: Mr Campbell's not here yet. Let me show you to his table.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! that is my boss. You have to seat us somewhere else.

dialogue: I'm sorry. that is always mr Campbell's table.

dialogue: But my... but my boss cannot see me. I'm interviewing for another job.

dialogue: I know. With Gukki

name: rachel
dialogue: Sssshhhh!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi... I'm on a date...

dialogue: that is great!

name: rachel

dialogue: Well, you got uhm... good energy.

dialogue: Oh.

dialogue: Rachel?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes, hi!

name: mr campbell
dialogue: James Campbell...

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!  Excuse us.

name: mr campbell
dialogue: Please...

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Oh, yeah...  Oh he's cute!

name: mr campbell
dialogue: So... your resume is quite impressive.

dialogue: Wha... My resume? I wouldn't... I wouldn't call my online dating profile a resume.

dialogue: Dating profile? I-I-I'm talking about the work resume.

name: rachel
dialogue: Whatever happened to just singing for  no reason? Huh?

name: mr campbell

name: rachel
dialogue: What? I-I don't.

name: mr campbell
dialogue: You don't?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, I-I-I love it there.

dialogue: What?

dialogue: that is Hugo Boss?

name: phoebe
dialogue: This place is so depressing. If I had to work here I'd kill myself.  But you obviously haven't.

name: clerk
dialogue: How can I help you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I need to change my name, please. See, I need to change it because I'm-I'm hiding from the law.  you are fun.

name: clerk
dialogue: You need to fill out this form.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, well, I just don't, I don't know how it works exactly. See, my name is Buffay and my husband's name is Hannigan, so is it supposed to be Buffay-Hannigan or Hannigan-Buffay?

dialogue: Yeah... anything.

dialogue: Get out of my line.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey!

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Pheebs.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, not anymore. I changed it today.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry, mrs Hannigan.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wrong again! Apparently you can change it to anything you want. So I thought, all right, here's an opportunity to be creative. So meet Princess Consuela Banana Hammock.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is what we were going to name the baby.

name: monica
dialogue: Phoebe!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh! Princess Consuela.

name: monica
dialogue: You seriously changed your name to that?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh-huh!

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, so from now on we have to call you Princess Consuela?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uhm, no. I'm going to have my friends call me Valerie.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, how'd the interview go?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! It's not good.

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, I always feel that way after an interview. I'll bet it went better than you think.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I didn't get the job at Gucci and I got fired from Ralph Lauren.

name: chandler
dialogue: That is a bad interview.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What are you, what are you talking about? How did this happen?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, my boss was at the same restaurant where I was having my interview and he heard everything. So later he calls me to his office and he tells me that he's going to have to let me go, because I'm not a team player. And I said "Wait a minute! Yes I am." and I had to sit there for 45 minutes while he proved that that in fact... was true.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh God. I'm so sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey! Wha-hoo! What's this?  Well it's a, it's a bottle of champagne. Why is this here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross...

name: ross
dialogue: I guess it's here because I GOT TENURE!

name: chandler joey ross monica phoebe
dialogue: Congratulations!

name: ross
dialogue: This is the single greatest day of my professional career. Gunther, six glasses!

name: gunther
dialogue: Six? You want me to join you?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I thought Joey was here. Five is good.  Well, I'm going to have a loogie in my coffee tomorrow.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh! Israeli champagne. And it's vanilla!

name: ross
dialogue: I got tenure. I didn't win the lottery... Hey Rach, so uh... how did your thing go?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh it... good! Yeah, but I'm not going to hear from that for a couple of days.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, you know what? you are going to get it. I-I-I-I can feel it.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Can you?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ah, all right. Here's to Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: And-and to years of hard work finally paying off.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And to knowing that your career doesn't mean everything.

name: ross
dialogue: But also knowing it means a lot.

name: monica
dialogue: But more importantly to full well-rounded lives.

name: ross
dialogue: ...that centre around work.

name: chandler
dialogue: To Ross!

name: chandler joey ross monica phoebe
dialogue: Ross!

name: ross
dialogue: You know what the best part about this is? I can never be fired.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh God!

name: ross
dialogue: No seriously. I have job security for life. You know, I never have to worry.  Oh, look at you. Look  how happy you are for me.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, it's not that. I got fired today. And I didn't get the other job.

name: ross
dialogue: Rach, I'm so sorry.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!

name: ross
dialogue: Great. I feel like an idiot.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, it's okay, you didn't know.

dialogue: Oh...  Little heads-up would have been nice.

dialogue: Thank you for letting us see the house again.

name: chandler
dialogue: And thank you for explaining to us what escrow means... I've already forgotten what you said, but thank you.

name: realtor
dialogue: Take as long as you want. Just let me know when you are through.

name: monica
dialogue: Ah, so glad you decided to come.

name: joey
dialogue: Me too. Yeah, this place is great. I'm so happy for you guys. Although, you know, I hope you like fungus.

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Fungus! Yeah. Place is full of it.

name: monica
dialogue: No it's not. We had an inspection and they didn't find anything.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. Then I guess I have dry eyes and a scratchy throat for no reason.

name: monica
dialogue: Maybe because it's you hung your head out of the window like a dog the whole ride here.

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe. So this is the living room huh? Ooh, it's pretty dark.

name: monica
dialogue: No it's not!

name: joey
dialogue: Are you kidding'? I think I just saw a bat in the corner!

name: chandler
dialogue: When your head was hanging out the window, it didn't hit a mailbox, did it?

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe. Well, I just think you guys can do better than this house, you know? Or any other house for that matter.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh Joey, look, we know you are having a hard time with this, but we really, we love it here.

name: joey
dialogue: FINE, ok, if you love this house so much, then you should just live here, okay? I just hope you get used to that weird humming sound.  Hmm...

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, we know that is you.

name: joey
dialogue: no... hmm... it's not... hmm

name: mike
dialogue: Hey

name: phoebe
dialogue: Welcome back!

name: mike
dialogue: Ah! I missed you

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, me too!

name: mike
dialogue: So, what's new?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I'm no longer Phoebe Buffay.

name: mike
dialogue: that is great! You changed you name?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes I did! Meet

name: mike
dialogue: you are kidding right?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Nope.

name: mike
dialogue: You really did that?

dialogue: Yep.

dialogue: Yeah, but you can't do that.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Why? It's fun, it's different, no-one else has a name like it.

name: mike
dialogue: Alright, then I'm going to change my name.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Great, okay, what are you going to change it to?

name: mike
dialogue: Crap Bag.

dialogue: Mike Crap Bag?

dialogue: No, no Mike, just Crap Bag. First name Crap, last name Bag.

name: phoebe
dialogue: you are not serious, right?

name: mike
dialogue: Yeah, I'm serious.  It's fun, it's different and no-one else has a name like that!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uhu, uhu, well, then, great. If you love it, I love it.

name: mike
dialogue: I do love it, and I love your name. I love Princess Consuela.

name: phoebe
dialogue: And I love Crap.

name: joey
dialogue: Ow!

name: girl
dialogue: Who are you?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, hi, I'm Joey. My stupid friends are buying this house. Who are you?

dialogue: I'm Mackenzie. My stupid parents are selling this house.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh.

name: mackenzie
dialogue: I hate my parents.

name: joey
dialogue: I hate my friends.  Alright, look. There's got to be a way that we can stop this from happening.

name: mackenzie
dialogue: Like what?

name: joey
dialogue: Uhm... oh! Okay. You come with me, and you tell them that the house is haunted!

name: mackenzie
dialogue: What are you? Eight?

name: joey
dialogue: Woah, uh! Okay, let's hear your great idea.

name: mackenzie
dialogue: I don't have any great ideas. I am eight.

name: joey
dialogue: Ahh! There's got to be a way. I mean, you know, if Monica and Chandler move out here and now Phoebe is married to Mike. That just leaves me and Ross and Rach, you know what I mean?

name: mackenzie
dialogue: I really don't.

name: joey
dialogue: What am I going to do, I feel like I'm losing my friends.

name: mackenzie
dialogue: My parents say I'm going to make new friends.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, yeah, sure, easy for you, you are young. Me, I'm set in my ways.

name: mackenzie
dialogue: This is what my mom was talking about. Whiners are wieners.  Look, you want your friends to be happy, right?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, yeah, I guess.

name: mackenzie
dialogue: Well, if moving here is going to make them happy, don't you want them to do it?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, maybe.

name: mackenzie
dialogue: Then you got to let them go.

name: joey
dialogue: I hate to admit it, but you are probably right. How did you get to be so smart?

name: mackenzie
dialogue: I read a lot.

name: joey
dialogue: Just when I thought we could be friends.

dialogue: Hey Rach, I just heard. I'm so sorry.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, thank you...

dialogue: Mark? Oh my God!

dialogue: I'm fantastic. You remember Ross?

dialogue: Sure, sure.  What's with the chair.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, you know, you can't always get a seat on the subway, so...

name: mark
dialogue: Clever.  So how are you?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, well,  you are not catching me on my best day.

name: mark
dialogue: Yeah, a box full of your desk stuff doesn't exactly say big promotion.

name: rachel
dialogue: No, but it's good, you know, I'm going to take some time off and do some charity work.

dialogue: Well, screw charity work. What've you got?

dialogue: Great! I'll call you!

name: mark
dialogue: Nice to see you.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah! yeah, I got tenure!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: ross
dialogue: See? I told you something good would come along. And he seemed really nice. I've met him before?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross! that is Mark. From Bloomingdales? You were insanely jealous of him.

name: ross
dialogue: That is Mark?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes.

name: ross
dialogue: I hate that guy.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

dialogue: No, no, NO, you cannot go to dinner with him.

name: rachel

name: rachel
dialogue: Ugh.

dialogue: I'm serious. I just don't trust that guy, okay?

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, you know what?  Okay, let's talk about it later, there comes security.

dialogue: Oh, I love this street. The trees, the big front yards, the actual picket fences.

dialogue: Man, those two dogs are going at it!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, where have you been?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, just er... you know, looking around. But you know what? This house... is great.

name: chandler
dialogue: Really? What changed your mind?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh well, the little girl who lives here made me feel a lot better about the whole thing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey, there was a little girl who lived here, but she died like 30 years ago.

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Ha! I'm just messing with you.

name: joey
dialogue: that is not funny! You know I'm afraid of little girl ghosts!

name: monica
dialogue: Joey, now that you are okay with the house, do you want to go see your room?

name: joey
dialogue: What? I get my own room?

name: chandler
dialogue: You don't think we'd buy a house and not have a Joey room do you?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God!  Oh! Hey, can I have an aquarium? And a sex swing?

name: chandler
dialogue: No!

name: joey
dialogue: Why not? I'll keep the tank clean.

dialogue: After you, miss Banana Hammock.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Thank you, mister Bag.

name: woman
dialogue: Oh hey, how are you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh hi Rita! Good!  Oh, Rita's a massage client.

name: mike
dialogue: Oh! Why don't you introduce me?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Er, Rita, this is my husband.

name: rita
dialogue: Oh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah.

name: mike
dialogue: Why don't you tell her my name?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, I will.  This is my husband Crap Bag.

name: rita
dialogue: Crap Bag?

name: mike
dialogue: If you need an easy way to remember it, just think of a bag of crap.

name: rita
dialogue: Okay. Excuse me...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah... OH... Okay, fine. You made your point. Can you please just be Mike Hannigan again?

name: mike
dialogue: Only if you'll be Phoebe Buffay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How about uhm... How about Buffay-Hannigan?

name: mike
dialogue: Really?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah. I'm Phoebe Buffay-Hannigan Banana Hammock.

dialogue: Do you even know what a banana hammock is?

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's a funny word.

name: mike
dialogue: It's a Speedo.

name: phoebe
dialogue: ...Oh crap!

dialogue: Hey, is Rachel here?

name: monica
dialogue: No.

name: ross
dialogue: She's still at dinner?

name: monica
dialogue: I guess. Why? Who's she with?

name: ross
dialogue: That guy Mark. From Bloomingdale's... She thinks he's just being nice to her. But I know he really wants to sleep with her.

name: chandler
dialogue: It's seven years ago.  My time machine works!

name: ross
dialogue: We ran into him on the street today and he said he might have a job for her. But I know he just wants to get into her pants.

name: monica
dialogue: So what if he wants to sleep with her? I mean, she's single and he's cute.

name: chandler
dialogue: Excuse me?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh please! Yesterday on the subway? You couldn't stop staring at that woman with the big breasts the whole time.

name: chandler
dialogue: For your information, I was staring at her baby. We're about to be parents.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, sorry!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi you guys!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, so uhm... How was dinner?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, it was great. Mark is so sweet.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh yeah? Yeah? I wonder why? What could that smarmy letch possibly want?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh Ross, come on. He's happily married. His wife just had twins.

name: ross
dialogue: Should we send something?

name: chandler
dialogue: How did the job stuff go?

name: rachel
dialogue: He offered me one.

name: chandler
dialogue: that is great!

name: ross
dialogue: Congratulations!

name: rachel
dialogue: I know, it's amazing. It's amazing. It's so much better than what I had at Ralph Lauren. The money is great...

name: ross
dialogue: Can we, can we just stop for a second? Who said something better would come along, huh? You didn't believe me. I told you everything was going to work out.  You know what? This calls for a bottle of Israels finest.

name: rachel
dialogue: The job is in Paris.

name: joey
dialogue: I mean, this soap opera is a great gig, but... am I missing opportunities? You know, I've always thought of myself as a serious actor. I mean, should I be trying to do more independent movies?

name: mackenzie
dialogue: I don't know... You know what? I'm going to put you on with my bear. Hold on.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey bear, I need some career advice.

name: jennifer
dialogue: Previously on Friends...

name: chandler
dialogue: How did the job stuff go?

name: rachel
dialogue: He offered me one.

name: ross
dialogue: You know what? This calls for a bottle of Israels finest.

name: rachel
dialogue: The job is in Paris.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, God! Please, somebody  say something.

name: ross
dialogue: So if you take this job you'll be moving to Paris?

name: chandler
dialogue: Or facing a bitch of a commute.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know, it's huge, and it's scary, and it's... really far, far away    from you guys, but this is such an incredible opportunity for me. And I've already    talked to them about our situation with Emma, and they said they'll do whatever    we need to make us feel comfortable.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: I mean, I'll fly back and forth, they'll fly you out...    Anything we want.

name: chandler
dialogue: My boss said I might be getting a new lamp in my cubicle.

name: ross
dialogue: All right, we'll work it out.

name: rachel
dialogue: Thank you! Thank you!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, yeah!  You sure this is what you want?

name: rachel
dialogue: I think it is.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ooh, what's going on?

name: rachel
dialogue: I got a really incredible job offer.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, great! All right!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Good for you!

name: rachel
dialogue: It's in Paris.

name: joey
dialogue: What? No, no, no! No, no... no... no, no... No, too much is changing,    okay? First, Phoebe getting married  Congratulations! ... and then these two move into a stupid house in the stupid    suburbs...

name: monica
dialogue: Hey, this afternoon you said you'd be supportive...

name: joey
dialogue: Well, it comes and goes. I wouldn't trust it.

name: rachel
dialogue: Look, you guys... this is really, really important to me. And it means    a lot if you could try to get on board.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Of course we can. Congratulations.     Yay!  Joey...

name: joey
dialogue: No, no, no. My hugs are reserved for people STAYING IN AMERICA.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey, it would mean so...

name: joey
dialogue: Hey! No! Get your France-going-arms away from me.

name: rachel
dialogue: Joey...

name: phoebe
dialogue: You okay with this?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, it makes me feel sad, but...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Talking to Ross.

name: chandler
dialogue: I see.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, Rachel moving to another country? Not being able to see her every    day. How can I be okay with this?

name: monica
dialogue: I know, but what are we going to do? She really needs this job.

name: ross
dialogue: Do you think if the Ralph Lauren people offered her her old job back,    she would take it?

name: monica
dialogue: How is that going to happen?

name: chandler
dialogue: Is this the best way to use one of your three magic wishes?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't know. I could talk to her boss. Yeah! I met him at that Christmas    party. We really hit it off.

name: monica
dialogue: You mean the guy who kept calling you Ron?

name: ross
dialogue: I didn't say we were brothers.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey Phoebe. Hey, tell me what you think. All right. The house next    door to the one that we're buying in Westchester? Just went on the market. I want to    take a look at it, but Chandler doesn't.

name: chandler
dialogue: We close escrow tomorrow, so seeing another house can only confuse    us, and we're easily confused. We're not very bright.

name: monica
dialogue: But what if it is better than ours? Should we at least look?

name: chandler
dialogue: What do you think Pheebs?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I think that shirt makes you look like you should work at a Baskin    Robbins... Anyway... Hey, isn't Joey's agent Estelle Leonard?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: She died.

name: chandler
dialogue: you are kidding!

name: monica
dialogue: that is terrible!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, last Saturday. Wow! She was the first black man to fly solo across    the Atlantic.  Oh, wait a minute, I read the    wrong one.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh yeah?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, she was just an agent.

name: monica
dialogue: Joey's going to be *so* upset.

name: chandler
dialogue: I know. *He* always wanted to be the first black man to cross the    Atlantic.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, we cannot tell Joey about this. He's already flipping out about    everything that is changing. This will push him over the edge.

name: monica
dialogue: Seriously, you don't think we should tell him?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, not for a little while. Let's just give him a few days to get    used to everything else.

name: monica
dialogue: What if he reads it in the paper?

name: chandler
dialogue: Unless Snoopy says it to Charlie Brown, I think we're okay.

name: ross
