dialogue: She's going to say goodbye to each of us individually.

name: ross
dialogue: Are you kidding? Oh my God...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, I know, it's going to be even worse for you... God... Ross, get ready to do some serious crying.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, man, I'm not going to be able to handle this.  Now I know how my students feel at the end of each year. And why they act out by giving me such bad evaluations.

name: rachel
dialogue: Mon... Okay... I've got to... just say what it is I'm going to say... None of the amazing things that have happened to me in the last ten years, would have happened if it wasn't for you. No-one has been more like a sister to me...

name: monica
dialogue: I know what you mean. you are like a sister to me too.

name: rachel
dialogue: I wouldn't know what I'm going to do without you...

name: monica
dialogue: you are the best friend I ever had.

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: That is so sweet.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh no, she took down Monica... And I'm the crier in the family. Oh God! I could be next. Maybe she won't talk with me if it looks like we're deep in converstation. Oh, so that thing you said about the thing. It really made me think about that other thing.

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, Rach?

name: ross
dialogue: Well it's okay. Chandler is talking to her.

name: joey
dialogue: I really made you think about that thing uh?

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh, Rach... I think I have something that belongs to you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, I'm sure going to miss pretending to laugh at your weird jokes that I don't get.

name: chandler
dialogue: No, no, no... They're really yours. We... found them in your old room.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, these aren't mine. Maybe Monica used to use them with...

name: chandler
dialogue: Don't say Richard! Well, if they're not Monica's and they're not yours, then whose are they?

name: rachel
dialogue: Well, I think you are forgetting the kinkiest former resident of that room.

name: chandler
dialogue: Pheebs!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah!

name: chandler
dialogue: I think these are yours.

name: phoebe
dialogue: These are not mine... Look how flimsy they are, come on! Good God! You try to hang a guy from a waterpipe with these, they'll snap like a piece of licorice.

name: rachel
dialogue: Can I talk to you alone for a minute?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure.  You don't really handcuff guys to waterpipes do you?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Where do you think Mike really is?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh honey...

name: chandler
dialogue: Let me just say something... Because once we get into this, I'm going to get all uncomfortable and probably make some stupid joke... I just want to say that I... I love you... And, I'm going to miss you. And I'm so sad that you are leaving.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, you know what? Let's not say anything else. I love you.

name: chandler
dialogue: Ooh, not so tight...  I'm sorry, just give me one more chance.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Oh...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm sor... Just go. Just go. I can't, I can't.

name: monica
dialogue: So, I guess you are next. you are ready?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't think so.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, you are definitely not. I haven't cried like that in years.

name: monica
dialogue: You cried yesterday at the six o'clock news.

name: chandler
dialogue: That old woman was being scammed by her mechanic.

name: ross
dialogue: God! I can't believe she saved me for last.  Why are they taking so long?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't know. But, God, Joey seems to be handling it surprisingly well.

name: all
dialogue: No, no, no, no!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, here we go...

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh...  Well...

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah...

name: rachel
dialogue: I think I'm going to take off.

name: ross
dialogue: Huh?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, you guys. This was an amazing night. Thank you so much. I love you. Good night.

name: ross
dialogue: What? I don't get a goodbye?

name: joey
dialogue: Lucky bastard!

name: ross
dialogue: Unbelievable. She says goodbye to everyone but me.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, maybe she thought that with all of your history it could be, you know, implicit.

name: ross
dialogue: Well, it needs to be plicit.

name: joey
dialogue: All right, let's think about this. I mean, there's got to be an explanation. Uh... did you do anything to make her mad?

name: ross
dialogue: No, I don't think so.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You know, maybe she was just really spent from our talk. It was pretty intense.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah. Mine too.

name: chandler
dialogue: Mine was a humdinger

name: ross
dialogue: O-kay... I mean, don't I deserve anything? I mean, a few tears, a cursory hug?  NOT FROM YOU!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, if you are this upset, you should go and talk to her.

name: monica
dialogue: And say what? "You owe me a goodbye", I mean, he's got more pride than that.

name: ross
dialogue: THE HELL I DO!

name: ross
dialogue: I don't get a goodbye?

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Everyone gets a goodbye but me? What have I got to do to get a goodbye, huh? Be best friends with you? Uh, go out with you? Have a baby with you? Oh wait a minute, wait a minute, I did all those things.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross...

name: ross
dialogue: Oh no, maybe it's me, I'm just not giving you enough credit. Uh, I mean it is difficult to say goodbye to five people. Uh, goodbye, goodbye, goodbye, goodbye, good...  IT'S PHYSICALLY IMPOSSIBLE. You know what? After all we've been through, I can't believe this is how you want to leave things between us. Have a, have a good time in Paris.

name: monica
dialogue: I hope Ross isn't too upset.

name: joey
dialogue: I'm sure he's not more bummed out than I am.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Tell me about it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, you can't say we don't know how to throw a party.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, I think I'm going to head out.

name: monica
dialogue: Uh, where do you think you are going?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I thought I was going home to go to bed, but I'm sensing there's something less fun for me to do here.

name: monica
dialogue: We're moving in a couple of days and we've got a lot of packing to do. It would be great if you guys could pitch in.

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey and I can finish up in the guest room.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, yeah, yeah, good idea.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh no! You and Phoebe are going to help me in here.

name: chandler
dialogue: You couldn't be cool.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, we're going to start in the kitchen. Plates get put into plate protectors and stacked ten to a box. The silverware gets bundled in rubber bands and then bubble wrapped. Got it?

name: phoebe and joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: monica
dialogue: Good! Now I need you to be careful and efficient. And remember, if I am harsh with you, it is only because you are doing it wrong.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey Mon, I think I figured out whose handcuffs they are.

name: monica
dialogue: You did? How?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I was cleaning out the closet and I found some pictures of them... being used.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! Let me see.

name: joey
dialogue: Who's that dirty old lady?

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica's grandmother.

name: monica
dialogue: Nana liked it rough!

name: erica
dialogue: Hi!

name: all
dialogue: Hey!

name: joey
dialogue: Come on here, have a seat.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How was your night?

name: erica
dialogue: Oh, it was okay. I went to a movie with my cousin and then out for dinner. We went to this place that had... Ooh...  Hoo... ooh... Anyway, they had these really amazing cheeseburgers.

name: monica
dialogue: Erica, are you okay?

name: erica
dialogue: Yeah, you know, maybe I ate too much. I keep getting these stomach aches. They come and go like every few minutes.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: chandler
dialogue: Relax! We just get her some antacids.

name: monica
dialogue: She doesn't have a stomach ache, she's in labour.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, you got to get to the hospital.

name: monica
dialogue: All right, Chandler get the coats. Erica let's go. Phoebe and Joey, keep packing! Oh my God we're going to have a baby. All right. We're going to have a baby! OH MY GOD, WE'RE going to HAVE A BABY! Oh God, oh God, I got to sit down, I got to sit down. Ooh!

name: chandler
dialogue: Honey, it's going to be okay.

name: erica
dialogue: You can do this. Just breathe.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, okay... Okay, I feel a little better.

name: erica
dialogue: Ooh! Are you sure?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh... Yes, I'm sure. Oh honey, let's go. Okay bye everyone.

name: joey
dialogue: Chandler, wait, wait, wait...

name: chandler
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: If you get a second, find out where she got that cheeseburger.

name: rachel
dialogue: You really think I didn't say goodbye to you because I don't care?

name: ross
dialogue: that is what it seemed like.

name: rachel
dialogue: I cannot believe that after ten years, you do not know ONE thing about me.

name: ross
dialogue: Fine, then why didn't you say something?

name: rachel
dialogue: Because it is too damn hard Ross. I can't even begin to explain to you how much I'm going to miss you. When I think about not seeing you every day, it makes me not want to go... Okay, so if you think that I didn't say goodbye to you because you don't mean as much to me as everybody else, you are wrong. It's because you mean more to me. So there, all right, there's your goodbye... Oh!

name: ross
dialogue: Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: You keep, you keep... You can't...

name: rachel
dialogue: WHAT?

name: joey
dialogue: A little more.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: A little more, a little more.  A little more... All right. Okay, all right, let's do this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, ready?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. All right, now give me your best shot.

name: phoebe
dialogue: All right, here it goes...

name: joey
dialogue: Doesn't work...

name: jennifer aniston
dialogue: Previously on Friends.

name: monica
dialogue: Erica, are you okay?

name: erica
dialogue: Yeah, you know, maybe I ate too much. I keep getting these    stomach-aches. They come and go like every few minutes.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: chandler
dialogue: Relax! We'll just get her some antacids.

name: monica
dialogue: She doesn't have a stomach-ache. She's in labour!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: rachel
dialogue: So if you think I didn't say goodbye to you because you don't    mean as much to me as everybody else, you are wrong. It's because you    mean more to me.

name: ross
dialogue: Rach!

name: rachel
dialogue: What?!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Shh.. Go back to sleep. I have to go home.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh. This was amazing.

name: rachel
dialogue: It really was. You've learned some new moves!

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, well, this guy at work gave me "Sex for Dummies" as a    joke.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ah.

name: ross
dialogue: Who's laughing now?

name: rachel
dialogue: I know!

name: monica
dialogue: Breathe, breathe, breathe... Good.

name: chandler
dialogue: Next time, can I say breathe?

name: monica
dialogue: No, last time you said it like Dracula, and it scared her! Can    I get you anything? You want some more ice chips?

name: erica
dialogue: No, I'm okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, I'll be right back.

name: chandler
dialogue: Where are you going?

name: monica
dialogue: To use the bathroom.

name: chandler
dialogue: You can't leave me alone with her.

name: monica
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: This is exactly the kind of social situation that I am not    comfortable with!

name: monica
dialogue: What kind of social situation are you comfortable with?

name: chandler
dialogue: It's just that we've never spent any time, you know, alone    together.

name: monica
dialogue: You'll be fine. Nah, you won't, but I'll be back in two    minutes.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: So, ah... Any plans for the summer?

name: erica
dialogue: I don't know. Maybe church-camp?

name: chandler
dialogue: Hah. May not want to mention this. So, you ever wonder which    is worse, you know; going through labour or getting kicked in the nuts?

name: erica
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, it's just interesting. You know, because no one will    ever know, because no one can experience both.

name: chandler
dialogue: One of life's great, unanswerable questions. I mean, who    knows? Maybe there's something even more painful than those things?  Like this.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Morning.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: What's that?

name: joey
dialogue: It's my house-warming present for Monica and Chandler.

name: phoebe
dialogue: It's a baby chick and duck!

name: joey
dialogue: Uh-huh. And I named them Chick Jr. and Duck Jr.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I did not see that coming.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I figure they'll love it at the new house, you know? It    has that big backyard. And then, when they get old, they can go to    that special farm that Chandler took the other chick and duck to.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. It's a shame people can't visit there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: That is the rule, though.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Guess what? you are almost an uncle!

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, Erica went into labour last night. Monica and Chandler are    at the hospital right now!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, and I have a definite feeling it's going to be a girl.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, you were sure Ben was going to be a girl.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Have you seen him throw a ball?

name: ross
dialogue: Is Rachel here?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh, I think she's still asleep. Hey, hey, how did it go with you    guys last night? She seemed pretty pissed at you.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, we, you know, we worked things out.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What's that smile? Did something happen with you two?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, I'm not one to kiss and tell, but I'm also not one to have    sex and shut up. We totally did it!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God. You and Rachel?

name: ross
dialogue: I know, it's pretty great.

name: joey
dialogue: So what does that mean? Are you guys getting back together?

name: ross
dialogue: Oh, I.. I don't know. We didn't really get to talk.

name: phoebe
dialogue: But do you want to get back together?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't know. It was incredible. I mean, it just felt so right.    When I was holding her, I mean, I never wanted to let her go. You know    what? Yeah, I do. I want to be together.

name: phoebe
dialogue: YAY!

name: ross
dialogue: Shh!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yay!

name: joey
dialogue: So, so is she still going to Paris?

name: ross
dialogue: Wow, I hadn't thought of that. I hope not.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, this is like the best day ever. Ever! You guys might get    back together, Monica and Chandler are getting their baby, there are    chicks and ducks in the world again! Oh, I feel like I'm in a musical!     "Daa - raa... When the sun comes up, bright and beaming! And    the moon comes..."

name: rachel
dialogue: Morning!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Guess we'll never know how it ends.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: rachel
dialogue: Hey.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey. How did you sleep?

name: rachel
dialogue: Good. You?

name: ross
dialogue: Good.

name: joey
dialogue: I bet you did!

name: ross
dialogue: Uh. Would you guys mind giving us a minute?

name: joey
dialogue: Sure, yeah. Will you just keep an eye on the chick and the duck?

name: rachel
dialogue: Chick and the duck? Didn't they die...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Dive. Yeah, they dove head-first into fun on    the farm.

name: ross
dialogue: So...

name: ross
dialogue: Morning.

name: rachel
dialogue: You too. Last night was just wonderful.

name: ross
dialogue: It really was.

name: rachel
dialogue: I woke up today with the biggest smile on my face.

name: ross
dialogue: I know, me too. It was... You know, it was like one of those    things you think is never going to happen, and then it does, and it's    everything you want it to be.

name: rachel
dialogue: Uh-huh. I know. It was just, it was just the perfect way to say goodbye.

name: monica
dialogue: It's just a little bit more, honey.

name: erica
dialogue: Help me! This hurts!

name: chandler
dialogue: Is it really that bad?

name: erica
dialogue: Uh-huh! I think it's time to kick you in the nuts and see which    is worse!

name: doctor
dialogue: The baby's head is crowning.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh! Oh my God! That is the most beautiful top of a head I have    ever seen! Chandler, you have to see this!

name: chandler
dialogue: I'm okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, you don't want to miss this. This is the birth of your    child! It's the miracle of life!

name: chandler
dialogue: Alright. Wow, that is one disgusting miracle.

name: doctor
dialogue: Start pushing. Here we go. Here come the shoulders...

name: monica
dialogue: It's a... It's a boy!

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow!

name: erica
dialogue: Is he okay?

name: doctor
dialogue: He's just fine.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, you did it!

name: chandler
dialogue: It's a baby! A beautiful little baby! And some   other stuff I'm going to pretend I don't see.

name: doctor
dialogue: Would you like to cut the umbilical cord?

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, that is spongy.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, hey handsome! Oh, I'm going to love you so much   that no woman is ever going to be good enough for you!  Oh, we are so lucky!

name: chandler
dialogue: I know. He has your eyes.

name: chandler
dialogue: I mean, I know that is not possible, but he does.

name: nurse
dialogue: We'll just get him cleaned up a bit.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God, he's beautiful. Thank you so much.

name: erica
dialogue: I'm really happy for you guys.

name: chandler
dialogue: How do you feel?

name: erica
dialogue: I'm tired!

name: doctor
dialogue: Well, you don't have that much time to relax. The other one    will be along in a minute.

name: monica
dialogue: I... I'm sorry, who should be along in a what now?

name: doctor
dialogue: The next baby should be along in a minute.

name: monica
dialogue: We only ordered one!

name: doctor
dialogue: You know it's twins, right?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, yeah! These are the faces of two people in the know!

name: doctor
dialogue: I can't believe you didn't know it's twins! This has never    happened before.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, gosh. That makes me feel so special and good.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait, did you know it was twins?

name: doctor
dialogue: Yeah, it's here in the paperwork we got from the clinic in    Ohio.

name: monica
dialogue: Anybody tell you?

name: erica
dialogue: I don't think so. Although, they did mention something about    two heartbeats. But I thought that was just mine and the baby's. They    kept saying both heartbeats are really strong, and I thought well,    that is good Because I'm having a baby.

name: monica
dialogue: This is unbelievable.

name: erica
dialogue: Twins actually run in my family.

name: chandler
dialogue: Interesting!  Can I see you for a second?

name: chandler
dialogue: What do we do?

name: monica
dialogue: What do you mean "what do we do"?

name: chandler
dialogue: Twins! Twins!!

name: monica
dialogue: Chandler, you are panicking!

name: chandler
dialogue: Uh-huh! Join me, won't you?! Okay, what do you say we keep   one, and then just like have an option on the other one?

name: monica
dialogue: We can't split them up!

name: chandler
dialogue: Why not? We could give each of them half a medallion, and    then years later, they'll find each other and be reunited. I mean,    that is a great day for everybody.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, what if the person who adopts the other one is horrible?

name: chandler
dialogue: What if they're not? What if it's adopted by a king?

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, because I hear the king is looking to adopt.

name: chandler
dialogue: Monica, we are not ready to have two babies!

name: monica
dialogue: That doesn't matter! We have waited so long for this. I don't    care if it's two babies. I don't care if it's three babies! I don't    care if the entire cast of "Eight is Enough" comes out of there! We    are taking them home, because they are our children!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay. Shh...

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay!

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay!

name: doctor
dialogue: It looks like we're about ready over here.

name: doctor
dialogue: Come on, Erica, start pushing again now.

name: erica
dialogue: Ow!

name: doctor
dialogue: Here she comes!

name: chandler
dialogue: She? It's a girl?

name: doctor
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, now we have one of each!     And that is enough!

name: ross
dialogue: And then she said it was the perfect way to say goodbye.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God! What did you say?

name: ross
dialogue: Nothing! What do you say to that?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, you've got to tell her how you feel!

name: ross
dialogue: No way!

name: joey
dialogue: You can't just give up! Is that what a dinosaur would do?

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Dude, I'm just trying to speak your language.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, Rachel doesn't know that you want to get back together. If    she did, she might feel differently. She might not even go.

name: ross
dialogue: You really think so?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm telling you! Oh, okay! This is the part of the musical    where there'd be a really good convincing song.  "Bam-bam,    don't take no for an answer. Bam-bam, don't let love fly away.    Bam-bam-bam-bam..."

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Can't a girl finish a song around here?

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! So I just dropped Emma off at my mom's.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, you are not taking her with you tonight?

name: rachel
dialogue: No, we decided that I would go ahead and set up first, and    then my mom would bring Emma to Paris on Sunday.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wow, eight hour flight with a one-year old? Good luck, mom.

name: rachel
dialogue: Are you kidding? Eight hours with my mother talking about    Atkins? Good luck, Emma!

name: ross
dialogue: Alright, you know what? you are right. I should at least tell her   how I feel.

name: joey
dialogue: Ross, wait!

name: ross
dialogue: What? What?

name: joey
dialogue: Could you get me a muffin?

name: gunther
dialogue: Rachel?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah?

name: gunther
dialogue: I... I know you are leaving tonight, but I just have to tell   you. I love you.

name: gunther
dialogue: I... I don't know if that changes your plans at all, but I   thought you should know.

name: rachel
dialogue: Gunther... Oh... I love you too. Probably not in the   same way, but I do. And, and when I'm in a cafe, having coffee, or I   see a man with hair brighter than the sun, I'll think of you. Aw.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh... Bye guys.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Unbelievable!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, you know what might help?

name: ross
dialogue: I'm not getting you a muffin!

name: monica
dialogue: Do you think they recognize each other from in there?

name: chandler
dialogue: Maybe. Unless they're like two people who have lived in    apartments next to each other for years, and then one day they're    pushed through a vagina and they meet.

name: nurse
dialogue: We're going to take Erica to recovery now.

name: monica
dialogue: There's something that we want to tell you. We decided to name    the girl-baby Erica.

name: erica
dialogue: Oh my God, that is just like my name!

name: monica
dialogue: Son of a gun, it is!

name: erica
dialogue: Anyway, I'm going to go and get some rest. I'm really glad I    picked you guys. you are going to make great parents. Even Chandler.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, well, bye!

name: erica
dialogue: Bye!

name: chandler
dialogue: Bye!

name: monica
dialogue: We'll call you!

name: erica
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Have fun at church-camp!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, look at these little bunnies!

name: chandler
dialogue: I know! You ready to trade?

name: monica
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright, let's see..

name: chandler
dialogue: We could trade later.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, I'm good.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, what are you working on?

name: joey
dialogue: It's a... It's a "welcome home" sign for the baby.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How sweet! Oh, is that the baby?

name: joey
dialogue: No, I sat in the paint.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey. So, did you talk to Rachel?

name: ross
dialogue: No, and I'm not going to.

name: phoebe
dialogue: What?

name: joey
dialogue: Why not?

name: ross
dialogue: Because she's just going to shoot me down. You guys saw what    happened with Gunther. That did not look like fun.

name: phoebe
dialogue: How can you compare yourself to Gunther? I mean, sure, he's    sexy in a more obvious way. You have a relationship with her, you    slept together last night.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, and she still wants to go! It's pretty clear where she is.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, I know what you mean. I mean, sometimes...

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh, Joe?

name: joey
dialogue: Damn it!

name: ross
dialogue: Look, even if I were going to tell her, I don't have to do it now.    Okay? I'll be seeing her again. We've got time.

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, you don't! She's going to Paris! She is going to meet    somebody. Do you know how many hot guys there are in Paris? It's...    It's a city of Gunther's!

name: mike
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey! What do you have there?

name: mike
dialogue: Oh, I made a little something. If I had more time to work on it,    it'd be better, but..

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God! You did that yourself?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Honey, that is gorgeous!

name: joey
dialogue: You know, the baby can't read, Mike!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! You guys, the car-service just got here. I can't believe   they're not home yet! I have to catch my stupid plane. I want to see the   baby!

name: joey
dialogue: Monica just called from the cab. She said they should be here   any minute. And apparently, there's some big surprise.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, did she sound happy about it? Because my friend Ethel's   baby was born with a teeny, tiny beard.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hi! Oh my gosh!

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey.

name: phoebe, ross, rachel
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, so what is the big surprise?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: rachel
dialogue: What... What...

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, okay, awkward question. The hospital knows you took two,    right?

name: monica
dialogue: Yes, it's twins!

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, they're so cute! Now, what, what kinds are they?

name: monica
dialogue: This is a boy,  and that is a girl.

name: chandler
dialogue: Her name is Erica.

name: rachel
dialogue: Aw..

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, that pregnant girl's name was Erica.

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah. It's a shame you two didn't get to spend more time   together.

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, we named the boy Jack after dad.

name: ross
dialogue: Aw, he's going to be so happy.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh, Jack Bing. I love that. Ooh, it sounds like a '40s   newspaper guy, you know? "Jack Bing, Morning Gazette. I'm going to blow   this story wide open!"

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my gosh. Wow, so beautiful.

name: mike
dialogue: I want one.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Oh yeah? Well, tell me which one, and I'll try slip it in my   coat.

name: mike
dialogue: Seriously. want to make one of those?

name: phoebe
dialogue: One? How about a whole bunch?

name: mike
dialogue: Really?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah! Ooh, we could teach them to sing, and we can be like the   Von Trapp family! Only without the Nazis. Although that sounds kind of   dull.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, you guys, I can't believe this. But I'll leave now, or I'm   going to miss my plane.

name: monica
dialogue: I'm just so glad you got to see the babies.

name: rachel
dialogue: Me too. Oh, I'm just sorry I'm not going to be around to watch   you two attempt to handle this! Alright, I can't say goodbye to you   guys again. I love you all so much.

name: monica
dialogue: I love you.

name: chandler
dialogue: I love you.

name: monica
dialogue: Call us when you get there.

name: rachel
dialogue: I will. Ross, come here.

name: rachel
dialogue: I just want you to know.. Last night.. I'll never forget it.

name: ross
dialogue: Neither will I.

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright, now I really have to go. Okay. Au revoir! Oh, they're    going to really hate me over there.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, you just let her go?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah.

name: joey
dialogue: Hey, maybe that is for the best.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. You know? You just... Look, you got to... You got to think    about last night the way she does, okay? Maybe, maybe sleeping    together was the perfect way to say goodbye?

name: phoebe
dialogue: But now she'll never know how he feels!

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe that is okay. You know? Maybe, maybe it is better this way?    I mean, now, now you can move on. I mean, you've been trying to for so   long, maybe now that you are on different continents..  Right?

name: joey
dialogue: Maybe now you can actually do it. You know? You can finally get   over her.

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, that is true. Except I don't want to get over her.

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't! I want to be with her.

name: joey
dialogue: Really?

name: ross
dialogue: Yeah, I'm going to go after her.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, you are!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Woo!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Wait, wait! Get your coat! Get your coat!

name: ross
dialogue: My coat...

name: joey
dialogue: This is so cool!

name: chandler
dialogue: I have no idea what's going on, but I am excited!

name: joey
dialogue: But Ross, Ross. What do you, what do you think she's going to   say?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't know, but I.. Look, even if she shoots me down, at least   I won't spend the rest of my life wondering what would have happened.   Where - where is my coat?!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You didn't bring one! My cab's downstairs, I'll drive you to   the airport.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, guys, wish me luck.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hurry!

name: joey
dialogue: Good luck, good luck!

name: ross
dialogue: There's no seatbelt!

name: phoebe
dialogue: that is okay. If - if we hit anything, the engine will explode,    so you know, it's better if you are thrown from the car.

name: ross
dialogue: Alright, alright, let's do this!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay!

name: ross
dialogue: Hey!

name: man
dialogue: 18th and East End.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I - I don't take passengers.

name: man
dialogue: Hey! The law says you have to accept any fare.

name: ross
dialogue: No, you don't understand. This isn't a real cab.

name: man
dialogue: Alright, I got to report you. What's your medallion number?

name: phoebe
dialogue: My medallion number is, "Get out of the cab!"

name: man
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Get out of the cab!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Get out of the cab!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, hey, hey, can I give you guys your house-warming present    now?

name: monica
dialogue: Now, that you can do.

name: joey
dialogue: Alright!

name: joey
dialogue: Ah... Chick Jr.? Duck Jr.? Don't hide from mama!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You can open your eyes now.

name: ross
dialogue: Are we off the bridge?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes.

name: ross
dialogue: Is the old woman on the bicycle still alive?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yes, she jumped right back up.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God, Phoebe, slow down!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Do you want to get to Rachel in time?

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, but I don't want to die in your cab!

name: phoebe
dialogue: You should have thought of that before you got in!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Toll-booth.

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Toll-booth! Four bucks. There are quarters in the    glove compartment.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hurry!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Damn, that window is clean.

name: joey
dialogue: Quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack,   quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, tweet, quack...

name: chandler
dialogue: We were wondering what was taking so long with the gift, but   now we understand you were doing this.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, I wanted to surprise you, but for your house-warming gift,   I got you a baby-chick and a baby-duck!

name: chandler
dialogue: Really? You got us a chick and a duck?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, great! Just what you want for a new house with infants.   Bird feces.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, yeah, they must have jumped off the table, Because now   they're gone!

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, don't worry, we'll find them.

name: monica
dialogue: Actually, I'm going to go check on the twins.

name: chandler
dialogue: Alright.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh God! What did I just step on?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh!

name: chandler
dialogue: It's okay, it's just an egg roll.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh..

name: joey
dialogue: You stepped on my egg roll?

name: monica
dialogue: I'm sorry, I didn't know to look for Chinese food on the    floor.

name: joey
dialogue: Just put it on a plate and leave.

name: chandler
dialogue: Okay, let's find these birds.

name: joey
dialogue: Alright.

name: joey
dialogue: Wait, wait. Do you hear that?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh! They're in the table!

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, that can't be good!

name: joey
dialogue: We got to get them out of there!

name: chandler
dialogue: How?

name: joey
dialogue: Oh, oh! Maybe we can lure them out. You know any birdcalls?

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, tons, I'm quite the woodsman.

name: joey
dialogue: Well, maybe we can just tip the table a little.

name: chandler
dialogue: Joey, wait! The ball!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh!

name: joey
dialogue: Oh God! So what do we do?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know. Maybe we can open this up somehow.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay.

name: chandler
dialogue: No... It's all glued together.

name: joey
dialogue: Does that mean we have to bust it open?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know. Maybe.

name: joey
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: chandler
dialogue: I know! It's.. It's the foosball table.

name: joey
dialogue: All right, you know what? We don't have a choice. It's like I would    have said in that sci-fi movie if I'd gotten the part. "Those are our    men in there, we have to get them out! Even if I have to sacrifice the    most important thing in my life; my time-machine."

name: chandler
dialogue: Did that movie ever get made?

name: joey
dialogue: It did not.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Ross, where are you going?

name: ross
dialogue: To talk to Rachel, isn't that why we took a ride in the    death-cab?

name: phoebe
dialogue: What? What are you just going to walk up to her at the gate? Have    you never chased anyone through the airport before?

name: ross
dialogue: Not since my cop-show got cancelled.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You have to get a ticket to get past security.

name: ross
dialogue: What? We're never going to make it!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Not with that attitude! Now, haul ass!

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, if you could all walk slower, that'd be great.

name: gate attendant #1
dialogue: Madame, your passport    please?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God! I was so afraid I wasn't going to remember any of my    high-school French, but I understood every word you just said!

name: gate attendant #1
dialogue: Your boarding pass, please.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, shoot. I had it. Oh, I can't believe this.

name: gate attendant #1
dialogue: Madame, if you don't have your boarding pass...

name: rachel
dialogue: I have it, I have it, I have it. Oh, okay, I can't find it,    but I remember that I was in seat 32C, because that is my bra-size.

name: gate attendant #1
dialogue: Madame, you must have your boarding pass..

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, fine! But you know what? If I was in 36D, we would not  be having this problem.

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, I need a ticket.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Just one? I drive you all the way down here, and I don't get    to see how it works out?

name: ross
dialogue: Fine, two tickets, I need two tickets.

name: phoebe
dialogue: We're on our honeymoon.

name: ticket agent
dialogue: And the destination?

name: ross
dialogue: I don't care. Whatever is the cheapest.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm so lucky I married you.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh! Shoot! Damn it! Where is it? Oh! Oh! I found it! I found    it!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hah! I found it! I told you I would find it! In your face!  you are a different person.

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, flight 421 to Paris. I don't see it, do you see it?

name: phoebe
dialogue: No, did we miss it?

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, no. that is impossible. It doesn't leave for another 20    minutes.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Maybe we have the flight-number wrong. God.

name: monica
dialogue: Hello.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, it's me. Here's Ross.

name: ross
dialogue: What? Hey, hey, listen..

name: monica
dialogue: Oh my God! Ross, you wouldn't believe the cute little noises    the twins are making. Listen.

name: ross
dialogue: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry. Shoot, they were doing it before.

name: ross
dialogue: that is alright. Listen, listen.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, wait, wait, wait! Here they go again.

name: ross
dialogue: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

name: monica
dialogue: Isn't that cute?

name: ross
dialogue: That is precious! Listen! I need Rachel's flight information.

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, okay. Alright, it's flight 421. Leaves at 8

name: ross
dialogue: Yes, that is what I have. It's not on the board.

name: monica
dialogue: that is what it says here. Flight 421, leaves at 8

name: ross
dialogue: What?

name: monica
dialogue: Newark airport. Why, where are you?

name: ross
dialogue: JFK.

name: joey
dialogue: Don't worry, you guys, we're going to get you out of    there.

name: chandler
dialogue: And we're also going to buy you tiny, bird hearing-aids.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. Here goes.

name: chandler
dialogue: What's the matter?

name: joey
dialogue: I need to say goodbye to the table first.

name: chandler
dialogue: I understand.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay. Table, you have given us so many great times. And you    guys, Jordan, Victor, Joel... All of you guys. What can I say? You    guys make us look good. You want to say anything?

name: chandler
dialogue: I don't know. Except that, for one last time...  Good game, good game, good game,    good game, good game, good game, good game.

name: joey
dialogue: Okay, here we go. I can't do it.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, I can't do it either.

name: monica
dialogue: Hey! Did you find them?

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, they're stuck inside the table!

name: chandler
dialogue: We have to bust it open, but neither of us can do it!

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, well sure. This got to be so hard. I'll do it. give me!

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe! Wow! No, no, no!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Well, I've never gone this fast before.

name: ross
dialogue: Phoebe, forget it, okay? Newark is - is like an hour away.    There's no way we're going to make it in time.

name: phoebe
dialogue: She's got her cell, you could call her.

name: ross
dialogue: I am not doing this over the phone.

name: phoebe
dialogue: You don't have any other choice!

name: rachel
dialogue: Hello?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Rachel? Oh, good. Hey, by the way, did you just get on the    plane?

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah.

name: phoebe
dialogue: For what it's worth, we would have caught her if we were at the right airport.

name: ross
dialogue: Yay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uh, Rach, hang on.

name: rachel
dialogue: Phoebe? Is everything okay?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Uhm, actually no. No, you've... You have to get off the plane.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? Why?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I have this feeling that something's wrong with it. Something    is wrong with the left Phalange.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, honey, I'm sure there's nothing wrong with the plane.

name: rachel
dialogue: Alright, look, I have to go. I love you, and I will call you    the minute I get to Paris.

name: passenger #1
dialogue: Uhm, what was that?

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, that was just my crazy friend. She told me I should get    off the plane, because she had a feeling that there was something    wrong with the left Phalange.

name: passenger #1
dialogue: Okay, that doesn't sound good.

name: rachel
dialogue: I wouldn't worry about it. She's always coming up with stuff    like this, and you know what? She's almost never right.

name: passenger #1
dialogue: But she is sometimes.

name: rachel
dialogue: Well...

name: rachel
dialogue: Wait, what are you doing?

name: passenger #1
dialogue: Well, I can't take this plane now.

name: air stewardess
dialogue: Excuse me, sir, where are you going?

name: passenger #1
dialogue: I have to get off this plane, okay? Her friend has a    feeling something's wrong with the left Phalange.

name: rachel
dialogue: Could I get some peanuts?

name: passenger #2
dialogue: What's wrong with the plane?

name: air stewardess
dialogue: There's nothing wrong with the plane.

name: passenger #1
dialogue: Yeah! The left Phalange!

name: air stewardess
dialogue: There is no Phalange!

name: passenger #1
dialogue: Oh my God. This plane doesn't even have a Phalange!

name: passenger #2
dialogue: I'm not flying on it!

name: air stewardess
dialogue: Ma'am, please sit down!

name: passenger #3
dialogue: What's going on?

name: passenger #1
dialogue: We're all getting off. There is no Phalange!

name: rachel
dialogue: This is ridiculous! I...

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah, okay.

name: monica
dialogue: Alright. My job here is done.

name: chandler
dialogue: That was... Impressive.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah, you didn't even use the tools for most of it!

name: monica
dialogue: Yeah, they were just slowing me down. Alright, I have to get    back to the babies. I'll see you girls later.

name: chandler
dialogue: Sorry about the table, man.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: You going to buy a new one?

name: joey
dialogue: Probably not. Nah. I don't know how much I'm going to want to play    after you go.

name: chandler
dialogue: Well, at least we got these little guys out.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah.

name: chandler
dialogue: Aww, we were worried about you! Hm. I guess I better get    used to things crapping in my hand, huh?

name: joey
dialogue: I'm going to miss these little guys. It was nice having birds    around again.

name: chandler
dialogue: Hey, you know what? Maybe we should keep them here with you.

name: joey
dialogue: What?

name: chandler
dialogue: Yeah, I mean we've got a lot going on right now. And, plus,    here they'd have their own room.

name: joey
dialogue: I could get a goose!

name: chandler
dialogue: You know, I - I think you are set with the poultry.

name: joey
dialogue: Thanks man. Did you hear that, you guys? you are going to get to    stay here! And, and it's good, you know, Because, Because now you have a    reason to come visit.

name: chandler
dialogue: I think there may be another reason. So, awkward hug or lame    cool guy handshake?

name: joey
dialogue: Uh, lame cool guy handshake, yeah.

name: gate attendant #2
dialogue: Ma'am, I assure you, the plane is fine.

name: passenger #2
dialogue: And you fixed the Phalange?

name: gate attendant #2
dialogue: Yes, the Phalange is fixed. As a matter of fact, we    put a whole lot of extra Phalanges onboard, just in case.

name: ross
dialogue: Where is she?

name: phoebe
dialogue: I don't see her.

name: ross
dialogue: Rachel! Rachel Green!

name: phoebe
dialogue: There she is!

name: ross
dialogue: Rachel! Rachel!

name: gate attendant #2
dialogue: Wow, excuse me, sir, do you have a boarding pass?

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, I just have to talk to someone.

name: gate attendant #2
dialogue: I'm sorry, you cannot go any further without a    boarding pass.

name: ross
dialogue: No, no, no, but...

name: phoebe
dialogue: RACHEL!!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God... What.. What are you guys doing here?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Okay, you are on.

name: rachel
dialogue: What? What? Ross, you are scaring me. What's going on?

name: ross
dialogue: Okay, the thing is..

name: rachel
dialogue: Yeah?

name: ross
dialogue: Don't go.

name: rachel
dialogue: What?

name: ross
dialogue: Please, please stay with me. I am so in love with you. Please,    don't go.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh my God.

name: ross
dialogue: I know, I know. I shouldn't have waited 'till now to say it, but    I'm.. That was stupid, okay? I'm sorry, but I'm telling you now. I    love you. Do not get on this plane.

name: gate attendant #2
dialogue: Miss? Are you boarding the plane?

name: ross
dialogue: Hey, hey. I know you love me. I know you do.

name: gate attendant #2
dialogue: Miss?

name: rachel
dialogue: I - I have to get on the plane.

name: ross
dialogue: No, you don't.

name: rachel
dialogue: Yes, I do.

name: ross
dialogue: No, you don't.

name: rachel
dialogue: They're waiting for me, Ross. I can't do this right now, I'm    sorry. I'm sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: Rachel?

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm so sorry.

name: ross
dialogue: I really thought she'd stay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: I'm sorry.

name: monica
dialogue: Well, that is it. Everything's packed.

name: chandler
dialogue: Wow, this is weird.

name: monica
dialogue: I know.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. Uh, does this mean there's nothing to eat?

name: monica
dialogue: I put three lasagnas in your freezer.

name: joey
dialogue: I love you!

name: joey
dialogue: Hey!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey.

name: joey
dialogue: So did you guys make it in time?

name: phoebe
dialogue: Yeah, yeah, he talked to her, but she got on the plane anyway.

name: chandler
dialogue: Where's Ross?

name: phoebe
dialogue: He went home. He didn't want to see anybody.

name: rachel
dialogue: Ross, hi. It's me. I just got back    on the plane. And I just feel awful. That is so not how I wanted    things to end with us. It's just that I wasn't expecting to see you,    and all of a sudden you are there and saying these things... And... And    now I'm just sitting here and thinking of all the stuff I should have    said, and I didn't. I mean, I didn't even get to tell you that I love    you too. Because of course I do. I love you. I love you. I love you.    What am I doing? I love you! Oh, I've got to see you. I've got to get    off this plane.

name: ross
dialogue: Oh my God!

name: rachel
dialogue: Excuse me?

name: air stewardess
dialogue: Miss? Please, sit down!

name: rachel
dialogue: I'm sorry. I'm really sorry, but I    need to get off the plane, okay? I need to tell someone that I love    love them.

name: air stewardess
dialogue: Miss, I can't let you off    the plane.

name: ross
dialogue: Let her off the plane!

name: air stewardess
dialogue: I am afraid you are going to    have to take a seat.

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, please, miss, you don't    understand!

name: ross
dialogue: Try to understand!

name: rachel
dialogue: Oh, come on, miss, isn't there any    way that you can just let me off...

name: ross
dialogue: No! No! Oh my God. Did she get off the plane? Did she get off    the plane?

name: rachel
dialogue: I got off the plane.

name: ross
dialogue: You got off the plane.

name: rachel
dialogue: I do love you.

name: ross
dialogue: I love you too, and I'm never letting you go again.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. Because this is where I want to be, okay? No more messing    around. I don't want to mess this up again.

name: ross
dialogue: Me neither, okay? We are - we're done being stupid.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay. You and me, alright? This is it.

name: ross
dialogue: This is it. Unless we're on a break.

name: ross
dialogue: Don't make jokes now.

name: monica
dialogue: Okay, please be careful with that. It was my grandmother's. Be    careful.

name: monica
dialogue: If that falls off the truck, it wouldn't be the worst thing.

name: ross
dialogue: Wow.

name: rachel
dialogue: I know. It seems smaller somehow.

name: joey
dialogue: Has it always been purple?

name: chandler
dialogue: Look around, you guys. This was your first    home. And it was a happy place, filled with love and laughter. But    more important, because of rent control, it was a friggin' steal!

name: phoebe
dialogue: Hey, do you realise that at one time or another we all lived    in this apartment?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, yeah, that is true.

name: ross
dialogue: Uh, I haven't.

name: monica
dialogue: Wait a minute. What about that summer during college that you    lived with grandma, and you tried to make it as a dancer?

name: ross
dialogue: Do you realise we almost made it ten years without that coming    up?

name: monica
dialogue: Oh, honey, I forgot. I promised Treeger that we'd leave our    keys.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, okay.

name: phoebe
dialogue: So, I guess this is it.

name: joey
dialogue: Yeah. I guess so.

name: monica
dialogue: This is harder than I thought it would be.

name: chandler
dialogue: Oh, it's going to be okay.

name: rachel
dialogue: Do you guys have to go to the new house right away,    or do you have some time?

name: monica
dialogue: We got some time.

name: rachel
dialogue: Okay, should we get some coffee?

name: chandler
dialogue: Sure. Where?
